SA16hvsatssu:18: samyak śāstrecchayā gacchet gabhīrajñāninaṃ sa ca //
SA16hvsatssu:24: cirakālañca dharmasya sthitaye na tu kīrtaye //
SA16hvsatssu:30: (pṛ) nanu bhavatā satyasiddhiśāstraṃ vakṣyata iti jñātmasmābhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:35: (u) bhagavān prakṛtyā manuṣyabhūtaḥ sarvākārajñānena sarvadharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇavibhāgān prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:36: sarvākuśalavinirmuktaḥ sañcitasarvakuśalaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ [SSS_3] hitaiṣī cetyato buddha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:38: taṃ dharmaṃ ye pratipadyante te saṅgha ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:50: ājanma yo maitrīmabhyasyati tasyākuśalacittamudeti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:52: tathāgataścirasañcitakuśalasvabhāvaḥ, nātmatrāṇārthaṃ kintu apakīrtibhīrutayā saṃvaraśīlaṃ dhatte /
SA16hvsatssu:56: tathāgata imaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya sarvajñajñānaṃ labdhavān /
SA16hvsatssu:58: yathā ghṛtatailabahulaḥ pradīpaḥ vartikāmahimnā mahān prakāśate /
SA16hvsatssu:63: tathāgatasya samādhiḥ puruṣaṃ sthānaṃ dharmopadeśaṃ vā ityādipratyayagaṇān nopakṣate /
SA16hvsatssu:66: yathā kaścit ātmānaṃ saṃrakṣan sadā smarati na vismarati /
SA16hvsatssu:68: tadyathā kaścit svāvasaṃthaṃ prāpya vadati kṣemaprāptaḥ akhinna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:71: dhyānasamādhiprakampino [SSS_4] mahāprāmodyādayo dharmāḥ tathāgatasya sarve prahīṇāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:73: ṛddhividhinā ekasminneva kṣaṇe daśadikṣu apramāṇadhātuṣu parikrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:78: asukhe ca sukhasaṃjñotpadyate sukhāsukhe ca upekṣāsaṃjñotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:92: dhyānāvaraṇaṃ kleśotpāda iti dvividhāvidyā tathāgatasya sarvathā prahīṇā /
SA16hvsatssu:96: anye sattvā steṣu kauśalaṃ na saṃpādayāṃbabhūvuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:106: prajñāprakarṣāt prakṛṣṭeryāpathaśca bhavati ityādibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ prajñāskandhasampannaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:112: yathā kaścit vṛkṣaṃ chettuṃ haste dhṛtakuṭhāraḥ pāryantikaṃ jānānaḥ prajānāti śākhāḥ praśākhāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:113: tathā bhagavānapi saṃyojanaprahāṇajñānasya pratikṣaṇaṃ kṣīyamāṇaṃ sarvamavayavaśaḥ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:117: kiñca bhagavān kālaṃ jñātvā dharmamupadiśati yathā timburukabrāhmaṇādinām /
SA16hvsatssu:120: yathā bhagavānānandamāmantrya chandakasya yogyaṃ bhāvābhāvavyāvartakaṃ sūtramupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:122: kiñcopāyakuśalaḥ sattvamalaṃ hāpayati yathā nandasya kāmaprajihīrṣāyai [dharma]mupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:123: sattvānāñca śraddhendriyādiparipākaṃ jñātvā paścāt dharmamupadiśati yathā rāhulasya /
SA16hvsatssu:124: kecit sattvāḥ karmavipākāvṛtāḥ na vimuktiṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:126: kecit sattvāḥ kālapakṣye kṣīṇāsravā bhavanti yathā jāyāpatisūtra upadiṣṭam /
SA16hvsatssu:127: kecit sattvāḥ puruṣaviśeṣamapekṣya kṣīṇāsravāḥ bhavanti yathā śāriputra aśvajitamapekṣya /
SA16hvsatssu:128: kecit sattvā deśamapekṣya kṣīṇāsravāḥ yathā rājā pukkasātiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:129: kecit sattvā satīrthyamapekṣya [SSS_6] kṣīṇāsravāḥ yathā gopāla nandaḥ ajitagrāmīṇādīnapekṣya /
SA16hvsatssu:130: kecit sattvā bhagavataḥ tāttvikakāyamapekṣya nirmitakāya ñcāpekṣya kṣīṇāsravā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:132: kiñca bhagavān vividhān saddharmānupadiya sarvān vimuktyāvaraṇadharmān paribhedayati ato vimuktijñānadarśanasampanna ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:136: bhagavān satvānāṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ kuśalamūla ñca jñātvā kramaśo dharmamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:137: bhagavān vimuktiṃ pratyakṣīkṛtya parasyopaśati na parataḥśratvā /
SA16hvsatssu:140: tathā jinaśāsanamapi pratipakṣakalāpamukhena sarvān kleśān vyāvartayati /
SA16hvsatssu:141: yathā navasaṃjñādīn mahatyo 'lpā vā saṃyojanā na punaḥ kṣapayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:144: kadācit sukumāravacanaiḥ kadācit kaṭuvacanaiḥ kadācit punaḥ sukumārakaṭuvacanaiśca /
SA16hvsatssu:153: asmāt īdṛśaṃ phalaṃ bhavati na tādṛśam /
SA16hvsatssu:154: ayamācāraḥ akuśalo 'vayaṃ duḥkhavipākaḥ na sukhavipāka iti jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:159: yathā yavādyava eva jāyate na brīhyādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:161: sthānāsthānabalena karmādīnāṃ jñānāt idaṃ balamatigahanaṃ paramaṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ na prāptuṃ śakyam /
SA16hvsatssu:162: jātadharmasya hetusamanantarādhipatipratyayān pratyāyayatītyata idaṃ balaṃ praṇītam /
SA16hvsatssu:163: (2) yat atitānāgatapratyutpannāni karmāṇi sarvadharmasamādānāni ca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:164: teṣāṃ sthānaṃ prajānāti vastu prajānāti hetuṃ prajānāti vipākañca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:169: ato bhagavataḥ teṣāṃ kathanaṃ balaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:172: kecit kuśalakarmavanto dṛṣṭe duḥkhavedanāḥ yathā śīlaṃ dhṛtvā kleśānanubhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:173: kecitpāpakarmāṇaḥ dṛṣṭe sukhavedanāḥ yathā śīlaṃ bhitvā svairaṃ caranti /
SA16hvsatssu:174: ataḥ kecit saṃśerate anāgatādhvāpi pratyutpannasama iti /
SA16hvsatssu:177: catvāri dharmasamādānāni pratyutpannaṃ duḥkhaṃ āyatyāṃ sukhavipākam,
SA16hvsatssu:181: bhagavān saṃprati āyatyāñca [teṣāṃ] sthānaṃ, vastu, hetuṃ vipākañca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:185: yathoktaṃ sūtre pūrvañca pramuditacittaḥ dānakāle ca viśuddhacitto dattvā ca yanna vipratisarati /
SA16hvsatssu:187: bhagavāneva prajānāti taratamaṃ karma yadi niyatamaniyataṃ vā dṛṣṭavipākam upapadyavipākaṃ tadūrdhvavipākaṃ vā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:191: bhagavān sarvadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ saṃkleśaṃ prajānāti sthitiṃ prajānāti upacayaṃ prajānāti vyavadānañca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:192: tatra dhyānaṃ nāma catvāri dhyānāni catvāra ārūpyasamādhayaśca /
SA16hvsatssu:197: samāpattayaścaturdhā vibhaktāḥ saṃkleśataḥ sthitita upacayato vyavadānataśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:212: atha śraddhāpratipat dharmapratipat iti dvividho mārgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:218: prājñajanā viśiṣṭendriyā adhimuktita upakṛtā średdhendriyapradhānāśca bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:224: tathāgato yathādhimukti pratipattiṃ prajānāti yadutāyaṃ sattvaḥ pañcakāmanāsvadhimuktaḥ bhāvanāmārge bādhimukta ityevaṃ viditvā yathārhaṃ dharmamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:227: sattvānāṃ yat dīrghakālamabhyasya abhirocate sa dhātuḥ sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:230: kecit sattvāḥ svabhāvataḥ pravṛttarāgāḥ kecit dṛṣṭaṃ pratītya pravṛttarāgāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:233: imāṃ pratipadaṃ pratipanno naraka utpadyate yāvatsvarge iti ca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:241: idānīṃ vivicyocyate īdṛśakarmaṇā narakaṃ yāti, īdṛśakarmaṇā nirvāṇaṃ prāpnoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:242: narakapratitasyāpi pravibhāgo 'sti anena karmaṇā sañjīvanarake patiṣyati,
SA16hvsatssu:244: atastathāgataḥ saptamabale sthitaḥ sukṣmaṃ karma prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:248: tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ pūrvamācaritāṃ pratipadaṃ jñātvā dharmamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:250: tathāgato 'tītaṃ sarvamupapattisthānaṃ rūpadhātau vā ārupyadhātau vā ityanusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:255: tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati anāgatādhvani tribhavasantānān trividhāni karmāṇi caturdharmasamādānāni ca jñātvā vyākaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:258: sattvā āyuṣonte kecit sasantānā bhavanti, kecit nivṛttasantānā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:274: eṣu caturṣu yadi kaścidāgatya yathā dharmaṃ codayet /
SA16hvsatssu:280: tathāgato vyākaroti āntarāyikamāntarāyikamārgadharmān yadutākuśalaṃ sāsravaṃ kuśalañca /
SA16hvsatssu:295: keṣāñcitpuruṣāṇāṃ jñāne satyapi vyākaraṇakauśalābhāvāt parapuruṣāṇāṃ vijayo vaiśāradyam /
SA16hvsatssu:305: ya ājanma paritrastaḥ sa paścāt kiñcit jñānaṃ labdhvā viśārado bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:306: kiṃ punarbhagavān sudūrakālāt mahodāracittaḥ sarvākārābhisambodhiñca labdhvā bibheṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:308: tatra na kaścidasti yaṃ tathāgato na vijitavān / ato viśāradaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:310: yo vādī vacanakuśalaḥ arthakuśalaśca sa viśāradaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:316: sarvasūtrāṇi sarvaśāstrāṇi ca pratividhya praśnavisarjanaṃ paridīpayatīti viśāradaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:317: kecitpunaḥ kule gotre rūpe śīlabāhuśrutyajñānādiṣu vā vikalā ityataḥ sāvadyaṃ śāstramadhigacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:321: yathāvocat asurabrāhmaṇo bhagavantam- yathābhūtadharmavādī durjayo duṣprakampaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:324: yaḥ punaścaturbhirvāda dharmaiḥ samanvitaḥ so 'pi durjayaḥ duṣprakampaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:329: devamanuṣyā api taṃ na jetuṃ śaknuvanti ityato viśāradaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:330: yaśca kalyāṇamitramanupasevya vādaṃ karoti sa sukampaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:331: tathāgatastu dīpaṅkarādiṣu apramāṇabuddheṣu pūrvamevābhyastavādadharmā ityato na prakampyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:341: śāstraṃ puna dvividhaṃ tattvaśāstraṃ śaṭhaśāstram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:347: tīrthikānāṃ śāstrāṇi sahetvābhāsāni na sahetukāni iti na vijayasamarthāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:348: bhagavataḥ sūtrāṇi pariśuddhapravacanārthagatikāni tattvalakṣaṇāvilomakāni na tīrthikīyasamānāni /
SA16hvsatssu:351: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantyāha mā bhikṣavo mama vacanādhimuktikā bhavata /
SA16hvsatssu:355: prātarvo dharmaṃ bhāṣamāṇe mayi sāyaṃ mārga labhedhvam /
SA16hvsatssu:366: bhagavān sattvānāmuttamo mahān iti alpajñānāṃ śāstraṃ jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:368: tīrthikānāṃ śāstraṃ yāṃ kāñcit dṛṣṭimupādāya pravṛttam /
SA16hvsatssu:376: tathāgatastu sarvākārajñaḥ sarvadharmajñaḥ sarvaparaśāstrāṇāṃ dārako na paraśāstrairdāryo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:387: sa śrāvakaḥ śāstā kṣayajñānasampanna ityataḥ sarvāṇi vaiśāradyāni sāmānyata uktāni /
SA16hvsatssu:388: (pṛ) sattvāḥ kasmāt saṃśerate tathāgato 'sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:390: tadyathā bhagavān pratyāha- kuto yūyamāgacchatha ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:391: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaḥ kaścit nagaraṃ praviśya tannāma nāgarikān pṛcchati /
SA16hvsatssu:393: śrotāsya sūtrasya saṃśete tathāgato 'sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:395: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānāha svāgataṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ anena [SSS_14] kāyena mahārthalābhāya mama śāsanamanuvartadhvam /
SA16hvsatssu:398: yathoktam- tvaṃ khalu devadatta śavabhūtaḥ kheṭāśano 'si /
SA16hvsatssu:401: yathātmānamadhikṛtyāha ahaṃ pariṣadi siṃhakalpo daśabalaiścaturbhirvaiśāradyaiśca samanvitaḥ mahāpariṣadi siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:404: āha ca devadattam- nāhaṃ dadāmi saṅghaṃ śāriputramaugdalyāyanādibhyo 'pi kiṃ punardāsyāmi tubhyam /
SA16hvsatssu:406: alpajñā imāni vacanāni śrutvā vadanti tathāgatasyasravā akṣīṇā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:414: ato 'lpajñāḥ saṃśerate āryamārgaḥ saṃyojanānāṃ na kṣayakṛta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:419: yathā laukikā jānanto 'pi praṣṭāro na duṣyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:421: laukikā anāsaṅgacittā api āsaṅgikalpaṃ vadanti īdṛśamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:423: kāmā nāntarāyikadharmā iti sati vacane tatra tathāgata upadiśati kāmā vastuta āntarāyikadharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:424: yasya kāmāścittagatāḥ sa na mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:425: ato 'vaśyaṃ kāmān pūrvaṃ parityajya paścānmārgaṃ spṛśati /
SA16hvsatssu:426: āpattidharme satyapi [SSS_15] mārgaḥprāpyata iti brūvato 'vaśyaṃ paribhinne 'pyāpattidharme mārgo na prāpyate /
SA16hvsatssu:428: tasya gurupratyayatvāt bhagavān punaḥkhayamāśrāvayet nāstyāpattidharmo vināśayitum iti /
SA16hvsatssu:430: ayaṃ mārgaḥ sarvasaṃyojanānuśayānāṃ vināśakaḥ, asampannatvāttu na vināśayituṃ prabhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:437_0: atha sūtra uktaṃ- tathāgatādīnāṃ daśa guṇāḥ yaduta tathāgataḥ arhan samyak sambuddho
SA16hvsatssu:437_1: vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavit anuttarapuruṣadaumyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ
SA16hvsatssu:438: tathāgata iti yathābhūtamārgayānena saṃsādhitasamyaksambodhitvāt tathāgata ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:439: yadyadupadiśati sarvaṃ tattvameva bhavati na mṛṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:445: atrāntarāle yat bhāṣate tat satyameva bhavati nānyathā /
SA16hvsatssu:447: sarvākārasarvajñajñānena pūrvāparaṃ parīkṣya paścādupadiśatītyata upadiṣṭaṃ satyameva bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:448: kiñca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ smṛtirdṛḍhā bhavati na muṣitā /
SA16hvsatssu:449: kecidanumāya yadupadiśaṃti tat kadācit sūtrānuyāyi bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:451: tairupadiṣṭhaṃ lābhāya vā bhavati hānāya vā /
SA16hvsatssu:452: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anumāturvacanaṃ lābhāya kadācit bhavati hānāya vā kadācit /
SA16hvsatssu:458: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān sattvānāṃ cittaprāmodyamadhimukti ñca prajñāya mārgamupadiśati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:461: yathoktaṃ kiṃśukaśirṣaka sūtre yo dharma upadeśārhaḥ tamupadiśati saṃkṣepato vistarato vā skandhāyatanādimukhena iti /
SA16hvsatssu:463: atha punardharmāvavādo dvividhaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ paramārthata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:464: tathāgata idaṃ satyadvayaṃ niśrityopadiśatītyata upadiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ tattvaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:465: bhagavān nopadiśati yat saṃvṛtisatyaṃ tat paramārthasatyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:466: na ca yat paramārthasatyaṃ tat saṃvṛtisatyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:468: atha tathāgatena yadi vā saṃvriyate yadi vā vivriyate tadubhayamapyaviruddham /
SA16hvsatssu:469: yat saṃvaraṇāya bhavati na tat vibriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:470: yat vivaraṇāya bhavati na tat saṃvriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:475: santi ca caturvidhā avavādāḥ darśanaśravaṇamananidhyaptidharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:476: bhagavāneṣu caturṣu dharmeṣu yadyadupadiśati tat sarvaṃ cittavyavadānāya bhavati nāsaṅgāya /
SA16hvsatssu:478: eṣu pañcasu bhagavān sambuddhaḥ san vyaktaramabhijñāyopadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:486: anityatādinā dharmān samyak bhāvayataḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:489: pūrvāntāparāntayośca nāsti santatiriti samyak pratisambudhyata iti samyak sambuddha iti nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:491: anye 'pi puruṣā anādisaṃsāre dānādīn dharmānācaranti na samyagācarantīti na sugata ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:492: bhagavān punardānādicaryāḥ samyaṅmārgeṇa caritavāniti sugata ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:501: kecit vicikitsante kathaṃ manuṣyeṇa devā avavadituṃ śakyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:502: ata āha- ahaṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ śāstā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:503: buddha iti atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtasakṣayākṣayāṇāṃ sthūlasūkṣmādīnāṃ vā sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇām /
SA16hvsatssu:504: bodhimūle niṣadya avidyāmiddhamavidhya sarvajñānojvalitāṃ mahābodhiṃ labdhavāniti buddhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:505: evaṃ navabhirguṇaiḥ sampanna triṣu adhvasu daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu ca pūjya iti bhagavān /
SA16hvsatssu:506: bhagavān daśanāmasampannaḥ svātmasampadā parasampadā ca ātmānamupakaroti parāṃścopakarotītyato 'bhivandyaḥ //
SA16hvsatssu:511: na hi santi tathāgatasya kāyikavācikamānasikaduścaritāni yāni[tathāgato rakṣitu]micchet mā paro drakṣyāt mā ca jñāsīt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:512: anyeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ santi kadācidavyākṛtābhāsāni kāyikavācikamānasikaduścaritāni vidvadgarhaṇīyāni /
SA16hvsatssu:520: tathāgataḥ kāyena subhāvitavān śīlasamādhiprajñā stattulyān dharmāśca /
SA16hvsatssu:521: ataḥ sarvāṇyakuśalāni akuśalābhāsāni ca karmāṇi sarvathā parikṣīṇāni /
SA16hvsatssu:524: tathāgataḥ sadā śīlamācarati adhimuktito na durgatipatanabhayādinā /
SA16hvsatssu:525: tathāgatasya ca sarvāṇi kāyikavācikamānasikakarmāṇi paropakārāya bhavanti iti nākuśalāni /
SA16hvsatssu:529: dharma upadiśyamāne yadi śrotā ekāgracitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:536: sarvadharmāṇāmatyantaśūnyatāṃ jñātavāniti na daurmanasyaṃ na vā saumanasyam /
SA16hvsatssu:537: susañcitamahākaruṇācittatvāt tathāgataḥ kuśale akuśale ca vinā saumanasyadaurmanasyādi mahākaruṇāmevotpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:538: tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ pṛthak pṛthak svabhāvamatigahanaṃ parijñātavānityato yadi kaścit kuśalacittaḥ śṛṇoti nānena sumanasko bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:539: yadi akuśacittaḥ śṛṇoti nānena durmanasko bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:551: mahākaruṇayā saṃsādhito 'nuttaro mārgo na punaranyaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:552: atha punastathāgatasya nāsti kāpīcchā- mama paramā santuṣṭiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:555: mahākāruṇikatvāt bhavaduḥkhahṛdvacanena mahopāye na sattvānāmuddharaṇāya vyavasāyaduḥkhānyupādatte /
SA16hvsatssu:556: tathāgato mahākaruṇayā sattvānāmuddharaṇāya loke 'smin taptāyaḥpiṇḍavat kṣaṇamapyasahyaṃ pañcaskandhātmakaṃ kāyamupādāya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:557: bhagavān buddhaḥ subhāvitopākṣācittaḥ tadupekṣācittamupekṣya sadā mahākaruṇācittamācarati / ataḥ pūjanīyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:561: ātmano mahāhitaṃ prāpayati parāṃśca mahāhitaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:563: tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ cittaparijñāne paramakuśalaḥ yathoktaṃ sūtre- ahaṃ sattvaparamārthasya suvijñaḥ kṛpāvān hitakārī ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:568: yathoktamekottarāgame tathāgatavarge- svayamāha- ahaṃ puruṣasārathiḥ puruṣāvataṃsaḥ puruṣahastī śramaṇānāṃ paramo brāhmaṇānāmapyuttamaḥ āryāṇāmadhipo 'pramattacārī,
SA16hvsatssu:580: yathā vyavadāna sūtre śāriputrastathāgatasyābhimukhaṃ tathāgataguṇān stauti /
SA16hvsatssu:592_0: tathāgataḥ svayaṃ pravacanaṃ praśaṃsati- mayā bhāṣito dharma ādau madhye 'vasāne
SA16hvsatssu:592_1: ca kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātamanulomakaṃ brahmacaryamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:594: jinaśāsanamakālikaṃ kalyāṇañca bālye yauvane vārdhakye ca kalyāṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:602: ādau madhye 'vasāne ca sarvadā viduṣāṃ kamanīyam, kālatraye sarvadā gabhīram /
SA16hvsatssu:603: nānyasūtravat rādau mahat madhye sūkṣmamavasāne sūkṣmataram /
SA16hvsatssu:618: [tadyathā] yo duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ yo vā duṣṭasvaraḥ śabdaḥ sa yajamānaṃ hinasti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:628: santi kānicana anyāni sūtrāṇi ca deva[putra]bhāṣitāni /
SA16hvsatssu:632: yathoktaṃ vinaye- dharmo nāma yat buddhabhāṣitaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:633: śrāvakabhāṣitaṃ nirmitabhāṣitaṃ devabhāṣitaṃ vā saṃkṣipya yāni loke subhāṣitāni tāni sarvāṇi buddhabhāṣitāni /
SA16hvsatssu:649: tathāgatāt śrutastu samyagarthe nikṣiptaṃ yathārthaṃ vacanaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:655: ayaṃ paryavadātadharma ucyate [yo] na sūtramātrānuyāyī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:656: santi ca jinaśāsanasya tisro dharmamudrāḥ- sarvamanātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:657: sarve saṃskṛtadharmāḥ kṣaṇikā anityāḥ- śāntaṃ nirodho nirvāṇam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:658: imā stisro dharmamudrāḥ sarvairapi vādibhirna śakyāḥ khaṇḍayitum /
SA16hvsatssu:667: atha tathāgataḥ svayaṃ svadharmaṃ stauti- mama dharmo nirodho nirvāṇagāmī samyak sambodhijanaka aupanāyika iti /
SA16hvsatssu:675: buddhāgama ucyate sarve saṃskṛtāḥ sādīnavā nāniśaṃsāsthānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:676: na tu yathā brāhmaṇāḥ brahmalokādīn praśaṃsanti /
SA16hvsatssu:679: tathāgatasya san dharmo nirvāṇāya bhavati ityataḥ samyaksambodhijanakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:687: buddha dharmaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ- svākhyāto [bhagavatā] sāndṛṣṭikaḥ akālikaḥ aupanāyika ehipaśyakaḥ pratyātmaṃ vedayitavyo vijñaiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:694: buddhadharmo dṛṣṭa eva loke vipākaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:700: ataḥ sāndṛṣṭikaṃ pūjāsatkāraṃ prāpayan aurdhvavipākaṃ nirvāṇaśca prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:704: buddhadharmo na kañcana divasaṃ māsaṃ vatsaraṃ nakṣatraṃ vāpekṣya mārgo bhāvyate /
SA16hvsatssu:705: asmin divase māse vatsare va mārgo na bhāvyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:706: na brāhmaṇadharmavat vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīnādadhīta grīṣme rājanya ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:712: aupanāuyika iti / samyak caryayā sattvān vimuktimupanayatīti aupanāyikaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:714: baddhadharmaḥ svakāyena sākṣātkartavyo bhaviṣyati na parānuvartanena /
SA16hvsatssu:715: yathāvocadbhagavān- mā bhikṣavaḥ kevalaṃ mama pravacanādhimuktikā bhavata /
SA16hvsatssu:716: svayameva parīkṣadhvam ayaṃ dharma ācāritavyaḥ ayamanācaritavya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:717: na yathā tīrthikā vadanti svaśiṣyān- praśnaprativacanaṃ mā kurudhvam /
SA16hvsatssu:723: upavāsādau paramamugdhāḥ śraddadhante vijñaiḥ sukhaṃ na vedyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:725: āhārabharite 'pi svadehe cittaikāgratāvīryarāgadveṣasapīḍanādīni [SSS_24] vijño dṛṣṭa eva vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:726: yathā kaścit rogānmuktaḥ adhyātmaṃ pravivekaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:728: kecit sadoṣaṃ dharmaṃ vadanti yathā khakkaṭalakṣaṇā pṛthivī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:729: kiṃ khakkaṭalakṣaṇam ityasya spṛṣṭvā vedayitavyam iti prativacanaṃ na vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:730: yathā jātyandho nīlapītalohitāvadātān na vyavahartuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:732: na sa buddhadharmasya paramārthaṃ vyavahartuṃ śankoti / upaśamātmakatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:733: atha buddhadharma adhyātmamadhigantavyaḥ na dhanādivat svayamadhigamya parasmai pradātavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:734: yathā pārāyaṇa sūtre bhagavānāha- nāhaṃ [bhikṣava] ucchetsyāmi vaḥ kāṃkṣām /
SA16hvsatssu:737: nāyaṃ dharmaḥ paragāmī san upalabhyate, tejaḥ saṃkramādivat /
SA16hvsatssu:738: pṛthagjanā avidyāparvatapraticchannā na śraddhadhanta imaṃ dharmam /
SA16hvsatssu:746: laukikā hi bahavo dṛṣṭaphalaṃ paśryanto na jānanti tatkāraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:749: uttānacetanā laukikā buddhadharme na gabhīrasaṃjñāṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:751: tṛṇamapi hetupratyayaiḥ sañcitaṃ parīkṣayituḥ tallakṣaṇaṃ gabhīraṃ vivartate /
SA16hvsatssu:752: yathā bhagavatā bhāṣitaḥ pratītyasamutpādadharmo gahanaṃ vastu /
SA16hvsatssu:753: [tathā] tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣayo viyogo nirodho nirvāṇam, idaṃ padaṃ durdarśam /
SA16hvsatssu:756: (u) kecidvā dino vadanti- nedaṃ vacanaṃ yuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:757: ānando mahān śrāvako dharmalakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī kathaṃ vadiṣyati pratītyasamutpādadharma uttānaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:760: na hi sa karmakleśān suvivicya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:761: āditaḥ śikṣitasya vastunaḥ paryantaṃ labdhavato [vā] uttānakasaṃjñotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:768: tathāgate nānāhetupratyayadṛṣṭāntairarthaṃ prakāśayati sati subodhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:769: bālā api jānanti yathā sudā ya śrāmaṇerādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:770: buddhadharmaḥ sāravān sarvapravacaneṣu tattvārthaḥ pradhāno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:771: na yathā bhāratarāmāyaṇādīni tattvārthaṃ vinā kevalākhyānarūpāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:772: yathā vā rāghabrāhmaṇa āha- bhagavān bhikṣūn arthadharme paramārthadharme yogaṃ śikṣāpayati yadutāsravakṣaye / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:774: na brāhmaṇā iva brāhmaṇadharmaṃ vadanta ātmana eva bodhimanuprāpnuvanti;
SA16hvsatssu:776: pañcakāmeṣu ātmārāmā devamanuṣyā api śraddhadhante; ityādibhiḥ pratyayairdharmo 'bhivandyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:796: yathā alaṅkaraṇāya puṣpāṇi vikīryante mālā vā dhriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:800: pūrvaṃ kaṇṭhoktasya dharmasya paścādgāthayopadiṣṭasyārthaḥ spaṣṭapratītaḥ śraddhādārḍhyakṛdbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:801: gāthānibaddho 'rthaḥ sāsakti kramaśaḥ supāṭhyo bhavati / ato gāthāmāha /
SA16hvsatssu:803: kecidāhu- śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ na kāvyapratirūpayā gāthayā racayitavyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:808: yathāha sūtram- sarve lokāḥ supraṇītavacananirūktikā mama pravrajitāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:813: yat sūtramaprativacanamavibhaṅgaṃ yathā catuḥpratisaṃ vidādisūtram tat sūtramityucyate sapraśnaprativacanaṃ sūtrantuyathocyate- catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:817: yathā kaścit daridro vividhānyakuśalakarmāṇi kṛtvā durgatau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:823: kintu saṅgīti kārā gabhīrasūtrārthān saṅgṛhyābhidharme prākṣipan /
SA16hvsatssu:824: yathā bāhyābhyantarasaṃyojanikaḥ puruṣaḥ sadā rātrāvarthaṃ vibhajate /
SA16hvsatssu:825: ityanena hetunā ayamarthaḥ saṃyojanaskandhe niveśitavya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:832: dvividhāṃ gāthāṃ vihāyānyat gāthārahitaṃ sūtram udānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:836: tāni sūtranidānāni kadācit sūtra eva vartante anyatra vā vartante /
SA16hvsatssu:840: yathoktaṃ sūtre- viduṣāṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ sakramaṃ sārthaṃ savibhaṅgamavikṣepakam /
SA16hvsatssu:842: itivṛttakam- idaṃ sūtrasya nidānaṃ bhavati, sūtrasyānantarañca bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:846: tathāgato 'nāgataṃ vastu kathayannapi atītaṃ pratyutpannamupādāyaiva kathayatītyataḥ pṛthaṅ nocyate /
SA16hvsatssu:848_0: kecinna śraddadhante yanmahāmunaya upaśamābhiratā na vikṣepavighāte suprītikā laukikasaṃbhinnapralāpānnirviṇṇāḥ
SA16hvsatssu:849: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mārgasya pratilābhī puruṣo dvau māsāvatītya ekamakṣaramuccārayati /
SA16hvsatssu:852: yathoktaṃ- tathāgato vaipulyataḥ saṃkṣepataśca dvidhā dharmamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:855: yathāha kalpānte bhūtāni vikṛtavṛttāni, devakāyā mahāpramāṇāḥ pṛthivī ca samprakampante /
SA16hvsatssu:860: upadeśaḥ- mahākātyāyanādayo mahājñānino bhagavadbhāṣitaṃ suvistṛtaṃ vyabhajanta /
SA16hvsatssu:872: prahvanīyaṃ dakṣiṇeyamañjalikaraṇīyamanuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ dāyakānāṃ hitakaram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:874: tathāgata śrāvakasaṅghaḥ aneḍakaṃ śīlaṃ dhārayan yāvadalpāparādhe 'pi paramatrāsaśaṅkī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:876: narakādibhyo 'pyabhītāḥ śīlaṃ saprayatnaṃ dhārayantaḥ kevalaṃ saddharmābhiratā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:889: samādhiskandhaviśuddhamiti / yaḥ samādhistattvajñānamutpādayati sa viśuddha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:892: yā sarvakleśānāṃ kṣayaṃ prāpayati na kevalaṃ vighnayati /
SA16hvsatssu:895: kṣīṇakleśānāṃ jñānaṃ bhavati yaduta kṣīṇā me jātiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:905: yathā aṣṭāṅgasamanvitaṃ [SSS_29] kṣetraṃ pañcavidhadhānyānyatiśayena saṃvardhayati na vināśaṃ gamayati /
SA16hvsatssu:906: tathā saṅghakṣetramapi aṣṭāṅgasamanvitamityato dāyakānāṃ guṇān vardhayati / ato 'bhivandyam //
SA16hvsatssu:911: caturvidhāḥ pratipattayañcaturvidhāḥ pratipannakāḥ śīlasamādhiprajñādiguṇāśca pariśuddhā ityataḥ saṅgha ityākhyāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:914: srotaāpattipratipattau trayaḥ pudgalāḥ śraddhānusāripratipannako dharmānusāripratipannako 'nimittānusāripratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:916: yo 'labdhānātmaśūnyatājñāno bhagavacchāsane śraddadhāno bhagavadvacanamanusṛtya pratipanno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:918: yathoktaṃ sūtre ahamasmin vastuni śraddhayā pratipannaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:920: labdhe tu tattvajñāne na śraddhāmātramanusṛtya pratipadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:921: yathoktaṃ sūtre- nāsti kārako nāsti śraddhālurityādi prajānan uttamapudgalo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:924: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo dharme kṣāntisukhaṃ prajñayā bhāvayati sa śraddhāpratipannakaḥ [yaḥ] pṛthagjanabhūmimatikrāntaḥ srotaāpattiphalañca nālabhata /
SA16hvsatssu:928: ayaṃ śrutacintāmayaprajñāyāṃ sthito dharmaṇāṃ kṣāntikāmasukhacittaṃ samyak bhāvayan anātmaśūnyatājñānamalabhamāno 'pi laukikaṃ dharmakṣāntyābhāsacittamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:932: sa krameṇa uṣmādidharmeṣu sthitau bhāvanāmayīṃ prajñāṃ labhamāno 'pi maulanāmnaiva śraddhānusārītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:934: asmāt sūtrāt vaktavyamavaśyaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ lapsyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:935: na vaktavyaṃ jīvitānte na lapsyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:938: yathogreṇa saṅghe nimantrite devatā upasaṃgamyārocayanti- amuko 'rhan amuko 'rhatpratipannako yāvadamukaḥ śrotaāpannaḥ amukaḥ srotaāpattipratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:943: ayaṃ labdhānātmajñāna ūṣmamūrdhakṣāntyagradharmeṣusthito dharmamanusṛtya pratipadyate yadanātmaśūnyādi /
SA16hvsatssu:945: imau dvau pratipannakau satyadarśanamārgamavatārya nirodhasatyaṃ paśyata ityato 'nimittapratipannaka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:947: laukikamārge saṃyojanaprahāṇāt phalatrayapratipanna iti na prathāṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:950_1: sayojānanāṃ parikṣayāt srotaāpanno bhavati avinipātadharmā niyataḥ sambodhiparāyaṇaḥ
SA16hvsatssu:952: yaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sa satyadarśanaprahīṇakleśo 'tyantaparikṣīṇāpramāṇaduḥkhaḥ pṛthivīsama iti aupamyasūtramāha /
SA16hvsatssu:954: (u) idamuttaratra vakṣyate yaduta satyadṛṣṭikṣayādanye kṣīṇā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:959: yathā gaṅghaughavartī dāruskandho vināṣṭapratyayān [SSS_31] niyataṃ mahāsamudramanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:963: yathā ca navanītādi saptadinaparamaṃ sevamānasya dhruvā glānirapi jarjaritā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:965: yathā ca saptaphaṇasarpadaṣṭaḥ pudgalakāyaścaturbhūtabalāt saptapadāni gacchati nāṣṭamaṃ viṣabalādgacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:975: ya ekaṃ dvau vā prahāya trīn caturaḥ pañca vā yāti /
SA16hvsatssu:982: sa dve vā trīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvati saṃsarati /
SA16hvsatssu:985: sakṛdāgāmī imaṃ lokaṃ sakṛdāgatya duḥkhasyāntaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:988: ayaṃ sakṛdāgāmī ihaiva vā janmani duḥkhasyāntaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:992: sa ihaiva vā janmani duḥkhasyāntaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1004: kaścidanāgāmī bhavānnirvidyate, alpanīvaraṇo na dṛṣṭe nirvāṇamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1013: kaścidutpannaḥ san anāsravamārgeṣu prakṛtyā sthito 'bhisaṃskāramaprayujya parinirvāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1022: yo dvayostriṣu vāyataneṣu utpadya [parinirvāti] sa madhyamendriyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1032: yaḥ pūrvabhave srotaāpattiphalasakṛdāgāmiphalaprāptaḥ paścātpravṛttakāyena anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1034: dṛṣṭadharmaparinirvāyī ti paramatīkṣṇendriyo dṛṣṭa eva kāye nirvāṇaṃ prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1035: atha pudgalo dvividhaḥ śraddhāvimukto dṛṣṭiprāpta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1054: anurakṣaṇalakṣaṇa iti kiñcidviśiṣṭendriyatvāt yaḥ samādhimanurakṣati sa na parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1057: mṛtalakṣaṇaḥ tato 'pi kiñcidviśiṣṭendriyo bhaveṣu paramaṃ nirviṇṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1061: sthitalakṣaṇa iti yaḥ samādhiṃ labdhvā na parākramate na ca parihīyate sa sthitalakṣaṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1076: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānāha- yo bhikṣavo macchrāvakaḥ śayane paryaṅke vā ahamahamikayā pratilabdhāt [āsrava]kṣayānna parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1079: pūrvoktā aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā navāśaikṣāśca [militvā] saptaviṃśati [pudgalāḥ] laukikaṃ sarvapuṇyakṣetram /
SA16hvsatssu:1091: śūnyalakṣaṇatvāt sarve rāgadveṣādayaḥ kleśā anutpannā nākuśalaṃ karmotpādayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1093: tairlabdhvā dhyānasamādhayaḥ sarve pariśuddhāḥ mahālpaiḥ kleśairviśaṃyuktatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1096: aṣṭakṣetraguṇasamanvitvāt saptavidha samādhipariṣkāraiḥ surakṣitatvāt saptāsrava sannirodhitvāt āsravairaduṣṭam /
SA16hvsatssu:1099: uktaṃ ca sūtre prasthānacitamātra eva kuśaladharmamācaritumabhilaṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:1103: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre yasmāddāyakād gṛhapateḥ śīlavato bhikṣuḥ satkāramādāya apramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:1104: sa dāyakto gṛhapatirapramāṇaṃ puṇyaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1109: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- trayāṇāṃ sannipātānmahataḥ puṇyasya pratilābhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1114: saṅghadānasya pratigrahītā pariśuddha ityatastaddānamapi avaśyaṃ pariśuddham /
SA16hvsatssu:1120: (5) pariśuddhacitto bahuśo ['lpaśo vā] dadāti tathā deyaṃ caturvidham /
SA16hvsatssu:1121: saṅghasya dānamavaśyaṃ dve trīṇi vā prasādhayet /
SA16hvsatssu:1127: yadyekasmin puruṣe utpannā śraddhā cittaṃ kadācit pariśodhayet kadācidvā prakampeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1130: kasmiṃścidutpannaḥ snehaḥ cittaṃ na gurukuryāt na pracīyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1131: saṅghe tūtpannā bhaktiḥ cittaṃ gurukuryāt apramāṇālambanatvāt cittaṃ pracīyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:1138: idaṃ ratnatrayaṃ sarvasya lokasya prathamaṃ maṅgalam /
SA16hvsatssu:1139: yathoktaṃ maṅgalagāthāyām- buddho dharmaśca saṅgaśca etanmaṅgalamuttamam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1140: atha kānicitsūtrāṇi maṅgalādīni śaikṣāṇāmāyuryaśaḥprasaravardhanāni iti sūtrakartāro 'bhiprayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1156: bhagavato mahākaruṇācittena sarvalokānāṃ hitakaratvāt taddharmo 'pāryantikabādha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1158: bhagavadupadiṣṭaṃ śāstrantu cāturvargīyāṇāṃ sattvānāmātiryagjantūnāñca santārakaṃ bhavati iti nāsti pāryantikabādhā /
SA16hvsatssu:1168: bhagavadabhisandhimajānatāmupadiṣṭaṃ vṛtheti tat ātmanaḥ kleśāyaiva bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1169: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dvau puruṣau bhagavantaṃ nindataḥ eko 'śraddhādveṣābhyāṃ nindati,
SA16hvsatssu:1172: vidvānapi buddhābhisandhimanavabudhya buddhabhāṣitaṃ na vicārayituṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1176: sarve bhikṣavo nānāvidhāḥ parapravādino nālabhanta tathāgatāśayam /
SA16hvsatssu:1178: yathā ca kaścit mahāntaṃ vṛkṣaṃ chitvā atikramyaiva mūlamatikramyaiva skandhaṃ śākhāpalāśāni paryeṣayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1182: kiñca bhagavān śariputramapṛcchat ke śaikṣāḥ ke ca sāṅkhyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1186: iti ānanda stathāgatamāmantyāha- abhisambodhisamadhigamāt pratilabdhe mārge hitaṃ bhavatītyatadapi yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1188: dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ samyak dṛṣṭirbhavati parato ghoṣāt yoniśaśca [SSS_39] manaskārāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1190: yathā cāha bhagavān- yadi mayā kasyacit dharma upadiṣṭaḥ so 'pratilabdhamadabhisandhitvāt kalahāyate / iti / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1194: ato jñātavyameva vādinaḥ tathāgatamapratipadyamānā yathārutamanuvartamānāḥ kalahāyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1196: tadā bhagavān bhikṣūnabravīt- bhāvayathemamartha nānandopamitākāram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1197: sarve vādina āhuḥ- arhan agradakṣiṇīya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1200: [evam] annapāne sthūlavastunyeva na jānanti [yathāvat] kaḥ punarvādastathāgatenabhisandhāya bhāṣite sūkṣmadharme /
SA16hvsatssu:1208: jānantyapi ca vaktuśca vivakṣā yasya vastunaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1209: tatrāsti dvidhā mārga āryamārgo laukikamārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1212: atha parapravāda sūtre 'pi bhagavān saṃśrāvayati sma /
SA16hvsatssu:1214: [SSS_40] udāyibhikṣudharmadinnādibhibhikṣuṇībhiḥ kṛtaṃ bhagavacchāsanaṃ bhagavān śrutvā [tadeva punaḥ] śrāvayati sma /
SA16hvsatssu:1217: evamanyaḥ "tathāgatamūlāḥ sarvadharmā" ityādi praśnaḥ sarvaḥ pratyuktaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1220: śāstre viracitte hi arthaḥ sugamaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:1223: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānavocadbhikṣūn- yathāpraṇītaṃ śāstraṃ samyagdhārayata /
SA16hvsatssu:1225: ataḥ sūtrādarthamādāya śāstraṃ nikāyānta rātmanā pṛthak sthāpyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1227: kiñca bhagavān nānāsattvānāṃ santaraṇīyānāṃ kṛte lokādīni śāstramukhānyuktavān /
SA16hvsatssu:1229: svātyādayo bhikṣava āhuḥ- tadevedaṃ vijñānaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati / ananyaditi /
SA16hvsatssu:1235: lokamukhaṃ paramārthamukhamiti dvimukhaṃ / lokamukhataḥ astyātmā ityucyate / yathoktaṃ sūtre-
SA16hvsatssu:1236: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:1242: āha ca- dīrgharātraṃ bhāvitacitto mṛta ūrdhvajanmabhāk bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1244: kiñcāha kārakaḥ karma karoti, kārakaḥ svayamanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1248: yathoktaṃ sūtre eṣu pañcasu skandheṣu nāstyātmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1250: asti karma asti karmaphalam, kārakastu nopalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1252: yathā bhagavān āha- skandhānāṃ santatyāsti saṃsāra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1257: [yathā vā] mṛgā ramāteti snuṣāṃ māteti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1259: yathoktaṃ sūtre- jihvā rasaṃ vijānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1260: jihvāvijñānaṃ rasaṃ vijānāti na tu jihvā /
SA16hvsatssu:1261: yathā śaktipratihataṃ puruṣaṃ prati vadanti puruṣo 'yaṃ duḥkhaṃ vijānātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:1262: vijñānantu duḥkhaṃ vijānāti, na tu puruṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1263: yathā vā daridraḥ puruṣaḥ prabhuriti vyapadiśyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1265: kiñca bhagavān tīrthikānākārayati brāhmaṇāniti śramaṇāniti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:1266: kṣatriyabrāhmaṇādaya iva buddho 'pi vyavahārataḥ pūjyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1267: ekameva yathā bhājanaṃ deśavaśāt vibhinnanāmakam, buddho 'pi nāmānuyāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1272: yathoktaṃ sūtre- pratītyasamutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ cakṣurādīnāmindriyāṇāṃ mūlaṃ mahāsamudravat /
SA16hvsatssu:1273: yathāha sūtram- skandhāyatanadhātūnāṃ pratyayāḥ sāmagrīmātram na kārakaḥ nāpi vedakaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1275: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat laukikā vadanti sukhamiti [tat] āryā duḥkhaṃ vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1276: yat āryā duḥkhaṃ vadanti [tat]laukikāḥ sukhaṃ vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1281: yatra rūpamityākhyāyate tatra yadatītaṃ yadanāgataṃ vartamānam sarvaṃ tat rūpamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1285: na tu sarvaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśasya hetūkriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1286: tṛṣṇasti cet avaśyaṃ sā vedanāmupādāyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1287: na tu sarvā vedanā tṛṣṇāyā hetūkriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1288: kadācit samagraheturucyate yathā sparśapratyayā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1289: kadācidasamagra heturucyate yathā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1295: iti ca caturbhirdhyānaiḥ prasrabdhimānapi na sukhaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:1298: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaścai- tyavandanāya pādāvutkṣipati sa āyuṣo 'nte deveṣūtpadyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1300: sūtrāntaramāha- anantaryasya kartā na deveṣūtpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1302: uktañca sūtre- kāmānāmanubhavitā nāpāpakaṃ karoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1304: srotaāpannaḥ puruṣaḥ kāmānupabhuñjāno 'pi na durgatipatanīyaṃ karma karoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1306: api coktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1308: yadi tadaiva sarvāṇi rūpāṇi pratītya cakṣurvijñānamutpadyata [SSS_43] iti vadet /
SA16hvsatssu:1310: atha coktaṃ sūtre- śrotraṃ pratītya śabdañca śrotravijñānamutpadyate na cakṣurvijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:1315: viniścitam- yathocyate- buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1318: kiñcāha- sarve saṃskṛtadharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmānaḥ [teṣāṃ]nirodho nirvāṇam ityādi mukhaṃ viniścitam /
SA16hvsatssu:1335: yathocyate- adbhuta mūlikā surabhipuṣpañca na vātarogapratikūlam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1339: kiñca vadanti tisro vedanā- duḥkhā vedanā sukhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1341: trividhaṃ duḥkhaṃ- duḥkha- duḥkhaṃ, vipariṇāmaduḥkhaṃ saṃskāra duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1343: āha ca- duḥkhamidaṃ trividhaṃ navaṃ purāṇaṃ madhyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1351: yathā bhagavānavocabhdikṣūn- prajahata prapañcam, tadā nirvāṇaṃ labhadhve iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1354: yathā ekavastukathane anyadapi vastu samalakṣaṇamuktaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1358: yathā bhagavānā ha- ya udayavyayalakṣaṇadṛṣṭidvayaṃ na prajānāti sa sarvaḥ sarāgī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1364: yathocyate- annadānaṃ prayacchati pañca guṇān- āyuḥ varṇaṃ balaṃ sukhaṃ pratibhānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1369: api tu kārṣāpaṇamupādāya labdhamadyate ityataḥ kārṣāpaṇamadyata ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1379: yathā vadanti- upacitadharmāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sukha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1381: yathā vadanti- mūḍhaiḥ saha saṃvāso duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1388: yathāha saptāsravasūtram- tatra dvau vastuta āsravau, amyāni pacca vastūni āsravakāraṇāni /
SA16hvsatssu:1398: yathoktaṃ sūsre- dvau puruṣau staḥ jño 'jñaśca /
SA16hvsatssu:1406: yathā vadanti- kaścinmuṇḍitakeśaśmaśruko dharmapaṭaṃ paridadhānaḥ parigṛhītabuddheryāpatho 'pi bhagavacchāsanād dūrībhūtaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1408: yastu śraddhendriyādisamanvāgataḥ sa gṛhastho 'pi aprākṛta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1409: yathoktaṃ sūtre- caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ kaścit saṅghasyeryāpathe 'vatīrṇaḥ na saṅghagaṇitaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1420: śraddhendriyalipsunā bhagavacchāsanaṃ śrutvā uddiṣṭaṃ prātimokṣamādāya yathāvaccaritavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1422: kiñcānena śāstreṇa dvividhaṃ hitaṃ bhavati ātmahitaṃ parahitamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1428: ya ātmanā śīlādīn sampādayati na parān śīlādiṣu sthāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1431: yat kaścidātmahitāya pratipanno 'pi pareṣāñca dānādimahāphalaṃ sampādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1436: sa ātmanā dharmacaryāmanuvartamāno 'pi parārthamupadeśāt ātmano 'pi hitamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1437: yathoktaṃ sūtre- parasyadharmamupadiśan pañcavidhaṃ hitaṃ labhate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1439: tatra pravacanamātrasyottamaṃ hitaṃ bhavati yadyathoktamācarata āsravāḥ kṣīyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1443: atha sa puruṣa idānīṃ jyotiṣi sthitaḥ paścādapi jyotiḥ parāyaṇo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1444: laukikāḥ sarve bhūyasā tamastamaḥ parāyaṇāḥ jyotiṣo jyotiḥ parāyaṇā vā /
SA16hvsatssu:1445: yaḥ kaścid buddhaśāsanamācarati sa tamaso jyotiḥ parāyaṇaḥ jyotiṣo jyotiḥ parāyaṇo vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1447: dānādīnācaran na [tādṛśaṃ] hitaṃ vindate yādṛśaṃ buddhadharmaṃ śṛṇvan [vindate] /
SA16hvsatssu:1448: yaścālpa[mapi] buddhapravacanaṃ śṛṇoti sa prativedhajñānalābhī san sarvakleśān bhaṅktvā apramāṇahitaṃ prasavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1449: yaktoktaṃ sūtre- catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ- tamastamaḥparāyaṇaḥ tamojyotiḥparāyaṇaḥ jyotirjyotiḥ parāyaṇaḥ jyotistamaḥparāyaṇaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1450: kiñca caturvidhāḥ parāyaṇāḥ anussrotogāmī pratisrotogāmī sthitātmā, tīrṇaḥ pāraṅgata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1451: yaścittaikāgryeṇa bhagavaddharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa eva pañca nīvaraṇāni prahāya saptabodhyaṅgāni bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1454: punaścaturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- sadābhavanimagnaḥ kañcit kālaṃ bhavānnirgatya punarnimagnaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1458: kaścit laukikaśraddhādīnutpādya na dṛḍhayati panaḥ parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:1460: yaḥ śraddhādīnutpādya śubhāśubhaṃ vivecayati sa nirgamaparīkṣakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1462: yo bhagavaddharmasya samyagarthaṃ vetti sa naiva sadā nimagno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1465: sa ca guṇābhāvayitetyucyate yaḥ kāyena śīlaṃ manasā prajñāṃ ca bhāvayati sa kiñcid duṣkarma kurvannapi durgatau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:1466: yastu bhāvayati kāyena śīlaṃ manasā prajñāṃ sa bahu duṣkarma kurvannapi na durgatau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:1468: kāyaṃ bhāvayan krameṇa śīlasamādhiprajñāskandhānutpādya karmāṇi prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:1470: - uktañca sūtre caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- kecit agambhīratīkṣṇānuyāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:1475: samanantaro yo mṛdumadhyānuśayaḥ sa sadāgatya cittaniviṣṭo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1477: caturtho yo mṛdumadhyānuśayaḥ sa kaśmiṃñcitkāla āgacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1478: sa yadi bhagavataḥ śāsane samyacchāsraṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:1483: nāsti puṇyapāpaṃ [nāsti] karmaphalamiti mithyādṛṣṭau yaḥ patati saparāneva vyābādhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1484: yaddānamācarati sa ātmānamapi vyābādhate parānapi vyābādhate /
SA16hvsatssu:1492: yathoktaṃ sūtre kathāsamprayogeṇa [pudgalo] veditavyo yadi vā kathyo yadi vākathya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1493: yo viduṣāṃ dharmaṃ pṛṣṭhaḥ sthānāsthāne na santiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:1501: yathā nāthaputrādayaḥ svayaṃ vadanti asmākaṃ śāstā āptaḥ tadvacanamevānuvartāmaha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1515: ātmano vā mānasikī tuṣṭhiḥ āryapravacanadharmaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1516: tatra yo bhagavaddharma samyak jñātvā pravakti sa kathyo bhavati / nānye /
SA16hvsatssu:1519: vibhajya vyākaraṇīyaṃ praśnaṃ na vibhajya vyākaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:1520: pratipṛcchāvyākaraṇīyaṃ praśnaṃ na patipṛcchya vyākaroti sthapanīyaṃ praśnaṃ na sthapayitvā vyākaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:1524: [tena] yathā buddho bhagavān [tathā] loke nāsti tatsama itīdṛśamanumānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:1531: sthapanīyaḥ praśna iti yo dharmo 'bhūtarūpaḥ kintu prajñaptisan /
SA16hvsatssu:1532: sa dharmaḥ kimekaḥ uta nānā, kiṃ śāśvataḥ utāśāśvata ityādi yadi kaścit pṛcchati /
SA16hvsatssu:1536: kiñca santi caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- sāvadyaḥ badyabahulaḥ alpāvadyaḥ anavadya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1537: sāvadya iti yasya kevalamakuśalaṃ naiko 'pi kuśaladharmo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:1544: bhagavacchāsanasya samyagarthavedī dvaividhyaṃ bhajate alpavadyo 'navadya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1551: yathoktaṃ sūtre- catvāri saṅgrahavastūni- dānaṃ priyavacanamarthacaryā samānārthatā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1565: tadā te sattvā na prakampyā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1569: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dharmapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyam na pudgalapratiśaraṇeneti /
SA16hvsatssu:1570: yadyapi kaścidevaṃ vadet mayā bhagavataḥ sammukhāt śrutaṃ bhadantaśca sammukhādvā pūrvānte śrutamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:1572: yadvacanantu sūtre 'vatīrṇaṃ dharmalakṣaṇāviruddhaṃ vinayānuloimitañca tatpunarādeyaṃ syāt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1577: tadyathā kaścit saṃskṛtadharmāḥ śāśvatāḥ [SSS_50] sukhāḥ sātmāna iti bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1579: anityā duḥkhā anātmāna iti yo bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:1581: anityatādijñānameva dharmalakṣaṇam dharmo 'yaṃ śaraṇīkartavyo na pudgalāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:1582: dharmapratiśaraṇaṃ vadatā sarve dharmāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:1583: ataḥ punarucyate nitārthasūtrapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na neyārthasūtrapratiśaraṇeneti /
SA16hvsatssu:1585: yaducyate arthapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na vyañjanapratiśareṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:1586: yo 'yaṃ vyañjanārthaḥ sūtre 'vatīrṇo dharmalakṣaṇāvirodhī vinayānulomakaśca tatpratiśaraṇena bhavitavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:1597: uktañca sūtre- catvāri devamanuṣyāṇāṃ cakrāṇi śubhavardhakāni /

SA16hvsatssu:2170: kiñcoktaṃ bhavatā- yat rūpe chandarāgaṃ prahīṇaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:2174: tatra pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭaśrutasmṛtavikalpita bhāvitānyupādāya hi svapnadarśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:2180: dūṣaṇam- yat bhavānavocat- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2182: tathāgataḥ pudgaladūṣaṇayāha- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2191: [yat]bhavānavocat cakṣurvijñānaṃ rūpaṃ vijānāti yāvanmanovijñānaṃ dharmān vijānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2192: tat vijñānaṃ viṣayamātraṃ vijānāti na vicinoti san vā asan vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2197: bhavānavocat- yadi asajjānīyāt, saṃśayo na bhavediti /
SA16hvsatssu:2198: kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti yadi saṃśayaḥ, tadā anālambanaṃ jñānamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:2199: āha ca bhavān- yathoktaṃ sūtre yallokato 'vidyamāna ātmā tasya jñānaṃ darśanaṃ veti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2200: idaṃ sūtraṃ na dharmalakṣaṇānugatam abuddhavacanaṃ tadābhāsaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:2205: asti asadālambanaṃ jñānamiti mama vacanaṃ na svato viruddham /
SA16hvsatssu:2211: dharmāṇāṃ yatparamārthalakṣaṇaṃ tallakṣaṇairviyuktatvāt cittacaittā nālambamānā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:2218: abravīcca bhavān- yasya jñānaṃ, na tadasadbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2227: nīlalakṣaṇālpamūlaṃ sarvāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ yat nīlaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:2229: tathā alpanīlabhāvanayā tu sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ yat nīlaṃ paśyati na tadabhūtadarśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:2230: bhavān bravīti- māyājālasūtramāha- asti māyā māyāvastu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2231: asati sattve sattvābhāsaṃ sattva iti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:2234: āha ca bhavān- samādhibalāttallakṣaṇaṃ bhavati yathā vastutaḥ sadapi rūpaṃ śūnyatayāpohyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2242: āha ca bhavān pañcanīvaraṇaviruddhāni saptabodhyaṅgāni dṛṣṭvā manaskāraṃ janayati ahamasat prajānāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2246: bhavān bravīti- paramārthaprajñādarśanasya mithyādhimuktiṃ prati virodhitaiva chandarāgaprahāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:2248: ata ucyate chandarāgaprahāṇaṃ prajñāya rūpaprahāṇaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2250: yat bhavān kathayati- svapne vastusan dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2255: na tu yatna jñānaṃ pracaratīti sattālakṣaṇam //
SA16hvsatssu:2262: ayaṃ vādī vadati- skandhadhātvāyatanasaṅgṛhītaṃ vastu pṛthagjanadharmo na dharmalakṣaṇānugatam /
SA16hvsatssu:2263: tathā cet tathatādayo 'saṃskṛtadharmā api santaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2266: ato jñāyate skandhadhātvāyatanasaṅgṛhītā dharmā na sallakṣaṇā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2267: (pṛ) yat puruṣasya pratyakṣajñānādinā astyupalabhyamiti śraddhā bhavati tatsallakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:2270: āha ca sūtram- jñānapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na vijñānapratiśaraṇena iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2271: svabhāvalabdhatvāt rūpādayo viṣayā nopalambhanīyā iti paścādvakṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2281: tadā punarvaktavyaṃ lokasatyato 'tīto 'nāgataśca kimasti uta nāsti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2284: ye rūpādayaḥ skandhā vartamānādhvagatāḥ, te sakāritrā upalabhyajñānadarśanāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2285: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpyata iti rūpalakṣaṇam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2288: ato jñāyate vartamānamātre santi pañca skandhāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2290: atha yo dharmaḥ kāritravihīnaḥ sa svalakṣaṇavihīnaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2293: tathā vijñānamapi, yadyatītaṃ na vijānāti na tadvijñānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2295: atīto dharmo nirhetukaḥ, so 'stīti na yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2297: yathā asti pṛthivī, santi bījasalilādayaḥ pratyayāḥ, tadā aṅkurādikamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2313: atha yadyanāgataṃ sat cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyati tadā sakāritraṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2320: atha yadi ghaṭādayaḥ padārthāḥ anāgatāḥ santi /
SA16hvsatssu:2324: kiñca bhagavānāhasaṃskṛtadharmā utpādavyayasthityanyathātvai strilakṣaṇā upalabhyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2325: utpāda iti yo dharmaḥ [SSS_71] pūrvamabhūtvā idānīṃ savyāpāro dṛśyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2336: apicāha- yatkiñcana rūpamādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vā atītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ vā [sarva]mabhisaṃkṣipya rūpaskandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2344: uktañca sūtre- yadatītaṃ vastusat hitakaraṃ tadbhagavānupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:2352: tathāgataḥ svayameva vadati- yasya nāstyatītaṃ kṛtaṃ pāpakarma sa puruṣo naiva durgatau patiṣyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2355: smṛtiryadi nāsti atītānāgatayoḥ tadā puruṣo nānusmaretpañcaviṣayān /
SA16hvsatssu:2357: nahi manovijñānaṃ dṛṣṭe pañca viṣayān prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:2359: yadyatītamanāgataṃ nāsti, tadā arhan na kīrtayet- ahaṃ dhyānasamādhimupasampanna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2361: caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu adhicittamadhivedanañca bhāvanā na bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:2369: dīrghamalpakālaṃ vā śīlābhyāsaśca na syādityato na yujyate //
SA16hvsatssu:2374: bhavatā yadyapyuktaṃ sati dharme cittamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2377: yaducyate bhavatā- rūpalakṣaṇena rūpasaṃjñayā [atītaṃ] rūpaṃ lakṣyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2387: bhavatoktaṃ- yat vastu sat hitakaraṃ tadbhagavānupadiśatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2392: yasmātsattvā atītānanāgatān dharmān sātmano manyante tasmāt bhagavānevamavocat /
SA16hvsatssu:2395: tacca karma phalasya hetuṃ kṛtvā niruddham /
SA16hvsatssu:2398: tathāgataśāsane asti vā nāsti vā iti sarvamupāya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2404: cittasyotpādo nātmani niśrayata iti ca viśadam /
SA16hvsatssu:2407: tathāgataḥ prajānāti- karmaniruddhamapi phalasya hetuṃ karotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2412: tasya ca karmaṇo nirodhe 'pi vipāko na praṇaśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:2423: prākṛto jano mohādabhūtasmṛtyā pūrvagṛhītaṃ niyatalakṣaṇaṃ paścānniruddhamapi utpadyamāna[mivā]nusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:2428: bhavānāha- na kīrtayet- ahaṃ dhyānasamādhiṃ labdhavāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:2431: bhavān bravīti- adhicittamadhivedanañca bhāvanā na bhavet iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2443: uktañca bhavatā- sūdīrghamalpakālaṃ vā śīlābhyāsaśca na syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:2451: śāstramāha- kecidvadanti sarve dharmāḥ santīti / kecidvadanti- sarve dharmā na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2455: bhagavānāha- sarvaṃ sarvamiti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva dvādaśāyatanāni /
SA16hvsatssu:2457: pṛthivyādīni dravyāṇi saṃkhyādayo guṇāḥ utkṣepaṇāvakṣepaṇādikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:2462: ākāśe [ca] padaṃ nāsti śramaṇo nāsti bāhyataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2472: bhagavataḥ śāsana upāyatayā sarvamastīti vā sarvaṃ nāstīti vocyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2485: āśvalāyanasūtre hi bhagavānāha- yadā pitarau sannipatitau bhavataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2488: vatsasūtrañcāha- yasmin samaye sattva imaṃ kāyaṃ nikṣipati punaścittotpādanakāyamanupādāno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2492: uktañcasūtre- vyavakīrṇaṃ karmābhisaṃskṛtya vyavakīrṇaṃ kāyamupādāya vyavakīrṇe loka utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2494: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- catvāro bhavāḥ pūrvakālabhavo maraṇabhavo 'ntarābhava upapattibhava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2495: āha ca- saptabhavāḥ- pañcagatayaḥ [SSS_76] karmabhavo 'ntarābhava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2496: āha ca- yamarājo 'ntarābhave pāpinaḥ santarjya vyatyastaṃ pātayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:2498: tathāgato 'ntarābhavamupādāya sattvānāṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ prajānāti ayaṃ sattvo 'smin upapattisthāna utpadyate sa sattvastasminnupapattisthāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2499: uktañca sūtre- divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati sattvān cyavamānānupapadyamānāṃśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:2502: laukikā api astyantarābhava iti śraddhadhānā vadantimriyamāṇasya sūkṣmāṇi catvāri mahābhūtāni asmādbhavāt [bhavāntaraṃ] krāmanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2505: yadi nāstyantarābhavaḥ, imaṃ kāyaṃ visṛjya parakāyamanupādānasyāntarā vyucchedaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2510: yadyapyuktaṃ bhavatā- āśvalāyanasūtra uktam astyantarābhava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2513: yadyāryā na jānanti- ayaṃ kaḥ kuta āgata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2520: anena brāhmaṇena kalpitam- anyaḥ kāyo 'nyo jīva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2521: ata evaṃ prativakti- santyantarābhave pañcaskandhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2523: sa kāmarūpadhātvorantarā kāyamupādāya tatra parinirvṛta iti antarāparinirvāyī /
SA16hvsatssu:2525: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kaścinmriyamāṇaḥ kutra gacchati kutrotpadyate kutra tiṣṭhati itīdamekārthakam /
SA16hvsatssu:2526: bhavānāha- vyavakīrṇaṃ kāyamupādāya vyavakīrṇe loka utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2527: kāyamupādāyeti vacanaṃ loka utpadyata iti cedamekārthakam /
SA16hvsatssu:2528: catvāro bhavāḥ sapta bhavā iti ca bhavaduktaṃ sūtramayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:2541: bhavānāha- mriyamāṇasya sūkṣmāṇi catvāri mahābhūtāni bhavāntaraṃ krāmantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2547: pūrvanivāsajñāna uktaṃ jānāti ayaṃ puruṣo 'smiṃlloke mṛtastasmiṃlloka utpadyata iti na tūktam antarābhave tiṣṭhatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2556: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadimaṃ kāyaṃ nikṣipan kāyāntaramupādatte tadahaṃ vadāmi upapattiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:2583: nahi pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate cittaṃ santatyotpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2585: na tatra pāde sthitaṃ [SSS_78] vijñānaṃ bhavapratyayaṃ śirasi saṅkrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:2593: (pṛ) kena kāraṇenocyate anupūrveṇābhisamayaḥ, kena kāraṇena ekakṣaṇenābhisamaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2595: yathoktaṃ sūtre lokasya samudayaṃ paśyato nāstitādṛṣṭirna bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2599: tasya virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dharmacakṣurbhavati / āha ca-
SA16hvsatssu:2600: anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokaṃ stokaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe /
SA16hvsatssu:2602: āsravakṣayasūtramāha jānataḥ paśyataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2603: pratipattupratidinaṃ kṣīyamāṇaṃ svayamajānato 'pi sadā bhāvitatvāt āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2604: [SSS_79] bhagavānāha satyeṣu udapadyata cakṣuḥ jñānaṃ vidyā prajñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2607: sūtre ca bhagavān kaṇṭhata āha anupūrveṇa satyābhisamaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2610: kleśānāñca catussatyeṣu caturdhā mithyācārā bhavanti yaduta nāsti dukhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:2614: yogī ca cittaṃ samādhāya idaṃ duḥkhaṃ ayaṃ duḥkhanirodha iyaṃ duḥkhanigāminī patipat iti vikalpayet /
SA16hvsatssu:2615: yadyekasmin citte syāt kathamevamanupūrveṇa samādhivikalpo bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:2620: bhavānāha lokasya samudayaṃ paśyato nastitādṛṣṭirna bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2623: tathā cet ṣoḍaśabhiḥ cittakṣaṇaiḥ dvādaśabhirākāraiśca mārgo labhyata iti na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2624: bhavatoktaṃ yatsamudayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ tannirodhalakṣaṇamiti prajānato dharmacakṣurbhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2625: tathā cet cittadvayena mārgalābhaḥ syāt- adyaṃ samudayacittaṃ dvitīyaṃ nirodhacittaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2627: bhavānāha anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokaṃ stokaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe /
SA16hvsatssu:2629: bhavatoktaṃ āsravakṣayasūtramāha rūpādīn jānataḥ paśyataḥ āsravānāṃ kṣayo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2632: bhagavān svayaṃ bravīti caturṣu satyeṣu jñānaṃ cakṣurvidyā prajñodapadyateti na bravīti anupūrveṇa ṣoḍaśacittakṣaṇāni bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2633: [SSS_80] bhavatoktaṃ bhagavān kaṇṭhenāha- anupūrveṇa satyabhisamayaḥ śreṇyārohaṇavat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2640: evaṃ ca ṣoḍaśabhireva cittakṣaṇairmārgalābha iti na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2644: [yogino] na [nānā]satyāni bhavanti kintu ekameva satyaṃ bhavati yaduta duḥkhanirodhadarśanamādyābhisambodhi nāmakam /
SA16hvsatssu:2645: dṛśyadharmādīnāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt yogī ūṣmagatādidharmānupūrveṇa caramanirodhasatyarūpaṃ satyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:2651: (pṛ) kena kāraṇena parihīyate kena kāraṇena na parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2653: yathoktaṃ sūtre- pañca hetavaḥ pañca pratyayāḥ samayavimuktasyārhataḥ parihāṇāya saṃvartante /
SA16hvsatssu:2661: āha ca sūtram dvividho 'rhan parihāṇalakṣaṇo 'parihāṇalakṣaṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2662: api coktaṃ sūtre yadyamuko bhikṣuḥ vimuktimukhāt parihīyate tadidaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate iti / api coktaṃ sūtre-
SA16hvsatssu:2663: kumbhopamaṃ kāyamidaṃ viditvā nagaropamaṃ cittamidaṃ sthāpayet /
SA16hvsatssu:2664: yudhyeta māraṃ prajñāyudhena jitañca rakṣedaniveśanaḥ syāt // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2672: sa parihīno 'pi rūpadhātāva(vu)dapadyata ityādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ jñātavyaṃ parihīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2675: kecidvadanti āryamārgānna parihīyate dhyānasamādheḥ paraṃ parihīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2676: (pṛ) tathā cet arhan dvividho na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2681: yathā gaudhiko bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍvāraṃ [cetovimukteḥ] parihīṇaḥ asinā ātmānaṃ jaghāna /
SA16hvsatssu:2683: tathāgatāśāsane hi vimuktiḥ pradhānā na samādhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2685: tasmāt samādheḥ cyutasyānāsravaṃ cyavate na tu anāsravātparihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2687: kṣīṇaṃ purāṇaṃ na navo 'sti sambhavo viraktacittā āyatike bhave ca /
SA16hvsatssu:2688: te kṣīṇabījā aviruḍhacchandā nirvānti dhīrā yathāyaṃ pradīpaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2690: śailo yathā caikaghano vātena na samīryate /
SA16hvsatssu:2691: evaṃ nindāpraśaṃsāsu na samiñjanti paṇḍitāḥ / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2696: kiñcāha- āryasya kṣīyamāṇaḥ samudayo na punarbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2702: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ye śaikṣā nirvāṇamārgaṃ paryeṣante /
SA16hvsatssu:2704: yeṣāmāsravāḥ kṣīṇāḥ na teṣāṃ punarāsravā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:2706: kiñcāha- vidvāna kuśalabhāvanaḥ kuśalavāk kuśalakāyakarmāntaḥ karaṇīyānna cyavata iti / api cāha-
SA16hvsatssu:2718: āha ca- dharmān mithyābhāvayato bhikṣostraya āsravāḥ prādurbhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2719: arhan punarna mithyābhāvayatīti na ta āsravāḥ prādurbhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2720: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ya āryaprajñayā prajānāti na sa parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2722: kīñcārhan tisro vedanāḥ samyak prajānāti [tāsā]mutpādalakṣaṇaṃ nirodhalakṣaṇamāsvādalakṣaṇaṃ mārgalakṣaṇaṃ nissaraṇalakṣaṇañcetyato notpādayati saṃyojanam /
SA16hvsatssu:2723: kiñcāha- yo bhikṣuḥ śīlasamādhiprajñākhyai stribhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa na parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2727: yathoktaṃ sūtre- satyavihārī āryo naiva parihīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2731: kiñcārhan akopyāṃ [ceto]vimuktiṃ sākṣātkṛtatvān ityato na parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2732: arhan tathāgataśāsane sāramarthaṃ pratilabdhavān yadutākopyā cetovimuktiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2733: kasyacit karacchedavat tatsmaraṇe 'smaraṇe ca sadā karacchedo 'styeva /
SA16hvsatssu:2736: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- śraddhādināmindriyāṇāṃ tīkṣṇatvāt arhan bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2739: tadyathā dahano 'dagdhaṃ dahati dagdhvā ca napunastatra pratyāvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:2740: evaṃ bhikṣuḥ ekā daśabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgata ityato na kadāpi parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2741: (pṛ) dvividho 'rhan iti bhavatodāhṛtasūtramāha- asti aparihāṇa[lakṣaṇa] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2743: śaikṣerapramattairbhavitavyamiti arhantamanapekṣya, na tu viśeṣata uktam aparihāṇalakṣaṇo 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2745: jinaścet punarutpannaḥ syāt ucyate na tu so jinaḥ
SA16hvsatssu:2746: jino bhūtvā na jāyet tātvikaḥ sa jino mataḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2747: yo 'rhan punaḥ kleśānutpādayati na sa jino bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:2748: arhataḥ kṣīṇajātitvāt na punaḥ kāyo vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2749: bhavataḥ sūtraṃ yadyapyāha- arhan parihāṇadharmā punaḥ parihīyeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2751: yo bhikṣustathendriyāṇi karoti yathā notpadyate, so 'rhan bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2763: kleśā hi sadā cittena saha saṃprayogajāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2770: yaḥ kleśaḥ sahajo bhavati na sa āgantuka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2775: cittamidaṃ tatkāla eva niruddhaṃ na malanimittavat bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2776: cittaṃ tatkāla eva vinaṣṭaṃ kena malena lipyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2785: kintu tathāgataḥ cittaṃ nityaṃ sthāyīti vadatāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛta āha āgantukamalakliṣṭaṃ sat cittamapariśuddhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:2786: kiñca kusīdasattvā ye śṛṇvanti cittaṃ prakṛtito 'pariśuddhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:2788: na te cittavyavadānamārabheran ityataḥ tathāgata āha prakṛtipariśuddhamiti //
SA16hvsatssu:2792: śāstramāha- kecidvadanti anuśayāścittasamprayuktā iti / kecidvadanti cittaviprayuktā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2799: bhavatāṃ śāsane yadyapyucyate cittaviprayukto 'nuśayaḥ cittasamprayuktasaṃyojanaparyavasthānasya hetuṃ karotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:2802: uktaṃ hi sūtre- avidyāyoniśomanaskāramithyāsaṅkalpādibhyo rāgādīni saṃyojanani prādurbhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2804: yadyapi bhavatāṃ śāsana uktaṃ- cirābhyastasaṃyojanaparyavasthāpako 'nuśayo nāma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2810: yujyata iti cet sarve 'pi dharmāḥ pratyutpanna hetorupadyeran nātītahetoḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2811: tathā ca na karmajo vipākaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:2813: anuśayānāmeṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt kathaṃ punaste janakahetavaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2822: śāstramāha- kāśyapīyā vadanti ananubhūtavipākaṃ karma atīte 'dhvani asti /
SA16hvsatssu:2833: yathā payo nirodhe daghno hetukṛtyaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:2845: śāstramāha- mahīśāsakā vadanti tathāgata saṅghavartī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2847: yadi mataṃ tathāgataḥ catasṛṣu pariṣatsu antargataḥ yaduta sattvapariṣat prāṇipariṣat manuṣyapariṣat āryapariṣat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2849: yadi mataṃ tathāgataḥ śrāvakapariṣadi antargata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2853: (pṛ) saṅghārāmāgragasya tathāgatasya dāyakaḥ puruṣaḥ saṅghadāyaka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2858: (pṛ) bhagavān gautamīmavocat- imaṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghe dehi /
SA16hvsatssu:2859: tadā ahamapi pūjito bhaviṣyāmi saṅgho 'pi ca /
SA16hvsatssu:2862: yathoktaṃ sūtre yo rogaprekṣī sa māṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:2868: ato jñāyate na bhagavān saṅgāntargata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2869: kiñca bhagavān na saṅghakarmapraviṣṭaḥ nāpi anyasaṅghavastusamaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2873: śāstramāha- vātsīputrīyā vadanti asti pudgala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2878: yathā bahuṣu sūtreṣu tathāgato bhikṣūnāha- nāmamātrataḥ prajñaptimātrata upayogamātrataḥ pudgala ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2880: nāmamātrata ityādinā jñāyate na paramārtha iti / kiñcoktaṃ sūtre-
SA16hvsatssu:2881: yo na paśyati duḥkhañca sa ātmānantu paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:2882: duḥkhadarśī yathābhūtaṃ sa ātmānaṃ na paśyati // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2883: yadi vastu san ātmā, duḥkhadarśyapi ātmānaṃ paśyet /
SA16hvsatssu:2885: api ca sūtre bhagavānavocat- yatrāsmīti tatreñjitam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2886: yadvastu sat na tatreñjitaṃ bhavati yathā cakṣuḥ, tasya vastusattvāt na [tatra] iñjitamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:2887: tatra tatra sūtre ca ātmavādaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2890: kiṃ nu satveti pratyeṣi māradṛṣṭigataṃ nu te /
SA16hvsatssu:2898: nāstyātmā na cātmīyaṃ na sattvo nāpi mānavaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:2905: na coktaṃ ātmānaṃ vijānātīti / ato nāstyātmā / ato nāstyātmā /
SA16hvsatssu:2914: bimbisārapratyudgamanasūtre bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha- vibhāvayata yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ prākṛtānāṃ prajñaptimanurudhya vadāmi astyātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:2917: kiñcāha- pañcaskandhānupādāyāsti nānāvidhaṃ nāma yaduta ātmā sattvo mānavo deva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2921: sthavirapūrṇakaḥ kaścit tīrthikaḥ āha- yadi puruṣo mithyādṛṣṭayā asantamastīti vadati /
SA16hvsatssu:2923: yamakasūtre śāriputro yamakamavocat- kiṃ yamaka samanupaśyasi rūpaskandho 'rhan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2925: kiṃ samanupaśyasi vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānamarhan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2931: yadevaṃ parimṛgya [dṛṣṭa eva dharme satyataḥ sthirataḥ] nopalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:2932: tatkalyaṃ nu te vyākaraṇaṃ arhan [kāyasya bhedāducchidyate vinaśyati] na bhavati paraṃ maraṇāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:2933: abhūtkhalu me [āyuṣman] śāriputra pūrvaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigatam,
SA16hvsatssu:2934: idaṃ punarāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā tacca pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ prahīṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:2936: yadyasti ātmā, pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ iti na vadet /
SA16hvsatssu:2940: uktañcaśreṇikasūtre- trayāṇāṃ śāstṝṇāṃ yo nopalabhate pratyutpannamātmānamūrdhvabhāvinaṃ vātmānaṃ tamahaṃ śāstāraṃ buddhaṃ vadāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2943: yadi mataṃ satyātmani ātmeti saṃjñā na viparyāsa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2963: astyekāntata ātmeti yo vadati sa ṣaṇṇāṃ mithyādṛṣṭīnīmanyatamasyāmanupatati /
SA16hvsatssu:2969: paramārthatastu astyātmeti brūvato hi doṣo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:2972: api cātmadṛṣṭimūloddharaṇāyāha bhagavān yathā mogharāja [māṇava]pṛcchāyāṃ bhagavān mogharājaṃ pratyāha-
SA16hvsatssu:2975: evaṃ lokamavekṣantaṃ] mṛtyurājo na paśyati // iti
SA16hvsatssu:2981: kasmāt caturṣu vyākaraṇeṣu caturtha sthapanīyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yaduta bhavati puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt na bhavati [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt] bhavati ca na bhavati ca [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt],
SA16hvsatssu:2982: naiva bhavati na na bhavati [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt] /
SA16hvsatssu:2983: yadi paramārthato nāstyātmā, na syādidaṃ sthapanīyaṃ vyākaraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:2984: ūrdhvakāyavedakaḥ [SSS_91] sattvo nāstīti yat keṣāñcit vacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:2987: tatra bhagavānevamāha- tasmin samaye ahameva mahāsudarśano rājā evaṃkāya ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:2988: pūrvakebhya utpannā idānīntanāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ na tu purāṇā eva /
SA16hvsatssu:2989: tasmādastyātmā [yaḥ] pūrvakebhyo 'dya yāvat bhavati / kiñcāha bhagavān-
SA16hvsatssu:2990: iha nandati pretya nandati kṛtapuṇyo ubhayanna nandati / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:2995: ekatyaḥ pudgala utpadyate loke bahūnāṃ vipattyanutāpāya /
SA16hvsatssu:2996: ekatyaḥ pudgala utpadyate loke bahūnāṃ lābhāya /
SA16hvsatssu:2997: yat kuśalākuśalakarmaṇāṃ samudācaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ tat sattvopagam /
SA16hvsatssu:2998: tatra tatra ca sūtre bhagavān svayamāha- ahaṃ vadāmi sattvā ūrdhvakāyaṃ vedayante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3013: yathā bālakānāṃ nāmamātreṇa vastudānaṃ savipākaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:3016: nāmamātrato 'sadapi astīti vādina āryā mṛṣāvādinaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3022: yadi vyavahārato 'sadapi astīti vadatāṃ punaḥ sūtragatāni pāramārthikāni dvādaśanidānāni trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā ityādi vacanaṃ na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:3023: asti paraloka iti vādinamanusṛtya vadanti astīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3025: vadanti ca loke ayutāni vastūni īśvarādutpannani /
SA16hvsatssu:3029: ato bhavatodāhṛtaṃ sūtraṃ sarvaṃ sāmānyato dūṣitameva /
SA16hvsatssu:3032: yadbhavatā pūrvamuktaṃ sthapanīyavyākaraṇāt astyātmeti jñāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3036: ato nāsti paramārthata ātmā avaktavya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3039: yathāha bhavatāmāgamaḥ cakṣuṣā dṛśyamānaṃ rūpamupādāyetyato vināśyātmā /
SA16hvsatssu:3041: tadā na vaktavyaṃ na rūpaṃ nārūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3045: sūtre hyuktam- pañcendriyāṇi nānyopyasya viṣayān pratyanubhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3051: yat cakṣurvijñānavijñeyaṃ na tat rūpamiti bravīṣi /
SA16hvsatssu:3053: sūtre bhagavān svayaṃ bhikṣūnāmantryāha- asatyapyātmani saṃskārāṇāṃ [SSS_93] santānamupādāya jananamaraṇamastīti vadāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:3054: paśyāmi ca divyena cakṣuṣā sattvānutpadyamānān mriyamāṇāṃśca /
SA16hvsatssu:3057: bhavatāṃ śāsane hyucyate ātmā na jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3060: anyānyapi pāpakarmāṇi na santi ityato bhavatāṃ śāsanameva mithyādarśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:3063: ta eva pañcaskandhāḥ santatyā buddho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3065: bhavatāṃ śāsane ātmana ekatvāt viśeṣo na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:3067: sūtre bhagavān idaṃ vastu pratiṣidhyāha- nāhaṃ vadāmi kaścidimān pañcaskandhān parityajya tān skandhānupādatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3068: kintu tatpañcaskandhānāṃ santatyā bhedābhāvādāha- ubhayatna nandatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3074: na hi sambhavati tasya saṃkleśasamayaṃ [sattva] upādatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3075: kintu prajñaptyā hetupratyayānāṃ saṃkliṣṭatvāt āha- sattvāḥ saṃkliśyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3078: bhavatāṃ śāsane cocyate na pañcaskandhā evātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:3080: vayantu vadāmaḥ pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā ātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:3081: imamātmānamupādāya asti janma asti nirodhaḥ puṇyapāpamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3085: abhūtasaṃjñayā bhavānevaṃ kalpayati na tathā bhagavadāśayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3086: vividhā ātmavādāḥ sarve duṣṭāḥ yathā bhavān bravīti- pañcaskandhān vihāya anyo 'styātmeti tīrthikā manyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3092: atha skandhasya santi trayo bhedāḥ- śīlasamādhiprajñāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:3105: loke ca nāsti ko 'pi dharma eka ityavaktavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3107: (pṛ) yathā agnirindhanañca na vaktuṃ śakyata evaṃ vā nānā veti /
SA16hvsatssu:3126: evamātmāpi pañcaskandhaiḥ saha triṣu adhvasu vartamānaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:3127: yathā cāgnirindhanaṃñca saṃskṛtam, ātmāpi pañcaskandhaiḥ saha saṃskṛtaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:3128: yadyapi bhavānāha- agnirindhanena naiko na nānā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3137: bhavāṃstu abhūtasaṃjñayā imamātmānaṃ vikalpya keṣāṃ hitaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:3139: ṣaḍvijñānavijñeya iti bhavatokta ātmā na ṣaḍviṣayarūpo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3142: caturṣu satyeṣu asaṅgraprahītaśca na satyeṣu bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3145: bhavatāṃ śāsana ucyate jñeyadharmā yaduta pañcadharmakośāḥ- atītā anāgatāḥ pratyutpannā asaṃskṛtā avaktavyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3148: sa caturbhyo dharmebhyo 'nya itīcchanti khalu bhavantaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3152: ato bhavatā pūrvamuktam- tīrthikāḥ pañcaskandhān vihāya pṛthagātmāstīti manyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3155: yadbhavānāha- ātmā prajñaptimātramitīdaṃ gāḍhataraṃ cintanīyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3158: jinaśāsane hyucyate lokasatyavastu na pragāḍhaṃ cintanīyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3163: yadavocadbhavān lokoktāni sarvāṇi anusartavyāni yadvadanti īśvarādutpannāni na yutāni vastūni ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3170: savijñānānāṃ skandhānāṃ santatyā samudācāre sati asti karma asti vipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3172: tasmāt pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā ātmā ityākhyāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3182: satyaṃ nāma catvāri [ārya]satyāni yaduta duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasamudayo duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī patipat /
SA16hvsatssu:3188: tathāgataḥ svayamimaṃ dharmaṃ sādhayannapi sattvānāṃ tāraṇāya tatra tatra viprakīrṇaṃ deśitavān /
SA16hvsatssu:3197: rūpaskandho yaduta catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya dharmāśca /
SA16hvsatssu:3221: uktaṃ khalu sūtre- yatkiñcana rūpaṃ sarvaṃ tat catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya [rūpam] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3223: (u) yatkiñcit tatsarvamiti vadan rūpalakṣaṇaṃ nirdhārayati nānyadastīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3225: tatpratyākhyānāyāha catvāri [eva] mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya [rūpam] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3233: (pṛ) kasmāt pṛthivyādaya eva rūpaṃ na śabdaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3248: yathā gandharasādayaḥ saukṣmyāt ekamākāraṃ yugapadāśrayante na mithaḥ pratighnanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3249: ataḥ śabdādayaḥ sāvaraṇāḥ sapratighā ityato rūpamityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3251: yat chidyate bhidyate vihiṃsyata ityādi tat sarvaṃ rūpāśritam /
SA16hvsatssu:3264: tīrthikāḥ kecidvadanti rūpādireva mahābhūtaṃ bhavatīti yathā sāṃkhyādīnām /
SA16hvsatssu:3265: kecidvadanti rūpādi vihāyāsti mahābhūtam iti yathā vaiśeṣikādīnām /
SA16hvsatssu:3266: ata idaṃ sūtramavadhārayati rūpādyupādāya pṛthivyādi mahābhūtaṃ sidhyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3268: kiñcāha sūtram- khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3272: te hi vadanti pṛthivīṃ paśyāmi pṛthivīṃ jighremi (dharmi) pṛthivīṃ rasayāmi pṛthivīṃ spṛśāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3273: sūtre coktaṃ yathā sparśavatī pṛthivī draṣṭavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:3274: pṛthivyādisarvāyata nagato 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyati rūpaṃ na kaṭhinyādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3275: kiñca puruṣo nirūpayati [idaṃ] pṛthivīrūpam, pṛthivīgandhaḥ, pṛthivīrasaḥ pṛthivīsparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3283: kiñcāha- ahamimāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ dagdhvā vidhūmaṃ bhasmasātkariṣyāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3284: atra prajñaptisatīṃ pṛthivīṃ dahati na kāṭhinyamātraṃ dahati /
SA16hvsatssu:3287: kūpopame coktam- āpo dṛśyante ca spṛśyante ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:3293: kiñcāha bhagavān- aṣṭaguṇā āpaḥsusaṃsthitaṃ śītalaṃ mṛdu madhuraṃ śuci adurgandhaṃ pātuḥ prahlādanaṃ paridāhanivāraṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3294: tatra yat susaṃsthitaṃ śītalaṃ sukumāraṃ tat sarvaṃ sparśāntargatam /
SA16hvsatssu:3301: upādāya dharmāḥ sarve prajñaptisantaḥ na dravyasantaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3304: evaṃ skandheṣu satsveva bhavati sattveti saṃvṛtiḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3309: [SSS_101] tattu sāśrayayaṃ sādhiṣṭhānakamiti na tathāgataśāsanaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:3312: khakkhaṭādayaścatvāro dharmāḥ kimarthā bhavantiiti kevalaṃ mahābhūtārthā bhavati iti prāpyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3314: ato jñāyate catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptimātrāṇi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3323: khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ snehalakṣaṇo 'bdhātuḥ ūṣmalakṣaṇastejodhātuḥ īraṇalakṣaṇo vāyudhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3325: rūpādi bhautikaṃ rūpaṃ caturbhyo mahābhūtebhyaḥ samutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3327: khakkhaṭādinā ca catvāri mahābhūtāni nirucyante yat khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sā pṛthivīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3329: kiñca sūtre dvābhyāmākārābhyāmucyate khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ, snehaḥ snehagatam ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3330: ato jñāyate khakkhaṭaṃ vastudharmaḥ kharagataṃ prajñaptidharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3337: sūtre cāha bhagavān- yaccakṣuṣi [māṃsa]piṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ iyaṃ pṛthivī /
SA16hvsatssu:3341: asmin māṃsapiṇḍe bhagavānāha santi catvāri mahābhūtāni iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3346: yadi kaścit brūyāt catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3348: yadi kharagataṃ pṛthivīti āpaḥ kharagatā iti tā api pṛthivī syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3349: mṛtpiṇḍaḥ snehagata iti so 'pi āpaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:3353: ato na vaktuṃ śakyate kharagataṃ pṛthivī, khakkhaṭamātraṃ pṛthivīdhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3356: yathoktaṃ sūtre yatkiñcidrūpaṃ sarvaṃ tat caturmahābhūtakṛtamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3358: catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti vaktustāni vinirbhaktāni syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3361: tathā ca sati cakṣurmāsapiṇḍe catvāri mahābhūtāni na syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3363: sūtrasyāvirodhaṃ kāmayānasya bhavataḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni dravyāṇi bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3367: sarve hi tīrthikā vadanti catvāri mahābhūtāni rūpādibhirekāni yadi vānakānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3370: kiñca vayaṃ vadāmaḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭāni khakkhaṭādīni caturmahābhūtāni na tu vaiśeṣikāṇāmiva tānyapratyakṣadṛṣṭānyapi /
SA16hvsatssu:3374: āha ca cittaṃ mahatāṃ dharmāṇāmāśraya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3375: asminnartha uktam khakkhaṭameva svaragataṃ na punardhamāntaramiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3377: laukikāḥ sarve śraddadhante yāvadaṣṭaguṇā āpa iti yadbhavato vacanaṃ tat vyavahārānuvartanamātrato vadanti na dravyamahābhūtā [nuvartana]taḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3378: kiñcoktaṃ bhavatā- upādāyadharmāḥ sarve prajñaptyātmakā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3381: uktaṃ hi sūtre- yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānyupādāya dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3383: bhagavān pratyāha- cakṣu[rbhikṣo] catvāri mahāmūtānyupādāya rūpaprasāda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3387: dharme dharmo vartata iti mātraṃ vadāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3388: yadbhavānāha- khakkhaṭādayaḥ kimarthā bhavantīti kevalaṃ mahābhūtārthā iti bhavanti iti prāpyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3389: khakkhaṭādayaḥ sārthakā yaduta khakkhaṭa lakṣaṇaṃ sandhatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3399: yadyapyuktaṃ bhavatā abhidharma uktaṃ- khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3403: [SSS_104] bhagavān hi svayamāha- khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataśca pṛthivī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3406: rūpādikaṃ caturbhyo mahābhūtebhyaḥ samutpadyata iti bhavaduktaṃ na yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3413: yathā cānando bhikṣuṇīśikṣaṇāya bhaginīmāha- ayaṃ kāyaḥ āhārasambhūtaḥ tṛṣṇāsambhūto mānasambhūto maithunasambhūta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3414: ato jñāyate rūpādi rna caturmahābhūtasambhūt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3416: tathāpi catvāri mahābhūtāni ca aṃśena hetavaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3419: tathā cakṣurādīnāṃ karmasambhūtatve 'pi catvāri mahābhūtāni aṃśato hetavo bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3421: yathā kalpāvasāne kalpādau ca mahatī vṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3427: yathā ca rūpasantānaḥ vyucchidya punaḥ pratisandhīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3433: utkaṭakarmabalastu na bāhyapratyayamapekṣate tathā dharmā api syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3440: kenārthena khakkhaṭādito rūpādirutpadyate na rūpāditaḥ khakkhaṭādiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3445: na vaktuṃ śakyaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe hetū iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3450: pradīpo hi rūpaṃ prakāśa iti dharmadvayasamavāyātmakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3451: rūpameva prakāśa iti na pradīpaḥ pṛthagbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3461: yathā sapratidhe vijñānasya cakṣūrūpaṃ hetupratyayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3465: pūrvaniruddhaṃ cittaṃ hetuḥ iti kathaṃ yugapajjāyamānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3466: yo dharmo yaṃ hetumanuvartyotpadyate sa tasya hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3467: yaccittaṃ yadindriyāṇyupādāya bhavati sa tadupādāya dharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3477: (u) na vayaṃ vadāmaḥ asarūpahetorna jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3478: kintu sarūpahetau ca sati jāyata iti vadāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3479: tasmāducyate rūpādibhyo [SSS_106] rūpādayo jāyante na caturmahābhūtebhya eva jāyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3480: ato nābadhāraṇaṃ bhavati rūpādayaścaturmahābhūtebhya eva jāyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3481: khakkhaṭādinā catvāri mahābhūtāni nirūpyanta iti yadavocadbhavān /
SA16hvsatssu:3485: saukumāryādestu aniyataḥ kadācit khakkhaṭabahule saṅghāte vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:3494: yathoktaṃ sūtre- khakkhaṭā[di]gatānīti caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ vibhāgā nirdiśyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3495: ato jñāyate khakkhaṭagatadharmaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ na tu khakkhaṭamātralakṣaṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3500: saṃjñākriyāyai yat kiñcan khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sarvaṃ tat pṛthividhātuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3510: prajñaptitaḥ prasiddhe hetau prajñaptitaḥ saṃjñā bhavati yathā vadanti- paśyāmyahaṃ vṛkṣasya chettāraṃ puruṣamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3518: kiñca tathāgate tejovatī samādhimupasampanne tatkāyā dvividhāni jvālārūpāṇi niścaranti /
SA16hvsatssu:3523: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santi kāye 'smin nakhalomakeśādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3526: uktañcabīja sūtre yataḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ syāt nābdhātuḥ na bījāni vṛddhiṃ [virūḍhiṃ vipulatā] māpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3527: tatra kiṃ pṛthivīdhātuḥ yaduta prajñaptitaḥ kṣetram, na tu khakkhaṭamātralakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:3529: ekasya dharmasya dravyatvaṃ prajñaptitvamiti dviprakāro 'pi nopalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3532: mahābhūtāni tu dravyataśca prajñaptitaśca santīdaṃ mithyāśāstram /
SA16hvsatssu:3533: ṣaḍdhātu sūtre ca bhagavānāha- keśalomanakhādīni pṛthivīdhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3534: hastipadopamasūtre coktam- keśā lomā nakhā ityādīni ayamucyate pṛthivīdhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3538: yadavādīḥ bhagavānāha- yaccakṣurmāsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ iyaṃ pṛthivī ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3539: vacanenānena bhagavān pradarśayati pañcendriyāṇi catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3542: kecidvadanti indriyāṇi nānāsvabhāvajāni yaduta pṛthivīmahābhūtāt sambhūtaṃ ghrāṇamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:3543: tatpratyākhyānāya bhagavānāha- cakṣurādīndriyāṇi caturmahābhūtasamavāyātmakāni śūnyānyavastūni iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3546: asmin māṃsapiṇḍe santi catvāro bhāgāḥ khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatamityādi vacanena bhagavān pradarśayati sarvapadārthāḥ caturmahābhūtasambhūtā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3551: pṛthivyādīnāṃ khakkhaṭagatadharmādayo viśiṣṭāḥ vāyostu na tathā /
SA16hvsatssu:3553: yadavādīḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti vaktuḥ tanmahābhūtalakṣaṇāni vinirbhaktāni syuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:3557: yo dharmo lakṣaṇādanya na sa āśrayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3561: (u) āśraya iti saṃjñāyate nānyadvastu lakṣaṇasyāśraya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3567: yathā ātape kevalaṃ rūpayuktaḥ sparśa upalabhyate nānye dharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3568: candrikāyāṃ kevalaṃ rūpayuktaḥ śītasparśa upalabhyate nānye dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3588: ataścatvāri mahābhūtāni na vinirbhāgalābhina iti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3591: (u) tathā cet vāyau kadācidgandho 'stīti gandho vāyugataḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:3603: evaṃ kiṃ saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpena yaduta catvāri mahābhūtāni sahajātāni apṛthagbhāgavartīnīti //
SA16hvsatssu:3607: pūrvaṃ yadavādīḥ- na vayaṃ brūmaḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni rūpādibhirekāni yadi vānekāni ityato 'navadyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3610: tīrthikāḥ sarve siṣādhayiṣantītyata ścaturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāmekatvanānātve udāharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3611: ato bhagavān prajñaptau catarṇāṃ mahābhūtānāmudāhṛtatvāt teṣāmarthamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:3613: laukikāḥ svabhāvataḥ pṛthivyādimahābhūtāni jānanto 'pi na vidanti [teṣāṃ] vastubhāvam /
SA16hvsatssu:3618: asti dvidhā āśrayārtha ityuktvā mahābhūtāni dravyāṇīti yadavocaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3619: tatra na pratīmo- ayamāśrayārthaḥ, [ta]danyo yaḥ sa prajñaptisan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3620: [aṣṭaguṇā āpa iti] vyavahārānuvartanato vadanti na tu dravyamahābhūtā[nuvartana]ta iti yadvacanaṃ tadayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:3622: yadi vā pravacane yadi vā loke na hetupratyayairvinā rūpādiṣu caturmahābhūta saṃjñāṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3624: rūpādiṣu hi puruṣa iti saṃjñā na hetupratyayairvinā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3625: yo vināpi sudṛḍhahetupratyayaiḥ saṃjñāṃ karoti so 'śvaṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣa ityāhvayet /
SA16hvsatssu:3628: laukikāḥ sadā [pṛthag] vadanti pṛthivīti śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3635: yathārūpamidaṃ prajñapterhetuṃ sādhayati tatra puruṣa iti saṃjñā /
SA16hvsatssu:3638: evaṃ rūpādiṣu dharmeṣu catvāri mahābhūtānīti saṃjñāṃ vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3640: yadavocaḥ- yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānyupādāya siddhā [dharmā] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3642: yathā bhavatāṃ śāsane bhautikaṃ rūpaṃ na kasyacijjanakam /
SA16hvsatssu:3643: tathā mama śāsane 'pi prajñaptau na [tat]kasyacit janyam /
SA16hvsatssu:3646: yadavādīḥ- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhautiko rūpaprasādaḥ cakṣuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:3651: yadyupyuktaṃ bhavatā dharme dharmo vartate nirāśrayo niradhiṣṭhātā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:3652: [tatra yo dharmaḥ] sa evāśrayaḥ adhiṣṭhātā ca /
SA16hvsatssu:3664: yadāha bhavān- khakkhaṭabahulo rūpādi [samavāyaḥ] pṛthivīmahābhūtamityataḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ prajñaptisanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3669: (1) yo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ sa eva [kadācit] mṛduḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3676: yena khakkhaṭaḥ kāyaḥ mṛduḥ kāya iti buddhirbhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:3685: anenaiva kāraṇena mṛdvādayaḥ sparśā api na santi //
SA16hvsatssu:3690: yadyapyāha bhavān- yo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ sa eva [kadācit] mṛduriti (1) /
SA16hvsatssu:3694: bahūnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā mṛtpiṇḍa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3697: mama saṃśliṣṭasaṃṅghātāṇuṣu idaṃ khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaṃ labhyata iti asti khakkhaṭatā /
SA16hvsatssu:3698: asaṃśliṣṭeṣu tanmṛdulakṣaṇaṃ labhyate, ityato nāsti doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3703: upalabhyante kilāsmābhiḥ ekasminneva dharme bahavaḥ sparśāḥ khakkhaṭo 'pi mṛdurapīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3704: yadapyuktam- khakkhaṭatā mṛdutā cānyonyamapekṣata iti nāsti niyateti (4) tannayujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:3716: yathāgniṃ dṛṣṭvā ūṣma jñāyate iti noṣma dṛśyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3717: yathā puruṣaḥ kambalaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimidaṃ kaṭhinaṃ kiṃ vā mṛdu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3744: yo dharmaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataḥ sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3747: āpaḥ snigdhā atiśaityāt karakā bhāvanti iti kathaṃ mahābhūtāni na svalakṣaṇaṃ jahati /
SA16hvsatssu:3748: yathāha sūtram- caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kadācit vikāryaṃ catvāraḥ śrāddhā nānyathopalabhyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3755: (pṛ) abhidharma uktam- apāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sneha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3761: ato drava eva [lakṣaṇam] na tu snehaḥ syandanaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:3781: karmeti kevalaṃ lokasatyato vadāmaḥ na tu paramārthataḥ laghudharmamupādāya deśāntare jananadharmaḥ karmeti saṃjñāṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:3786: yathā daśapalaṃ vastu viṃśatipalavastvapekṣya laghu pañcapalavastvapekṣa tu guru /
SA16hvsatssu:3802: gurutvavarjitā anye rūpādayo dharmā atulyatvāt laghavaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3805: (u) na vayamaṅgīkurmo rūpādīn vihāya dharmāntaraṃ guru bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3806: rūpādaya eva dharmāḥ [SSS_115] kecit tulyasvabhāvā utpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3807: yathā khakkhaṭamakhakkhaṭaṃ balamabalaṃ navaṃ purāṇamupacitamanucitaṃ kṣīṇamakṣīṇaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmam ityādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3810: ayaṃ rūpādisaṅghāto yadi pārthiva āpyo vā /
SA16hvsatssu:3820: gurulaghutvavikalpo 'vaśyaṃ kāyendriyeṇeṣyata ityato na gururlaghuḥ rūpādisaṅghātaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3821: (u) te ca khakkhaṭādayaḥ kadācit cakṣuṣā kadācit śrotrādīnā vikalpyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3822: te ca khakkhaṭādayaḥ padārthā na rūpādīn vihāya santi /
SA16hvsatssu:3829: (pṛ) na tasmin samaye jñāyata idaṃ gurulakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3830: (u) yathā parihitavastraḥ puruṣo 'spṛṣṭo 'pi jñāyate [ayaṃ] balavān abalavān iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3841_0: kecitsparśāḥ sadākāyagatāḥ na śītoṣṇādivat bāhyamapekṣyāgāminaḥ yaduta praśrabdhisukhaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:3841_1: styānaprakarṣaḥ astyānaprakarṣaḥ rogo viśeṣovā kāyataikṣṇyaṃ kāyamāndyam ālasyagurutā
