SA16hvsatssu:3847: yathā khakkhaṭākhakkhaṭatvādayo rūpādisaṅghātavartino 'pi [SSS_116] cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā jñātuṃ śakyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3848: yathā ca praśrabdhisukhādayo rūpādisaṅghātātmakakāyenāpi vijñāya vikalpyante / tathedamapi /
SA16hvsatssu:3849: yadi gururlaghuḥ sparśamātram [ityabhyupagamyate] ko doṣaḥ kimanayā rūpādisaṅghātavikalpakriyayā /
SA16hvsatssu:3868: kiṃntu yo laghuḥ san samudīraṇasya hetuṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:3871: tatra laghutvaṃ vāyorlakṣaṇaṃ samudīraṇatvaṃ vāyoḥ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:3884: kadācit kevalaṃ rūpasparśau staḥ yathā suvarṇajatādiṣu /
SA16hvsatssu:3886: kadācit trayo rūparasasparśāḥ santi tejasi kadācit rūparasagandhasparśāḥ santi /
SA16hvsatssu:3892: śītoṣṇakaṭhinasukumārādayaḥ sparśāḥ yanmahābhūtasantatāvavinirbhāgavartinaḥ tasya mahābhūtasya sparśā iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:3896: yathā vātarogiṇo mukhe tiktaraso 'stīti na sa bhiṣagvavati vāyau raso 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:3898: (pṛ) kecidvadanti vāyuḥ śīto na tu laghuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:3901: yathā himaṃ śītaṃ sat na vāyurbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:3910: sattve 'pi saukṣmyānnopalabhyata iti vaktuścitta eva saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ syāt yaduta vāyau rūparasau sta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3913: tasmāt yatphala upalabhyate nāvaśyaṃ taddhetau pūrvamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:3920: cakṣurvikalpayan bhagavānevaṃ vacanamāha yaccakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivīdhāturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3923: bhagavān cakṣuḥ śūnyamiti janānāṃ jijñāpayiṣayaivedṛśaṃ vacanamāha /
SA16hvsatssu:3924: tathā no cet cakṣuṣi khakkhaṭādikamanyadasti khakkhaṭādau vā anyadāsti cakṣuḥ [iti]khakkhaṭādīnāṃ vikalpe 'pi nāsti kaścanopakāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3928: tadā cakṣurādīni na puruṣapratyayā iti sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:3934: bhagavān pratyāha- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpi anidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ cakṣuḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3938: laukikāḥ sarve prajānanti rūpadarśanaṃ cakṣuryāvat sparśanaṃ kāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3943: pañcendriyāṇi caturmahābhūtamayānīti parididṛkṣayā bhagavān pratyāha- cakṣurbhikṣo [ādhyātmikamāyatana] catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpamanidarśanaṃ sapratighamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:3944: yo dharmo dravyasan na sa upādāyāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:3951: tathā nocet asya bhikṣoścakṣurādiṣu indriyeṣu śaṅkā naivocchidyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:3953: bhagavān prāha- cakṣurādīnindriyāṇi catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhavantītyato 'yaṃ bhikṣurjānāti adravyasan cakṣurdharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:3955: bhagavān cakṣuṣaḥ śūnyatvapradarśanāya tatra catvāri mahābhūtāni vikalpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:3956: yathā prajñayā aprapañcayitā vadati- ayaṃ kāyaḥ ṣaṭsu dhātuṣu vibhaktaḥ yat khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivīdhāturityādi pratyavekṣeteti /
SA16hvsatssu:3959: hastipadopamasūtre catvāri mahābhūtāni vikalpitāni na punaścakṣuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:3961: vātsaputrīyādaya abhidharmikā api īdṛśaṃ vacanaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:3975: yāni catvāri mahābhūtāni karmajāni cakṣurādisaṅgṛhītāni [tāni] ādhyātmikamāyātanam indriyam iti ca kathyante /
SA16hvsatssu:3983: (u) na yujyata [idam] yathā prasādamupādāya āpaḥ sphaṭikam /
SA16hvsatssu:3984: āpa eva prasannā āpa iti prasāda āpa eva /
SA16hvsatssu:3990: na ca prajñaptiḥ tatsādhanahetoranyeti vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4015: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu anindriyāṇāṃ vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4020: dharmatā ca tathā- ya indriyavirahitāḥ teṣāṃ vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4021: na bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni anindriyāṇi janayanti iti dharmatā tadapekṣeta /
SA16hvsatssu:4023: yathā dhānyakāraṇakarmapratilambhāt dhānyaṃ bījāṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrāṇyapekṣyāpi kramaśo jāyate / evamidamapi /
SA16hvsatssu:4025: yathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurindriyakaṃ samanantaraniruddhacittamupādāya ca bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4031: cittadharmaśca tathā syāt- yat samanantaraniruddhacittendriyakaṃ bhavati nānyatkiñcidapekṣata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4049: yathoktaṃ sūtre- manaḥ pratītya dharmāṃśca manovijñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4066: yathokta sūtre- paṭaṃ datvā rūpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:4077: vadanti ca mriyamāṇasya cakṣuḥ sūryaṃ pratigacchatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4093: yathā vadanti- annaṃ datvā pañcavastu- vipākān labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4102: yathā kṣālitacakṣuṣkasya puruṣasya cakṣuḥ sphuṭameva pratyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:4114: yathā cakṣurākāśādipratyayaṃ labdhvā rūpamaprāpyāpi sudūraṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4116: ato na kāryaḥ saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpoi yaduta tejobahulaṃ [cakṣu]riti /
SA16hvsatssu:4121: yathā ulūkādayaḥ pakṣiṇo viḍālasṛgālādayastīryañca bāhyāmālokamanapekṣyāpi draṣṭuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4125: yadbhavānavādīḥ- cakṣuḥ saprabhatvāt sudūraṃ rūpaṃ patihantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4135: upari devānāṃ mriyamāṇānāṃ cakṣuḥ kutra pratigacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:4145: tasmādindriyeṣu mahābhūtāni nyūnādhikāni bhavantīti bhavadvacanaṃ dūṣitameva /
SA16hvsatssu:4149: abtejovāyuṣu rūparasasparśāḥ santi iti rūparasasparśajñānotpādakā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4163: apāṃ śītasparśamātraṃ tejasa uṣṇasparśamātraṃ jivhācakṣurbhyāṃ jñātuṃ śaknuyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4172: (pṛ) indriyāṇi viṣayān kiṃ prāpya vijānanti utāprāpya vijānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4179: bhavato hṛdayam- yatkecidvadanti indriyaṃ vijñānamapekṣya saha vijānāti na tu vijñānaviyuktaṃ vijānātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4184: yadīndriyaṃ vijānāti idamindriyakarma idaṃ vijñānakarma iti vivektavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:4189: bhavatāṃ śāsane śrotrādīnīndriyāṇi na tejaḥprakṛtikāni iti na prakāśayeyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4193: tadā prakāśakasya punaḥ prakāśaka ityevamanavasthā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4194: yadi punaḥ prakāśakaṃ vināpi indriyamātraṃ prakāśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:4203: yathā sati tejasi ūṣma nāsati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4204: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:4209: uktañca sūtre- vayaṃ māṇavakāḥ susūkṣmamaṣi vastu jānīmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4215: indriyeṇa viṣayo gṛhyate vijñānena vikalpyate ityayamevendriyavijñānayorbhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4216: (u) sūtre bhagavān svayamāha- cakṣu[brāhmaṇa]dvāraṃ[yāvadeva] rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4220: (pṛ) āha ca- mano dvāraṃ [yāvadeva] dharmāṇāṃ vijñānāye ti /
SA16hvsatssu:4233: kiñca laukikā vyavaharanti- cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4236: āha ca bhagavān- paśyāmi rāgādīn doṣān iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4237: candraḥ kṣīṇa iti laukikānāṃ vacanaṃ bhagavānapyanuvadati /
SA16hvsatssu:4244: (u) cakṣuṣo vijñānāśrayahetutāmanusṛtya tasmin hetau paśyatīti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4245: yathā vadanti sa puruṣaḥ paśyati ayaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4246: yathā ca vadanti janāḥ puṇyapāpādīni kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4248: yathā ca vadanti vāmacakṣuṣā paśyati dakṣiṇacakṣuṣā paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4249: vadanti ca sūryācandramasābhyāṃ paśyati sūryācandramasau paśyataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4251: kadācinmadhyaṃ paśyati [SSS_126] yat dvāramadhyaṃ [tat] paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4266: cakṣurupādāya vijñāne paśyati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4267: yathā mañcastheṣu puruṣeṣu krośatsu mañcāḥ krośantīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4268: cakṣuḥpratisaṃyuktaṃ vijñānakarma ityatastatra cakṣuṣi vijñānakarma vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4269: yathā hastapādapratisaṃyukte puruṣe vartamānaṃ puruṣakarma hastakarmeti vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4272: yathā vadanti amukaḥ puruṣo 'mukaṃ grāmaṃ dahatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4277: evaṃ cakṣurbhyomutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ rūpaṃ paśyatītyataścakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4278: cakṣuḥsannikṛṣṭe vijñāne rūpaṃ paśyati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4280: cakṣuṣā cākṣuṣaṃ vijñānaṃ vivicyata ityataścakṣuṣi cākṣuṣavijñānakarmāropyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4283: yathā dhane prahīṇe puruṣaḥ prahīṇa iti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4284: pravivṛddhe ca dhane pravivṛddhaḥ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4285: cakṣurvijñāne cakṣuṣā saṃyujya paśyati sati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4286: yathā vṛkṣe puruṣeṇa saṃyujya chidyamāne sati puruṣo vṛkṣaṃ chinnattīti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4287: yathā vā kṛṣṇavarṇasaṃyukte paṭe kṛṣṇaḥ paṭa iti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4288: sarve ca dharmā mithaḥ saṃkīrya vyavahriyante /
SA16hvsatssu:4290: cakṣūṣā rūpaṃ paśyatīti vaktavye saṃkṣipya vyavaharantaḥ kevalamāhuḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4294: bhavānidaṃ prativaktavyaḥ cakṣurādayaḥ pañcadharmā stadanyarūpādīnatiśerata ityata indriyamiti vyavahriyante /
SA16hvsatssu:4297: yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ viyoge vijñānaṃ notpadyate, tathā yadi rūpādīnāṃ viyoge 'pi vijñānaṃ notpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4306: rūpavijñānamityukte saṃśayaḥ prasajyate kimidaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ kiṃ vā rūpaṃ pratītya manovijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:4314: prasanne tu indriye vijñānaṃ viśadaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4318: eko viṣayo bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ sādhāraṇa upalabhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4327: yadbhavānavādīḥ- vayaṃ māṇavakāḥ susūkṣmamapi vastu jānīmaḥ tadyathā cakṣurmyāṃ dṛśyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4329: laukikāścakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadantītyata āhuḥ tadyathā cakṣurbhyāṃ dṛśyata iti / yathā ha bhagavān-
SA16hvsatssu:4332: acetanāpi jihvā tu na darvībhājanopamā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4334: jihvāśritaṃ mano jihvāvijñānaṃ janayatītyata āha jihvā [sūpa]rasaṃ vettīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4335: tathā cakṣurāśritya samutpanne vijñāne cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4336: ata āha- jinaurasāḥ paśyanti tadyathā cakṣurbhyāṃ dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4337: yadbhavānavādīḥ- indriyeṇa viṣayo gṛhyate vijñānena vikalpyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4340: na ca yūyaṃ bravītha indriyasyaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ viśiṣṭalakṣaṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4354: idānīṃ kiṃ viṣayendriyasaṃyogādvijñānamutpadyate kiṃ vā tadviyogāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4363: ato jñātavyaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ na prāpya vijānāti / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4364: śrotrādivijñānaṃ dvividham- kiñcitprāpya vijānāti kiñcidaprāpya vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4369: dṛṣṭaṃ khalu trayāṇāmeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ viṣayaiḥ saṃyogāt vijñānaṃ labhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4384: yathoktaṃ sūtre- trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4389: ghrāṇaṃ gandhe jihvā rase kāyaḥ spraṣṭavye cakṣūrūpe śrotraṃ śabde yadyaprāptam /
SA16hvsatssu:4395: bahupratyayasāmagryā ca jñānamutpadyate iti cakṣūraśmirviṣayasaṃyogāya gacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:4399: viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe mandaṃ bhāṣamāṇe na śrūyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4409: aprāpya śravaṇe tu sa vibhāgo na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4410: ato jñāyate śabdaḥ prāpya śrūyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4415: aprāpya śravaṇe tu na sākalyena śrūyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:4416: yathā rūpasyāprāptyā darśānāt na sākalyena darśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:4417: ato jñāyate na rūpasamaḥ śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4419: yathā rūpasyekadeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā avaśiṣṭamapi ālokamapekṣya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4432: śabdaṃ yadi ghananibiḍaṃ jalādyāvṛtamapi śrotraṃ śrotuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:4439: ekāṃ diśaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaknoti naikasmin samaye sarvā diśo draṣṭuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:4440: yathā pūrvābhimukhaḥ puruṣaḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ rūpañca paśyati nānyā diśaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4441: vadanti ca mano gacchatīti / ataḥ prāpya viṣayaṃ vijānāti / yathoktaṃ sūtre-
SA16hvsatssu:4445: parispandatīdaṃ cittaṃ svābhīṣṭañca yathā caratyadaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4450: yathā puruṣo dūrataḥ sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimayaṃ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4457: kasmāt sthūlaṃ paśyati na sūkṣmaṃ [SSS_131] vivecayati /
SA16hvsatssu:4458: rūpadarśane 'sti dvibhāgaḥ yaduta pūrvasyāṃ paścimāyāṃ vā diśi rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:4480: tasya nayanaraśme rasati draṣṭari sa na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4484: (pṛ) rūpa dharmā avaśyaṃ bāhyaṃ prakāśamapekṣya dṛśyante /
SA16hvsatssu:4500: yat rūpaṃ jñānasya [SSS_132] gocaraṃ tat dṛśyam /
SA16hvsatssu:4509: (u) samānamidam, yathā bhavataścakṣū rūpaṃ prāpyāpi kadācitpaśyati kadācinna paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4510: tadyathā cakṣuḥ sūryaṃ prāpya sūryamaṇḍalaṃ paśyati na tu sūryakarma /
SA16hvsatssu:4516: (u) yadi vegaprakarṣātsūkṣmaṃ karma na paśyati, sthūlaṃ sūryamaṇḍalaparimāṇaṃ kasmānna paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4519: kasmād dūrasthaṃ sūryamaṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi karma na paśyati tat pāṭaliputrādi āsannaṃ janapadanagaram /
SA16hvsatssu:4520: yadi bhavān manyate pāṭaliputrādi na ābhāsagatamityato na paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4521: mama cakṣuraprāpyāpi rūpaṃ nābhāsāgatamityato na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4525: rūpasyābhibhāvakaviśeṣānna dṛśyate yathā rātrau tejo dṛśyamanyadadṛśyam /
SA16hvsatssu:4526: bhūmiviśeṣānna dṛśyate yathā prathamadhyānagatacakṣuṣā dvitīyadhyānagataṃ rūpaṃ na dṛśyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4527: tama āvāvaraṇānna dṛśyate yathā tamasi ghaṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4533: aprāptyā na dṛśyate yathā prabhāgatā aṇavoḥ dṛśyāḥ prabhābāhyāstu adṛśyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4534: saukṣmyānna dṛśyate yathā puruṣākāraḥ sthāṇurna vivektuṃ śakyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4540: yat vātopahataṃ cakṣuḥ tat viparyastaṃ nīlakṛṣṇādirūpaṃ paśyet /
SA16hvsatssu:4543: yat jāgaraṇopahataṃ [SSS_133] cakṣuḥ tat kampitavṛkṣādirūpaṃ prāyaḥ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4544: yat parikhedopahataṃ cakṣuḥ tat rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na budhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4556: (pṛ) pañca viṣayāḥ jñānābhāsagatatvāt jñeyā bhavantīti jñātameva /
SA16hvsatssu:4559: ūrdhvabhūmikatvānna jñāyate yathā prathamadhyānacittaṃ dvitīyadhyānatadūrdhvadharmān na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4560: indriyaviśeṣānna jñāyate yathā mandendriyasya cittaṃ tīkṣṇendriyasya cittagatadharmān na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4561: puruṣaviśeṣānna jñāyate yathā śrotraāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāminaścittagatadharmān na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4562: balaprabhedānna jñāyate yathā yanmanovijñānaṃ yasmin dharme balavihīnaṃ na tena manovijñānena sa dharmo jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4564: manovijñānavijñeyadharmo na vikṣiptacittakamanovijñānena vijñātuṃ śakyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4565: yathā pratyekabuddhamanovijñānabalavijñeyadharmo na śrāvakamano[vijñāna]balena vijñātuṃ śakyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4569: yaduta pratītipratyāyakaṃ pūrvānubhavitṛ, tena smaryate nānanubhavitrā /
SA16hvsatssu:4570: yathā janāḥ saṃsāre pūrvānubhūtaṃ dharmaṃ smaranti /
SA16hvsatssu:4572: āryāstu yadi vānubhūtaṃ yadivānanubhūtaṃ sarvaṃ tadāryajñānabalādvijānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:4573: viśiṣṭaviṣayatvāt jñāyate yathā rūpadhātukacittamanubhūya kāmadhātukadharmān vijānānti /
SA16hvsatssu:4574: viparyayāvṛtatvānna jñāyate yathā satkāyadṛṣṭikacittaṃ pañcaskandhālambanaṃ nairātmyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4576: balāvṛtatvānna jñāyate yathā mṛdvindriyaḥ puruṣastīkṣṇendriyasya cittamāvṛtatayā na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4580: vikṣepaviparyayabhūtāveśā mānamadacittapramoṣā madyena vā auṣadhavyāmohena vā cittavibhramaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:4587: tasmādyadyaprāpya paśyati kasmānna sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśyatīti bhavadvacanamayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:4595: pratyutpanneṣu jñānamutpadyata iti yadavādīḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhaṃ vijñānamapi pratyutpannamātraṃ jñāpayet paracittajñānavat /
SA16hvsatssu:4597: tat ṣaṣṭhamanaindriyeṇa pratyuktameva yaduta indriyaviṣayavijñānānugamakālaḥ sannipāta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4598: pratītya mano dharmāṃśca manovijñānamutpadyata itīdaṃ vacanañca tadā vyarthaṃ syāt prāptyabhāvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4605: yadavādīḥ viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe mandaṃ bhāṣamāṇe na śabdaḥ śrūyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4609: yathā bhavānāha viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe bhāṣamāṇe śabdāt śabdasantatyā tanurbhūtvā na punarudbhavatītyato na śrūyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4612: yathā bhavato nayanaraśmirgatvāpi sūryamaṇḍalamātraṃ paśyati na sūryasya karma /
SA16hvsatssu:4614: śrotramaprāpyāpi [SSS_135] śabda audārikaḥ san śrūyate sūkṣmastu na śrūyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4615: yathā bhavato nayanaraśmiḥ sudūraṃ gacchannapi na śatasahasrāyutayojanāni prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:4616: prasannasalilādyāvṛtaṃ suṣṭhu paśyannapi bhittyādyāvṛtaṃ tu na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:4623: tadā tu na kaścitpratikūle vāyau śṛṇotīti syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4625: tadā śabdo 'pi pratikūlavāyau na kiñcidapi na śrotavyaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4631: yadavocaḥ śabdaḥ sākalyena śrūyata ityataḥ prāptipakṣe na rūpasama iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4646: idānīṃ śabde kaḥ punaḥ śabdaḥ yaḥ śabdāntaraṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:4654: yadi ghaṇṭātaḥ śabdasantatirutpadyate, tarhi ghaṇṭā śabdavihīnā na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4657: evaṃ ghaṇṭātaḥ śabda [udgate] sati ghaṇṭā niśśabdā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4659: ato jñāyate śabdo ghaṇṭāyāṃ vartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4662: yadi śabdo ghaṇṭāmāśrito ghaṇṭātaścāpi viyujyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4665: dṛṣṭe vyavahāre ca nāsti kiñcit yathā ghaṇṭāsantatirutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4666: śabdasya cāsti digbhāgabhedo yaduta prācīśabdaḥ karṇadeśaṃ prāpnoti tadā na syāt ayaṃ vibhāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4674: tathā no cet viddhaśabda iti nocyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:4675: yaḥ śabdo viprakṛṣṭaḥ sannikṛṣṭaśca tau yugapat śrūyetām /
SA16hvsatssu:4677: na hi paśyāmaḥ kṣaṇikadharmaḥ kasyacijjanaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4682: ekañca na karma karmotpādakamiti vacanaṃ praṇaṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4683: bhavatāṃ śāsane śabdaḥ śabdāntareṇa viruddhaḥ pṛthak, naikasthānikaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4684: yadi śabdaḥ śabdantareṇaikasthānikaḥ, na sa viruddho nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:4692: (u) paśyasi khalu saṃyoga ekaḥ san yaṃ śabdamutpādayati [so] 'pi tathā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4695: evañca dravyaṃ pañcasvabhāvaṃ trisvabhāvaṃ dvisvabhāvaṃ na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4698: yathā vadanti śabdo guṇo 'pi [SSS_137] karmaṇā tulyo nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4701: evaṃ śabdo 'pi karagṛhīte khaḍge śabdaḥ spandena sahoparamati /
SA16hvsatssu:4704: yathā kalpayasi ādyakarmaṇaḥ saṃskāra uttarottarakarmotpādaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4712: pūrvaṃ karmaṇi niruddhe hi tadanantaraṃ dravyamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4724: kiṃ yathā khalu viṣaṃ viṣauṣadhena viruddham /
SA16hvsatssu:4726: tathā no cet ghaṇṭā na śabdadvayavatīti [na] syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4727: yadyekasmin kṣaṇe ghaṇṭā śabdadvayavatī, tadā kṣaṇasahasre 'pi śabdadvayavatī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4731: tathā no cet ekasminneva kṣaṇe ghaṇṭā śabdadvayavatī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4734: yadi śabdāt śabdāntaramutpadyate tadā na hetumanuvarteta /
SA16hvsatssu:4748: tasya rūpamupādāya jala ādarśe rūpamutpannaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4749: evaṃ jale candra ādarśe pratibimbameva rūpaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:4750: tathā ca vaiśeṣikasūtraṃ sarvaṃ naṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4756: khaḍgavaṃśādīnāmavayaveṣu mithaḥ saṃśliṣṭeṣu vibhajyamāneṣu ca mitho nodanācchabdo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4757: na ca vayaṃ vadāmaḥ saṃyogācchabdo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4762: kevalaṃ caturṣu mahābhūteṣu saṃyukteṣu viyukteṣu vā śabda utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4763: yathā mahābhūtānāṃ karma nityasthāyi, na tāni vihāya gacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:4766: (pṛ) yadyāha bhavān- gandho nāsikāṃ prāpto jighryata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4771: yadi manyase yat asmādgandhāt santatyā gandhakāraṇamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4776: yadi kusumāvayavā gacchanti kusumāvayavasya rūpamapi draṣṭavyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4783: (u) yatra sūkṣmāvayavarūpaṃ [tatra] tadgandho jighrayata iti pratyakṣadṛṣṭam /
SA16hvsatssu:4789: yadi gandha kusumāvayavaḥ, alpaṃ ghrātavyaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4794: yathā ekapalaṃ kuṅkuma[kusumaṃ] sadā sagandhaṃ gatvāpi sadaikapalam /
SA16hvsatssu:4796: yathā jalaghaṭa ekabindvapagame tatkṣayo na budhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4811: nāpi vāyuḥ kusumasya gandhaṃ boḍhvā gamayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4813: tadupādāya gandhavāyuḥ tataḥ samutpanno gandhavāyurnāsikāṃ prāpya jighryate /
SA16hvsatssu:4816: yathā jighranti tile gandhaṃ, na tu kusumāvayavagandham /
SA16hvsatssu:4822: sa kusumagandhaḥ kusume niṣpīḍite vā niṣpiṣṭe vā saṃparitāpite vā kṣīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4827: sa ca gandho dīrghakālaṃ tile vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:4832: (u) ayaṃ tilagandhaḥ kusumamupādāya samutpanno na tilādviyujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4839: yadi vāyāvuṣṇasparśastaijasaḥ, śītasparśaśca jalīyaḥ tadānuṣṇāśītasparśena pārthivena bhavitavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:4840: yathā jalasya tejasaśca rūpaṃ nopalabhyate, pārthivarūpamapi saukṣmānnopalabhyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:4846: tatra nāsti vinigamakaṃ yadudakāvayavā stejovayavā eva vā vāyumanugacchanti,
SA16hvsatssu:4848: yathā bhavatāṃ sūtram- trayaḥ sparśā sparśakāyā vā na pṛthivyudakatejasāmityadṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuriti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4849: anena vacanena trividhāḥ sparśā vāyau kadācidāgantukā vānāgantukā vā syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4852: bhavato mataṃ yat dṛṣṭa udake tejasi śītoṣṇaspaśau staḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4855: evaṃ dṛṣṭapṛthivyāmanuṣṇāśītasparśo 'stīti so 'pi vāyvayavīyo na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4859: kathaṃ jñātavyaṃ vāyusparśamātra manuṣṇāśītaṃ na tu pṛthivyavayava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4860: vayamapi vadāmo rūparasagandhasparśāḥ pṛthivyāmeva santi nābādiṣu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4861: yat bhavatāṃ matam- yat dṛṣṭeṣu abādiṣu rūpādikamastīti /
SA16hvsatssu:4862: tat pṛthivīyogād dṛśyate na tu tat tatrāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:4868: tadā sambhavati vaktum idaṃ rūpamabīyaṃ na pārthivamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:4881: yatra nāsti tatra gandhamupādāya gandha utpadyate ityasya ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4882: yadavādīḥ pūrvaṃ gandho dūrāt jighryata ityaprāptyā syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:4890: ato jñāyate aprāpya na jighryata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:4907: tathāpi tattejo vartate iti sparśātt jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4909: bhavatāṃ sūtre nāstyarūpaṃ teja ityayameva doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:4921: yathā vā jvarārtasya puruṣasya tejaḥ kāyaniśritamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:4934: kiñca mano gacchatīti kiṃ jñātvā gacchet /
SA16hvsatssu:4941: yat cittaṃ manyate śrotraṃ gamiṣyāmīti tacchrotasmaraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:4943: yadi cakṣuṣi vartamānaṃ cittam, na tadā [śrotra]smaraṇaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:4946: yaḥ pumān pūrvaṃ nagarādīn dṛṣṭavān sa idānīṃ pūrvamanurudhya smarati na jānāti pratyutpannān /
SA16hvsatssu:4951: yo dharmo gacchati sontarāle sarvān viṣayān jānīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:4952: yathā kaścitsañcaran madhyemārgaṃ rūpādīn padārthān jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4954: yathā cittamasadapi jānāti yadutātītamanāgataṃ śagaśṛṅgaṃ kūrmaromāhipādaṃ vāyurūpaṃ lohitalavaṇagandhamityādīni [sarvāṇya]pijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:4974: ato jñāyate na gacchatīti, rāgacittānmukhe rūpāntaramutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:4981: tā vedanā stistraḥ- duḥkhāḥ vā sukhā vā aduḥkhāsukhā veti /
SA16hvsatssu:4991: ālambanaṃ vijñānasaṃyuktaṃ punaḥ sa vijñānamityucyate ato na gacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:4998: yathā kaścitsvapne pibati naiba tat tṛṣṇāmapanayati /
SA16hvsatssu:5001: cittaṃ dṛṣṭe śrute mate jñāte dharmamātre vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:5003: yadi gamanena prāpnoti tadā dharmāntaramapi jānīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5029: (pṛ) yadyuktaṃ sūtre- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādāḥ pañcendriyāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5034: bhagavān kāṃkṣāvataḥ svaśiṣyān pratyāha- karmajāni pañcendriyāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5040: ato bhagavānāha- indriyāṇi rūpīṇi rūpādīnupādāya siddhānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5041: kadācidyāni rūpādīnupādāya bhavanti tāni sanidarśanānīti brūyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5047: yadrūpaṃ sākāraṃ sapratigham, tadaudārikaṃ cakṣurmātreṇa dṛśyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5048: tīrthikā vadanti- saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve karma sāmānyaṃ viśeṣāśca [rūpi]dravyasamavāyādarūpiṇo 'pi cākṣuṣāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5049: ato bhagavānāha- eṣāṃ rūpamātraṃ sanidarśanam nānye dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5063: yo dharmaḥ pratiniyataḥ sa pratiniyataṃ dharmaṃ pratihanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5072: dharmo yadi pratiniyataḥ tadā [na] saṃkhyeyāni pañcendriyāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:5081: (pṛ) cakṣuṣo raśmirmahadalpaṃ paśyati sudūraṃ gatvāpi rūpamapratihataṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:5083: raśmirayaṃ dve cakṣuṣyupādāyaikatra militvā ekībhūto rūpaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:5084: cakṣurekaṃ śrotraṃ nāsikā ca kāyasyāntarvartamānā na vibhaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5085: ato bhavadvacanam anyatpaśyati anyadvijānāti idaṃ nirastam /
SA16hvsatssu:5119: yadavādīḥ sannikarṣo nigūḍha ityato na dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5131: karmabalena pariṇamitāni mahābhūtānīndriyāṇi bhūtvā vibhaktāni santi /
SA16hvsatssu:5172: yathā catussatyābhisamaye dharmān sākṣātkṛtya [ta]ddharmatāṃ samyak bhāvayatīti sarvamidaṃ manovijñānenaiva /
SA16hvsatssu:5177: kiṃ prāpya vijānāti kimaprāpyeti sarvaṃ pratyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:5195: hrasvadīrghādilakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ rūpaṃ pratītya manovijñāne samutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5197: saṃskṛtadharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt strīpuṃnimittakarmāpi nāsti, vijñānadharmo na gatiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5207: (u) [kasmiṃścit] dharme sthānāntara uddhite yadi parasyopakāro hiṃsā vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5223: na tu vadanti ghaṭe śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5228: sattvānāṃ pūrvākṣiptakarmavāsanatvādyadi padārthā nityaṃ saśabdāḥ syuḥ tadā na tātkālikaḥ [śabdaḥ] /
SA16hvsatssu:5232: mahābhūtānāṃ sadā mithaḥ sammardāt sarvaṃ saśabdaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5233: (u) na padārthānāṃ mithaḥ sammardaḥ sarvaḥ śabdahetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5247: (pṛ) saṃvṛtitaḥ sadā vadanti śabda ākāśaguṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5272: [SSS_151] ākāśe vartamāne 'pi auṣṇyamasti kadācit kadācinnetyākāśo nauṣṇyakāraṇamiti jñeyam /
SA16hvsatssu:5278: dṛṣṭe tāvanna paśyāmaḥ śabdaḥ ākāśamupādatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5302: yathā pūrvaṃ kusume gandhamāghrāya paścādvastre jighrataḥ ayamāgantukaḥ saṃbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5308: yadi bravīṣi jalādāvasti rūpaṃ svata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5309: [SSS_152] vayamapi vadema kāṃsyādau svata eva gandho 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5310: yo dharmo yasya vastuno 'vinirbhāgavartī sa tasyāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:5311: ato yo gandho yatrāvinirbhāgavartī sa tasyaiva dravyasya gandhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5314: yathā vadanti- asti candramasi tejaḥ tejasaḥ pratiniyatoṣṇatā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5315: vadanti ca gharmagṛhe 'gnyapagame 'pi śiṣyamāṇasya dharmaṇo 'sti sūkṣmaṃ rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5327: candrādayaḥ śītā api taijasā iti bravīṣi /
SA16hvsatssu:5340: ataḥ kāryata iti vacanaṃ na hetuḥ kalpate /
SA16hvsatssu:5346: tejaso rūpaṃ bhāskaraṃ śuklam kāṃsyādīnāntu abhāsvaram /
SA16hvsatssu:5347: kāṃsyāṃdīnāṃ tejasā vailakṣaṇye 'pi tāni taijasadravyāṇīti jñāpyante /
SA16hvsatssu:5354: asamyakcintanāt bravītha yūyaṃ- gandhaḥ pṛthivīmātre vidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5360: na tu caturṣu mahābhūteṣu tāratamyena bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5361: yathā vadanti pṛthivyā apāṃ bāhulyena madhura iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5364: ato jñātavyam - padārthāt pṛthak [pṛthak] svabhāvo raso jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5369: kadācidvayo rasayoḥ samavāyaḥ, kadācit trayāṇām, kadāciccaturṇāmityevamapramāṇāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5372: saṃvṛtyā rasā vibhaktāḥ yathā janā manyante madhuraṃ madhurameva bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5380_0: sparśo nāma kaṭhinaṃ mṛdu guru laghu prabalaṃ durbalaṃ śītamuṣṇaṃ karkaśaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:5380_1: kṛśaṃ śthūlaṃ praśrabdhiḥ klamathamaklamathaṃ rogo viśeṣo vā kāyataikṣṇyaṃ kāyamāndyamālasyaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:5380_2: gauravaṃ sammūrchanaṃ [SSS_154] sammohaḥ stambharna vyathā śūlaṃ vijṛmbhikā jighatsā
SA16hvsatssu:5380_3: pipāsā santṛptiḥ sātaṃ visātaṃ maurarvyam ityādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5381: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- trayaḥ sparśāḥ śīta uṣṇo 'nuṣṇāśīta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5385: (pṛ) aulūkyā vadanti- pṛthivyā anuṣṇāśītasparśastathā vāyorapi sparśaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5388: [tādṛśa]niyamo nāstīti pūrvamevoktam- yaduta sarpirādīnāṃ niyatā śītatā kāṃsyādīnāmanuṣṇateti /
SA16hvsatssu:5389: kiñcoktaṃ pūrvaṃ triṣu sparśeṣu yadi vāyavīya āgantukaḥ tadā sparśāntarābhāvādvāyuraniyatalakṣaṇaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5396: (u) kāṃsyādīni sarpirādīni ca kaṭhinadravyāṇi agnisaṃyogādravī bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5402: agnisaṃyoge sa sparśo yadi na vinaṣṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5412: [tadā] paro 'pi brūyāt payolakṣaṇamanirudhya kevalaṃ dadhilakṣaṇaṃ parāvartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5414: yadi bravīṣi na paśyāmaḥ payaḥ punaḥ payorūpeṇeti /
SA16hvsatssu:5417: anādau saṃsāre kiṃ dravyaṃ nāgninā dagdhaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5420: ato jñāyate pāko na nityo 'parāvṛtta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5421: evañca śītasparśe vinaṣṭe punaḥ śītasparśa utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5424: evaṃ śītasparśo vinaṣṭaḥ sannagniviyoge punarutpadyate / tatra ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5425: vaiśeṣikā vadanti- pṛthivīmātre pāko bhavati nāpsu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5426: bhiṣajastu vadanti- yastaptāṃ yavāgūṃ pāti sa vijātīyaṃ phalaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5446: yathā mārgavarge smṛterekasyā eva pañca nāmānyu[cyante] smṛtyupasthānaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ smṛtibalaṃ smṛtisambodhyaṅgaṃ samyaksmṛtiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:5449: sambodhirityādīni nānā pṛthak pṛthaṅ nāmāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5450: eka eva samādhiḥ dhyānaṃ vimuktiḥ nissṛtiḥ samāpattirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5454: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tasya kāmāsravāccittaṃ vimucyate avidyāsravaccittaṃ vimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5457: api coktaṃ sūtre- yadā bhagavān sattvānāṃ kallacittaṃ mṛducittaṃ dāntacittaṃ vimuktilābhapravaṇatāñca prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:5460: api coktaṃ sūtre- cittasaṃkleśātsattvāḥ saṃkliśyanti cittavyavadānātsattvā viśudhyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5462: kiñcāha- yo bhikṣuścatvāri dhyānānyupasampadya viśuddhākopyacitto [SSS_157] bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5463: sa duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgamāryasatyañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5468: api coktaṃ sūtre rāṣṭrapālamāhūyāvadat idaṃ vastu punaḥ punarājavajjavaṃ mahārāja cittaṃ vadāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5469: āha ca ādhyātmiko vijñānakāyo bāhyaṃ nāparūpamiti dvidhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5475: ato jñāyate cittamātramasti na caitasikamasti pṛthagiti //
SA16hvsatssu:5485: yadbhavatāṃ mataṃ- cittamanyena cittena samprayujyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5488: uktaṃ hi sūtre- dūraṅgamamekacaramaśarīraṃ guhāśayam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5491: yathā bhikṣurekākī san satsvapi maśakā[di]prāṇiṣu sajātīyo nāstīti ekākītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5492: ato [SSS_158] jñāyate nānyacittena cittaṃ samprayujyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5495: caitasikāstu ekena dhātunā ekenāyatanena tribhiḥ skandhaiśca saṅgṛhītāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5505: yathoktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5513: tādṛśavibhāgāt jñāyate cittamanyat caitasikā anya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5519: bhagavān svayamāha- ye cittajāścittaniśritāste caitasikā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5522: paro 'pi vadet- caitasikāḥ santi na cittamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5537: puruṣasyāvidyayā [SSS_159] saṃkleśaḥ prajñayā vyavadānamiti na bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:5543: bhavatā yadyapyuktaṃ dharmālambanaṃ cittaṃ cittaviśeṣāścaitasikā mārgavargoktavat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5560: sūtre bhagavān na pariniṣṭhitaṃ vakti idamasyādhivacanamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5561: yathāha sūtram- ekaṃ dharmaṃ prajahītha ahamājānāmi anāgāmimārgaṃ pratilabhadhve yadidaṃ kāmacchandam /
SA16hvsatssu:5568: yaduktaṃ bāhyaṃ nāmarūpamiti sa eva caitasika[dharma] ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5573: yat bāhyaṃ sa eva viṣaya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5599: evaṃ cittaṃ cittamāśrayata iti na nāmāntaraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:5611: sa hi bravīti- pūrvaṃ vijñānasya kālaḥ paścātsaṃjñādīnām iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5616: cittameva dvidhā vadāmi ekaṃ jñānamaparaṃ vijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5618: yadāha bhavān- bhagavān svayamāha ye cittaniśritāste caitasikā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5622: kintu vadāmi cittaviśeṣā eva caitasikā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5630: cittañca caitasikaiḥ saha cittādutpadyata iti caitasikamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5631: caitasikamātramastīti yo vadati sa vadet caitasikadharmā arthākhyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5639: citta utpannaṃ cittameva citte vitarka udabhūdityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5653: vijñānasya buddhervā [anyeṣāṃ] sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇādiṣu nāsti viśeṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5654: yaccittaṃ rūpaṃ vijānāti saiva buddhirityucyate, saṃjñā ityādyapi /
SA16hvsatssu:5655: yathā laukikā vadanti yadbhavān vijānātīmaṃ puruṣamiti tat jñānameva vedanā saṃjñā iti jñeyam /
SA16hvsatssu:5663: asmin cittaskandhe saṃkleśo 'vidyā ca sarvathā saṃprayuktā /
SA16hvsatssu:5670: ato jñāyate avidyāto 'pi cittameva vimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5673: yadi ca saṃkleśebhyaścittaṃ vimucyate avidyātaḥ prajñā vimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5675: ataścittaṃ vinā na kiñcidvimucyata iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:5681: laukikā bhūyasā sukhaṃ duḥkhamapi vijānantīti vedanādayo '[pi] vaktavyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5686: bhagavān sattvānāṃ kleśatāratamyavaśātsadā viṣādākrāntacittaḥ san vadati ayameko dharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5698: dharmāṇāṃ sasamprayogatve 'pi sparśa eva vedanādīnāṃ hetuḥ na vedanādayaḥ sparśasya /
SA16hvsatssu:5712: ato nāsti samprayogaḥ gambhīre pratītyasamutpāda[sūtre]bhagavānāha- asyotpādādidamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5713: yathā ca bījāṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrapuṣpādīni hetuphalābhyāṃ kramikāni dṛṣṭāni /
SA16hvsatssu:5715: yadbhavān manyate kāmādayaḥ kleśā rūpasya saha[bhū]hetavaḥ sahajāḥ syuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:5732: (u) kasya pratibandhādekaṃ kramikamālambanaṃ na kramaśaḥ ṣaḍvijñānānyutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:5733: jñātavyaṃ pūrvaṃ hetuḥ paścātkāryamiti kramaśa utpādaheturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5734: sūtre coktam- cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5738: yo nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti sa dṛṣṭvā gṛhṇāti na darśanakāle /
SA16hvsatssu:5740: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvānuprahṛṣṭacetano bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5743: ato jñāyate na sarvaṃ cittaṃ vedanādisamanvitamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5747: tasya [SSS_164] nāsti saṃjñā nāpi daurmanasyaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:5749: kecidāhuḥ tasyāpi kāmādayaḥ kleśā na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5754: kiñca bhavataḥ pañca vijñānāni na vikalpakāni /
SA16hvsatssu:5756: cetanāvikalpaḥ pūrvarbhaudārikaḥ san pañcātsūkṣmo bhavatītyato vitarkavicāraustaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5758: tadyathā vadasi mayi tava jñāpanāya prathamata evābhyūhādhīno vitarka utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5764: ato 'bhyupeyaṃ pañca vijñānāni asaṃjñāni avitarkāni avicārāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5766: na hi pañcavijñāneṣu strī puruṣa iti vikalpo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:5769: pañcavijñānānāṃ nirvikalpakatvāt tadanantaraṃ manovijñānamutpadyata iti yuṣmābhiruktam /
SA16hvsatssu:5782: avidyā prajñā ca viruddhe na yugapatsyātām /
SA16hvsatssu:5786: sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti naikasmin citte samudācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:5790: ayaṃ puruṣo mama jñāto māmupakṛtavāniti yat smaraṇam,
SA16hvsatssu:5791: smṛtvā ca prītijananam tata kathamekasmin citte syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:5793: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣava ātmadharmābhirataḥ, tasya dharmo vardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:5799: ekasminneva hi citte 'sti jñānamajñānaṃ saṃśayo niścayaḥ śraddhāśraddhā vīryaṃ kausīdyamityevamādyā doṣāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5800: sarve ca caitasikā ekasmina citte pariniṣṭhitāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5801: kasya pratibandhāt sukhaṃ dukhaṃ rāgo dveṣa ityādayo na bhavantyekasmin citte /
SA16hvsatssu:5802: yadyāha bhavān sukhaduḥkhādayo virodhānnaikasmin citte vartanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5806: "yo bhikṣuścaturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati ca smṛtisambodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:5815: upekṣāyāṃ prajānāti" iti caitasikāḥ kramikā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5821: śīladharaḥ puruṣo na kaukṛtyabhāvāya cittaṃ praṇidadhāti /
SA16hvsatssu:5835: yo bhikṣuralpeccho viharati sa santuṣṭo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5865: ārakṣāṃ pratītya daṇḍādānaśasrādānakalahavigrahavivādāḥ sarve duḥkhopāyāsādayaḥ sambhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5872: uktañca sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5874: cittacaittā ekakālikā iti vadatastrayāṇāṃ sannipāto nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:5875: ekaikaśa utpadyanta iti vadatastu asti trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:5880: kasmāt yaḥ paśyati sa vedayata ayamātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:5885: puruṣasūtra uktam- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:5888: asmin mate vividhaṃ nāmāsti yaduta sattvo devo manuṣyaḥ strī puruṣo mahānalpa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5889: evamādīni nāmāni sarvāṇi skandhān pratītya bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5890: yadi cittacaitasikāḥ kramikāḥ tadā skandhadvayaṃ pratītya puruṣo bhavet na skandhapañcakam /
SA16hvsatssu:5893: bhavānāha- pratyutpanne na santi pañcaskandhāḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5895: ucyate tu sarvaskandhān pratītya na skandhadvayamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:5897: asti ca sūtre samprayogo yadutendriyajñānasamprayuktā śraddhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5898: api coktaṃ sūtre- sparśo vedanāsaṃjñāvitarkaiḥ sahaja iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5902: [SSS_168] kathaṃ vijñānasthitiṣu vedanādiṣu sthitamidaṃ niśrayate tiṣṭhatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5906: āha ca- sattvānāṃ cittaṃ dīrgharātraṃ rāgadveṣādisaṃkliṣṭamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:5910: api coktaṃ sūtre- yasmin samaye cittamuddhataṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:5911: akālastrayāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgānām yaduta dharmapravicayabodhyaṅgasya vīryabodhyaṅgasya prītibodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:5914: [yasmin samaye cittamuddhataṃ bhavati] kālastrayāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyai yaduta praśrabdhisambodhyaṅgasya samādhisambodhyaṅgasya upekṣāsambodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:5917: akāla[stasmin samaye] trayāṇāṃ sambodhyaṅgānāṃ yaduta praśrabdhisambodhyaṅgasya samādhisambodhyaṅgasya upekṣāsambodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:5921: ] kāla[stasmin samaye] trayāṇāṃ sambodhyaṅgānāṃ yaduta dharmapravicayasambodhyaṅgasya vīryasaṃmbodhyaṅgasya prītisambodhyaṅgasya /
SA16hvsatssu:5925: ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- ekakālaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuktasya bodhi[pakṣikā] dharmā na viyujyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5929: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- yaḥ paśyati sa vedayate sa ātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:5932: na vibhajanti vedaneyamidaṃ vijñānaṃ niśrayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:5934: te cittasantatiṃ dṛṣṭvā avibhajanto vyavahāramātrāsaṅgāttathā [SSS_169] vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:5936: yadavocaḥ- sarvān skandhān pratītya puruṣo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5937: tatra pañcaskandhānāṃ santatiṃ pratītya puruṣa ityataḥ sarveṣāṃ skandhānāṃ vacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:5938: yathā loke vadanti- sukhī duḥkhī aduḥkhāsukhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:5956: yathā ca vadanti rājā mānthātā smṛtimātreṇa svargamāruroheti /
SA16hvsatssu:5958: pṛthagjanānāṃ vijñānasyālambanakriyāyāṃ catvāro dharmāḥ kramikā bhavanti- vijñānānantarajā saṃjñā,
SA16hvsatssu:5970: vitarkavicārau ca na saṃprayuktāviti pūrvameva pratyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:5972: tatsūtra uktā vijñānasya pratyaya[rūpā] sthitiḥ na niśrayarūpā /
SA16hvsatssu:5974: tasminneva hi sūtra uktam- vijñānaṃ rūpaṃ pratītya snehapramodābhyāṃ tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:5976: yadyupyuktaṃ bhavatā- yadi vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ pratītya tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:5982: tatra tṛṣṇodbhavati udbhūtatṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānasthiti rityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6000: yadi bravīṣi cittaṃ pūrvamutpadyate tanmahimnā caitasikānāmāśraya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6003: yadbravīṣi cittaṃ kleśasaṃkliṣṭamityato jñāyate 'smi samprayoga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6006: tadā sa eva pariśuddhadharmā dūṣyo bhavatīti dharmalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:6013: tathā ca sattvā api samprayuktāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6032: caitasikāścittajāścittaniśritā iti yat bhavato vacanaṃ tatpūrvameva pratyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:6035: na tu sāhāyyāya mitha ālambane samudācarantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6044: tasmin samaye praśrabdhyādīni trīṇi bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6059: (pṛ) ājñātaṃ na santi pṛthak caitasikāḥ nāsti ca samprayoga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6077: jñānañca niścitaṃ sandigdhaṃ, kuśalamakuśalamavyākṛtaṃ vā sarvamanyadeva /
SA16hvsatssu:6083: saṃyogato viyogato vā hetusamanantarālambanādhipatīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viśeṣāccittāni bhidyante /
SA16hvsatssu:6088: yathā sūryaraśmiḥ prakṛtito viśuddhā na kadāciddūṣyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6089: yat prakṛtito 'viśuddhaṃ na tat viśodhayituṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6090: yathā roma prakṛtitaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ nāvadātaṃ kartumarhati /
SA16hvsatssu:6095: yathocyate bhikṣurvijñānamupabhuṅkte keṣāṃ vijñānaṃ yaduta sukhaduḥkhāduḥkhāsukhānāṃ vijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:6096: yadi cittamekam, ekameva vijñānaṃ sarvaviṣayān gṛhṇīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:6109: yathā markaṭopasūtra uktam- yathā markaṭaḥ [araṇya upavane caramāṇaḥ] śākhāṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6111: evameva cittaṃ [rātryā divasasya ca] atyayena anyadevotpadyata anyannirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6116: yat citta- [mityucyate tat rātryāśca divasasya] atyayena anyadevotpadyate 'nyannirudhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6120: yathā caikaṃ karma [kṛtaṃ] na punarādeyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6130: yadi cittaṃ nānā, na sadopakliṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:6131: ratnahārasūtra uktam- yaścittaṃ sadā śraddhayā śīlena tyāgena śrutena prajñayā ca bhāvayati sa mṛto deveṣūtpadyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6132: dhyānasūtre coktam- prathamadhyānalābhī cittasya paridamanāya prathamadhyānādvitīyadhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:6136: ato jñāyate cittamekaṃ cañcalamitastato dhāvatīti / saṃyuktapiṭake ca bhikṣurāha-
SA16hvsatssu:6140: tiṣṭha markaṭa mā [dhāvī]rna hi te tat yathā purā /
SA16hvsatssu:6142: ato jñāyate- cittamekaṃ pañcendriyadvāreṣu kāyakuṭikāyāṃ paribhramati /
SA16hvsatssu:6144: ata āha "mā [dhāvī]rna hi te tat yathāpurā" / iti / āha ca-
SA16hvsatssu:6149: ekameva hi cittaṃ karmāṇyabhinirvṛttya punarvipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:6150: cittaṃ mriyate cittamutpadyate cittaṃ badhyate cittaṃ mucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6168: yadekaṃ cittaṃ tadeva rūpaśabdādigrahaṇarūpāṇi nānākarmāṇi karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:6169: yathaikaḥ puruṣaḥ pañcachidrake gṛhe sthitaḥ tatra tatra gatān viṣayān gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6170: tadeva cittaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnamālokadipratyayamapekṣya rūpaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:6171: yathā sa eva puruṣa anyatra sahāyamapekṣya [aparaṃ] kāryaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:6173: yathā sa eva pūrvaṃ jñānī san paścādajñānī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6174: evaṃ mithyājñānaṃ punaḥ samyak jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6175: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ viśuddhaḥ paścādaviśuddho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6176: evaṃ yat sandigdhaṃ jñānaṃ tadeva niścitaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6177: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ saṃśayitaḥ punarniścito bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6178: yadakuśalaṃ cittaṃ tadeva punaḥ kuśalamavyākṛtañca bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6179: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ kadācitkuśalaṃ smarati /
SA16hvsatssu:6182: yathā sa eva puruṣo 'tītānāgatādau nāneryāpathān karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:6185: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ prasannaḥ paścādaprasanno bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6187: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvamanyaṃ sukhayati paścātpunarduḥkhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6189: yadavādīḥ- ekameva vijñānaṃ na ṣaḍvivaṣayān gṛhṇātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6193: yat vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnaṃ tat rūpamātraṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6199: yathā pradīpa ātmānaṃ prakāśayati anyānapi prakāśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6200: yathā gaṇaka ātmānaṃ gaṇayati anyānapi gaṇayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6203: yathā markaṭaḥ śākhāṃ gṛhṇāti tāṃ muttkāparāṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6207: svayameva punarvipākaṃ vedayate iti saṃkṣipya pratyavocam /
SA16hvsatssu:6209: yadi cittamanyat, tadā anyatkaroti, anyadvedayate anyanmṛnmriyate anyajjāyata ityādayo doṣāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6213: atrocyate / yadabravīḥ- cittamekaṃ kāmādinā ciramupakliṣṭam iti / tadayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:6225: tenaiva cittena tadeva smaryata iti kathaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:6239: idānīṃ kurvan paścātkariṣyan nitya eko 'vikārītyata ātmā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6246: brahmādayo vyāmohagatā evaṃ manyante kāyo 'yamanityaḥ cittaṃ vijñānantu nityam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6251: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- dakṣiṇena dṛṣṭvā vāmena vijānīyāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:6256: atītaṃ vastu asadapi smṛtvā vijānanti anāgatamasadapi [ārya]jñānabalādvijānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6263: samyak pratyāyakātmakaṃ hi cittam, rūpapratyāyanaṃ śabdapratyāyanādanyat /
SA16hvsatssu:6273: evaṃ cakṣūrūpayoḥ kṣaṇikatvāt tadāśrityotpannaṃ vijñānamapi kṣaṇikam /
SA16hvsatssu:6277: yadavādiḥ- vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnaṃ sat ālokamapekṣya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:6278: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ paśyati śṛṇoti ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:6285: saṃśayajñānādīni niścayajñānādibhyo 'nyāni na saṃśayajñānādīnyeva niścayajñānādīni ityapi vadāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6299: ghaṭādi dravyamapi [paśyati] gaṇakastu ātmarūpamapi jānāti pararūpamapi jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6310: tathā bandhamokṣādirapi yadavādīḥ- anyat karoti anyadvedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6314: saṃvṛtisaṃjñayā karmādīnāṃ vacanaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6328: yadi kṣaṇikaṃ [cittaṃ] tadā rūpādīni na kadāpi pratīyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:6330: yathā vidyutprabhā kiñcitsthāyinyapi na punaḥ sujñeyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6335: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñāna[mutpadyate] ityanayorabhede vijñānamapyabhinnam /
SA16hvsatssu:6349: ekaikasmin tantau pratyekamasti kiñcidvalam iti tatsamavāyaḥ prabhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6367: tathā no cet śabdakarmaṇo na syātpratyāyanam /
SA16hvsatssu:6369: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalvidaṃ kṣaṇikamatha ca pratyāyakamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:6385: vijñānañca viṣayaṃ gṛhṇāti mandaṃ vā kṣipraṃ vā iti cittasya nāsti niyamaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6405: puruṣasya kadāciccittaṃ bhavati yadahamekakālaṃ sarvānalambanān gṛhṇāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6417: tasyaikameva jñānaṃ samyaṅ mithyā ca sambhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:6418: ayaṃ puruṣa iti graha eva ayaṃ na puruṣa iti graha iti yathā darśanaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6444: ato jñāyate bahūni vijñānāni yugapadekakālamutpannāni sarvān spraṣṭavyān gṛhṇanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6449: vahūni vijñānānīti kāyāvayaveṣu ca śīghrataraṃ jñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6452: na hi sambhavatyekameva vijñānaṃ sarvānavayavān gṛhṇātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6453: ato ekakālamutpannāni bahūni vijñānāni sarvānavayavān gṛhṇantīti //
SA16hvsatssu:6457: yaducyate bhavatā- bahūni vijñānāni yugapadekakālamutpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6465: ato jñāyate vijñānāni manaskāramapekṣya bhavanti naikakālikānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6479: tathā ca sarvadharmāṇāmutpattaye nāvaśyaṃ yatnaṃ kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:6489: cakṣuṣā paśyāmaḥ khalu bāhyān bījāṅkurādīn kalamāṃsapeśyādirūpāṇi kaumārayauvanajarākārān kramikān /
SA16hvsatssu:6491: uktañca sūtre- yadā sukhā vedanā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6492: tadā [anye] dve vedane niruddhe yaduta duḥkhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:6493: yadi vijñānānāṃ yugapadutpādaḥ tadā tisro vedanā ekakālaṃ vedyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:6495: ato jñāyate vijñānāni naikakāla mutpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6496: ekasmin kāya ekacittotpattyā ekaḥ puruṣa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6497: vijñānānāṃ yaugapadya ekasmin kāye bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6499: ata ekasmin kāye vijñānānāṃ yaugapadyaṃ na sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6500: yaugapadye hi ekakālaṃ sarvān dharmān jānīyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6512: tathā mamāpi ekasya manasa ekaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6525: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kecitparīttasaṃjñāḥ kecidbahusaṃjñāḥ kecidapramāṇasaṃjñāḥ kecidakiñcanasaṃjñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6526: vastutastu te bahu kiñcidādidharmā na santi /
SA16hvsatssu:6535: saṃjñā tridhā vibhaktā grahālambanā yaduta priyadvepyodāsīnāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6540: yathoktam- cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhvīta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6544: tathā saṃjñayā hi sarvān kleśān prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6545: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anityasaṃjñā sādhu bhāvitā sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6559: yathā ca vadanti akṛṣṇāśuklakarmaṇā sarvāṇi karmāṇi kṣapayatīti / vadanti ca-
SA16hvsatssu:6562: vastutastu prajñayā tarati na tu śraddhādinā /
SA16hvsatssu:6565: yathoktam- āryāstadantevāsino vā prajñābalena sarvān kleśān prajahatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6570: uktañca sūtre- jānan paśyan āsravakṣayaṃ pratilabhate nājānan nāpaśyan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6572: āha ca bhagavān- prajñāskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandho bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6575: anukramasūtre coktam- viśuddhaśīladhāriṇo na cittaṃ paritapati yāvadyathābhūtajñānāya cittaṃ samādadhāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6580: āha ca bhagavān- sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtajñānamanuttarā prajñā ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6582: prajñaiva sarvakleśānāṃ samucchedini na tu saṃjñeti yogo nyānyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6584: yathāha mahānidānasūtram- yacca sūtre 'vatarati vinaye ca sandṛśyate dharmatāñca na vilomayati tat grāhyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6585: api cāha- samyagarthe sthāpanā yathārtha [grahaṇam] samyak rute sthāpanā yathārūta [grahaṇam] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6586: ataḥ sūtre yadyapyuktam anityasaṃjñādayaḥ kleśānāṃ samucchedakā [SSS_185] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6591: ato jñāyate prajñayā sarve kleśāḥ prahīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6595: prajñaptidharmāḥ pañca atītaḥ anāgataḥ saṅketaḥ saṃyogaḥ pudgala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6603: yathoktam- siṃho mṛgarāja iha nadītīre sthitastratra tīre nimittaṃ gṛhītvā oghaṃ tīrtvā niṣkrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:6604: tatra yadi nimittaṃ nāsti tadā idaṃ tīraṃ pratinivṛtya [tannimitta]māmaraṇaṃ na muñcati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6611: kiñcāha- trīṇi nimittāni yaduta samādhinimittaṃ pragrahanimittamupekṣānimittamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:6616: tatra pañca dharmā eva nimittāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6620: uktañca sūtre- cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi [SSS_186] dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhṇīteti /
SA16hvsatssu:6621: dharmamudrāyāñcoktam- yo bhikṣuḥ rūpaśabdādinimittaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:6628: āha ca rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhṇīteti /
SA16hvsatssu:6630: kathaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:6632: duṣṭanimittaniṣedhārthamāha- rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittaṃ gṛhṇātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6633: animitta[samādhe]rālambanamapi duṣṭamiti paścānnirodhasatya [varge]vakṣyate yat trividha cittanirodhī animittamādāvupasampadya viharatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6639: yathoktaṃ- dharmanimittasya grāhī na duṣyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6672: yathā kaścit yadā śītārtaḥ tadoṣṇasparśaḥ sukhamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:6673: (pṛ) nanu sa evoṣṇasparśaḥ utkaṭaḥ san duḥkhakaro bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6681: yadi pūrvameva duḥkhaviyogaḥ tadoṣṇasparśo na sukhakaraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6691: kiñcāha- rūpasya ka āsvādāḥ ye rūpamupādāya prītisukhajananā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6692: kiñcāha- sukhavedanāyā utpadyamānāyāḥ sukhe sthite sukham /
SA16hvsatssu:6694: duḥkhavedanāyā utpadyamānāyā na duḥkhe sthite duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:6696: aduḥkhāsukhavedanāyā na duḥkhaṃ jñāyate na sukhaṃ jñāyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6703: yadi nāsti paramārthataḥ sā, rūpārūpyadhātū na [sukha]vedanāvantau syātām /
SA16hvsatssu:6706: yadi nāsti sukhā vedanā, kutra rāgo 'nuśayīta /
SA16hvsatssu:6707: na vaktavyaṃ duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6715: sarvo lokadhātu ā mahānarakamā ca bhavāgraṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhalakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:6717: yathā kaścit dharmataptaḥ śītasparśaṃ sukhaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6721: tathā no cet duḥkhālpatve sukhasaṃjñotpadyata ityapi na vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6725: na hi paśyāmaḥ kathamapi sūkṣmaṃ sukhamanubhavantaṃ puruṣaṃ bāhumudyamya sudīrghamucchvasantam /
SA16hvsatssu:6726: sukhā ca vedanā sūkṣmā pravṛttā upaśamalakṣaṇamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6728: ato yaduktaṃ sūkṣme sukhe duḥkhasaṃjñotpadyata iti tat vacanamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:6729: bālapṛthagjanānāmalpaduḥkhe sukhasaṃjñā mithyā prādurbhavati iti tu nyāyyam //
SA16hvsatssu:6734: cīvarabhojanādayo hi sarve dūḥkhahetavaḥ na sukhahetavaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6736: annavastrādiṣūtkaṭeṣu duḥkhamapi vardhata iti pratyakṣaṃ khalu /
SA16hvsatssu:6743: yathā janā maraṇabhītāḥ [anyaṃ] daṇḍaṃ sukhaṃ manyante /
SA16hvsatssu:6744: daṇḍādānaśastrādānakṣuraśaktayo duḥkhahetutayā niyatāḥ na tathā sukhahetutayā /
SA16hvsatssu:6745: sarveṣāmavaśyamātyantikaduḥkhatvāt jñātavyaṃ pūrvaṃ [duḥkhaṃ] sadevordhvakālaṃ budhyate pādukākṣayavat /
SA16hvsatssu:6755: yasya yatra sukhamabhūt tasya tadeva paścādduḥkhacittajanakamityato jñāyate nāsti sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:6760: kiñca janā duḥkhe sukhaviparyāsamutpādya paścāttatrābhiṣvajante sukhaṃ yadi kiñcidasti /
SA16hvsatssu:6762: yathā nitya ātmā viśuddhaḥ kimapi vastu nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:6768: sūtre ca bhagavatoktam- sukhā bhikṣavo vedanā duḥkhato draṣṭavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:6775: ato bhagavānāha- yatra pṛthagjanānāṃ sukhasaṃjñotpadyate tat duḥkhato draṣṭavyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:6788: apara ādau mṛdurapi ante puruṣaṃ hinasti /
SA16hvsatssu:6789: tadvatpadārthā api kecidādau subhakarā ante tu hiṃsrāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6797: sarve sattvāḥ kāyikaduḥkhena vā caitasikaduḥkhena vā sadānugamyanta ityataḥ kāyo duḥkhamiti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6806: kāyasya ca bahavaḥ śatravo yadutāśīviṣakāraṇḍaḥ pañcotkṣiptāsikā vadhakāḥ kalyāṇamitravañcanāścorāḥ śūnyagrāme grāmaghātakāścorā mahānadyā avaratīram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6809: kiñca jānīmaḥ sattvānāṃ kāyaḥ sarvaduḥkhairanugamyate yaduta jātiduḥkhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:6810: jarāduḥkhaṃ vyādhiduḥkhaṃ maraṇaduḥkhaṃ vipriyasamāgamaduḥkhaṃ priyaviyogaduḥkhaṃ prārthitādivighātaduḥkham ityādibhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6816: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāṃ vijñānañca duḥkhaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6817: rūpa utpadyamāne jarāvyādhimaraṇādayaḥ sarva upadravā utpadyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:6836: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā sūtre- rūpārāmā[bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā rūparatā rūpamuditā rūpavipariṇāmavirāganirodhāt [SSS_191] duḥkhaṃ [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā viharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6853: yathā vanyapakṣiṇāmāhāraḥ matsyānāṃ bhakṣaṇapraskandanañca sarvaṃ grahaṇāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:6866: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tṛṣṇā duḥkhasya mūlam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6876: lābhakāle na tṛpyati srotaḥ kabalayan sāgara iva /
SA16hvsatssu:6880: sattvāḥ sukhasādhanānveṣaṇakāle prapātacaṅkramaṇā[di]doṣamapi sukhato matvā na citte parikhidyante /
SA16hvsatssu:6895: uktañca sūtre- dve ime bhikṣava āśe duṣprajahe /
SA16hvsatssu:6898: eṣāṃ kāmānāmupabhogāya yā jīvita pratilābhāyāśā sā jīvitasyāśā /
SA16hvsatssu:6900: ataḥ prajñāvatā yathābhūtaṃ sukhavedanālakṣaṇaṃ bhāvayatā duṣprahajā[pi] praheyā /
SA16hvsatssu:6907: loke hi prājñā avaśyamuttamabhūmyāsvādamupādāyādharāṃ bhūmiṃ tyajanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6916: idānīṃ kena vibhaṅgena santi tisro vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6918: ekasyā eva duḥkhavedanāyā kālabhedena trayaḥ prakārā bhavanti yat viheṭhakaṃ tat duḥkhamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6927: (u) puruṣo 'yaṃ tribhiḥ sparśaiḥ spṛṣṭaḥ yaduta duḥkhasparśaḥ sukhasparśa aduḥkhāsukhasparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6933: yadbhavato matam- aduḥkhāsukhasparśe na vedanotpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6939: puruṣaṃ prati ālambanaṃ tridhā vibhaktaṃ priyaṃ dveṣyamudāsīnamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:6953: pratikūlaṃ yatra cittaṃ tatra duḥkhā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:6954: yatra na pratikūlaṃ nānukūlaṃ tatrāduḥkhāsukhā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:6955: lokadharmāścāṣṭau lābho 'lābho nindā praśaṃsā yaśo 'yaśaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:6964: ye cittopavicārāḥ kāyavartinaḥ te sarve 'pi sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā vā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6967: uktaṃ hi sūtre- aṣṭādaśa manaupavicārāḥ iti tatra kevalamekaṃ manaḥ aṣṭādaśadhāvibhaktaṃ yaduta ṣaṭ saumanasyopavicārāḥ ṣaṭ daurmanasyopavicārāḥ ṣaḍupekṣopavicārā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6969: ato jñāyate sarve 'pi cittopavicārā [SSS_194] nāvedanā bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:6970: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- sarvā vedanā duḥkham iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6971: ato jñāyate cittopavicāreṣu dehagateṣu sarvaṃ duḥkhamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:6972: āha ca yo rūpasyotpādaḥ sa duḥkhasyotpāda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6976: ataḥ sarve 'pi cittopavicārā vedanā ityucyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:6978: vipariṇāme duḥkhatvāt sukhāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhato bhāvayet /
SA16hvsatssu:6980: itīmāstisro vedanā duḥkhāḥ pratyayasāmagryāṃ samutpannāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:6986: anāsravā vedanā api āryā anantaraṃ tyajanti /
SA16hvsatssu:6992: ya āryā anāsravacittavihāriṇaḥ te sarvatra paraṃ nirvidyante /
SA16hvsatssu:7000: te tasmin samaye sarve saṃskṛtā duḥkhamiti vyaktaṃ paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7001: yadyanāsravā vedanā sukhā tadā sukhe prāmodyeran na nirvāṇonmukhacittā bhaveyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7004: (u) ekaiva vedanā ālambane nānopavicaratīti vibhaktā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7008: imeṣu sarvadharmeṣu kāyagateṣu santi [SSS_195] hitādayo viśeṣā ityato vedanetyākhyāyante /
SA16hvsatssu:7013: aduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ moho 'nuśete iti tasmātsaṃjñāvikalpitā ālambane saumanasyādayo dharmā vedanā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:7024: puruṣasya tatra sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñānutpādādvastuno jñānadarśanābhāvācca kevalaṃ mohānuśayaḥ sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7025: upekṣālambane yadi rāgadveṣau na samudācarataḥ pṛthagjanāstadutkṛṣṭālambanamiti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7028: yathoktaṃ sūtre- prākṛtānāṃ yadrupe bhavatyupekṣā sa sarvā rūpaniścitā /
SA16hvsatssu:7030: yo nikṛṣṭaṃ karoti tasya punā rāgadveṣau samudbhavata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7037: yo jānāti tadālambanaṃ tasya sukhaduḥkhe spaṣṭaṃ pratīyete /
SA16hvsatssu:7041: (u) puruṣasyāsya tadā tadālambane na sukhacittamutpadyate na ca duḥkhacittam /
SA16hvsatssu:7048: puruṣasyāsya tasmin ālambane pūrvaṃ nimittagrahāt tatrālambane yadyavidyānuśayo yadi vā rāgadveṣānuśayo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:7050: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sa tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayañcāstagamañcāsvādañcādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ na prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:7051: tasya tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayañcāstagamañcāsvādañcādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtamaprajānato yo 'duḥkhāsukhasyāvedanāyā avidyānuśayaḥ so 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7055: sūtramidaṃ svayamāha- vedanānāṃ samudayāstagamādīnavādīn yathābhūtamaprajānato 'duḥkhāsukhāyāmavidyānuśayo 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7059: ata idaṃ sūtramevaṃ vaktavyam- aduḥkhāsukhāyāḥ samudayādyaprajānato 'duḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāmavidyānuśayo 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7068: aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā yathākālaṃ tridhā vibhaktā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7070: tasmin samaye duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ sukhasaṃjñotpadyate aduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñā cotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7075: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- tasya cet sukhā vedanotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7076: sa evaṃ prajānāti- utpannā khalu ma iyaṃ sukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7080: (u) sūtrasyāsya puruṣo [SSS_197] vedayata ityābhiprāyikaṃ vacanaṃ ityadoṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7081: sukhādivedanā kāya āgamya mana ālambate ityato 'pyanavadyam /
SA16hvsatssu:7085: ata ucyate sukhā vedanotpadyate cet sa yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7089: sūtre tūktam- sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7091: kena tadvedyata iti vedayatīti vedanā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7096: ato vedayatīti vedanā bhavati (pṛ) na sattvānāṃ vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7098: (u) ayaṃ padasyārthaḥ yat sanimittaṃ tat sakāritram /
SA16hvsatssu:7099: prajñaptau sanimittāmimāṃ sukhāṃ duḥkhāmaduḥkhāsukhāṃ [vedanāṃ] kāyagatāṃ cittamanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7103: kiṃ tasya tasmin samaye duḥkhasaṃjñā notpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7104: (u) sarvaṃ duḥkhamityalabdhvā sa tisro vedanā anusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:7107: (u) sarvāsu vedanāsu evaṃ smṛtyunubandhāt syāt idaṃ kāyikaṃ sukham idaṃ caitasikaṃ sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7113: tīrthikā hi vadanti vedanā ātmaniśritā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7114: ato bhagavānāha- vedanāḥ kāyaṃ cittañca niśritā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7117: ṣaṣṭhamindriyamupādāyotpadyamānā vedanā caitasikī (pṛ) āsāṃ katamā sāmiṣā katamā nirāmiṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:7122: (u) prahīṇāmiṣasya yā duḥkhā vedanā sā nirāmiṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:7123: āmiṣāṇāṃ viruddhā duḥkhā vedanā itīyaṃ nirāmiṣetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7129: yathocyate sūtre- asti sāmiṣā prītiḥ asti nirāmiṣā prītiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7131: sāmiṣā prītiriti pañcakāma guṇān pratītyotpadyate prītiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7134: yā vedanā nirvāṇamātrārthā sā naiṣkramyaniścitetyucyate / ataḥ punarucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7135: (pṛ) pañcasvindriyeṣu kasmādduḥkhā vedanā sukhā vedaneti pratyaṅgaṃ dvidhā vibhaktā /
SA16hvsatssu:7144: atastṛtīyadhyāne prītiviśeṣaṃ niśrityocyate kāyena sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:7151: sattvāḥ duḥkhābhihatāḥ sukhārthitvāt ghaniṣṭhaṃ kleśamutpādayanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7153: yathā pañcakāmaguṇasampannasya puruṣasya maśakapataṅgadaṃśe yo duḥkhānubhavo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7155: yādṛśañca jīvatāṃ putrāṇāṃ śatena sukham, na tadekaputramṛtitulyam /
SA16hvsatssu:7159: bahavaḥ sattvāḥ [SSS_199] tisṛṣu durgatiṣūpapannā devamanuṣyebhyo nikṛṣṭāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7162: yathā kṣetre tṛṇavīraṇāni svayaṃ prarohanti na sasyāni /
SA16hvsatssu:7163: duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratītya guruke pāpakarmaṇi pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:7175: sā ca vedanā triṣu dhātuṣu vyāptā /
SA16hvsatssu:7178: tadvedanārāgaṃ pratītya jīvati aśīti mahākalpasahasrāṇi duḥkhalakṣaṇān skandhānanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7185: sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā tu laukikamārgasyāpi doṣaprāpiṇī /
SA16hvsatssu:7198: sukhendriyaṃ caturthadhyāne nirudhyate upekṣendriyaṃ nirodhasamāpattau nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7204: (pṛ) rūpārūpyadhātau kuśaladharmān samyak bhāvayato duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ nasyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7212: eṣāṃ vijñānānāṃ yā kācidvedanā sā duḥkhā vā sukhā vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7217: yatkiñcanarūpaṃ [sarvaṃ tat] anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharma iti rūpadhātoḥ sarūpatvāt astyāsvādacittaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:7226: yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya saṃjñā vedanā ca śalyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7233: rūpārūpyadhātvorapi tathāṣṭasaṃskārāḥ samānamuktā iti kasmānnāsti duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:7237: āha ca sūtram- atra santīrṣyāmātsaryādayaḥ kleśā [SSS_201] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7238: yathā brahmā brahmāṇamāmantyāha- dhrūvamidaṃ sthānam mā bhavantaḥ śramaṇaṃ gautamamupasaṅkramata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7241: api coktaṃ sūtre- tatrāsti mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kleśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7244: ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- sarve kleśā akuśalā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7246: uktañca sūtre- rūpārāmā [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyāḥ rūparatā rūpasamuditāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7253: prākṛtānāmajñānāṃ kasya śaktibalena priyaprāptipratyayaṃ saumanasyaṃ na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7255: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mārgaṃ pratipannasyaivāyuṣo 'nte rūpe saumanasyaṃ daurmanasya ñca nāsti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7256: ato jñāyate sarveṣāṃ prākṛtānāṃ saumanasyaṃ daurmanasyaṃ sadānuvartate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7257: bhagavān svayamāha- daurmanasyavigataṃ saumanasyavigatañcaikaṃ cittamupekṣāyāmupavicaratītyayamarhato guṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7261: yathoktaṃ sūtre- prākṛtānāṃ yadupekṣācittaṃ sarvaṃ tat rūpaniśritaṃ na rūparāgavimuktam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7263: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśayaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7268: uttamabhūmau ca pravṛtte kāyacitte śāntasukhe na mahadanugṛhīte staḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7270: yadi [te] duḥkhopavicāriṇaḥ [SSS_202] na te tadiryāpatheṣu dīrghakālaṃ sthātuṃ śaknuvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7271: yathoktaṃ sūtre- saptadināni samāviśya vimuktisukhaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7273: yathoktaṃ sūtre praśrabdhiriti sukhā vedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7274: ato jñāyate sarvāsu bhūmiṣu asti sukhā vedaneti /
SA16hvsatssu:7285: tasmāt ucyate [tatra] nāsti sukhaṃ nāsti duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7286: tatra ca sukhaduḥkhe sūkṣme na pratīte staḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7287: asiśastrādi duḥkhaṃ bandhamaraṇādi daurmanasyañca nāstītyato nāsti duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7291: yaducyate triṣu dhyāneṣu sattvā ekakāyā ekanimittā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7293: yathā vadanti- yo dhyānavihārī na samyak styānamiddhauddhatyānyapanayati so 'viśuddhābha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7295: yathā ca laukikā vadanti alpalavaṇe bhojane alavaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7296: evaṃ tatra saumanalyaṃ daurmanasya ñca na pratītamito nāstītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7298: uktañca sūtre bhagavatā saṃjñāpratyayo vitarka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7299: atra saṃjñāyāṃ satyāṃ kathaṃ nāsti vitarkaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7301: [cittasya] audārikatā vitarka iti dhyānadvaye niruddha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7307: sūtra uktam- ṣaṭ cetanākāyāḥ saṃskāraskandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7310: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avaracetanā avaraprārthanā avarapraṇidhānam / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7315: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- yathāpi [bhikṣavaḥ] yavakalāpī caturmahāpathe vikṣiptā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7320: kiṃ punaridaṃ bhikṣavo bhavatāṃ manasi vipacyate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:7324: evaṃ hi sa moghapuruṣaḥ suhatataro bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7334: yatrāsmīti tatreñjitaṃ manaskṛtaṃ prapañjitaṃ spanditaṃ rāgagatam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7337: kiñcāha- yo bālo janmaprabhṛti maitrīmabhyasyati so 'kuśalaṃ karma karoti cetayate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:7340: āha ca cetanā karma cetayitvā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:7344: upālisūtre uktam- nighaṇṭo nāthaputraḥ śītodakapratikṣipta uṣṇodakapratisevī /
SA16hvsatssu:7352: sahetusapratyayasūtra uktam- aśrutavataḥ pṛthagjanasya yatprārthitaṃ tṛṣṇaiva sā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7353: mahānidānasūtra uktam- tṛṣṇāṃ pratītya paryeṣaṇā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:7354: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- duḥkhī bhūyasā sukhārthī kiṃ na prārthayate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7355: āha ca- yadā puruṣaḥ pañcakāmaguṇeṣu rajyate sa rāga eva prārthanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7356: api cāha- tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānamiti paryeṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ bhavati paścādupādānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7361: kasmāt upālisūtra uktam- asañcetanikaṃ karma na mahāsāvadyam /
SA16hvsatssu:7364: yathā vadanti ko jñānī idaṃ kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7371: yathā kañcitpraṇidadhannāha- ahamanāgate 'dhvani īdṛśaṃ kāyaṃ pratilapsya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7375: yathoktaṃsūtre- manaḥsañcetanāyā [bhikṣavaḥ] āhāre parijñāte tisrastṛṣṇāḥ parijñātā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:7389: kāryaprahāṇāddhetuprahāṇamuktaṃ yaduta manaḥsañcetanāhāraprahāṇāt tisṛṇāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ prahāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7392: tṛṣṇā hi dvividhā hetubhūtā phalabhūtā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:7399: yo dharmo hetvavasthaḥ so 'nyaḥ phalāvastha ścānyaḥ ityato jñāyate cetanā na tṛṣṇāṅgamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7400: yathoktaṃ sahetusapratyaya sūtre mūḍhasya yatprārthitaṃ tṛṣṇaiva sā /
SA16hvsatssu:7403: yasya yasmin vastuni rāgaḥ tasya tasmin vastuni prārthanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7419: manasā cet praduṣṭhena bhāṣate vā karoti vā /
SA16hvsatssu:7429: yadā puruṣaḥ parasattvānāṃ kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:7435: ato jñāyate ekaiva cetanā nānānāmabhirucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7451: ato jñāyate asti ca caitasika dharmaḥ sparśākhya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7452: ṣaṭ ṣaṭkasūtra uktaṃ- ṣaṭa sparśakāyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7455: na punaḥ pṛthak vaktavyaṃ sa [SSS_207] prajñaptidharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7456: sūtre cāsti dvividhaḥ sparśaḥ eka trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7458: ato jñāyate dvividhayoḥ sparśayorekaḥ svarūpasan aparaḥ prajñaptisanniti /
SA16hvsatssu:7463: yathā ca bhikṣūṇāṃ samavāyo na bhikṣubhyo 'nyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7468: evaṃ sparśo 'pi na cakṣurādibhyo bhidyata iti nāstyavadyam /
SA16hvsatssu:7470: prāguktaṃ mayā [yadā] cittamālambanaṃ gṛhāti tasmin samaye sparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7475: na vayaṃ svīkurmaḥ sparśo 'yaṃ dvividha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7482: ato jñāyate sa sparśo na tribhyo bhidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7483: kiñca yadi sparśaścaitasikadharmaḥ tadā anyebhyaścaitasikebhyo bhidyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:7490: yathā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇāpratyayā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7491: (u) sparśasya kiṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ yadanyacaitasikānāṃ noktaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7494: vedanādyakālīnā tṛṣṇānantarakālīnā iti vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā na tu tṛṣṇāpratyayā vedanā /
SA16hvsatssu:7497: na tūcyata iti jñātavyaṃ nāsti vibhinnaḥ [sparśa] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7499: yathāha yo duḥkhopaghātaḥ sa āgatya janakāyaṃ spṛśatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:7503: bhagavān sūcīlomaṃ yakṣamāha- tava [SSS_208] saṃsparśaḥ pāpaka iti kāyamapanayāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7504: yathā loke vadanti sukha uṣṇasaṃsparśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7515: ato jñāyate nāsti pāramārthikaḥ pṛthak caitasikadharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7516: yo dharmaḥ kāyagataḥ sa sparśa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7517: yat vedanādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ hetukriyāṃ prayacchati tasmin samaye sparśa iti nāma pradīyate //
SA16hvsatssu:7528: (pṛ) kiṃ vijñānānāṃ jñānaṃ sarvaṃ manaskārabalenotpadyate kiṃ vā na /
SA16hvsatssu:7534: kadācidālambanabalādutpadyate yathā dūrataḥ pradīpaṃ paśyan tasya kampaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:7545: kadācitsamādhibalādutpadyate yathaikatra pratibaddhacitto vijñāne prakarṣaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:7551: saukumāryādutpadyate yathā lomākṣigataṃ sat cittasya duḥkhajanakaṃ nānyatra gatam /
SA16hvsatssu:7563: ata evamāha- kasyacit cittāntarajanakamanaskāre 'sati vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7576: yathā vadanti samyak praśnaḥ samyag dūṣaṇaṃ, dūṣaṇapraśnayoridaṃ sayukti samādhānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7579: [SSS_210] ato jñāyate yuktayanuyāyimanaskāraḥ tattvamanaskāra ityādayaḥ samyaṅ manaskārāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7594: kiñcāha- yadi bhikṣavo mama śāsane tīvracchandā [vartadhve] /
SA16hvsatssu:7595: tada mama śāsanaṃ suciraṃ tiṣṭhet iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7600: ayaṃ vīryasahakāriṇā prajñāsamādhiṃ sañcinotītyebhyaścaturbhyo 'bhilaṣitamṛddhyaṅgamiti nāmabhāg bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7601: āha ca- tvaṃ vihāyasā gamanaṃ chandayasi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7602: tenakhalu samayena sa bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ svādhyāyabahulo viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:7604: atha khalu tasminvanaṣaṇḍe adhivasantī devatā tasya bhikṣordharmaśṛṇvantī yena sa bhikṣuḥ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7607: kasmāt dharmapadāni tvaṃ bhikṣurnādhyepi bhikṣubhiḥ sukhaṃ vasan /
SA16hvsatssu:7608: śrutvā ca dharmaṃ labhate prasādaṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme labhate praśaṃsām // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7609: abhūt pūrvaṃ dharmapadeṣu chando yāvadvirāgeṇa samāgato 'smi /
SA16hvsatssu:7610: yato virāgeṇa samāgato 'smi yatkiñcidṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vā mataṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:7621: bhagavān yat sattvānāṃ nānādhātūn prajānāti tat dhātujñānabalam /
SA16hvsatssu:7628: ata āha- sattvānāṃ yathādhātu santānamanuvartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7639: (pṛ) tathā cet svayaṃ dharmadarśinaḥ śraddhā na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7645: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ahaṃ bhagavan asmin vastuni yathā bhagavadvacanaṃ śraddhadha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7649: tasyeyaṃ cintā bhavati sa dharmaḥ paramārthasatyo na mṛṣeti, cittañca prasīdati /
SA16hvsatssu:7651: tadyathā rogī pūrvaṃ bhiṣagvacane śraddadhāna auṣadhamupasevya rogānmuktaḥ paścāttasmin bhiṣaji prasannacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7656: jñānajā yathā caturṣu [avetya] prasādeṣu buddhādiṣu cittaprasādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7657: sā tridhā vibhaktā kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:7663: tathā no cet akuśalā vedanā vedanā na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7666: yā śraddhā indriyeṣu gaṇitā vimuktyanugāminī saptatriṃśabdodhipakṣikeṣu gatā sā niyamena kuśalaiva /
SA16hvsatssu:7671: tatrāmyutsāhaḥ sadā cittaikāgratāsamudācāraḥ sa vyavasāya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7673: yat caturṣu samyakpradhāneṣu antargataḥ sa kuśalaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7676: tasya paścādutpadyate vyavasāyo 'kuśalānāṃ prahāṇāya kuśalānāṃ samādānāya /
SA16hvsatssu:7685: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat ciraviprakṛṣṭānubhūtaṃ smarati na pramuṣati sā smṛtirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7699: tatra pratyutpannā prajñaiva na tu smṛtiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7700: atastathāgato [yadā] pūrvaṃ smṛtināmnā vimuktimuktavān tadā tāmeva prajñetyavocat /
SA16hvsatssu:7703: smṛterdharmaṃ evaṃ yat svasantāne yo dharmaḥ [pūrva]mutpannaniruddhaḥ tameva [svasantānikaṃ] viprakṛṣṭaṃ vijñānāntaramālambata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7704: jñānānāṃ vijñānadharmaśca tathā yat vijñānāntarānumūtaṃ vijñānāntaraṃ vijānātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:7705: yathā cakṣurvijñānena vijñātaṃ rūpaṃ manovijñānaṃ vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:7713: yathā bhagavān salyakaṃ nāthaputramavocat pūrvaṃ manasi kṛtvā vyākuruṣva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7715: ato vijñaptyādidharmā api pūrvavastvanusmaraṇarūpā smṛtaya ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:7719: samādhiḥ prajñā ca samādhivarge prajñāvarge ca vakṣyate //
SA16hvsatssu:7723: yat cittaṃ vyagraṃ muharmuhurālambhakaṃ sa vitarkaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7727: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānāha- savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ prathamadhyānamupasampadya viharāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:7729: yā cittasya vyagratā kiñcitsūkṣmatā sa vicāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7736: ato 'pratyakṣavastuno 'nuvitarkaḥ samyagvitarko vā mithyāvitarko vā iti taṃ kathayāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7740: samyagvitarkaḥ yadapratilabdhaṃ tattvajñānamanumitilakṣaṇena jñānena labdhvā yogī nirvedhabhāgīyakuśalamūle vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:7744: tasminneva vitarke anena hetunā evaṃ bhavati anena hetunā naivaṃ bhavati iti cintanā vicāraṇā vā sa vicāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7760: yat kuśalasyānācaraṇaṃ mithyācaraṇaṃ vā sa pramādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7785: [anye] kecidāhuḥ trīṇi tṛṣṇā avidyā prajñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7787: avyākṛtānugaṃ cittaṃ yaddhetujaṃ sa heturavyākṛtamūlaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7790: cittasamācaraṇakāle yat kāyaścittaṃ dauṣṭhalyavigataṃ praśāntaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7794: dhyāneṣu yat sukhaduḥkhaviviktaṃ vimuktiparāyaṇaṃ cittasamācaraṇaṃ sopekṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:7803: aprāptiḥ asaṃjñisamāpattiḥ nirodhasamāpattiḥ āsaṃjñikaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ jātiḥ vyayaḥ sthitiḥ anyathātvaṃ jarā maraṇaṃ nāmakāyaḥ padakāyo vyañjanakāyaḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ ityādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7815: uktaṃ hi sūtre yaḥ puṇyaṃ pāpañca karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:7818: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- mṛtasya puṇyaṃ na praṇaśyati yaduta phalaprāpakameva /
SA16hvsatssu:7828: yathā pratyutpannakliṣṭāt kliṣṭam, tathā pratyutpannaśīlāt śīlaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7841: na hi nirudhyante pṛthagjanānāṃ cittacaitasikadharmā iti paścādvakṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7857: bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ gabhīraṃ yatpratyayānāṃ sāmagryā dharmā [SSS_220] utpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7862: kiñca vadanti jātyādayo dharmā ekakālīnā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7866: yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmin tasmin [sattvanikāye] jātiḥ skandhānāṃ pratilābhaḥ....... [sā jātiḥ] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7869: āha ca- skandhānāṃ jīrṇatā bhugnatā jareti /
SA16hvsatssu:7872: vyañjanebhya utpannaṃ nāma yathā vadanti devadatta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7885: tīrthikānāṃ hi sūtreṣūktaṃ- anyo ghaṭo 'nyat ghaṭatvam /
SA16hvsatssu:7892: tadā rūpaṃ svabhāvaṃ vinā syāt, rūpatvāpekṣitvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:7894: ato gabhīramananuvicintya vavīṣi- asti pṛthagjanatvaṃ pṛthagiti /
SA16hvsatssu:7904: śāstramāha- duḥkhasatyaṃ parisamāpya samudayasatyamidānīṃ vakṣyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7914: (u) ghaṭādi kāyikakarmaṇaḥ phalam na kāyikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:7921: idaṃ kṣaṇikavarge pratyuktaṃ yadekasmin dharma utpadyamāne 'nyasyāpacaya upacayo vā [tat] kāyikaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:7922: (pṛ) tathā cet kāya eva kāyikaṃ karma bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:7924: na tu kāyena kṛtaṃ kāyikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:7935: atastatsamudayo yadi vā kuśalo [yadi vā] akuśalaḥ na tu sākṣātkāyikaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:7938: [SSS_223] cittabalāt śabdavyavahārasamuditaṃ karma kuśalamakuśalaṃ vācikaṃ karmetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:7940: ya imaṃ sattvaṃ hanmīti adhyavasitacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7941: tasya tasmin samaye pāpaṃ samudeti / evaṃ puṇyamapi /
SA16hvsatssu:7944: (u) tat dvidhā bhavati mana eva mānasaṃ karma manasa utpannaṃ vā mānasaṃ karma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7945: sattvaṃ hanmīti yadadhyavasitaṃ manaḥ tadakuśalaṃ mana eva manasaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:7956: nahyasti tatra kāraṇaṃ kevalaṃ kāyikavācikāvijñaptirevāsti na mānasikāvijñaptiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:7957: sūtre coktaṃ dvidhā karma- cetanā vā cetayitvā vā [karme]ti /
SA16hvsatssu:7959: cetayitvā [karma] trividham- cetanāsañcitaṃ karma kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:7967: (u) cittaṃ pratītyotpadyamānaṃ puṇyapāpaṃ middhamūrchādikāle 'pi yannityaṃ pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:7972: teṣāṃ divā ca rātriñca sadā puṇyaṃ pravartate // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7985: (pṛ) na viratyā svarga utpadyate, kintu kuśalacittena /
SA16hvsatssu:7987: uktaṃ hi sūtre- vīryavān puruṣa āyurvaśāt bahupuṇyaṃ prasavati /
SA16hvsatssu:7991: āha ca vanādiropasya divā rātriñca sadā puṇyaṃ pravardhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:7994: kathaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt puṇyaṃ sadā pravardhate, śīlaṃ dhruvamiti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:8008: idānīṃ kimidaṃ rūpaṃ kiṃ vā cittaviprayuktasaṃskāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8014: [SSS_225] (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ ṣaṭ cetanākāyāḥ saṃskāraskandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8016: (u) pratipāditamidaṃ pūrvaṃ yadasti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ cittaviprayuktamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8046: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- hetukṛtaṃ karma ahetukṛtaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:8057: yadi yodhājīvo vyavaharasi na tadā gaṇayiṣyāmīti yāvat tridhā pṛcchati /
SA16hvsatssu:8058: yadyakaraṇacittapūrvakaṃ karoti- yathā kaścidviharan pādanikṣepaṇena kīṭaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8061: karmāṇi caturvidhāni- kṛtānupacitaṃ, upacittākṛtaṃ, kṛtopacitaṃ akṛtānupacitam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8062: kṛtānupacitamiti- yathā hananādikarma kṛtvā paścāccittaṃ paritapati /
SA16hvsatssu:8066: upacitākṛtamiti- yat anyaṃ hananādi kārayitvā pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8067: anyaṃ dānādi kārayitvā ca pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8068: kṛtopacitamiti- yat hananādi pāpaṃ kṛtvā dānādipuṇyaṃ kṛtvā ca pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8069: akṛtānupacitamiti- na ca karoti nāpi muditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8071: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat karma kṛtamupacitaṃ tasya karmaṇo 'vaśyamasti vipākapratisaṃvedanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8072: ataḥ kṛtopacitakarmaṇo dṛṣṭadharme vā vipāko vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8075: (pṛ) yadi hetukṛtopacitakarmaṇo 'vaśyamasti vipākapratisaṃvedanā tadā nāsti vimuktiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8084: (u) yastattvajñānaṃ na bhāvayati sa pāpakarmaṇo 'nuśayaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8100: niyatavipākaṃ karma bahu vā alpaṃ vā avaśyavedanīyavipākam /
SA16hvsatssu:8109: yathā bhagavati tacchrāvake vā satkāraḥ athavālpamātrānindā /
SA16hvsatssu:8120: yathā rājadharme gurupātakī daṇḍya eva na kṣantavyaḥ //
SA16hvsatssu:8135: dharmo dharma iti [yat] tannāstīti tasmin vadati kuśaladharmāṇāmacaritāro bahavaḥ sattvāḥ pratihanyanta ityato bhavati gurutaraṃ pāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:8139: nāsti pāpaṃ nāsti puṇyaṃ nāsti mātāpitṛsajjānānāṃ satkāravipāka iti yadvacanaṃ tadādimithyādṛṣṭirapi tadvipākaprāpiṇī /
SA16hvsatssu:8140: anyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭau pātayan bahūn sattvānakuśalāni kārayaṃśca tadvipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:8141: īdṛśamithyādṛṣṭisūtrāṇi racayanti yathā pūraṇādayo mithyādṛṣṭināmācāryāḥ samyagdṛṣṭivihiṃsayā bahūnāṃ sattvānāmakuśalāya hetupratyayaṃ prakāśayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8150: śataṃ sahasrāṇāṃ nirarbudānāṃ ṣaṭ triṃśacca pañca ca arbudānām
SA16hvsatssu:8151: yadāryagarhī nirayamupaiti vācaṃ manaḥ praṇidhāya pāpakam / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8153: guruviparītaṃ laghu yaduta tapanapratapanādiṣu hīnanarakeṣu tīryakṣu preteṣu devamanuṣyeṣu cākuśalavipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:8169: evaṃ manuṣyeṣu caturmahārājikānāmadhaḥ pratyekaṃ karmavaśādvipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:8177: [SSS_230] tato jaghanyabhūteṣu caturapramāṇacitteṣu viharan śīlasamādhipratyayavaśācca rūpadhātāvutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8182: (pṛ) puṇyakṣetraṃ kiṃ bodhyotkṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ vā prahāṇena /
SA16hvsatssu:8186: yathā bhagavān bodhyā śrāvakebhyo 'tiricyate na prahāṇena /
SA16hvsatssu:8191: ato yadbodhisattvānāṃ saṃsāre dīrghakālāvāsaḥ sa samyak prahāṇārthaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8200: āha ca- dandhānāṃ hiṃsayā kāmarāgakalahacittaṃ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:8208: tasminneva sūtra uktaṃ- tiraścāṃ dānaṃ śataguṇaṃ hitaṃ prāpayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8209: vastutastu pārāvatapakṣyādīnāṃ dānena pratilabdho vipākaḥ tīrthikānāṃ pañcābhijñānāṃ dānamatiśete /
SA16hvsatssu:8211: sūtraṃ tat bahunā hetunāha- nissaraṇārthā prajñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8219: asmin śrāmaṇere utpannānuttara [bodhi]citte tu arhanneva tatpātracīvaramādāya svayamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā tamanugacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:8226: (u) yat karma pareṣāṃ priyaṃ prayacchati tat kuśalam /
SA16hvsatssu:8231: yat pareṣāṃ duḥkhaprāpakaṃ tena pāpena bhavitavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8232: yathā āñjanauṣadhaśalyavedhāḥ pareṣāṃ duḥkhajanakāḥ pāpāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8235: yathā paradāragamanaṃ tat tasya sukhajanakaṃ tat puṇyakaramapi syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8237: yat parānukuśaladharme pravartayati tat duḥkhāya bhavati na sukhāya /
SA16hvsatssu:8242: tadannapānaṃ kadācidajīryamāṇaṃ sat puruṣasya maraṇaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8243: tadannadāyakaḥ kiṃ pāpaṃ labheta kiṃ vā puṇyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8248: (u) idaṃ pūrvameva pratyuktaṃ yadabrahmacaryaṃ niyamena akuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8257: yathā corāṇāṃ nigrahe rāṣṭraṃ nirīti bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8271: yat karma kuśalākuśalahetusamuddhitaṃ, tataḥ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vyāmiśraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8278: iti prāṇātipātāt kathaṃ puṇyaṃ na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8284: āha ca ca sūtram- yo yuddhe hanyate sa svarga utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8285: yathāha gāthā- mriyamāṇañca saṅgrāme patiṃ barayatepsarāḥ iti / kiñcāha-
SA16hvsatssu:8287: hanyādeva na vai pāpaṃ āhantā vindate tu tat // iti
SA16hvsatssu:8290: brāhmaṇasya ṣaḍdharmāḥ kṣatriyasya catvāro vaiśyasya trayaḥ śūdrasyaikaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8291: ṣaḍ dharmā iti yajanamārvijya madhyayatamadhyāpanaṃ dānaṃ pratigrahaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8295: trayo dharmā iti yajanaṃ nārtvijyaṃ, adhyayanaṃ nādhyāpanaṃ dānaṃ na pratigrahaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8297: kṣatriyasya prajāpālanāya prāṇivadhe puṇyameva na pāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:8298: veda uktam- prāṇivadhaḥ puṇyaprāpakaḥ yaduta vaidikamantreṇa hatāḥ paśavaḥ svarga utpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8300: kiñcāha yadvastuto martavyaṃ taddhanane nāsti pāpam- yathā pañcābhijña ṛṣirmantreṇa puruṣaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8303: ato jñāyate prāṇivadho na pāpaprāpaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8324: kecitsattvā api pratyarpaṇīyajīvitadhanā ityato vadhahiṃsayā yadabhīpsitaṃ tallabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8327: yathā loka āhuḥ- ayaṃ puruṣo 'lpapuṇyo bahukurvannapi na vindata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8335: yadbravīṣi sūtra uktaṃ- yo yuddhe hanyate sa svarga utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8342: yadāha bhavān- caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ pṛthak santi svadharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8345: yathā sūnakādīnāṃ lokānāṃ gṛhyadharmāḥ prāṇivadhāḥ sadā kriyamāṇā na pāpavimuktāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8348: yadi kṣatriyo rājadharmatvena prāṇān vadhyan apāpo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8350: kṣatriyaḥ paraṃ prajāsu karuṇārdracittatayā vairamutsṛjya tadadhīnaṃ puṇyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8358: yo mumūrṣuḥ sa brāhmaṇādapyupādānaṃ labhate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8359: ime duṣkarmaṇā jīvanto 'pi nocyante śīlavyasanina iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8363: (u) ukta brāhmaṇa dharma eva- cauryakāle dhanasvāmyāgatya rakṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:8370: tadā ātmahanane parahanane vā tatpāpamapi tulyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8376: corahanane 'pyevaṃ syāt duṣkarmaṇā jīvanta iti yaduktaṃ tatra duṣkarmasattvātkathaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8377: yadavocaḥ coraṃ purata āgataṃ hanyādeva na vai pāpamahantā tu vindate tat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8384: yadabravīḥ veda uktaṃ prāṇivadhaḥ puṇyaprāpaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8386: yaduktaṃ vastuto martavyasya kasyacidvadhe nāsti pāpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8399: evaṃ yaḥ parasmai dadāti tasyāpi na puṇyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8400: pratigrahītā pūrvādhvani svācaritadānakarmaka idānīṃ tadvipākaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8401: na hi sambhavati nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8402: ato jñātavyaṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvādhvakṛtavadhakarmaṇāmapi vadhitā pāpaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8408: tathā nocedṛṣayo rāgadveṣādikleśānāmudaye ṛddhe na hīyeran /
SA16hvsatssu:8411: jñātavyaṃ pūrvādhvakṛtapratyayānāmapi sattvānāṃ vadhitā pāpavān syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:8417: yadabravīḥ- kaściccittabalena prāṇātipātaṃ kurvan puṇyaṃ prasūte /
SA16hvsatssu:8423: yaḥ kuśalacittena gurutalpago brāhmaṇahantā vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8425: pārasīkādi paryantabhūmigatānāṃ janānāṃ puṇyabuddhayā mātṛbhaginyādigāmināṃ kiṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8433: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ bahavaḥ sattvā vadhādīnācaranto bhūyasā tisṛṣu gatiṣu manuṣyagatau ca duḥkhapīḍā anubhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8439: devā api sadā yuddhe 'suraiḥ saha vadhyante /
