SA16hvsatssu:8442: na tu tisṛṣu gatiṣu, iti jñātavyaṃ tatra pāpaṃ tīvraduḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8451: yo vadhahiṃsādibhyo viramati sa punarlābhasukhāyuḥpauṣkalyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8454: idānīmauttarā vadanti taṇḍulaṃ svābhāvikaṃ vasanaṃ vṛkṣajam /
SA16hvsatssu:8459: ye buddhā bodhisattvāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ śrāvakā anye ca bhadantāḥ te sarve tān parityajya viramanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8474: yo dharmo 'duṣṭaḥ na sa dharmaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8476: keciddharmāḥ svarūpato 'kuśalā ityataḥ pariharanti yathā madyapānavikālabhojanādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8480: yadanena hetunā janavidviṣṭaṃ kathaṃ tadakuśalaṃ na bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8481: yaḥ prāṇātipātavirataḥ sa bahūnāṃ [SSS_237] janānāṃ priyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8485: yathā kaścidrājārthaṃ duṣṭacorāṇāṃ hantā rājapriyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8487: yathā vadanti yo duṣkarmaṇā rājacittaṃ tarpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8495: vadhādidharmāḥ tāḍanahiṃsanavandhanādīnāṃ duḥkho padravāṇāṃ hetava ityato jñāyate 'kuśalā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8498: yo na vadhyati taṃ rājā hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8499: (u) yo na hanti sa hanyata ityahantāraḥ sarve mariṣyamāṇā bhaveyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8501: yadi rājā jānāti ayamavadhacitta iti tadā avadhitā pratyuta satkriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8502: ato jñāyate vadhādayo duḥkhahetavo na tvavadhādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8513: yathā sūnako na kadāpīdṛśakarmaṇā satkāraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8517: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu hiṃsādīnāṃ vipriyaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8525: gatāgate pādotkṣepaṇe pādāvakṣepaṇe vā sadā sūkṣmasattvān vihanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8532: teṣu sattvasaṃjñāmutpādya jighatsābuddhyā tān hatvā hananapāpaṃ labhanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8534: (pṛ) yathā viṣaṃ pītavāniti hetāvahetāvubhayathā puruṣaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8535: yathā ca vahniprakramaṇaṃ jñāne 'jñāne ca puruṣaṃ dahati /
SA16hvsatssu:8537: jñātavyaṃ prāṇihiṃsā hetāvahetau ca pāpaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8545: sati tu vijñāne budhyate evamasati hetucitte na karma sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:8554: yathā mātustanagrahaṇe bālako na pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8557: puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ sarvaṃ cittādhīnaṃ jāyata iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8559: tadā vimuktilabdho 'pi asati hetau sattvān pīḍayan pāpaṃ labheta /
SA16hvsatssu:8564: yathā kaścitpuṇyaṃ karma kurvan sattvaṃ hatavānasmīti bhrānto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8567: hetāvasati puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā nāstīti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8569: tadā kathamidaṃ kuśalaṃ idamakuśalaṃ idamavyākṛtamiti vibhāgaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8571: yathā trayaḥ puruṣāḥ sambhūya stūpapradakṣiṇaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8583: yadi cittavyatiriktaṃ karmāsti asattvasaṃkhyeṣvapi puṇyapāpaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8584: yathā sabhīraṇonmūlitaparvatopadruteṣu sattveṣu samīraṇe pāpaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8588: tīrthikā vadanti- upavāsasthaṇḍilaśayanaśalākāvedhādibhirjalapatanadahanapraveśa [SSS_239] bhṛgupatanādibhiśca duḥkhapratyayaiḥ puṇyaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8590: tathā cennārakāḥ sattvāḥ sadā dahyante pacyante ca /
SA16hvsatssu:8597: avaśyaṃ hetucittena tadduḥkhamanubhavatāṃ puṇyaṃ bhavati natvahetucittena /
SA16hvsatssu:8605: yadi hetucittaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:8613: vastutastu santi brahmakāyikādīnāṃ surucirāḥ kāyā ato jñāyate na hetuṃ vinā puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8617: pariśuddhena cittena bhojane na punarasti pāpamiti śrutaṃ dṛṣṭavānasi /
SA16hvsatssu:8618: tadā cittaṃ vinā nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8622: tathā no cet sarve prāṇivadhāḥ puṇyaprāpakāḥ pāpaprāpakā vā syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8628: ato jñāyate yo hetuṃ vinānyasya viṣaṃ prayacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:8644: yaḥ [SSS_240] prājñaḥ sa pañcakāmaguṇeṣu vasannapi na pāpamāk bhavatīti manaso balam /
SA16hvsatssu:8646: na hi prājño rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mithyāsaṃjñāmutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8651: tathā ca mānasaṃ karma niṣprayojanaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8667: annavastrābhyāṃ paramupakurvatā tasmin samaye puṇyaṃ labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8674: anyapuruṣe ca duṣṭacittamātramutpādayati na kāyavākkarma karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:8689: ato jñāyate ātmārthatā na puṇyavatī syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:8694: yadbravīṣi caityavihārā vasattvabhūtau, tayoḥ secanaśodhane api puṇyaprāpaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8695: tat bhagavadguṇāḥ sattveṣu pūjyā iti smṛtvā janāḥ secante śodhayanti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:8698: uktañca sūtre- na tathāgataḥ san nāsan, nāpi sadasat nāpi ca na san nāsan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8701: tadā anirvṛtakālīnaṃ bhagavantaṃ smṛtvā pūjayantaḥ puṇyaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:8702: yathā janāḥ pitarau jananapoṣaṇakālaṃ smṛtvā yajanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8703: tathā no cet na pitṛpūjā bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8719: yathā ca vastradānaṃ yadyapi paraṃ hāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8721: tathā ca vastradānenāpi na puṇyaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:8723: yathoktaṃ sūtre- eko bhikṣuḥ snānagṛhe anyasya dehaṃ hastena mārjayati sma /
SA16hvsatssu:8728: yadbhavānāha- na ca cittamātreṇa puṇyaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8730: yat kaścitparasyopakāraṃ cakāra karoti kariṣyati vā sarvaṃ tat kuśalacittamūlakam /
SA16hvsatssu:8731: yacca parasyāpakāraṃ cakāra karoti kariṣyati vā sarvaṃ tadakuśalacittamūlakam /
SA16hvsatssu:8732: karuṇācārī ca karuṇācittavipākena sarveṣāmupakaroti yaduta caṇḍavātavṛṣṭyanupatane 'pi sūryācandramasau nakṣatrāṇi ca na bhraśyanti sadā caranti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:8737: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadi sarve lokāḥ karuṇācittamācaranti /
SA16hvsatssu:8742: tatpratyayena apakarṣakaraṇe 'karaṇe vā sarvathā tadādhipatyena pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:8743: bhagavati piḍājananānna pāpamastīti bhavato yadi matam /
SA16hvsatssu:8750: akuśalacittavattvāt tasmin śṛṇvati aśṛṇvati vāvaśyaṃ duḥkhaṃ janayet /
SA16hvsatssu:8755: yadi paraprabodhito jānāti tadā tasyāvaśyaṃ duḥkhopāyāso jāyeta eva /
SA16hvsatssu:8757: tadā [svāmī] prabudhya yadyapi na jānāti tathāpi tasya [paścāt] pīḍāṃ karotyeva /
SA16hvsatssu:8764: tathā ca sarve sattvāḥ sadā pāpaṃ labheran yathā parapīḍanā janāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8767: ato na svadehamātrātpuṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāstīti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:8768: mārgahetutvādvinaye śīlamidaṃ paribaddhaṃ yaḥ kliṣṭacittenātmānaṃ hanti na saṃkleśātpāpaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8770: yatkarma na kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā na parasattvānāmupakārakaṃ nāpakārakaṃ tadavyākṛtamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8773: yatkarma na kuśalaṃ nākuśalaṃ tadavyākṛtamiti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8786: bhagavānāha- dvidhā vipākaḥ mithyākāyacaryā apriyavipākaprāpiṇī samyakkāyacaryā priyavipākaprāpiṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8795: bhagavānāha- trīṇi duścaritāni kāyaduścaritaṃ vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8803: pāpamidaṃ svakāyenāpi kriyate yatra svakāyena sattvān hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8804: vācāpi kriyate yatna sattvān hantuṃ paramājñāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8805: manasāpi kriyate yat kaściccittamutpādayati yena paro mriyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8809: kadāciccittotpāde paro jānāti anena pratyayenāpi pāpakaraṃ prāṇātipātādi kuryāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:8814: yat kenacitpraśne sthāpite taṃ purata eva vañcayati /
SA16hvsatssu:8823: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- sarvāṇi duścaritāni apriyavipākakarāṇi sucaritāni priyavipākakarāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8825: yathaikameva rūpaṃ [kasyacit] priyaṃ bhavati [anyasyā] priyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8840: samyak caritāni priyavipākakarāṇīti sūtra uktvā kasmātpunarucyate sucaritapratyayaṃ svarga utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8843: ataḥ sūtre punarucyate sucaritapratyayaṃ svarga upapadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8844: duścaritasucarite kuśalākuśalagatikakāyaṃ prāpayataḥ gṛhītakāyastatra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā [SSS_244] vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:8846: sucaritapratyayaṃ deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā sukhaṃ vedayate //
SA16hvsatssu:8855: yadvandanavastradānādi kuśalaṃ kāyikaṃ karma tat kāyasucaritam /
SA16hvsatssu:8863: anye 'pi śīlasaṃvarasaṅgṛhītaṃ sucaritaṃ labhante yathā daśavarṣāyuṣkasya puruṣasya prāṇātipātaviratisamādānādviṃśativarṣāyuṣkaḥ putra utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8867: ābhidhārmikā āhuḥ- pṛthagjanānāṃ yat kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ kuśalaṃ karma tat sucaritamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8872: kecidāhuḥ- imāni trīṇi caritāni ekasyaivārthasyavibhinnāni nāmāni /
SA16hvsatssu:8878: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- cittameva vyupaśamacaritaṃ na cetaneti /
SA16hvsatssu:8884: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃṃ- sucaritadṛṣṭisampanno devadṛśo vā bhavati devasaṃkhyātadṛśo vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:8888: sucarītaśālī yadyapi nāvaśyaṃ deveṣūtpadyate tathāpi ya āryabahumatasthāna utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:8892: yat samyaṅmithyāvyāmiśraṃ sucaritaṃ [tatra] mithyācaritasya prābalyānna deveṣūtpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:8893: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānānandamavocat- paśyāmyahaṃ kecana trīṇi suritāni caranto 'pi durgatāvutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:8895: idānīṃ sucaritasyāpi aparipūrṇatvānmaraṇa upasthite mithyādṛṣṭeścittābhimukhyāddargatau patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8902: sūtra uktaṃ- trividhaṃ karma kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma rūpadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma arūpyadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:8905: yat karma ānarakādāca paranirmitavaśavartidevādantarāle vipākavedakaṃ tatkāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:8908: (pṛ) avyākṛtaṃ karma aniyatavipākañca karma kimeteṣu nāntargatam /
SA16hvsatssu:8916: tathā cedidaṃ tīrthikaśāstraṃ yaduta sarvapratisaṃvedyaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhañca pūrvakarmahetupratyayaṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:8917: pūrvakarmavipāko yaduta kuśalamakuśalaṃ karma savipākamavipākamiti vyavasāyaguṇasya nāsti yatkiñcanaprayojanam /
SA16hvsatssu:8920: yasya [SSS_246] kleśāḥ karmāṇi karmavipākāśca santi tasya vimuktirnāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:8925: tīrthikā hi vadanti sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ paratvamaparatvaṃ pūrvavipākamātramiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8927: paśyāmastu vastutaḥ padārthāḥ pratyutpannebhyaḥ pratyayebhyaḥ samutpadyante yathā bījāṅkurādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8945: tatra bījādaṅkura utpadyate na tu tuṣādibhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8947: yaduktaṃ bhavatā prayāse na guṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8955: tadyathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:8957: kiñca ya utpannā dharmāḥ sarve te karmamūlakāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:8961: yadi nāsti karmamūlaṃ, kathamevaṃ pratiniyatavibhāgaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:8968: purā kila janāḥ kuśalamācaritavanta ityataḥ śālitaṇḍulāḥ svata ajāyanta /
SA16hvsatssu:8969: ato jñāyate karmabhūlakatvāt māṣānmāṣo jāyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:8972: sarvasattvānāṃ sādhāraṇakarmavipāko yaduta [SSS_247] caṅkramaṇāsthānakarmapratyayalābhāt kṣityādayo bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:8973: prakāśakarmapratyayalābhāccandrasūryādayo bhavanti iti jñātavyaṃ janyaṃ vastu sarvaṃ karmamūlakamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8983: uktaṃ hi sūtre- asti aprasaṃyuktā vedeneti /
SA16hvsatssu:8989: (u) yaḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣu daśākuśalakarmāṇi samutpādayati sa kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:8997: uktaṃ hi sūtre bhagavatā- mithyādṛṣṭirduḥkhakleśānāṃ heturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:8999: yathā tiktakāravelle vidyamānāni catvāri mahābhūtāni sarvāṇi tiktarasāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9003: yathā bako brahmā brahmāṇamāmantrayāha- mopagaccha śramaṇaṃ gautamam /
SA16hvsatssu:9006: anye 'pi brahma [kāyikā] devāḥ tatra bhavantaṃ tādṛśaṃ puruṣaṃ dūṣayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9013: (u) yadīdamakuśalaṃ karma tadā kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayata ityataḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:9022: (pṛ) kathaṃ tatra samutpāditaṃ kuśalaṃ karma kāmadhātuvedanīyavipākaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:9024: tathā tatra vikṣiptacittasamutpāditakuśalakarmaṇo 'smin loke vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9025: yathā ca rūpārūpyadhātusamutpāditākuśalakarmaṇaḥ kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9027: (pṛ) yo rūpārūpyadhātugataḥ na sa utpādayati kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9029: tatra nāstyayaṃ hetuḥ yat kāmadhātugato rūpārūpya[pratisaṃyuktaṃ] kuśalaṃ karmaiva samutpādayati na rūpārūpyadhātugataḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma samutpādayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9030: ucyate ca yuṣmābhiḥ kāmadhātugataḥ kāmadhātukamavyākṛtaṃ cittaṃ samutpādayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9033: sūtre bhagavān hastakadevaputrametadavocat- cittaviharaṇe audārikavedanāsaṃjñāṃ manasikuru iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9035: ayaṃ kuśalacittena yat dharmaṃ śṛṇoti buddhaṃ pūjayati tat sarvaṃ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ cittam /
SA16hvsatssu:9036: tathā no cet audārikasaṃjñeti nākhyā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9038: yathāha bhagavān triṣu vastuṣu atṛpto 'smin loke āyuṣo 'nte 'navataptadeveṣūpapatsye yaduta tathāgataṃ paśyāmi dharmaṃ śṛṇomi saṅghaṃ satkaromīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9057: (pṛ) kimetāni trīṇi karmāṇi niyatavipākāni niyatakālāni ca /
SA16hvsatssu:9063: tathā cet pañcānantaryāṇi niyatavipākānīti na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9070: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākaṃ karma nāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharma eva vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9071: vedyate cet dṛṣṭadharma eva vedanīyaṃ syāt nānyatra /
SA16hvsatssu:9074: (u) kecidāhuḥ- vyādhyarthakarmaṇo dṛṣṭadharma eva vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9075: yathā tathāgata āryeṣu mātāpitrādiṣu samutpāditaṃ yat kuśalamakuśalaṃ karma tat dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākam /
SA16hvsatssu:9079: yathā cakravartinaḥ karma bodhisattvasya vā karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9080: kecidāhuḥ- trividhakarmaṇāmeṣāṃ yathāpraṇidhānaṃ vipākaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9083: yathā mallikādevī svānnabhāgadānena praṇidadhāti dṛṣṭa evādhvani rājamahiṣī bhaveyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9088: (pṛ) yasmin kṣaṇe karmotpadyate tatsamanantarakṣaṇa eva kiṃ vipāko vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9093: yo garbhamadhyastho ye ca middhonmattādayaḥ te karma sañcinvanti na vā (u)
SA16hvsatssu:9096: (pṛ) yo 'syāṃ bhūmau vītarāgaḥ sa pṛthivīkarma karoti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9105: uktañca sūtre- prahīṇapuṇyapāpakarmako 'rhanniti sa nopacinoti puṇyakarmāṇi apuṇyakarmāṇyāneñjyakarmāṇi ca /
SA16hvsatssu:9106: ato vedanāparyavasannaṃ karmeti na nūtnaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:9110: sūtre hyuktaṃ- sa karmāṇi vidhvasya na sañcinoti nopacinoti niruddhaṃ na tathā bhavati ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:9114: (u) sarvatra triṣvapi dhātuṣu (pṛ) aniyataṃ karma kimasti kiṃ vā nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:9116: yat karma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākaṃ vā upapadyavedanīyavipākaṃ vā tadūrdhvavedanīyavipākaṃ vā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9121: (u) ya imāni trividhakarmāṇi vivecayati sa samyagdṛṣṭimutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:9125: udāsīnasya kadācinmithyādṛṣṭirbhavet yaduta kuśalasyākuśalasya vā nāsti vipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9129: pāpo 'pi paśyati bhadrāṇi yāvatpāpaṃ na pacyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9130: yadā ca pacyate pāpamatha pāpo pāpāni paśyati //
SA16hvsatssu:9131: bhadro 'pi paśyati pāpāni yāvadbhadraṃ na pacyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9132: yadā ca pacyate bhadramatha bhadro bhadrāṇi paśyati //
SA16hvsatssu:9135: yaḥ pūrvādhvani puṇyavān san āyuṣo 'nte prabalakuśalacittamutpādayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9137: ata eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prajānīyāt //
SA16hvsatssu:9140: (pṛ) sūtre bhagavānāha- trividhaṃ karma sukhavipākaṃ, duḥkhavipākamaduḥkhāsukhavipākamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9157: hetau phalopacāraḥ yathānnasya dātā pañcārthānāṃ dāteti /
SA16hvsatssu:9185: tatra saumanasyamapi saṃjñāvikalpādutpadyata iti na vipākaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9194: tacca daurmanasyaṃ jñānapraheyaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhamapi pariharati /
SA16hvsatssu:9195: daurmanasya triṣvadhvasu kleśaṃ janayati yaduta pūrvamahaṃ duḥkhī idānīṃ duḥkhī āyatyāñca duḥkhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9202: yathā ca rogī kaścit [roga]duḥkhābhihataḥ punaḥ kāyacittapīḍanayātyadhikadaurmanasyopāyāso bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9210: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān [SSS_253] prasenajitaṃ rājānamapṛcchat- api tvaṃ [mahārāja] kāśīkosaleṣu priyo 'si iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9211: uktañca- devā rūpāsaktā rūpakāmāḥ rūpe vinaṣṭe daurmanasyajātā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9218: bahavaśca sattvā daurmanasyakaraṃ parān sampīḍayantaḥ sadaurmanasyasampīḍanavipākaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:9221: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- vītarāgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttatvānna vipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9224: narakādivipāko na vipāka iti kiṃ sambhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:9225: ato na sambhavati vītarāgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttamavipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9236: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trīṇyāvaraṇāni karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ vipākāvaraṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9242: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo 'yaṃ puruṣo nitayaṃ samāpattau vedanīyavipākaṃ karmopacinoti na sa supade 'vatarati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9245: yat kasyacit kleśā anivāryāḥ tadyathā ṣaṇḍādīnāṃ kāmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9247: yannarakādau pāpākuśalopapattyāyatane yathopapattyāyanañca na mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:9250: (pṛ) kecit pūrvaṃ vidyāvihīnebhyaḥ pūrvapuruṣebhyo na prajānanti idaṃ kuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9251: tadā te na dadanti yat sa yadi matto dānaṃ labdhvā akuśalāni karoti tadā ahaṃ bhāgī syāmiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9267: kūṭamānādayaḥ kuhanāyāḥ pratyayāḥ iti kretāraḥ pāpinaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9268: pratigrahītā dānasya pratyaya iti puṇyabhāk syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9269: ye kūpataṭākādyupabhoktāraḥ te sarve puṇyabhājaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9270: tathā ca svasya puṇyaṃ na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9280: bhūyasā te trividhaviṣakaluṣitacittāḥ pañcakāmaguṇāsaktā na vyavasyanti kuśalabhāvanām /
SA16hvsatssu:9282: brāhmaṇādaya ātmānaṃ sujanabhāvitadharmacaya iti kīrtayanto na samyak paśyanti samāpatticittasamādhānāni dharmān /
SA16hvsatssu:9284: ato dātā avītarāgāya dadan pāpabāhulyaṃ labheta /
SA16hvsatssu:9285: janāḥ pitṝn pūjayantaḥ putrabhāryābandhūn samārādhayantaḥ [yadi] jñātvā vijānanti sarve pāpaṃ prāpayeyuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:9294: ataḥ puṇyārthī punaḥ prāṇinaṃ hanyāt, na śīlaṃ dhārayet /
SA16hvsatssu:9302: ghanikatvahetoḥ kṛtānāṃ pāpānāmapi dātā bhāgī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9303: tathā ca brāhmaṇā na dānaṃ pratigṛhṇīyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9305: idānīntu brāhmaṇāḥ kevalaṃ pratigṛhṇanti na prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9306: ato jñāyate sa duṣṭaḥ panthā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9307: [SSS_255] yathā ca rājāno yathādharmaṃ prajāḥ pālayantaḥ pāpino 'pi syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9318: avītarāga āsvādābhiniviṣṭa ityato dātā pāpī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9319: tathā ca dātā, tvadannaṃ bhuktvā nākuśalaṃ kariṣyāmīti bhoktāraṃ sadā pratijñāpya paścāddāsyati /
SA16hvsatssu:9322: nanu sūtre 'pyuktam- yadi bhikṣurdānapaterannaṃ bhuktvā cīvarañca paridhāyāpramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati tatpratyayāt sa dānapatirapramāṇapuṇyaṃ prasūta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9323: tatpratyayena puṇyalābhī cet kathaṃ na pāpabhāk bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9324: (u) yadi sa bhikṣurdānapaterannaṃ bhuktvā cīvarañca paridhāyāpramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:9331: na tu pratigrahītuḥ puṇye pāpe vā dātā bhāgaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:9332: ato na tatpuṇyapāpapratyayena dātā puṇyapāpabhāk bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9334: tathāpi svaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā svakṛtatrividhakarmāpekṣya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9335: (pṛ) avītarāgasya cittaṃ na svavaśavarti, avaśyaṃ kāmāsaktam /
SA16hvsatssu:9337: (u) tathā cet pravrajinaḥ śīlādin dhṛtvā sapuṇyo bhavatīdamupekṣitaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9344: tāni hi karmāṇi hetukāla eva vāryāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:9346: ato buddhā [bhagavanto] hetukāla eva vinayāya dharmamupadiśanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9367: yena karmaṇā savyābādhye loke yathāvaivartinaraka upapadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9368: anyatra ca savyābādhye 'kuśala vipākāyatane samupapadyate yadi vā tiryañca ekatyāḥ pretā vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9370: yena karmaṇā avyābādhye loka upapadyate yathā rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ kāmadhātau ca devā manuṣyā ekatyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9372: yena karmaṇā samutpadyate savyābādhye 'vyābādhye ca loke yadi vā tiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyā ekatyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9374: yat karmalokadvayavigarhitaṃ iha vigarhitamamutra ca vigarhitam /
SA16hvsatssu:9375: tat pāpaṃ karma puruṣaḥ kṛtvā tamasi patitaḥ san na yaśaḥ śrutavān bhavatīti kṛṣṇamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9382: akuśalakriyā ca gurujaneṣu yanmātāpitṛṣu anyeṣu sajjaneṣu ca /
SA16hvsatssu:9383: sattvānāmahitaṃ kṛtvā na kiñcidapi kṛpāṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:9384: yathā sattvān hanti samastaṃ taddhanaṃ vāpaharati /
SA16hvsatssu:9400: tṛtīyaṃ karma durbalaṃ kuśalākuśalavyāmiśratvāt tadvipākaṃ yugapatpratisaṃvedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9403: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- yadakuśalaṃ karma durgatau vipākapratisaṃvedakaṃ tadādyaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9405: yat kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu vyāmiśravipākapratisaṃvedakaṃ tat tṛtīyaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9412: sa savyābādhyaṃ kāyasaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhyaṃ vāksaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhyaṃ manaḥsaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhye loke utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9413: tatra savyābādhye loka utpannaṃ santaṃ savyābādhyāḥ sparśāḥ spṛśanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9414: ato jñāyate yat sattvānāṃ kṛṣṇaduḥkhalokotpādakaṃ tadādyaṃ karmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:9417: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhināṃ manuṣyāṇāmapi santi ṣaṭ sparśā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9418: devamanuṣyairanubhūyamānā viṣayā yena amanorūpā na bhavanti tat dvitīyaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:9440: loke ślādhyataraṃ sāsravaṃ kuśalaṃ karma śuklamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9449: yadi dṛṣṭa eva dharme vedyate tadā savyābādhavipāko laghurbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9450: tasya gurutvātkrameṇa kṣipraṃ vā avaivartike narake patati /
SA16hvsatssu:9451: trīṇyānantaryāṇi puṇyakṣetraguṇagauravādānantaryāṇītyucyante yaduta saṅghabhedaḥ tathāgataśarīre duṣṭacittena lohitotpādanamarhadvadhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9456: (pṛ) anyeṣāmāryajanānāṃ vadha ānantaryaṃ labhate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9459: yastathāgataṃ tāḍayati na tu lohitamutpādayati sa gurutaraṃ pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:9464: tadā ekasminneva kāye vipākavedanā kṣīyate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9468: (u) yadyadharmamadharmato jñātvā imaṃ dharmaṃ dharmato jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:9472: yat kaścit buddhātsaṅghaṃ prabhidya ātmānaṃ praśaṃsati mahān śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pūjya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9480: kecidāhuḥ imāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni pūrvādhvani parān vighnayantaḥ kuśalamūlamārgalabdhāstatpratyayamidānīṃ tadvipākaṃ vindanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9511: ato madyapānaṃ yaḥ śāsti sa pāpāṅgaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:9526: (u) narakavedanīyavipākaṃ karmeti [SSS_260] yathā ṣaṭpādābhidharme lokaprajñaptau vistṛtam /
SA16hvsatssu:9528: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaḥ prāṇātipātanirataḥ sa naraka utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9534: bhavāṃstu kevalamāha narakeṣu manuṣyeṣu votpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9535: idānīṃ viśiṣya vaktavyaṃ kiṃ karma narakavipākamātravedakamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:9541: śīlabhedinā dṛṣṭibhedinā ca kṛtamakuśalaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9548: yathā kaścidakuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā paścātprīyā praśaṃsan na parityaktumicchati /
SA16hvsatssu:9557: akuśalasvabhāvena janena kṛtaṃ pāpakarma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9559: sadākuśala karmacāriṇā kṛtamakuśalaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9564: yaḥ kāyena śīlaṃ manasā ca prajñāṃ nābhyasyati /
SA16hvsatssu:9577: sa gurukaṃ pāpakarma kṛtvā narakavipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9578: yaḥ pāpaṃ kṛtvā na kuśalaṃ pratiśrayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9585: sa duṣparipācanamāhāraṃ bhuṅktvā na paripaktuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:9587: yathā kaściccauryaṃ kṛtvā laghutaraṃ gurutaraṃ vā badhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9588: yaḥ sarvakuśalamūlaviviktaḥ yathā hastinā yudhyamānaḥ [tasya] hastaṃ na parirakṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:9596: gaṇḍasyāntaḥ srāvavat pāpasya mrakṣaṇe narakaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9597: yo dīrghakālaṃ cittagatamakuśalaṃ na sahasā niyacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:9599: yathā cikitsāyai dattaṃ viṣameva puruṣaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9602: yathā rāṣṭrapālā bahavo vijñāḥ pūrṇādivadakuśalamithyācāramācarantonyānyapi bahūn śikṣayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9603: yacca kṛtaṃ karma bhūyasā sattvānāṃ byābādhāya bhavati yathā vanadāhādi /
SA16hvsatssu:9604: bahūnāṃ śāsanaṃ yena adharme te patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9608: yadāmaraṇaṃ na tyajanti tadatyantamityucyate / yathāha gāthā-
SA16hvsatssu:9610: karoti sa tathātmānaṃ yathainaṃ icchanti dviṣaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9618: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dveṣaḥ pāpīyānapi sunigraha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9620: yat hetupratyayaiḥ pāpaṃ karma karoti tadaṇīyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9621: yaḥ pramādāya vyutsṛṣṭaḥ tena kṛtamaśubhaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9622: yo vijñaiḥ paripālito bhavati sa deveṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9626: [SSS_262] śāriputraprabhāsvaramāhātmyamavalokyācintayat ayaṃ mahātmā na hantavya iti viśuddhacittena saptakṛtvaḥ śāriputramūrdhvamadho vyavālokayat /
SA16hvsatssu:9630: yathā cāṅgulimālaḥ pāpakaṃ karma bahukṛtvā mātara[mapi]hantumaicchat /
SA16hvsatssu:9631: bhagavān tatkuśalābhijñatvāt tasya vimuktiṃ prāpayati sma /
SA16hvsatssu:9634: evamādayaḥ puruṣāḥ akuśalakarmakā api na narake patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9635: ata uktaṃ yaḥ pramādāya vyusṛṣṭaḥ tena kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ karma narakāya bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:9639: yaḥ kuśalaṃ kartumagaṇayan mriyamāṇo durutpādakuśalacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9642: sa pūrvākuśalahetukaṃ mithyādṛṣṭi pratyayañca narake patati /
SA16hvsatssu:9646: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāvocat- yān sattvān paśyatha kāyikamithyācārān vācikamithyācārān mānasikamithyācārān tān jānīta narakaprekṣakāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:9663: yathā kaścitkarmavipākamajñātvā śraddhayā ca nānāvākkarma tathā karoti yathā vadanti ayaṃ puruṣo markaṭavadaticapala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9678: evamādyakuśalaṃ vācikaṃ karma kṛtvā yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:9681: yo nāgagaruḍādīnāṃ śaktibalaṃ śrutvā praṇidadhāti sa tatrotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9682: uktañca sūtre- yo nibiḍasthāne mriyamāṇaḥ praṇidadhāti vipulaṃ sthānaṃ labha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9684: yaḥ paritarṣito mriyate sa jalārthitayā jaleṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9686: vyomāhāt laghu karmāṇi kurvan vyāmiśrakuśalatvāt makṣikālīkṣākṛmikīṭādiṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9687: yaḥ parānupadiśan asaddharme pātayati so 'vidvatpada utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9711: sa kṛpaṇaḥ yācanāṃ kurvati kasmiṃścit nāstīti vadan anṛtavāditvātpreteṣu patati /
SA16hvsatssu:9715: kadaryo 'yaṃ dānacāriṇaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ dānapatiṃ dvipyati /
SA16hvsatssu:9717: cirādārabhya kadaryacittavāsanayā na svayaṃ dadāti paramapi niṣedhati /
SA16hvsatssu:9718: yatkiñcidasti vihāre saṅghadravyaṃ yajñe ca brāhmaṇadravyam /
SA16hvsatssu:9719: [SSS_264] tat kaścit svayaṃ kevalamabhilaṣati na parasya dātumicchati /
SA16hvsatssu:9723: yo dānapuṇyavigataḥ sa tadupapattyāyatane vipākālābhī tato yācakādhikṣepakarmaṇo duḥkhaṃ tatraivānubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9724: ayaṃ kṛpaṇaḥ kṣuttṛṣṇārditaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nirdayacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9772: yaḥ pitroḥ pūjyānāñca satkāre svabhiruciko bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9775: manuṣyeṣu ca yo viśuddhakarmapratyayaḥ sa uttara[kuruṣū]tpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9778: yaḥ śuklakarma samyagācaran parānapīḍayitvā dhanamādatte dānāya nābhiṣvaṅgāya /
SA16hvsatssu:9779: svayañca śīlamācaran na pūrvāparaparivāreṣu śīlaṃ bhedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:9788: manuṣyeṣūktavat praṇidhānahetunā ca viśrutadeveṣu sukhavedanāpratyayaṃ kṛtakuśalakarmakāḥ sarve tatra janmagatiṃ praṇidadhati /
SA16hvsatssu:9789: yathoktaṃ- aṣṭapuṇyasargasthāne yaḥ karuṇāmuditopekṣāsu viharati sa utpadyate brahmaloke yāvadbhavāgram /
SA16hvsatssu:9793: yasya samyak prahīṇāni sa viśuddhataraprabho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9801: idaṃ karma narakeṣu preteṣu tiryakṣu deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā vedyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9802: (pṛ) anyāsu catasṛṣu gatiṣu kuśalakarmavipāko vedayituṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9805: yathā [kaści]darcirnarakādvimukto dūrato vanaṣaṇḍaṃ dṛṣṭvā muditacitta āśu tasmin vane praviśati /
SA16hvsatssu:9806: śītavātakampite tasmin vane [yāvat] asitomarāṇi na patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9808: athavā kṣāranadīṃ dṛṣṭvā idaṃ prasannasalilamiti drutagati pradhāvya muhūrtaṃ sukhabhāgbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9815: ya eṣāṃ saptānāṃ vastunāṃ samagro vā asamagro bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9825: kecidāhuḥ- rājānaḥ pratipakṣiṇo rājñaḥ śāsanāvasare etadakuśalasaṃvarasamanvitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9833: (pṛ) kiṃ vadhitasattvāt saṃvaramimaṃ labhate kiṃ vā sarvasattvebhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9835: yathā kaścit śīladhārī sarvasattvebhyaḥ śīlasaṃvaraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:9861: yo bhikṣuḥ parāvṛttendriyaḥ na sa vinaṣṭasaṃvaro bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9863: (pṛ) pañcasu gatiṣu kasyāṃ gatau sattvā akuśalasaṃvarasamanvitā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:9865: kecidāhuḥ- [tathā nocet] siṃhavyāghrādayaḥ sadā duṣkarmaṇopajīvino 'pi samanvitāḥ syuriti //
SA16hvsatssu:9869: (pṛ) asattvākhyebhya imaṃ kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9872: kuśalasaṃvaro 'yaṃ trividhaḥ- śīlasaṃvaro dhyānasaṃvaraḥ samādhisaṃvara iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9875: ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- asti punaḥ prahāṇasaṃvaro yaduta kāmadhātuvīta[rāgaḥ] tasmin kāle kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:9878: (pṛ) tīrthikā imaṃ śīlasaṃvaraṃ labhante na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9881: ācāryaḥ śīlamupadiśati adyaprabhṛti prāṇātipātādipāpaṃ mā kuryā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9882: (pṛ) anyāsu gatiṣu imaṃ śīlasavaraṃ labhante na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9883: (u) uktaṃ hi sūtre- nāgādayo 'pi dinamekaṃ śīlamupādadate /
SA16hvsatssu:9893: tādṛśāḥ puruṣā na bhikṣumadhye vartate(nte) nāpi bhikṣuṇīmadhye /
SA16hvsatssu:9897: (pṛ) asti ca pratiṣedho vinaye pātakinīcavṛttikabhikṣuṇīdūṣakādayo na bhikṣucaryāṃ śṛṇvanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9905: (pṛ) kiṃ vadhyādisattvebhyaḥ kiṃ kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate kiṃ vā sarvasattvebhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9907: tathā no cet saṃvaraḥ prādeśikaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:9909: ayaṃ tu saṃvara upacīyamāno 'pacīyamāno nirgranthaputradharmasamaśca yaduta śatayojaneṣvantaḥ prāṇātipātādibhyo viratiḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9911: ya āha asya puruṣasya vadhādviramāmi na tasya puruṣasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:9922: ekāhorātraṃ vā ekadinamātraṃ vā ekarātrimātraṃ vā ardhadinamātraṃ vā ardharātraṃ vā yathaśakti kālaṃ svīkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:9924: ya āha- āhamekamāsamātraṃ māsadvitayamātraṃ vā ekavatsaramātraṃ vā [śīlaṃ samādada iti] /
SA16hvsatssu:9927: (pṛ) yaḥ kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate sa punaḥ saṃvarādbhraśyati na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:9930: (pṛ) kiṃ pratyutpannasattvebhyaḥ śīlasaṃvaraṃ labhate kiṃ vā traikālikasattvebhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9932: yathā [SSS_269] kaścidatītān pūjyān pūjayitvāpi puṇyaguṇo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:9939: yathaikasya puruṣasya tathā sarvasattvānāṃ samantādapi pratikṣaṇaṃ sadā pratilābhādapramāṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:9959: yasmādayaṃ śīlasaṃvaraḥ sarvasattveṣu sadā pratikṣaṇaṃ labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9960: tasmāducyate catvāro ratnākarā nārhanti ṣoḍaśīṃ kalāṃ dinamekaṃ saṃvarasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:9974: tadā sampīḍanīyasattvebhya eva kuśalasaṃvaro labhyeta ityayamasti doṣaḥ / ato na yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:9988: avadātavasanānāṃ kuśaladharmo bhūyasā hīnaḥ mārgasya kāraṇatāmātraṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:9992: kecidāhuḥ- eme dharmā ekamupavāsadinaṃ rātriñca bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:9994: bahvalpaṃ śīlaṃ yathā [balaṃ] upādāya ardhadinaṃ vā yāvadekaṃ māsaṃ vā sambhavatīti ko doṣo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:9997: asatyanyasmin manasā smaran vācā vadati- ahamaṣṭaśīlāni dhārayāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10003: ya idṛśopavāsasamarthaḥ tasya catvāro mahāratnākarā naikāmapi kalāmarhanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10006: bhagavān taṃ vigarhya [avocat]- yaḥkṣīṇāsravaḥ tena hīyaṃ gāthā vaktavyā / yathoktam-
SA16hvsatssu:10008: sa pumān puṇyamāpnoti mayā ca sadṛśo bhavet // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10009: yo dinamupavasati sa upavāsapuṇyamupabhuñjānaḥ śakratulyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10016: (pṛ) āryaścaka vartī rājā upavāsadharmasamādānamabhilaṣati [cet] kastaṃ samādāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:10017: (u) bhadantā brahmā devā bhagaddraṣṭārastaṃ śāsayitvā grāhayeyuḥ //
SA16hvsatssu:10024: adṛṣṭvā adrākṣamiti van [vyavahāre] pṛṣṭo vadati nādrākṣamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:10025: dṛṣṭvā nādrākṣamiti brūvan pṛṣṭo vadati- adrākṣamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:10030: dṛṣṭvā nādrākṣamiti brūvan pṛṣṭho vadati nādrākṣamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:10031: adṛṣṭvā adrākṣamiti bruvan pṛṣṭho vadati adrākṣamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:10050: navavidhaṃ karma- kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma trividhaṃ vijñaptiravijñaptirnavijñapti nāvijñaptiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:10060: tasmādyanmanasā praṇidhāya paścātkāya[kṛtaṃ] tanmānasaṃ karmāpi cetanetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10064: (pṛ) avijñapteḥ kāyajātāyā api kiṃ tāratamyavibhāgo bhaviṣyati na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10088: yadi vā samaiḥ melayāmi, yadi vā cīvaraṃ dadāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10109: yathā puṣpaṃ tilaṃ vāsayati na tṛṇavṛkṣādi /
SA16hvsatssu:10121: yaduktaṃ bhavatā na tatra vitarkavicārau sta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10123: (pṛ) āryā aparyavasannasaṃyojanaprahāṇā vijñaptikarma kurvanti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10125: (pṛ) śvādīnāṃ sattvānāṃ [vāg]dhvaniḥ vākkarma bhavati na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10127: yadi vā vyaktalakṣaṇaṃ yadi vāhvānaṃ yadi vā veṇvādi sarvaṃ [tat] vākkarmetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10130: ataḥ puruṣāḥ svakāyikaṃ karma paśyanti svavācikaṃ karma śṛṇvanti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:10131: manovijñānasamutpannaṃ karma santatyāvicchinnaṃ sat svayaṃ paśyanti śṛṇvanti ca //
SA16hvsatssu:10139: (u) pañcaskandhāḥ pratikṣaṇavināśino 'pi punaḥ punaḥ santatyā samutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:10147: atha vā dṛḍhāsinābhihatya sahasā sattvān hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10156: adattādānamiti yadvastu yatpuruṣasambandhī tat tasmātpuruṣāccauryeṇa gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:10167: bhūmāvupari gataṃ dravyaṃ paraṃ rājasambandhi syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:10169: anāthapiṇḍadādaya āryā api hīdaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhṇanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10171: yaḥ svābhāvikadravyasya lābhaḥ na tat cauryam /
SA16hvsatssu:10175: yat [yasya] puruṣasya karmahetubalatiśayādhiṣṭhitaṃ tat dravyaṃ tatsambandhi /
SA16hvsatssu:10178: (u) bhagavataḥ saṅghasya vā dravye nāsti mamatācittam /
SA16hvsatssu:10180: dravyamidaṃ niyamena bhagavataḥ saṅghasya vā sambandhi /
SA16hvsatssu:10181: tasya caurye adattādāne vā akuśalacittaṃ samutpannamityataḥ pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10190: tayā saha kāmacāraḥ kathaṃ na kāmamithyācāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10192: yathoktaṃ vinaye- alpavayaskā jāyā yāvadekena śmaśrṛṇāntaritā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10193: (pṛ) yadi kācidasvāminī strī svayamāgatya prārthayate jāyā bhavāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10218: (pṛ) yadi kaścidvastuviparyayāt adṛṣṭvā vadati adrākṣamiti tasya kathaṃ na mṛṣāvādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10224: (pṛ) yathā vastusati sattva utpannasattvasaṃjño vadhapāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10227: natvadṛṣṭe dṛṣṭasaṃjñāmutpādayan na pāpaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10229: ataḥ sattve satyapi sattvasaṃjñāvihīno na labhate pāpam /
SA16hvsatssu:10231: asati sattve sattvasaṃjñāvān [vastutaḥ] sattvasyābhāvādapi na pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10232: sati sattve sattvasaṃjñāvān prāṇātipātapāpaṃ labhata eva /
SA16hvsatssu:10253: yat kaścitkaṭu vadati hitakarañca na bhavati parasyopāyāsamātramicchati /
SA16hvsatssu:10255: yastu karuṇācittena hitaṃ kurvan kaṭu vadati /
SA16hvsatssu:10258: [cikitsārthaṃ] kasmiṃścitkāyadeśe sūcyā vedhanaṃ kaṭvapi na pāpaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10271: satyavacane 'pi kāle cāhite amūlamanarthamakramaṃ vacanaṃ sambhinnapralāpaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10274: kintu bhūyasā vākkṛtameva vyavahārataḥ sambhinnapralāpa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10275: anyāni trīṇi vākkarmāṇi sambhinnapralāpasaṃmiśrāṇi bhavanti na vivekabhāgīni /
SA16hvsatssu:10277: tadā dvidhā bhavati mṛṣāvādaḥ sambhinnapralāpa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10279: tadā tridhā bhavati mṛṣāvādaḥ paiśunyaṃ sambhinnapralāpa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10287: ato buddhā eva bhagavadvādaprasādhane śraddheyāḥ nānye /
SA16hvsatssu:10290: (u) kecidvadanti- puṇyaṃ pāpamavaśyaṃ kāyavāgadhīnaṃ na cittamātrāt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10292: trividhasyāsya mānasakarmaṇo balādutpadyate kāyikaṃ vācikamakuśalakarma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10295: sarveṣāṃ leśānāmakuśalakarmotpādakatve 'pi idaṃ trividhaṃ paraṃ sattvānāmupāyāsakaratvādakuśalakarmapatha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10296: yadi rāgo madhyamo 'varo vā na sa karmapatho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10297: rāgo 'yamadhimātraḥ paramadhirajya saṃpīḍecchayā sopāyaḥ kāyikavācikakarmotpādakatvāt rāgerṣyā karmapatho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10299: yadi moha eva sarvakleśātmaka ucyata iti matam /
SA16hvsatssu:10307: yadi [vā] kaściddhanalābhāyākuśalaṃ karma karoti tadyathā suvarṇakārṣāpaṇāya prāṇinaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10308: dveṣeṇa vā [akuśalaṃ karma karoti] tadyathā amitraṃ coraṃ vā hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10309: atha vā na dhanalābhāya na dveṣeṇa, api tu mohabalenaiva parāparāvijñānāt prāṇinaṃ hanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10311: catvāro durgatipratyayāḥ sūtra uktā [SSS_277] rāgato dveṣato bhayato mohataśca durgatiṣu patantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10314: yaducyate bhayata iti tanmohata eva bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10316: na jñānī yāvadāyurvināśapratyayamapi akuśalaṃ karma karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:10318: yat kleśavivṛddhiḥ kāyikavācikarmotpādayati sa kālo 'kuśalakarmapatha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10339: (pṛ) āryāḥ kimakuśalaṃ karma kuvanti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:10342: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- śaikṣā anyān śapamānā āhuḥ samucchinnavṛṣaṇo bhava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10345: ayaṃ kṣīṇāsrava puruṣaḥ prahīṇakleśamūlaḥ cittameva notpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:10353: yadyāryā ihādhvani akuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā durgatau na patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10356: āryāṇāṃ manasi tattvajñāne samutpanne sarve 'kuśalakarmapathā mandā bhavanti yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:10358: trīṇi ca viṣāṇi dvividhāni- durgatiprāpakāṇi tadaprāpakāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10364: te ca tīkṣṇaprajñāvidyā akuśalaṃ karma kṣapayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10367: kadācid buddhān smṛtvā kadācitkaruṇāṃ smṛtvā kuśalakarmahetubhi[rvā] akuśalebhyo vimuktiṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:10373: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo nityaṃ kāyena śīlaṃ cittena prajñāmabhyasyati sa narakavedanīyaṃ karmābhimukhībhūya laghu vedayate iti / yathā cāha gāthā-
SA16hvsatssu:10375: gurukarmāṇi sarvāṇi na kiñcidupayanti ca // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10378: āryāṇāṃ kuśalaṃ karma sudūragāmi khadira vṛkṣamūlavat /
SA16hvsatssu:10380: alpamakuśalaṃ bahukuśaleṣu vartamānaṃ na balavat yathā gaṅgāyāṃ kṣiptamekapalalavaṇaṃ na vikārayati tadrasam /
SA16hvsatssu:10385: yathāryāḥ satyapi pāpe na narakaṃ praviśanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10386: yathā vyāghraśārdūlajāśvavarāhānāṃ(ṇāṃ) saha vivadamānānāṃ baliṣṭho jayaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10392: tadyathā gṛdhro vā kaṅka iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10396: dvividhasaṃyojanasamanvāgamāddhi durgatau patito yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:10398: te sadā kuśalakarmavipākaṃ samādadata ityato [SSS_279] durgatikakarmāṇi nāvakāśaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:10399: yathā pūrvaṃ ṣaṭkarmavarge pratipāditaṃ naraka[vedanīyaṃ] karmalakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:10430: sattvānāṃ vidyamānāḥ sarvā akuśalaparābhavahānipīḍā akuśalaiḥ [karmabhi]reva bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10432: yathā sainikavyādhādayo nānena karmaṇā bahumānaṃ labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:10433: coravadhapratyayaṃ dhanabhānaṃ labhata iti yat bhavata āśayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10446: akuśalacārī tamasastamaḥ praviṣṭaḥ pravṛttimārgatritayānna niryāṇaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10452: kiñcākuśalacārī svakāyaṃ kāmayannapi na vastutaḥ svātmānaṃ kāmayate /
SA16hvsatssu:10455: puruṣo 'yaṃ kāyasaṅgataḥ tadyathāmitracoreṇa [saṅgataḥ] svātmana eva duḥkhakārakatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:10459: akuśalakarmacaryā yadyapīdānīṃ nābhivyajyate vipāke tu adhyavasīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10462: yathā vā ṛṇamalpamapi krameṇa vṛddhyā vardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10463: parasya kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ paraḥ sadā na vismarati /
SA16hvsatssu:10471: akuśalakarmaphalāt vihāyasā gatvā samudre nimajyāpi na vimuktisthānaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10475: uktañca sūtre- pramādaḥ śatruvatkuśaladharmān hanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10477: kiñcākuśalaṃ karma buddhabodhisattvairarhadbhirāryaiḥ pañcabhijñairmaharṣibhiḥ puṇyapāpavedibhiravigītaṃ na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10479: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣamakuśalacittavaipulya eva bhāvavyāmohavikṣepopāyāsādhiduḥkhairvikṛtamukhavarṇaḥ pumānaprīto dṛśyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10485: triṣu karmasu kiṃ gurutaraṃ- kiṃ kāyikaṃ karma, vācikaṃ karma kiṃ vā mānasaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:10492: yathā kaścidimaṃ sattvaṃ hanmīti cittamutpādya kāyavāgbhyāṃ tatkarma sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:10503: mānasaṃ karma mahattaramiti cet [tadā] dānapuṇyaṃ labheta /
SA16hvsatssu:10510: ācaritā kasmāt sulabhamidaṃ karma tyaktvā durācaraṇaṃ dānādikarma kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:10521: cittaṃ laghu calaṃ durdamamityato 'kuśalākaraṇaṃ na kiñcit /
SA16hvsatssu:10526: yadi mānasaṃ karma mahattaram, prāṇātipātacikīrṣācittamutpādayan narake patet /
SA16hvsatssu:10531: uktañca sūtre- kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma audārikam /
SA16hvsatssu:10538: utpadyamānaṃ vijñaptikarma sarvaṃ kāyavacasā bhavati na mānasakarmaṇā /
SA16hvsatssu:10539: yathā parapuruṣanindā avaśyaṃ vākkarmādhīnā mṛṣāvādapāpaṃ gamayati /
SA16hvsatssu:10540: yatpūrvamuktaṃ caturbhiḥ pratyayaiḥ [SSS_282] prāṇātipātapāpaṃ labhate yaduta sattvasattā,
SA16hvsatssu:10542: jighatsācittaṃ tajjīvitoccheda iti caturbhirvastubhiḥ pāpaṃ sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:10544: yathā cāha bhagavān- yo bālaka ājanma karuṇāmabhyasyati /
SA16hvsatssu:10545: sa kimakuśalaṃ karmotpādayituṃ śankoti akuśalaṃ karma cetayate vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10546: ato jñāyate kāyikaṃ karmaivotpādayati na mānasaṃ karma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10548: yat bhavānāha- kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmaiva gurutaraṃ na mānasam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10551: cittaṃ dharmasya vai mūlaṃ cittaṃ prabhuśca kiṅkaraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10552: śubhāśubhaṃ tatsmarati vacanaṃ caraṇañca tat // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10556: vinā cittaṃ nāsti kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:10557: sūtre vacanācca vijñaptikarma kṛtvā niyamena vipākaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:10562: yathāha sūtram- purāhaṃ saptavarṣāṇi karuṇāsamudācaraṇānneemaṃ lokaṃ saptamahākalpān pratinivartāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10568: yathā kuśalacārī āyuṣo 'nte mithyādṛṣṭimutpādayan narake patati /
SA16hvsatssu:10572: āha- yo lokottarāṃ samyagdṛṣṭimutpādayati sa varṣaśatasahasyāṇi saṃsāre saṃsarannapi na durgatau patati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10574: yathoktamupālisūtre- tīrthiko maharṣiḥ [āgatya vadet] ekena manodaṇḍena nālandaṃ bhasmīkaromīti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10577: yathoktaṃ [SSS_283] sūtre- yo 'yamatra mṛtaḥ sa eva narakaṃ praviśati /
SA16hvsatssu:10584: yanmanasā kāyaṃ vācañca niśritya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā carati tatkāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10586: na tu vinā mānasaṃ karma kāyikasya vācikasya vā vipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10587: ato jñāyate mānasaṃ karma gurutaraṃ na kāyikaṃ vācikam / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10588: yadbhavatoktaṃ kāyikavācikakarmaṇorniyamena satyatvāt yathā pañcānantaryāṇi kāyaṃ vāca[ñcopādāya] kriyanta ityato gurutarāṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10590: yasmāt cetanā gurvī vastu ca guru tasmātkarma guru /
SA16hvsatssu:10593: yathā cittabalamātreṇa saddharmapadaṃ praviśati tathā cittabalenaiva cānantaryapāpaṃ sampādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:10596: uktaṃ bhavatā kāye vāk ca karma vastu niṣpādayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10603: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- vṛthācittotpādamātreṇa nāsti vipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10605: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dṛḍhacittamutpādya tadaiva deveṣūtpadyate narake vādhaḥ patati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10607: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- nāpi praṇidhānamātreṇa vastu sādhayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10613: yathāha bhagavān- santi vividhāni pāpāni kāyikavācikamānasapāpānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10618: yaduktaṃ bhavatā puṇyaṃ pāpañca sulabhaṃ syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:10620: cittabalasya tanutvāt janāḥ sulabhaṃ tyaktvā durlabhaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10623: sattvā avarajñānabalāḥ karuṇādi mānasaṃ karma carituṃ na samarthā ityato [SSS_284] dānādi kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10627: sa yadi bodhibalayuktaḥ tadā akṣīṇaṃ kuśaladharmaṃ labhetaiva /
SA16hvsatssu:10628: yaduktaṃ mānasaṃ karma na kasyacidupakaroti apakaroti vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10635: yathā kalpādau taṇḍulāni svayamutpadyante puruṣāṇāṃ daśavarṣāyuḥkāle prāpte tatsarvaṃ nābhūta /
SA16hvsatssu:10661: yathāha sūtrama- śīlavrataḥ prāṇihitaṃ mano 'nuyāyi bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10672: yasya mānasaṃ karmāviśuddham, tasya śīlamapi aviśuddham /
SA16hvsatssu:10674: yaduktaṃ tvayā- utpadyamānaṃ vijñaptikarma kāyavāgbhyāṃ bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10675: tat sāmānyataḥ pratyuktaṃ yaduta kāyikavācikakarmadharmabhede mānasakarmadharmabhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10676: kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma avaśyaṃ vijñāpayitrā sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:10677: yathā caturbhiḥ pratyayaiḥ siddhaṃ prāṇātipātapāpaṃ na mānasakarma vinā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10678: laukikāḥ satvā vadanti kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmākuśalaṃ na tathā mānasamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:10679: [SSS_285] mānasaṃ karma ca na janeṣūpaprayujyate nāpyupalabhyate 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10681: tallakṣaṇatvānmānasaṃ karmaiva gurutaraṃ na kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ vā //
SA16hvsatssu:10699: ato vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathaṃ jñāyate karmata utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10702: padārthā nānāviprakīrṇajātaya iti jñātavyaṃ heturapi bhidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10703: yathā paśyāmaḥ alakasandukakodravādīnāṃ bhedaḥ tadbījamasamaṃ jñāpayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10706: kiñca sajjanāḥ śraddhadhante yat karmopādāya kāya upādīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10711: yadi karmopādāya śarīramupādīyate tadā tat nivartanīyam /
SA16hvsatssu:10716: īśvarādīnāṃ kāraṇatve tu na nivartayituṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10726: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ padārthāḥ karmasambhūtā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10730: ato jñāyate karmataḥ śarīramupādīyate na maheśvarādibhya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10731: laukikāḥ svayaṃ jānanti padārthāḥ karmahetasambhūtā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10735: ato jñāyate karmato vipāko labhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10736: janā īśvarādīn kāraṇaṃ vadanto 'pi karmāṇi niśrayante yaduta svadehaṃ khedayanta upavāsādīn svīkurvanti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:10739: sarve cāryāḥ śīlādikuśaladharmān niśrayante yato jānanti karmahetorloko 'stīti /
SA16hvsatssu:10747: yathā upari vṛkṣe phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā jānanti vṛkṣastaddheturiti /
SA16hvsatssu:10749: durgatau mohādayaḥ prabalā iti jñātavyaṃ kleśāḥ durgatikāraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:10757: sajjānānāṃ citte yadyakuśalamutpadyate tadaiva prayatnena nigṛhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10760: tathā nocet yatheṣṭaṃ kuryaḥ idameva paramaṃ sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:10761: tadā hatvā sattvānāṃ bhojanaṃ paradravyāpahāraḥ yadi vā parastrīgamanaṃ imānyapi sukhāni bhaveyuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10771: catussatyajñānāt satyāśrayāḥ kleśā na kadāpi punarudbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10776: yathā śuṣkabhūmau bīje ca dagdhe na sarvo 'ṅkuraḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:10777: evaṃ vijñānasthitikṣetre tṛṣṇāsnehānabhiṣyandite karmabīje ca tattvajñānadagdhe nordhvadehāṅkuraḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:10778: vidvānetadvastu prajñāya vijñānasthitikṣetraṃ śoṣayituṃ karma bījaṃ dagdhuñca vīryamadhiṣṭhāya prayatate /
SA16hvsatssu:10779: ato jñāyate karma kāyopādānasya pratyaya iti //
SA16hvsatssu:10799: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kāmatṛṣṇā bhavatṛṣṇā vibhavatṛṣṇā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10801: sattvā duḥkhābhihatā skandhakāyaṃ parijihīrṣavo vibhavaṃ sukhaṃ manyante /
SA16hvsatssu:10803: yathoktaṃ sūtre- aihikaṃ saumanasyamāmuṣmikaṃ saumanasyaṃ ihalaukikasukhavedanā āmuṣmikasukhavedanā ityarthamabhidadhāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10804: kiñcāha- aihikaṃ daurmanasyamāmuṣmikaṃ daurmanasyaṃ ihalaukikaduḥkhavedanā āmuṣmikaduḥkhavedanā ityarthamabhidadhāti /
SA16hvsatssu:10805: yathoktaṃ devatāpraśne- kiṃ nandati putraiḥ putravān /
SA16hvsatssu:10817: yathoktaṃ sūtre- samudayasatyaṃ yaduta tarṣaṇaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10829: (pṛ) yadi tarṣaṇamapi nandiḥ, rāgo 'pi nandiḥ kasmāducyate rāgaṃ niśrityeti /
SA16hvsatssu:10835: uktañca sūtre- nirodhaṃ varjayitvā rāgo daurmanasyañca sarve 'kuśalā dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10838: yathocyate dveṣo daurmanasyamiti tadā jñāyate nandiḥ rāga ityupyucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10839: ato 'ṣṭādaśamanaupavicāreṣu na kleśā ucyante kevalaṃ vedanā ucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:10845: tṛtīyavedanāyāmucyate pṛthagjanā asyā vedanāyā na jānanti samudayaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:10848: na jānanti ādīnavaṃ na jānanti nissaraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:10850: ime pṛthagjanāḥ sadā pañcadharmān tān na jānantītyato 'duḥkhāsukhavedanāyāṃ sadāvidyānuśayaṃ rvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:10858: saptānuśayānāmaṅgaṃ dvidhā bhavati- kāmarāgo bhavarāga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10863: asati rāge na janma bhavati ityataḥ pṛthagucyate bhavarāga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10868: pradarśayati ca bhagavān tatra[āpi] bhavaḥ sūkṣmaḥ pravartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10870: daśākuśalakarmapatheṣu caturṣu bandhaneṣu ca kāmarāga ityākhyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:10876: ayaṃ rāgo yadyadhamācaraṇaḥ tadā akuśalarāga ityākhyā /
SA16hvsatssu:10879: yadi vā mātṛbhaginīsvasrācāryapatnīḥ pravrajitapatnīṃ svapatnīṃ vāmārgeṇa jigamiṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:10886: bahudānasya bahudravyasya vā lipsā, sā bahurāgatā /
SA16hvsatssu:10887: yadalpadravyasyālpadānaṃ labdhvā priyataraṃ kāmayate na tṛpyati /
SA16hvsatssu:10891: ayañca rāgo dvividhaḥ kāmarāgaḥ upakaraṇarāga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:10902: tisṛṣu vedanāsu rāgo 'sti sukhavedanāyāmasti lipsārāgaḥ, tatparipālanarāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10907: yathā kaścit anena vastunā duḥkhito vastvantaraṃ paryeṣate /
SA16hvsatssu:10908: yathoktam- sukhī na paryeṣate duḥkhī tu bahu paryeṣate /
SA16hvsatssu:10934: tadyathā priyarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā citte idaṃ [priya]miti vacanaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:10949: yadi vā tadrūpe yadi vākāre yadi vā sparśe yadi vā subhāṣite [mithyāmanaskāramutpādayati] /
SA16hvsatssu:10957: yathā śuddhaṃ vastra [mapagatakalaṅkaṃ] samyaṅ malena dūṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10965: tadyathā gṛdhro vā kaṅko vā iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10966: aśucyādi vilokya apratihatālambanasya kāmarāgo vegaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:10969: strīrūpādyalambane prīto nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti paricchedañca gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:10979: kāmarāgasya hitāsvādamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā tadānīnavamajānataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10980: ṛtunā ca kāmarāga utpadyate yathā vasantādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10981: sthānavaśena ca kāmarāga utpadyate yathā kiñcitsthānaṃ yatra cirādārabhya kāmacāro bahuśo 'bhyastaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:10987: pakṣiṇāṃ kalaravaṃ strīṇāṃ sukumārabhūṣaṇarutāni subhāṣitāni vā śṛṇvataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:10995: alabdhacittasamādhānasya antaḥ sattvaṃ paśyato bahiḥ rūpādi paśyataśca kāmarāgo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11001: (pṛ) kāmarāgasya ke doṣāḥ santīti kāmaḥ prahātavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11012: vyāpāda[gato] laghupāpaḥ, vastutaḥ sa [tato 'pi] laghuttaraḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11014: yathoktaṃ- tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānaṃ yāvanmahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11017: kiñcāha- vidyamānāni duḥkhāni bhikṣavaḥ kasmādbhavantīti manasikṛtvā jānīdhvaṃ [tāni] kāmahetukāni /
SA16hvsatssu:11019: kiñcāha- kabalīkāre [bhikṣava] āhāre 'sti nandi asti rāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11026: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yathā śvā raktaliptamasthikaṅkālaṃ svādayitvā [sva]lālāyogānmanyate yanmadhura[mida]miti /
SA16hvsatssu:11027: tathā rāgyapi nīrase kāme mithyāviparyāsabalena manyate yadidaṃ rasāsvādamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11031: sattvānāṃ kāmarāgapratyayaṃ sukhamalpaṃ duḥkhaṃ bahu kena kim [syāt] /
SA16hvsatssu:11032: kāmatṛṣṇāvān sukhahetoḥ sarvaduḥkhānyanubhavati yadutārjanakāle duḥkhaṃ rakṣaṇakāle duḥkhamupabhogakāle 'pi duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:11033: yathā kṛṣivāṇijyasaṃgrāmarājasevāparicaryādīni arjane duḥkhaṃ hānabhītyā rakṣaṇe duḥkhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:11035: iṣṭasaṅgame prītiralpā virahe ca duḥkhaṃ bahu /
SA16hvsatssu:11037: yathāha bhagavān- kāmatṛṣṇāyāḥ pañcādīnavāḥ- alpāsvādo bahuduḥkhaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:11042: kleśā rāgamupādāya bhavanti yathā kāmarāgāt kleśāḥ sarve samudbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11047: yathā kṛṣṇaśuklā gauḥ svayamabaddhā rajjunā paramabaddhā /
SA16hvsatssu:11048: evaṃ cakṣurna rūpabaddhaṃ, rūpañca na cakṣurbaddham, kāmarāgastu tatra baddhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11050: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- pūrvā koṭirna [prajñāyate] avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanānāṃ sandhāvatāṃ saṃsaratām iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11051: api coktaṃ sūtre- rāgaprahāṇādrūpaṃ prahīyate yāvadvijñānaṃ prahīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11060: kāmarāgaḥ sadā kusumāramukhataḥ samudācaratītyataḥ paramamakuśalaṃ nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:11061: kiñca sattvāścittapramodena kāmarāge pravartante yāvanmaśakapipīlikā[daya]ḥ sarve 'pi āhāramaithunayoḥ pravartante /
SA16hvsatssu:11062: sa kāmarāgo nānākāraṇaiḥ puruṣāṇāṃ cittaṃ badhnāti yaduta mātṛpitṛsvasṛbhaginīpatnīsaṃjñā dhanādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11070: yathā rūpāṇāmāsvādādhyavasānamityuktaṃ yaduta rūpaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhaṃ saumanasyam /
SA16hvsatssu:11075: yasmāt sattvāḥ kāmaḥ sukhaṃ dhyānaṃ sukhaṃ samāpattiḥ sukhamiti saṃrajyante /
SA16hvsatssu:11078: yathoktaṃ- yasya vairāgyaṃ sa paramaṃ sukhamanuprāpnoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11079: kiñcāha- yaḥ sarvasukhalābhamicchati tena sarvāṇi kāmasukhāni tyaktavyāni /
SA16hvsatssu:11085: yasya cittaṃ rāgatṛṣṇāviviktaṃ tasya sarve duḥkhopāyāsā niruddhāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11092: unmattavat pramattavacca na jānāti kurūpaṃ surūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:11095: kāmarāgo na vijānāti dharmaṃ andhatamasi ajñānavat /
SA16hvsatssu:11103: yathoktabhāvanāyogī so 'yaṃ tarati vai tadā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11112_2: sākūtasakākusasmitābhilāṣī durlabhakopaḥ sulabhapramodo bhūyasā dayālucittaḥ punaḥ
SA16hvsatssu:11118: yathoktaṃ- rūpasukhino [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā rūparāgino rūpamuditā rūpavipariṇāme duḥkhacittā viharanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11120: bhagavān tatra tatra sūtre nānādṛṣṭāntairimaṃ kāmarāgaṃ garhayati yaduta [āśī] viṣopamaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:11143: (u) yaḥ sarvamanityamiti prajānāti na tasya kāmarāgo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:11144_0: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anityasaṃjñā [bhikṣavaḥ] bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā tadā sarvaḥ kāmarāgaḥ
SA16hvsatssu:11144_1: paryādīryate sarvaḥ rūparāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvo bhavarāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvāvidyā
SA16hvsatssu:11145: yaḥ paśyati loko duḥkhaṃ duḥkhahetuḥ rāga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11147: yo nityaṃ smarati mayā jātijarāvyādhimaraṇānyanubhavitavyānīti sa imaṃ rāgaṃ prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:11154: kuśalapratyayasampannasya kāmarāgaḥ prahīyate yaduta śīlaviśuddhyā dīnyekādaśasamādhyupakaraṇānīti paścānmārgasatye vakṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11161: yathā jñāyate rūgṇasya trivastusampannasya tasminneva samaye vyādhiḥ śāmyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11162: (pṛ) yathoktaṃ sūtre- aśubha[bhāvanayā] rāgaṃ nirvāpaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11163: kasmāt bhavān bravīti aśubhādi anityatādi ca /
SA16hvsatssu:11166: ādau aśubhayā rāgo vāryate paścādanityatājñānena prahīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11167: aśubhayā audariko rāgo 'panīyata itīdaṃ bahūnāṃ jñātameva /
SA16hvsatssu:11180: kaścit dveṣī parān nindituṃ daṇḍena tāḍayituñcecchati /
SA16hvsatssu:11192: kaścit dveṣī sahasā kiñcit gṛhītvā nānākāraṇai[rna] tyaktumicchati /
SA16hvsatssu:11193: yathā siṃho nadīṃ vigāhya [SSS_299] tattīranimittaṃ gṛhītvā āmaraṇaṃ na [tato] vinivartate /
SA16hvsatssu:11196: kaścit dveṣī hitalābhinaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā citte mātsaryamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:11198: kaścit dveṣī sadā kalahapriyo dhṛṣṭamanovāg bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11201: kaścit dveṣī ciramātsaryeṇa śīlamupadiṣṭo 'pi punaḥ pratilomayati /
SA16hvsatssu:11204: kaścit dveṣī kiñcidabhīṣṭasya amanaḥprahlādanasya vastuno lābhe kṣubhitacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11207: kaścit dveṣī asukumāravacanaḥ sadā bhrukuṭilālaso na manaḥ pūrvamālāpaṃ yojayati /
SA16hvsatssu:11213: kaścit dveṣī kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ satīrthyaṃ saṃspṛṣṭopāyāsaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:11216: kaścit dveṣī sadā garhāprakaṭanaprīto vigītavastupriyaśca bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11219: dveṣo 'yaṃ dvividhaḥ- kadācitsattvamupādāya bhavati kadācidasattvamupādāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11229: durjanasahavṛttyā vā vyāpāda utpadyate yathā saunikavyādhādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11230: mandajñānabalādvā dveṣa utpadyate yathā vṛkṣāṇāṃ śākhopaśākhā vāteritā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11231: cirasamupacitadveṣānuśayasya āniryātanabhāvaṃ dveṣa utpadyate saunikavyādhasarpāṇāmāgamādvā dveṣa utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11232: paradoṣānusmṛtipremṇā vā dveṣa utpadyata iti yathā navakleśeṣūktam /
SA16hvsatssu:11234: jātyā vā dveṣa utpadyate yathā sarpādīnām /
SA16hvsatssu:11238: ātmabuddhimadhyayasya [tatra] mānaparipoṣaṇaṃ padārthādhyavasānañcetyevamādipratyayeṣu satsu dveṣa utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11241: (u) uktaṃ sūtre- dveṣaḥ kāmarāgād gurutaraṃ pāpam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11254: sattvāḥ sadā duḥkhinaḥ punardveṣeṇa pīḍitāḥ vraṇe prayuktakṣāravat /
SA16hvsatssu:11255: kiñca sūtre bhagavān svayaṃ dveṣadoṣānāha- dveṣabahulaḥ kutsitaḥ kharvākāro 'praśāntabuddhiśayaḥ sadā bhīrucitto janānāmaśraddheya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11258: bhrukuṭikṣepeṇa durabhigamo 'saṃśliṣṭamukhavarṇo durvimokasulabhakopaḥ sadā vyāpādopanāhamudito vigrahabhūṣaṇāyudheṣu prīto durmitrapakṣapātī sajjanavidveṣī,
SA16hvsatssu:11268: (u) yaḥ paragarhādiduḥkhaṃ kṣamate sa kuśaladharmapuṇyaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11276: yo bhikṣuḥ kṣamāvān sa pravrajyādharmā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11279: ya ākāraveṣābhyāṃ bhikṣuḥ bhinnavyavahāro dveṣacittasahagataśca na sa bhavyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11283: dveṣakārī parān vyābādhituṃ kāmayānaḥ svātmānameva vyābādhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11286: ato jñāyate dveṣo mahāntamātmāpakarṣaṃ karoti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11287: ataḥ prājñenātmano hitaṃ kartukāmena mahadduḥkhaṃ mahatpāpañcāpākurvatā kṣāntirācaritavyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11291: yo 'nityatāṃ bhāvayati bahulīkaroti pratibudhyate sarvadharmā kṣaṇikāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:11294: śūnyatācittasya samyak bhāvanayā kṣamamāṇa evaṃ cintayati dharmeṣu vatustaḥ śūnyeṣu ko nindakaḥ ko vā nindāvedaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11296: ahaṃ satyato doṣavān iti pūrvapuruṣāḥ satyaṃ vadanti, kasmāt dviṣāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:11300: aśubhanindāṃ śṛṇvan evaṃ cintayet sarve lokā yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayante /
SA16hvsatssu:11314: mayā śabdasyāsya nimittagrahaṇādeva daurmanasyopāyāsāḥ sambhavanti ityahameva duṣṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11316: kasmāt dveṣādīni pāpāni na sattvānāṃ doṣāḥ, sattvā vyādhisamutthāpitacittatvādanīśvarāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11317: yathā bhūtacikitsako bhūtoccāṭanādhyavasito bhūtameva dviṣati na tu rogiṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:11321: yathā nindāpaṭavo brāhmaṇādayo buddhaṃ vividhaṃ nindanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11324: kiñcedaṃ cintayet lokā akuśabahulā ātmajīvitamahṛtvaiva kaṭukaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11326: kiñcaivaṃ cintayet- aśubhanindādinā na mama duḥkhamiti vedanā kṣantavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:11327: yathā bhagavān bhikṣūn śāsti- kāye krakaceṇa vidīrṇe 'pi vedanā kṣantavyā /
SA16hvsatssu:11330: nindāyāṃ labdhāyāṃ nirvedaṃ bhūyasā mātrayā suniśritamavagamyākuśalamācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:11331: sa jānāti ca nindāyā akṣamā ante duḥkhaṃvipākavedanā ityevaṃ cintayan narake mā bhūt pāta iti gurvīmapi nindāṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:11332: so 'tīva hryapatrapāsāpekṣaḥ cintayati ahaṃ mahāpuruṣasya bhagavataḥ śrāvako mārgabhāvayitā /
SA16hvsatssu:11334: kṣānticāribhirbodhisattvaiḥ śakrādibhiśca labhyaṃ kṣāntibalaṃ śrūyate ca /
SA16hvsatssu:11343: dharmāṇāṃ samavāyaḥ kevalaṃ prajñaptyā puruṣa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11352: sūtre ca vidyāyā artho vivṛtaḥ- yasya kasyacit jñānaṃ vidyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:11363: avidyā tu vikalpinīti na tarupāṣāṇayoḥ samānā /
SA16hvsatssu:11365: yathā puruṣasya cakṣuṣā rūpādarśanaṃ nādarśanadharmo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11370: pañcaskandheṣu asti pudgala iti mithyākalpanā ghaṭaśakale ca suvarṇasaṃjñotpadyata iti kasmādbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11375: (pṛ) na vidyā avidyā iti cet idānīṃ vidyāṃ vihāya sarve dharmā abhāvāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11381: evamiyaṃ vidyā savikalpāpi yathābhūtaṃ na prajānātītyavidyetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11391: vidyāyā abhāvo 'vidyeti yathā vadanti loke- adho 'rūpadarśī, badhiro 'śabdaśroteti /
SA16hvsatssu:11392: viparītā vidyā avidyeti- yathā rātrau sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣa iti buddhirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11400: arhato buddhadharmeṣu vidyā nāstīti vidyāvidyā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11408: yathāha- kāmarāgī na dharmaṃ paśyati, kāmarāgī na puṇyaṃ paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11413: ato jñāyate sarve kleśā avidyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11418: ato jñāyate avidyāṅgāni sarve kleśā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11421: yathā asti dravyamastyavayavī asti cit, sarve dharmā akṣaṇikāḥ, nāsti punarbhavaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11422: śabda ātmā, sa ca nityaḥ, tṛṇavṛkṣādayaḥ sacetanā ityevamādimithyāgrahe sati avidyotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11424: yaduta durmitrasaṃstavo 'saddharmaśravaṇaṃ mithyāmanaskāro mithyāsamudācāra [SSS_304] ityebhiścaturbhiḥ kāraṇairavidyotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11431: puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā astīti buddheḥ pūrvameva puruṣamanaskāra utpadyate paścānniścaya ityato 'vidyetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11441: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyānivṛtasya [bhikṣavo vālasya] tṛṣṇāsamprayuktasyaivamayaṃ kāyaḥ samudāgata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11442: siṃha nādasūtre coktam- upādānāni tṛṣṇānidānānīti / gāthā cāha-
SA16hvsatssu:11446: pṛthagjanā vedayante [sukhata] imān skandhān pañca [ye] 'śucayo 'nityā duḥkhāḥ śunyā anātmakāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11447: ya āryāḥ te tān duḥkhān vedayante /
SA16hvsatssu:11449: yathoktaṃ sūtre- ātmasaṃjñā mithyāviparyāsa iti prajānato na punarutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11454: tathā sattvā api dṛṣṭe 'lpāsvādagṛddhā bahūnādīnavān na pratīkṣante /
SA16hvsatssu:11455: tīrthikagranthairutpannamithyādṛṣṭikā vadanti na santi puṇyādīni iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11461: buddho bhagavān sarvajñaḥ śāstā trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samyak caryāviśuddha āryavinīta ityādi tīrthikā na vivicya prajānanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11467: yathā kalpādau janā āsvādastuccha ityanabhijñāya [tatra] rāgādhyavasāyamutpādayāmāsuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11469: ato jñātavyamavidyayā sarve lābhāḥ pramuṣitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11477: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyā pāpīyasī gurvī durvimokā ca iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11483: karmaṇāmanupacayādvijñānādīnyaṅgāni na punaḥ prādurbhavanti ato jñāyate avidyā sarvaduḥkhānāṃ mūlamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11484: pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate khalu asminnaśucikāya āsaṅgaḥ, anitye nityasaṃjñā ca /
SA16hvsatssu:11486: yathā ca māyā mūḍhānāṃ puraḥ pradarśayati mṛdaṃ suvarṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11487: prākṛtā mūḍhā dṛṣṭe pāpādhiṣṭhitā abhidhānenollapanīyā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11488: tathā lokā api cakṣuṣā aśuci dṛṣṭvā tadvañcitā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11496: susthāne prītivigataḥ sajjanadveṣī durjanasnidgho 'bhiprāyasya viparyayagrāhī priyamitre sadā pratikūlaḥ tucchavastuṣu sāragrāhī alpahrayapatrapo na vicikitsāpratīkṣī,
SA16hvsatssu:11497: na pareṣāṃ tarpaṇa ātmanāpi durniṣevaṇo mūḍho 'vijñātā sujīrṇamalinavastro bhramati /
SA16hvsatssu:11499: ātmanaivātmānaṃ mahāniti ślāghamānaḥ parasya laghūkaraṇe tṛpyati /
SA16hvsatssu:11503: apariśuddho 'nairyāṇiko bhāṣaṇe 'paṭuḥ sadā krodhopanāhamuditaḥ paropadeśaṃ viparyayato gṛhītvā [tatra] paramādhyāvasito durlabhamabhyasya suvinaśvaraṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11511: kasmātsūtra uktam- avidyāyā bhaiṣajyaṃ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādabhāvanā vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11513: hetau bhrāntā vadanti- īśvarā dayo lokakāraṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11525: yathā ghaṭapadaṃ śṛṇvato manasi saṃśaya udeti kiṃ rūpādiḥ ghaṭaḥ kiṃvā rūpādivyatirikto 'nyo 'sti ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11526: evaṃ pañcaskandhātmakaḥ puruṣaḥ kiṃ vā tadvyatirikto 'nyo 'sti puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11527: samāhitacittaḥ kāya evātmā kāyādanya ātmā iti śāśvatocchadākhye 'ntadvaye na patati /
SA16hvsatssu:11528: yaḥ prajānāti ghaṭaḥ pratītyasamutpanno rūparasagandhasparśamaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11533: nāma sarvamadhvabhāvi nāma bhūyo na vidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11534: ekadharmasya nāmno 'sya sarve dharmā vaśānugāḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11538: api coktam- saṃskārāṇāṃ santatiṃ pañcaskandhānāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11540: ukta ñca sūtre- yaḥ pratītyasabhutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:11541: yo dharmaṃ paśyati sa buddhaṃ [SSS_307] paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:11542: evaṃ yo nāmajaṃ saṃśayaṃ prajahāti so 'parapratyayaḥ paramārthato buddhaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:11545: saṃkṣepata uktaṃ caturaśītidharmaskandhe- yā kācana prajñā sarvā sāvidyāvyāvartinīti /
SA16hvsatssu:11546: avidyā ca sarvakleśānāṃ mūlaṃ sarvakleśānāṃ sahakāriṇī cetyevaṃ pratītyasamutpāda [jñāne] avidyā prahīyate //
SA16hvsatssu:11569: yathā sthaviraḥ kṣemaka āha- na khalvāyuṣman rūpamasmīti vadāmi,
SA16hvsatssu:11575: api ca ma āyuṣman pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu anusahagato 'smīti mānaḥ asmīticchandaḥ asmītyanuśayo 'samuddhataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11581: (u) dhyānābhyāse 'lpāsvādalābhāt saṃyojanā nuśayaṃ vyāvartayati na punaścitte samudācarati /
SA16hvsatssu:11587: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣuḥ kathayati ahaṃ samuddhatavicikitsaḥ pratilabdhamārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11588: [tasya] purata evaṃ kathayet- atigabhīraḥ pratītyasamutpādo lokottaradharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11592: adhimānini buddhā bhagavanto mahākāruṇikā api [taṃ] dūrīkṛtya na dharmāvavādaṃ kurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11597: tathāyamapi buddhaśāsanārṇavagataḥ alpaṃ dhyānasukhaṃ pratilabhya pāramārthikamārga iti tatrāsaṅgaṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:11598: adhimānī ante maraṇakāle na mārgaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:11610: yat sujane pūjye pṛṣṭhato 'satkāra uddhatamānaḥ saḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11614: yathoktaṃsūtre- ye kecit [śramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā] anityena rūpeṇa [duḥkhena vipariṇāmadharmeṇa] śreṣṭho 'hamasmīti samanupaśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11615: sadṛśo ['hamasmāti samanupaśyanti] hīno ['hamasbhīti samanupaśyanti] kimanyatra yathābhūtasyādarśanāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11622: kaḥ prājña imamapekṣya ucco 'smīti [manyeta] evamādikāyānusmṛtipratyaye tu nāsti mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11623: prājño jānāti sarve sattvā yadi vā daridrī yadi vā dhanī yadi vā pūjyo yadi vā jadhanyaḥ sarve 'pi asthimāṃsasnāyusirāpañcasandhipeśīkalalasamavāyamayakāyāḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:11626: ābhyantaraṃ bāhyaṃ cittaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ sarvaṃ kṣaṇikamiti paśyato na bhavati mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11627: cittasamādhiñca samyak bhāvayato na bhavati mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11631: kiñca prājñasya śīlādiṣu satsu na bhavati mānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11633: śīlādayo hi sarve eṣāṃ kleśānāṃ kṣayakarāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11636: kaḥ prājño 'nityena duḥkhena aśucinā padārthena mānaṃ kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11641: na tadā mānalakṣaṇamājñāsiṣam ahamiti vedanāvyākaraṇaṃ kutracidutpatsyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11658: anena rāgeṇa labdho gotrādimānastu vipulaṃ vardhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11665: ayaṃ samupāttadhārṣṭyo duḥsahabhāṣaṇo 'satkāracitto 'lpabhayaḥ svairācāramuditaḥ svayañca mahāduḥśāsano yatkiñcijjadhanya[mapi]svayaṃ bahumānī,
SA16hvsatssu:11671: śāstramāha- vicikitsā nāma tattvārthe buddhyaviniścaḥ kimasti vimuktiḥ kiṃ vā nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:11675: (pṛ) vṛkṣe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ sthāṇuḥ kiṃ vā puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11676: mṛtpiṇḍe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ mṛtpiṇḍaḥ uta kokila iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11677: madhukare saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ madhukaraḥ kiṃ vā jambūphalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11678: sarpe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ sarpaḥ kiṃ vā rajjuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:11679: ghoṭakamṛge saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ prabhā kiṃ vā salilaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11681: dhvanau saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ mayūrakṛta uta manuṣyakṛta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11682: gandhe saṃśayo bhavati kimutpalagandhaḥ uta saṃparkagandha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11683: rase saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ māṃsarasa uta māṃsābhāsarasa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11684: sparśe saṃśayo bhavati kimautpattikatantava uta paripakvatantava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11686: yathā kimayaṃ dharmo dravyavān uta guṇamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:11687: vimastyātmā uta na ityevamādayaḥ kiṃ saṃśayā na santi /
SA16hvsatssu:11689: sthāṇurvā puruṣo va ityevamādibhistu na kleśā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11690: na ca te punarbhavasya pratyayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11695: pūrvaṃ dvidhāvasthitaṃ padārthaṃ sthāṇuṃ puruṣañca dṛṣṭvā paścāddūrataḥ paśyati [SSS_311] puruṣādi vastu tadā saṃśeta sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti /
SA16hvsatssu:11697: dvidhāśravaṇam- yadi kaścicchṛṇoti asti puṇyaṃ pāpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11700: dvidhājñānam- yadā deve varṣati nadī samṛddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11707: adṛśyaṃ vastu yathā vṛkṣamūlaṃ pṛthivyāmadhastāt jala[sthaṃ]vā /
SA16hvsatssu:11708: kiñcidavastu adṛśyañca yathā dvitīyaṃ śiraḥ tṛtīyo bāhuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11716: vimate vastuni yāvadviśiṣṭalakṣaṇaṃ na paśyati tāvatsaṃśayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11722: yathā bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'vadat vyavasāyena brāhmaṇalabdhaṃ gamīraṃ dharmamabhisametya pratyayān jānan paśyaṃśca prakṣīṇasaṃśayajālo bhaveyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:11724: yathā jñānī saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ śrutvā vijñāya ca nirdhāsyati saṃsāro 'nādirityevamādi /
SA16hvsatssu:11726: (u) vicikitsābahulasya laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ sarvaṃ na sidhyati /
SA16hvsatssu:11728: sandidghaḥ pumān na kāryaṃ karma karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:11736: kiñcāha bhagavān- vicikitsā nāma tamaso rāśiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:11737: sa tamaso rāśistrividhaḥ atīto 'nāgataḥ pratyutpanna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11740: vinā bhagavacchāsanaṃ na samyaksamādhimān iti vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11742: tadyathāha- aṣṭakādayaḥ pañcābhijñā maharṣayaḥ saṃśayālīḍhā vipannā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11743: saṃśayānasya dānādi kurvataḥ puṇyamavipākaṃ vā syādalpavipākaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:11746: tasya puruṣasya cittaṃ sadā vicikitsākaluṣitamityato nāsti kuśalam /
SA16hvsatssu:11747: uktañca sūtre- vicikitsitacitto dānaṃ datvā pratyantabhūmau vipākaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11763: na tasmin samaye cittaṃ nirdhārayati ayaṃ sthāṇurayaṃ puruṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11765: mithyādarśanādasti vā nāsti veti vicikitsanna śraddadhate /
SA16hvsatssu:11770: samyadgarśanasambhavā śraddhā dṛḍhā bhavati śravaṇasambhavā tu naivaṃ bhavati //
SA16hvsatssu:11779: (pṛ) pañcasu skandheṣu ātmeti nāmakaraṇe ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11789: evaṃ bruvataḥ pañcaskandhā eva nityāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11791: tathā sati pañcaskandhā eka eva syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11796: ātmīye sati rāgadveṣādayaḥ sarve kleśāḥ samudbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:11804: ima ātmakalpanayā kāyaśiraścakṣurhastapādasyaudārikaṃ vivekameva na labhante /
SA16hvsatssu:11810: yathoktaṃ sūtre- pṛthagjanāḥ śūnyānātmatāṃ śrutvā mahābhītimutpādayanti ātmā na bhaviṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:11812: evaṃ pṛthagjanā yāvatpāmopahataṃ kāyaṃ prārthayamānā na nirvāṇāya prayante /
SA16hvsatssu:11816: tuṣṭa āyuḥkṣaye bhoti rogasyāpagame yathā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11818: ātmāstīti yo vadati sa mithyādṛṣṭau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:11819: yadyātmā nityaḥ tadā sukhaduḥkhayorvikāro na syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11820: asati vikāre nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:11823: svabhāvato vimuktasyāpi nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:11828: yo nairātmyaṃ paśyati tasya yātāyātaṃ samucchidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11831: (u) martyo devaḥ pumān strī iti nāmanimittaṃ śṛṇvataḥ saṃjñāvikalpādātmabuddhirutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11833: hetvabhāvenātmabuddhirutpadyate yaduta yadyātmā nāsti kaḥ sukhaṃ sukhaṃ vedayet,
SA16hvsatssu:11843: tadyathā andha[kalpa]sya śakalādi labdhvā suvarṇamaṇisaṃjñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11846: (pṛ) paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ rūpakāye keśanakharomādyavayavān pratyekaṃ vibhinnān /
SA16hvsatssu:11857: aṇoraṇiyān mahato mahīyān ātmā guhāyāṃ nihito 'sya jantoḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11862: madhyamacetanā āhuḥ saṃjñā ātmā, sukhaduḥkhayoratītayorapi [tat] saṃjñāvadātmeti buddhi[sattvā]t /
SA16hvsatssu:11875: vedanādaya ime rūpe pratibaddhā ityata ucyate rūpa[vān] ātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:11893: tadā eka eva pumān bahvātmā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11894: rūpādīnāṃ saviśeṣatvāt vaktuṃ śakyaṃ rūpamevā na vedanādaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11901: lokasatyato 'styātmā paramārthato nāstyātmeti vacanaṃ samyak dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11902: paramārthato nāsti saṃvṛtito 'stīti vadan na dṛṣṭau patati /
SA16hvsatssu:11904: yathā vyāghrī svapotaṃ mukhenāpaharati atiniṣṭhuragrahaṇe kṣataṃ [bhavediti] atiśithilagrahaṇe bhraṃśo [bhavediti] /
SA16hvsatssu:11911: paramārthato nāstīti vadan saṃvṛtito 'stīti ca vadan antadvayaṃ parityajya madhyamāyāṃ pratipadi caratītyākhyāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11918: (pṛ) yo dharmaḥ paramārthato nāsti sa sutarāṃ nāstīti syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11920: (u) sarvairlaukikairvyavahriyate astīti yaduta karma karmavipāko yadi vā bandho yadi vā mokṣa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11923: ime pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā māyopamāḥ jvālāvacca santānenotpannatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:11926: tadā pṛthagjanā vyāmuhya yadi vā ucchedavāde pateyuḥ yadi vā skandhānāṃ nāstītākathane avineyāḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11927: puṇyapāpādikarmabhirbandho vā mokṣo vā na sidhyet /
SA16hvsatssu:11936: saṃvṛtyāstīti kathane na tadā punaḥ paramārthato [SSS_317] nāstīti vacanamapekṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11937: uktañca sūtre- yaḥ sarvadharmān niḥsvabhāvān prajānāti sa śūnyatāyāmavatarati /
SA16hvsatssu:11939: ato jñāyate pañca skandhā api na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:11942: mahāśūnyatāsūtra uktam- yadidaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti vacanaṃ yadi vāyaṃ puruṣo jarāmaraṇa[-lakṣaṇa] iti vacanaṃ /
SA16hvsatssu:11943: yadi vā tīrthikānāṃ vacanaṃ kāya eva jīvaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:11946: kāya eva jīvaḥ anyaḥ kāyo 'nyo jīva itīdaṃ vacane na brahmacaryaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:11947: yaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ayaṃ puruṣo jarāmaraṇa[lakṣaṇa] iti nairātmyasyābhidhānam /
SA16hvsatssu:11948: yaḥ pratiṣedha idaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti tat jarāmaraṇasya vyāvartanam /
SA16hvsatssu:11953: kiñcoktaṃ rādhasūtre- rūpaṃ rādha yūyaṃ vikirata vidhamata vidhvaṃsata vikrīḍanakaṃ kuruta [tṛṣṇā]kṣayāya [pratipadyata] tadyathā pāṃsvāgārikāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:11960: yadā tu mahāvāte opūyate jalena vā pravāhitaḥ tadā vṛkṣasaṃjñā nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:11961: evaṃ yadā vidhvaṃsitāni vikrīḍanakaṃ kṛtāni vikīrṇāni vidhmātāni niruddhāni pañcaskandhalakṣaṇāni,
SA16hvsatssu:11963: yathāha sūtram- rādha yūyaṃ [rūpaṃ] vidhvaṃsata vikrīḍanakaṃ kuruta vikirata vidhamata bhāgaśo vidalayata sattvakṣayāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:11964: asmin sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhā anityāḥ sattvaśūnyāḥ na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:11965: pūrvasmin sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhā vikīrṇā niruddhāḥ te dharmaśūnyā bhavanti iti //
SA16hvsatssu:11969: dharmāḥ samucchidyante vā śāśvatā vā iti yadidaṃ vacanaṃ tadanta[graha]dṛṣṭirityucyate /

SA16hvsatssu:11981: (pṛ) ayaṃ caturtho graho na dṛṣṭiḥ syāt /

SA16hvsatssu:12038: iṣṭhaṃ iti vedokto devānāṃ kṛte yāgaḥ /

SA16hvsatssu:12062: abhidharme yāḥ pañcadṛṣṭayaḥ brahmajālasūtre ca dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ sarvā[stā] mithyādṛṣṭayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12069: laukikāḥ padārthā ahetukā apratyayā iti yadvadanti /

SA16hvsatssu:12083: samyakcaryayā taddharmapratilābhino na santītyato nāsti saṅghaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12088: kṛpaṇastu dhanika ityādibhiḥ nāsti kāraṇairvadanti dattamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:12092: nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ, nāsti ca sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ [phalaṃ] vipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12093: yadi jīvo nityaḥ tadā nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtam /
SA16hvsatssu:12095: nāsti paro loka ityato nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ, nāsti sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ vipākaḥ, nāstyayaṃ loka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12098: maraṇātparaṃ na bhavati pratītyasamutpāda ityato vadanti nāsti paro loka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12103: ye mastakādayaḥ śarīrāvayavāḥ, na ta eva matāpitroḥ śarīrāvayavāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12104: dharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt mātā pitā ca kiṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:12111: tadā cakṣuṣā paridṛśyamāno 'yaṃ kāyaḥ khanyamāno mṛdbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12115: akāyātmaka ityayaṃ dvividho yadi cittātmako yadi vā cittavyatirikta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12123: sa kṣudhitaḥ sarvān dṛṣṭvā annaṃ prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:12136: paśyāmaḥ khalu sarve sattvāḥ prajñaptikāraṇakā iti /

SA16hvsatssu:12139: ato vadanti nāsti balaṃ nāsti vīryaṃ [nāsti] ca tatphalamiti /

SA16hvsatssu:12158: asti punaḥ sattvo yena śucīkriyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12161: skandhānāṃ santānena pravṛttiṃ dṛṣṭvā ekalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:12167: brahmā svayamāha- ahamasmi mahābrahmā prabhurdevānāṃ kartā jagata ityevamādi /
SA16hvsatssu:12168: kecidāhuḥ- yadi kaścitpañcakāmānāṃ sukhavedanāsampannaḥ ayamutkṛṣṭa dharma iti /

SA16hvsatssu:12175: kecittasmin anutkṛṣṭasaṃjñāmutpādya vadanti- ayaṃ kṣatriyaḥ alpakālikaśikṣāmārgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12176: buddhavacanañca na cāṭukāvya[vat] kleśagurukaṃ na vedasadṛśam /
SA16hvsatssu:12183: śīladhāraṇa brahmacaryamātra āsajya devapūjādayaśca [vyavadānamārga ākhyāyeta] īśvara [prasādena] ca viśuddhiṃ labhata iti ca vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12186: punaḥ prayataḥ snātvā brahmayajñapaṭhanatadūrdhvabhojanaṃ viśuddhimārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12189: yat dharmā lokasatyataḥ santo 'pi abhāva ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:12190: abhāve bhāvasaṃjñeti yaducyate santi dravyāṇi astyavayavīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12207: (u) sarve doṣā vipattivyasanāni ca mithyādṛṣṭyā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12208: sa āha- nāsti pāpaṃ nāsti puṇyaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ phalaṃ vipāka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12209: ato dṛṣṭadharma eva na santi suvṛttāni /
SA16hvsatssu:12213: yathoktaṃ ṣaṭpādābhidharme- krimipipīlikāhananaṃ puruṣahananād gurutaram iti /

SA16hvsatssu:12217_1: samādattaṃ yacca vākkarma........yacca manaḥkarma yā cetanā yā prārthanā yaḥ praṇidhiḥ
SA16hvsatssu:12217_2: ye ca saṃskārāḥ sarve te 'niṣṭāya akāntāya amanāpāya ahitāya duḥkhāya saṃvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:12218_0: tadyathā tiktakālābubījaṃ koṣātakībījaṃ picumandabījamādrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ nikṣiptaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:12218_1: yaccaiva pṛthivīrasamupādīyate yaccāporasaṃ tejorasaṃ vāyurasamupādīyate sarvaṃ tat
SA16hvsatssu:12220: evameva mithyādṛṣṭikasya puruṣapudgalasya cittacaitasikā dharmā aniṣṭāya [akāntāya [SSS_325] amanāpāya ahitāya duḥkhāya] saṃvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:12222: atastasya puruṣapudgalasya kṛtamapi dānādi neṣṭaphalaṃ bhavati /

SA16hvsatssu:12245: yathā karmavarge narakavimocakaṃ karma ityanena kāraṇena tatpuruṣakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ narakāya saṃvartate /

SA16hvsatssu:12251: citte mithyādṛṣṭikatvāt tasya kuśalamūlaṃ kathaṃ pravarteta /
SA16hvsatssu:12260: abhūtavastuni idameva satyamanyanmithyeti vacanaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12263: (u) sa puruṣo nyūnaguṇaṃ labdhvā ātmānaṃ pūrṇaṃ manyate /

SA16hvsatssu:12279: ye doṣā uktā dṛṣṭiparāmarśasya "nyūnaṃ vastu [labdhvā] sampūrṇaṃ manyate ityādinā ta eva doṣāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12281: yaduta śītoṣṇavedanā, bhasmabhūmitarukaṇṭakādiṣu śayanaṃ jalahradāgnipraveśo bhṛgupatanamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:12283: yathoktaṃ sūtre- govratikaḥ saṃsiddha[vrata]ḥ [kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇāt] gavāṃ sahavyatāmupapadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12296: kasmāt ya ādito nācarati tasya mārgacaraṇaṃ sukaram /

SA16hvsatssu:12304: sukhaṃ prārthayitvā duḥkhaṃ labhamāno vimuktiṃ prārthayitvā bandhaṃ labhamānaḥ puruṣaḥ kiṃ na mattaḥ /

SA16hvsatssu:12320: yadasantaṃ guṇaṃ khyāpayati tena janā vadanti astīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12322: lābhasatkārāyādbhutaṃ prakhyāpya pareṣāṃ manaḥprahlādinī vāk lapanā /
SA16hvsatssu:12323: paradravyalipsayā tallipsāmupagūhya vadati idaṃ vastu sundaramityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:12325: yadetatpuruṣanindāyai anyaṃ stauti- tava pitā vyavasāyī tvantu neti /

SA16hvsatssu:12329: yat puruṣasya nidrāvyādhau niratiḥ sā tandrītyucyate /

SA16hvsatssu:12336: yo mahāmātrāṇāṃ vacanaṃ na satkaroti na bibheti /
SA16hvsatssu:12349: trayaḥ kleśā sāvānāṃ cetasi bhūyasā vartante /
