SA16hvsatssu:12357: yasya nāsti mohaḥ na tasya rāgadveṣau /
SA16hvsatssu:12360: santi ca tisra eva vedanā na punarasti caturthī /
SA16hvsatssu:12361: āsu tisṛṣu vedanāsu trayaḥ kleśā anuśayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12369: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhavedanīyasparśaṃ labhamānasya bhavati prītiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12376: tadā [khalvasya] tatra bhavati nirvāṇasaṃjñā vā vimuktisaṃjñā vā aduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñā vā ātmasaṃjñā vā /
SA16hvsatssu:12378: (pṛ) anuśayāḥ kiṃ dharme 'nuśerate ki vā sattve 'nuśerate /
SA16hvsatssu:12399: ayamanuśayo yadi prahīṇo yadi vāprahīṇaḥ sa ālambanataḥ saṃprayogataśca /
SA16hvsatssu:12404: ato jñāyate sattvamātre 'nuśayo na dharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12413: sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśaya iti sūtroktaṃ virudhyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:12415: vaktavyaṃ khalu sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ samutpanno rāgaḥ sattve 'nuśeta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12418: (u) saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpaprītyādinā rāga utpadyate na tu rūpādimātrāt /
SA16hvsatssu:12420: yathā vadanti- sukhī na prārthayate duḥkhī tu bahu prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:12423: duḥkhasya pīḍanātmakatvāt puruṣasya sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāmeva rāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12427: ata ucyate sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12428: tāsu triṣu vedanāsu trayaḥ kleśā anuśayā ityatastraya evocyante //
SA16hvsatssu:12431: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- traya āsravāḥ- kāmāsravo bhavāsravo 'vidyāsrava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12433: (u) kāmadhātāvavidyāṃ varjayitvā anye sarve kleśāḥ kāmāsravā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:12439: (pṛ) ime traya āsravāḥ; kathaṃ vadanti saptāsravā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12440: (u) vastuta āsravā dvividhāḥ satyadarśanaheyā [ye] āsravāṇāṃ mūlabhūtāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12450: (pṛ) catvāra oghāḥ kāmaugho bhavaugho dṛṣṭyodho 'vidyaugha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12452: (u) dṛṣṭimavidyāñca varjayitvā tadanye kāmadhātukakleśāḥ sarve kāmaugha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12469: kiñcittīkṣṇendriya evaṃ cintayati- yadi jīvo nityaḥ tadā aduḥkhasukhavikāraḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:12473: catvāro granthāḥ abhidhyākāyagrantho vyāpādaḥ kāyagranthaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ kāyagranthaḥ idaṃ satyābhiniveśaḥ kāyagrantha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12477: yaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśakaḥ kāmayate anena śīlavratena viśuddhiṃ labheya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12481: catvāra ime granthā avaśyaṃ kāyavāṅmayā iti kāyagrantha ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:12482: kecidāhuḥ- catvāra ime dharmā jananamaraṇe saṅgra 'thnantīti granthāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12483: (pṛ) pañca nīvaraṇāni- kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhaṃ auddhatyakukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:12487: īrṣyādayaḥ kleśāḥ kaśāśastrādiduścaritāni ca kāmacchandādutpadyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12489: styānamiddhena kiñcidviśramya punā rāgadveṣavikṣiptacitto na dhyānasamādhiṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:12491: aśuddhakarmakasya puruṣasya citte sadā daurmanasyakaukṛtyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12498: kecit teṣāṃ nīvaraṇānāṃ varjanāya vadanti- idaṃ kuśalamidamakuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:12499: sa tatra vicikitsate kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12501: eṣu pañcasu nīvaraṇeṣu trīṇi dṛḍhabalānīti kevalaṃ nīvaraṇamityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:12502: anye dve nīvaraṇe tanubale iti dvau dharmau sāṃsargikau /
SA16hvsatssu:12503: ime dve nīvaraṇe jananakāraṇasahite ityataḥ sāṃsargike ityucyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:12506: auddhatyakaukṛtyasya catvāro dharmāḥ pratyayāḥ- jñātivitarko janapadaḥvitarko 'maraṇavitarkaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:12518: pañcāvarabhāgīyeṣu saṃyojaneṣu kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ śīlabrataparāmarśaḥ avaragamanārthatvādavarabhāgīyāni /
SA16hvsatssu:12519: tadyathā govratikaḥ saṃsiddhaḥ kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇāt [SSS_333] gavāṃ sahavyatāmupapadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12537: tāni śaikṣajanānāṃ citta ucyante na pṛthagjanānām /
SA16hvsatssu:12538: (pṛ) auddhatyaṃ kasmāt rūpārūpyadhātukaṃ saṃyojanaṃ na kāmadhātukam /
SA16hvsatssu:12542: keṣāñcit rūpe ārūpye ca vimuktisaṃjñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12544: pañca mātsaryāṇi- āvāsamātsaryaṃ, kulamātsaryaṃ, lābhamātsaryaṃ, varṇamātsaryaṃ dharmamātsaryamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:12545: [tatra] āvāsamātsaryam- ahameva atra vasāmīti nānyān prayojayati /
SA16hvsatssu:12548: lābhamātsaryamiti- ahamevātra dānaṃ lapsya mānyebhyaḥ prayacchatu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12561: kaḥ punarvādaḥ [SSS_334] svīyān pañca skandhān tyajatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12566: mātsaryacittena dātarguṇaṃ pratigrahīturdeyañca samucchedayatītyato gurutaraṃ pāpaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:12568: tadyathā jātyandhasya sapatnabahulānāñca janma na svātantrayaprāpakam /
SA16hvsatssu:12570: triṣu adhvasu daśasu dikṣu [gatānāṃ] buddhānāṃ śatruḥ san saṃsāre saṃsaran sadā mūḍho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12580: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santyāvāsamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- anāgatasya subhikṣorāgamanāya necchati /
SA16hvsatssu:12589: lābhamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- sadā sambhārasambhavāya klamati /
SA16hvsatssu:12592: varṇamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- anyeṣāṃ varṇaṃ śrutvā vyākulakaṣāyacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12596: sarveṣāṃ mātsaryāṇāṃ sāmānyata ime doṣāḥ santi- prabhūtadhanasañcayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12602: pañca cetaḥ khilāḥ- [ihāyuṣmanto bhikṣuḥ] śāstari vicikitsate,
SA16hvsatssu:12606: yo bhikṣuḥ śāsturmahāpuruṣāṇāñca [SSS_335] varṇavādī, tasmin jane anāttamanā āhatacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12608: śāstari vicikitsaka evaṃ cintayati- kiṃ śāstā mahān, kiṃ vā pūraṇādayaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12609: dharme vicikitsaka [evaṃ cintayati] kiṃ śāstuḥ pravacanamutkṛṣṭamuta vedasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:12610: śīle vicikitsate kiṃ śāstṛproktaṃ pravacanamutkṛṣṭaṃ, kiṃ vā kukkaṭaśvādivratamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:12611: śikṣāyāṃ vicikitsate kiṃ mānapānādi dharmo nirvāṇaṃ gamayati uta neti /
SA16hvsatssu:12612: anāttamanā āhata [citto] vyāpādabuddhyā bhayagauravacittaṃ vinā sajjanān garhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:12618: sa ca bālo mūḍho 'jño na tathāgatadharmānyadharmayorvivekaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:12623: na ca vedadīn granthān śṛṇoti adhyeti vā /
SA16hvsatssu:12625: adhvanyadhvani bahulamithyāvicikitsaḥ sadā kaluṣitacittatayā śāstrādau vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:12627: sa ca mithyādṛṣṭibahulaiḥ puruṣaiḥ samānakṛtyatayā vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:12628: kiñca vedavyākaraṇādīni mithyādṛṣṭisūtrāṇyadhīyānaḥ paribhinnasamyakprajño bhavati ityato vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:12629: dharmāṇāṃ [yathāśrute] 'rthe prītaḥ kusmṛtiṃ janayan na sūtrakṛdāśayaṃ labdhuṃ śaknoti /
SA16hvsatssu:12630: ato vicikitsate sarvadā svahitālābhapratyayataḥ śāstrādiṣu vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:12631: pañca cetaso vinibandhāḥ- yaḥ kāyo 'vigatarāgo sa kāya āsajyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12639: abhilāṣāvyākulatayā āryavacane upaśamapradarśane dharme na prahṛṣyati /
SA16hvsatssu:12640: ataḥ śīlabāhuśrutyadhyānasamādhyādiṣvalpaṃ hitaṃ vastu labdhvā tenātmānaṃ pūrṇaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12643: [SSS_336] ayaṃ yadyaṣṭākṣaṇavihīnaḥ [saḥ] puruṣakāyaṃ duṣkaraṃ labdhvavānityataścittaikāgryeṇa vīryamārabheta /
SA16hvsatssu:12645: asya samagrasya pratyayasya vigame 'nye pratyayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12656: sūtra uktaṃ- pṛthagjano viṃśatidhā svacittaṃ nigṛhyaivaṃ cintayet- mama vibhinnākāraveṣamātrasya vṛthā,
SA16hvsatssu:12674: naivāsti sukhalayaḥ kṛtayoḥ kuśalākuśalayornaiva vismṛtirvināśo vā āmaraṇaṃ na dānto bhaviṣyāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12693: evaṃ krameṇa santatyā vardhata ityanuśaya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12695: (pṛ) ayamanuśayaḥ kiṃ cittasamprayuktaḥ kiṃ vā cittaviprayuktaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12701: saumanasyamidaṃ yadi sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ vartate [tadā] rāgānuśaya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12708: uktaṃ hi sūtre- bālānāṃ maithunacittameva nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:12713: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- satkāyadṛṣṭisamucchede 'nuśayāḥ sahaiva samucchidyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12716: tathā nocet āryamārgeṇa kasya samucchedaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:12718: pṛthagjanāḥ śaikṣajanāśca yadā kuśalacitte 'vyākṛtacitte ca vartante /
SA16hvsatssu:12736: yathā ca caturdinajvarārto dinadvaye [jvarā]nudbhave 'pi jvarārta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12741: yaducyate bhavatā nāsti cetanā nāsti vikalpaḥ vijñānasyamālambanamasti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12743: yadāha bhavān- satkāyadṛṣṭiranuśayena saha samucchidyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12752: yadavocaḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śaikṣajanāśca yadi kuśalāvyākṛtacittagatāḥ, tadā arhantaḥ syuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:12755: yathā kaścinmāsavarjanadharmamasamādāno māṃsamabhuñjannapi na varjitamāṃsa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:12769: mithyājīvo [yena] māyāśāṭhyādayaḥ pañcadharmāḥ puṣṭiṃ labhante sa mithyājīvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12773: vinaye yatpratiṣiddhaṃ tena ca svātmajīvanaṃ mithyājīvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12781: mārgāvacara evaṃ cintayet- bhagavataḥ śāsane 'vatāro mārgācaraṇārthaḥ na [SSS_339] jīvanārtha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12792: evaṃ cintayati- ahamanena śīlena svarga utpatsya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12802: sa naihikaṃ sukhaṃ vindate, paratra ca mahadduḥkhamanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12809: śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ sthūladarśana ityato bahūnāṃ satvānāṃ gocaraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12825: anena kāraṇena ca daridrāṇāṃ nīcānāṃ kutsitānāmatejasvināñca sthāne patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:12840: yathā kasyacitsvata utkṛṣṭavastulābhinaṃ putrameva paśyataścittaṃ duṣprītikaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12850: daśakleśamahābhūmikadharmāḥ tadyathā aśrāddhayaṃ kausīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā vikṣepo 'vidyāsamprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśca /
SA16hvsatssu:12861: ato jñāyate na sarvakleśacitteṣu te daśa dharmāḥ santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12872: sūtra uktam- mahābrahmā brahmakāyikānāmantryāha mā bhavanto śramaṇaṃ gautamamupasaṅkramantu /
SA16hvsatssu:12876_0: uktañca sūtre- [atha khalu kevadhaṃ] mahābrahmā taṃ bhikṣuṃ bāhau gṛhītvā ekamantamapanayitvā
SA16hvsatssu:12876_1: taṃ bhikṣumetadavocat- ahamapi na jānāmi yatremāni catvāri mahābhūtānyapariśeṣāṇi nirudhyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12881: īdṛśānāṃ pāpakānāṃ kleśānāṃ sattvāt jñātavyamasti ca [tatrā] akuśalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:12882: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- mātāpitrupādhyāyācāryādiṣu yo rāgaḥ sa kuśalarāgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12889: yanmānaṃ niśritya mānaṃ samucchedayati ayaṃ kuśalamānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12892: kiñcāhurābhidharmikāḥ- yaḥ kuśalaḥ na [sa] kleśo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:12909: varaṃ saṃśaya eva pātayati na mithyādṛṣṭāvatārayati /
SA16hvsatssu:12922: ato jñāyate tṛṣṇayā sarve bhavasantānāṃ bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:12932: (u) ime sarve dvidhāpi bhavanti satyadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:12933: kenedaṃ jñāyate yathā nāthaputrādayo bhagavacchrāvakān satkāralā bhino dṛṣṭvā īrṣyācittamutpādayamāsuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12939: yathā srotaāpannasya narakapatanapratyayaḥ aṣṭamaloke kāyavedakamāyā ca satyadarśanaheyāpi /
SA16hvsatssu:12940: (pṛ) kleśeṣu kati duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ kati samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12942: pūrvoktāḥ satyadarśanaheyāḥ ṣaḍanuśayāścaturdhā bhavanti duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12952: pañcaskandhāḥ sanirodhāḥ, ātmā tvanirodhaḥ, mārga ātmadṛṣṭervirodhidharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12956: yogī samudayasambhūtaṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā ucchedadṛṣṭiṃ vyāvartayati /
SA16hvsatssu:12960: ato duḥkhaṃ paśyan prajānāti- śīlaṃ duḥkhaṃ, nānena viśuddhirlabhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12962: mithyādṛṣṭyā nirvāṇamapodyate, yadanayā dṛṣṭyā viśuddhirlabhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12971: rāgo māno mithyādṛṣṭiṃ varjayitvā anyāścatasro dṛṣṭayo duḥkhadaurmanasyendriye varjayitvā [tadanya]trividhendriyasamprayuktāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12978: paścādapi vakṣyate pañcasu vijñāneṣu nāsti kleśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:12980: mātsaryantu na tathā ityatra nāsti hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12982: evaṃ māno na daurmanasyendriyasamprayukta ityatrāpi nāsti hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12985: samudayasatya[darśana]heyāśca mithyādṛṣṭidṛṣṭiparāmarśavicikitsā rāgapratighamānaviprayuktāvidyāśca ime sarvatragānuśayā anye 'sarvatragānuśayāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:12990: mama[śāsane]mithyādṛṣṭau rāgo bhavati, nāsti duḥkhaṃ yāvannāsti mārgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13000: tena dharmeṇātmānamunnamayati, tatpradhānā bhavanti [rūpadhātau] na kāmadhātau /
SA16hvsatssu:13001: yathā kāmadhātukakleśārūpadhātvālambanāḥ tathā rūpadhātukādṛṣṭayādayaḥ kleśā api kāmadhātvālambanāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13005: rāgaḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇālambano 'pi caturo devān tadadhastanāṃśca saṃkleśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13006: yathāha dīrghanakhasūtram- sarvaṃ kṣamata itīdaṃ saṃrāgāya /
SA16hvsatssu:13013: uktaṃ hi sūtre- īdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭimutpādya īdṛśaṃ vastu vadati yadasti jīva ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:13019: tathā no cet satkāyadṛṣṭyādayo 'pi pañcasu vijñāneṣu varteran /
SA16hvsatssu:13021: cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadati ahaṃ paśyamīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13024: kathamucyate pañcasu vijñāneṣu na kleśāḥ santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13028: manovijñāne hi vidyamānaṃ vikalpakāraṇaṃ na pañcasu vijñāneṣu /
SA16hvsatssu:13029: ato jñāyate pañca vijñāneṣu na santi kleśā iti //
SA16hvsatssu:13033: kecidāhuḥ- kleśā navavidhā- adhamamadhyamottamā adhamādhamādhamamadhyamādhamottamā madhyamādhama madhyamamadhyamamadhyamottamā uttamādhamottamamadhyamottamottamā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13042_0: sūtre bhagavānāha- tadyathā dakṣaḥ [SSS_345] karmakaro hastena paraśumādāya cakṣuṣā
SA16hvsatssu:13042_1: muṣṭipradeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā yānyaṃśasahasrāni pratidinaṃ kṣīyamāṇāni tānyagaṇayanannapi
SA16hvsatssu:13043: tathā sa bhikṣurapi mārgacaryāṃ bhāvayan kānyadya kṣīṇāṇyāsravasahasrāṇi kāni hyaḥ kṣīṇānyāsravahasrāṇīti agaṇayannapi kṣīṇamātre prajānāti kṣīṇa āsrava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13044: ato jñāyate 'pramāṇai jñānaiḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyanta natvaṣṭha nava vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13045: (pṛ) kaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya kaḥ kleśa prahīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13047: yathoktaṃ sūtre bhagavatā- prathamadhyānamupādāyāsravāṇāṃ kṣayo yāvadākiñcanyāyatanamupādāyāsravāṇāṃ kṣaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13048: tāni saptapratiśaraṇāni vināpi āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:13050: ato jñāyate kāmadhātukasamādhiṃ niśrityāpi āsravakṣayaṃ pratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13055: (pṛ) pūrvaṃ prathamadhyānādvītarāgaḥ kiṃ krameṇa dvitīyadhyānādīn prāpnoti kiṃ vā ekakālameva /
SA16hvsatssu:13060: yathā ca yāmyā devāḥ pariṣvaṅge kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13061: tuṣitā devāḥ pāṇiṃ gṛhītvā kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13063: paranirmitavaśavartino devā ākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13074: (u) yathā satyadarśanaheyāḥ sarve kleśā nirodhasatyadarśanena prahīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:13075: uktapūrvamidam yat nirodhadarśanapraheyāḥ [SSS_346] satkāyadṛṣṭyādayaḥ kleśāḥ sarve nirodhasatyadarśanena prahīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:13076: ūṣmadharmādārabhya anityādyākāraiḥ pañcaskandhalakṣaṇāni bhāvayitvā ādau praheyāḥ kleśā nirodhadarśanena kṣīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:13086: [nanu] sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhānanityādinā bhāvayitvā srotaāpattipalaṃ yāvadarhatphalaṃ vindate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13092: ayaṃ rūpanirodha iti sarvadā mama paśyato dharmaṃ vijānataḥ kleśāḥ prahīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13097: ato jñāyate skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyataḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13104: ato jñāyate 'saṃskṛtālambano mārga eva kleśān prajahātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13120: yat satvā viśuddhaṃ paramaṃ nirvāṇasukhamupekṣante pratyutātitucchaṃ kāmasukhaṃ bhavasukhaṃ kāmayante tadidaṃ sarvaṃ kleśānāṃ doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13121: yadā kleśān [SSS_347] prajahāti tadā mahāhitaṃ pratilabhante /
SA16hvsatssu:13149: yathoktaṃ bhagavatāsūtre- yaḥ pratilabdhavidyaḥ sanyastāvidyaḥ sa kiṃ pāpakaṃ karma puṇyaṃ karma āneñjyañca karma karoti na vā /
SA16hvsatssu:13152: ato jñāyate prajñaptyanuyāyī kevalaṃ karmāṇi karotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13153: anāsravaṃ cittaṃ na prajñaptimavalambata iti na karmāṇi karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:13155: yathoktaṃ sūtre- śaikṣajanaḥ pratyāgataṃ nācarati, niruddhaṃ na karotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13158: anāsravaṃ cittañca na caryālakṣaṇamityato nāstyanāsravaṃ karma /
SA16hvsatssu:13161: ato jñāyate vidyamānaḥ kāyaḥ kleśahetu[ka] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13166: kleśavāneva [SSS_348] [jāyate] yatra bhavalakṣaṇaṃ kvarodanādi jananakāle pratyakṣamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:13167: ato jñāyate kleśaiḥ sahaiva sarve jāyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13168: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu sattvā bahavo varcaḥkuṭyādiṣu prasūyante na tu śilādiṣu /
SA16hvsatssu:13175: mriyamāṇā dūrato narakaṃ dṛṣṭvā idaṃ padmasara iti tadāsaṅgāttatrotpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:13176: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo nibiḍitasthāne vipulaṃ sthānaṃ labheyamiti mriyate sa pakṣiṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13178: yaḥ śītārto mriyate sa tapananarake jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13181: ya āhārāsaktaḥ sa kuṇapeṣu kīṭo jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13195: muhūrtaṃ daṇḍe viramatyapi [cakram] bhramatyeva na tu śāmyati /
SA16hvsatssu:13202: evaṃ jñānāgninā vijñānasthitiṣu dagdhāsu na vijñānabījaṃ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:13210: arhatastveṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ vaikalyānnāyatyāṃ kāyo bhavati iti jñātavyaṃ kleśapratyayā kāyavedaneti /
SA16hvsatssu:13213: ato jñāyate vigatakleśo nopapatiṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13221: bhavatoktaṃ yathā daśanaṃ paścātkrameṇa bhavati tathā kleśā apīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13225: yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:13226: pratyakṣaṃ khalu loke 'smin kleśajaḥ kāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13229: ato jñāyate āyatyāṃ pañcaskandhā api kleśajā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13235: pratyakṣaṃ khalu caṭakādayaḥ kāmabahulāḥ, sarpādayo dveṣabahulāḥ, sūkarādayo mohabahulāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13236: jñātavyamime sattvā avaśyaṃ pūrvābhyāsasañcitamaithunarāgādikleśā ityatasteṣūtpadyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13242: tebhyaḥ pāpebhyo dṛṣṭa eva badhabandhanādiduḥkhamanu bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13245: yatheha loke lābho hāniśca kleśahetukā, tathāmuṣminnapyevamiti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13249: kleśavivṛddhyā durgatau patati sa eva pāpakāyamanubhūya kleśān punarvardhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13259: teṣāmeva mahatvato duḥsthāne janmānuvartate yathā sūkaraśvādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13260: alpakeśatvataḥ susthāne jāyata iti yathā [kaścit] kleśatanutvāt dānaśīlādikarmācaran ṣaṭsu kāmadeveṣūtpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13265: paśyāmaḥ khalu sattvā kudeśabhūmau ratā durjanaiḥ saha kutsitamadhivasantīti sarvamāsaṅgādbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13270: śalabhā ime na jānanti agnirduḥkhasparśa ityatastatra patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13272: yathā matsyā aṅkuśaṃ grasantaḥ, hariṇāḥ śabdānu cāriṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13274: yathā ca kaścit kāmāsaktyā viprakṛṣṭāṃ vidiśaṃ gacchan na pratinivartate /
SA16hvsatssu:13276: yathā vṛkṣasya mūle 'nunmūlite sa vṛkṣaḥ punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:13277: tathā rāgamūle 'nunmūlite duḥkhavṛkṣa sadā vartate / yathāha bhagavān-
SA16hvsatssu:13278: yathāpi mūle 'nupadrute dṛḍhe cchinno 'pi vṛkṣaḥ punareva rohati /
SA16hvsatssu:13279: evamapi tṛṣṇānuśaye 'nuddhṛte nirvartayati duḥkhamidaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13281: svato 'vidyāṃ vinā ko jñānī tat vyayaduḥkhaṃ kāmayamāno vedayeta /
SA16hvsatssu:13293: yathā viṣasarpasampūrṇe gṛhaprakoṣṭhe 'prajvalite ca dīpe sukhādhyavasānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13295: tathā sattvā api avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ loke 'bhiramante /
SA16hvsatssu:13300: prārthanā hi dvividhā- kāmaprārthanā bhavaprārthanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13307: bhavapratyayā jātiriti jñātavyaṃ kleśāḥ kāyasya mūlamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13327: catasro jātayaḥ- aṇḍajo jarāyujaḥ saṃsvedaja upapāduka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13331: ato jñāyate catvāro jātivibhāgāḥ kāmatṛṣṇādhīnā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13332: catasraḥ kāyavedanāḥ- kaścidātmaghātako na paraghātaka ityādayaścatasraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13335: catasro vijñānasthitayaḥ- rūpopagaṃ vijñānaṃ tiṣṭhat rūpapratiṣṭhitaṃ rūpārambaṇaṃ nandyupasevanam /
SA16hvsatssu:13374: kleśā vedanāniśritā ityataḥ pañca vedanā indriyāṇi bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13381: [te] sarve kleśānāṃ nirodhāya bhavanti jñānī taddhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān skandhānupāśrayate /
SA16hvsatssu:13389: evaṃ kleśānāṃ kramaśo nirodhātkāyo 'pi kramaśo nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13393: draṣṭavyamavaśyaṃ rāgādipratyayamidānīmāyatyāñca glānyupāyāsān labhanta ityato 'vaśyaṃ [teṣāṃ] prahāṇaṃ prārthayante /
SA16hvsatssu:13401: bhagavānāha- tatra tatra sūtre nandirāgakṣayātsamyagvimuktiṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13421: śāstramāha- trividhacittānāṃ nirodho nirodhasatyaṃ yaduta prajñapticittaṃ dharmacittaṃ śūnyatācittam /
SA16hvsatssu:13429: (u) skandhānupādāya ye vikalpā tadyathā pañcaskandhānupādāya puruṣa ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13434: evaṃ skandheṣu satsveva bhavati sattveti saṃvṛtiḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13435: yathā ca bhagavān bhikṣūnavocat- dharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmānaḥ pratītyasamutpannā aniyatasvabhāvā nāmamātramanusmaraṇamātraṃ bhogamātram /
SA16hvsatssu:13436: imāneva pañcaskandhānupādāya nānā nāma pravartate sattvo manuṣyo deva ityādi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13438: kiñcāha bhagavān- dve satye paramārthasatyaṃ saṃvṛtisatyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13448: buddhā bhagavanto laukikānāṃ prajñaptito viyojanāya lokasatyena vyavaharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13452: purā kila janā vastūpabhogakāmanayā vahuvastunāmutpattikāle ghaṭa ityādi nāma sthāpayāñcakruḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13459: na patati mithyādṛṣṭau sukhānte duḥkhānte ca /
SA16hvsatssu:13463: anena dharmeṇa taccittaṃ damayitvā mārgaśāsanaṃ grāhayitvā paścātparamārthasatyamupadiśati /
SA16hvsatssu:13464: evaṃ jinaśāanamādāvagādhagabhīram- tadyathā mahāsamudraḥ kramaśo gabhīraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13466: yo mārgasya lābhajñānaṃ sādhayati [sa] paramārthadharmopadeśārho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13467: yathā bhagavata evaṃ cetaḥ parivitarka udabhut- paripavkāḥ khalu rāhulasya [bhikṣoḥ] vimuktiparipacanīyā dharmāḥ yannūnamahaṃ rāhulaṃ uttara āsravānāṃ kṣaye vinayeyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13468: tadyathā ghrāṇapākaḥ tadvināśe sukhaṃ janane durbhedanam /
SA16hvsatssu:13469: evaṃ lokasatyena cittaṃ damayitvātha paramārthajñānena vināśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13470: uktañca sūtre- dharmāṇāṃ pravicayapūrvakaṃ nirvāṇaṃ parijñātavyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13471: yogī pūrvaṃ dharmāḥ [kiṃ] prajñaptisantaḥ [kiṃ vā] paramārthasanta iti jñātvā paścānnirodhasatyaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:13483: yathoktaṃ sūtre- lokasamudayaṃ paśyataḥ nāstīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13484: lokanirodhaṃ paśyataḥ astīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13486: lokasatyato bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ satyameva yaduta astyātmā nāstyātmā ityādi paryāyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13491: asti vastutaḥ sattva iti yā dṛṣṭiḥ ayaṃ mahāmohaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13499: jananamaraṇavedakaḥ sattvo nāstīti vacanaṃ hi mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13500: yadi śūnyatābuddhipratilābhī vadati nāsti sattva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13502: yathoktaṃ sūtre- arhantī bhikṣuṇī pāpīyāṃsaṃ māramavocat-
SA16hvsatssu:13503: kiṃ nu sattva iti pratyeṣi māradṛṣṭigataṃ nu te /
SA16hvsatssu:13514: (u) yasya puruṣasya śūnyatātattvajñānaṃ notpannaṃ tasyāstyātmeti matirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13516: yathāha bhagavān- ye bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śūnyo nāstyātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:13517: na punaḥ karoti iti śrutavantaḥ te mahābhītā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13519: ato jñāyate apratilabdhaśūnyatājñānaḥ astyātmeti matyā nirvāṇādbibheti /
SA16hvsatssu:13523: apratilabdhaśūnyatātattvo nāsti kiñcanetidṛ ṣṭyā durgatau patati yadutocchedadṛṣṭi[rūpa]mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13524: yo 'yaṃ lokasatyato 'styātmeti prajñāya asti karmaphalamiti śraddadhānaḥ paścāt saṃskārā anityā utpattinirodhalakṣaṇā iti bhāvayitvā nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:13526: sa yadi nāsti kiñcaneti vacanaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:13529: kecittīrthikā apavadanti śramaṇo gautamaḥ paramārthata ātmānaṃ dūṣayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13530: ato bhagavānāha- lokasatyato vadāmi asti sattva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13531: samyagdṛṣṭiṃ prakāśayan vadāmi santi sattvāḥ sandhāvantaḥ saṃsaranta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13533: pṛthagjana mithyāmanaskārānniḥsattve vastusaditi vacanaṃ, tanmithyāmanaskārasya dūṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:13543: yathā citritaḥ pradīpaḥ pradīpa ityukto 'pi na pradipavṛttiko bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13544: evaṃ ghaṭo 'stīti kathito 'pi na vastusan bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13545: santi pañcaskandhā ityuktā api na paramārthāḥ //
SA16hvsatssu:13549: (pṛ) kathaṃ ghaṭādayaḥ prajñaptitaḥ santi na vastutaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13551: yathā vadanti idaṃ rūpaṃ idaṃ ghaṭarūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13569: yathā vedanā na vedayate vijānāti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:13582: yathā kaścidaśvaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadati- aśvaṃ paśyāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13598: manovijñānamapi sattvādau vikṣipati yaduta kāyaḥ sattvaḥ cittaṃ sattva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13599: evaṃ rūpādaya eva ghaṭa athavā rūpādivyatirikto ghaṭa ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:13600: paramārthavacane tu cittaṃ samādadhāti na vikṣipati /
SA16hvsatssu:13601: rūpaṃ paśyāmīti [vat] śabdamapi paśyāmīti na vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13607: rūpādayo dharmā jñeyādāvanabhidheyā iti na vyapadiśyante /
SA16hvsatssu:13614: yaḥ kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kuśalaṃ karoti sa vidvān /
SA16hvsatssu:13624: yathāha bhagavān- vidvān mūḍhaśca sarvaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:13633: yathāha- [kṣipraṃ] dharmaṃ vijānāti vijño jihvā sūparasaṃ yathā /
SA16hvsatssu:13647: rūparasagandhasparśānupādāya hi ayaṃ ghaṭa iti vyavahāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13649: (13) prajñaptau ca bhavati saṃśayaḥ yathā sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13650: rūpādiṣu tu na saṃśayo bhavati rūpaṃ vā kiṃ vā śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13651: (pṛ) rūpādāvapi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13653: rūpaṃ paśyan naiva saṃśete ayaṃ śabda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13654: anyasmāt kāraṇāt saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13655: yathā rūpaṃ śūnyamiti śrutvā punā rūpaṃ paśyan saṃśete kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13657: (pṛ) nirodhasatye 'pi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti nirodhaḥ kiṃ vā nāsti nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13658: (u) abhiniviṣṭeṣu saṃśayo bhavati na tu nirodhasatye /
SA16hvsatssu:13659: asti nirodha iti mataṃ nāsti nirodha iti matañca yaḥ śṛṇoti tasya bhavati saṃśayaḥ kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13662: nirodhasatyaṃ paśyato na punaḥ saṃśayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13677: snehadveṣādivikalpo yaḥ kaścana sa sarvaḥ prajñaptisan /
SA16hvsatssu:13684: dāhyate [SSS_361] pradāhyate ityādi yā kācana kriyā sarvā sā prajñaptisatī /
SA16hvsatssu:13691: prāṇātipātādi pāpaṃ prāṇātipātaviratyādi puṇyaṃ sarvaṃ na paramārthasat /
SA16hvsatssu:13707: tathā śūnyatayā yat khaṇḍanaṃ tattu paramārthasat /
SA16hvsatssu:13711: (20) santi catvāro vādāḥ- ekatvaṃ, nānātvaṃ, anirvacanīyatvaṃ, abhāva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13716: anirvacanīyatvam- rūpādaya eva vā ghaṭaḥ kiṃ vā tadvayatirikto ghaṭa iti na nirvaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13723: (u) ekatvavāde doṣo yaduta rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratyekaṃ vibhaktam /
SA16hvsatssu:13724: yadi ghaṭa ekaḥ, tadā na sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13730: (pṛ) yathā ekaikaṃ tilaṃ na kalāpaṃ sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:13746: ato jñāyate rūpādaya eva na pṛthivīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13747: laukikā vadanti- pṛthivīrūpaṃ pṛthivīgandhaḥ pṛthivīrasaḥ pṛthivīsparśaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13748: na paśyāmo rūparūpamiti vadantaṃ yaṃ kañcana /
SA16hvsatssu:13749: anyadharmalakṣaṇenāvaśyaṃ pradarśyate- yathā amukasya puruṣasya kuṭīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13755: tathāpi svātmarūpeṇaiva svātmapradarśanaṃ [iti vadataḥ] ko doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13756: (u) yadyucyate pṛthivī rūpādinā svātmānameva pradarśayatīti nāyaṃ nyāyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13760: śilāpuruṣasya hasta iti pradarśane tadanyaḥ kāyaḥ śilāpuruṣa iti syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:13763: tasmin samaye śilāpuruṣa eva na punastadanyo 'stītyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13764: yathā bhagavānāha- santyasmin kāye keśā romāṇi raktaṃ māṃsaṃ ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:13767: ato jñāyate śilāpuruṣa iti vacanamapi mṛṣāvacanam, iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13772: ato jñāyate rūparasagandhasparśā eva, naivāstīyaṃ pṛthivīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13775: rūparasagandhasparśavatī pṛthivī iti tu vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13787: puruṣa evaṃ cintayati- pṛthivīṃ paśyāmi, pṛthivīṃ rasayāmi, pṛthivīṃ spṛśāmi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13789: na [SSS_363] syāt rūpamātre pṛthivīṃ paśyāmīti pṛthivīsaṃjñā /
SA16hvsatssu:13794: yathā kaścid vṛkṣaśākhāṃ chindan vadati- vṛkṣaṃ chindāmi, vanaṃ chindāmīti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:13801: yathā pūrvamuktaṃ- śabdo rūpādivyatiriktaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ santānapravṛttaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13803: ato jñāyate na sarvāṇi bhautikāni śabdavantīti //
SA16hvsatssu:13822: na rūpavyatiriktaṃ rūpalakṣaṇaṃ pṛthagastīti / ato na yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13824: ato jñāyate na pṛthak santi pṛthivyādayo dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13828: kāyendriyeṇa spṛṣṭvāpi jānīmaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13835: na hyandhakāre vivecayati ghaṭo vā jighrayate kapālaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:13836: ghaṭo vā rasyate kapālaṃ vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13837: (u) yadyapi na vivecayati kiṃ ghaṭa uta kapālamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13838: tathāpi mṛdi jñānaṃ bhavati mṛdaṃ [SSS_364] jighrāmi, mṛdaṃ rasayāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:13840: tadā dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā vā na nirdhārayati kimayaṃ ghaṭa śarāvaḥ kiṃ vā ghataśakalamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13841: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyañca na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13842: andhakāre ghaṭabuddhirutpannāpi na vivecayati suvarṇaghaṭo rajataghaṭo vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13843: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyamapi na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:13846: yathā [cakṣuḥ] puṣpādi paśyati na vivicya jānāti gandhaḥ surabhirasurabhirvā raso madhuro 'madhuro vā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:13847: ato yadi mataṃ cakṣuḥkāyendriyābhyāṃ jānīmo dravyaṃ na ghrāṇajihvābhyāmiti /
SA16hvsatssu:13849: yathā ghrāṇajihve dravyaṃ pṛthakkṛtya na vikalpayataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13850: tathā cakṣuḥkāyendriye api dravyamapṛthagbhūtamapi na vikalpayataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13862: na tu sarvo rūpātpṛthagbhūto dharmo dṛśyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13868: yadi ca dṛśyadharmeṇa tadanyadharma upalabhya dṛśyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13876: indriyeṇa rūpaṃ dṛśyamitīdaṃ rūpalakṣaṇaṃ punaralakṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13877: tathā tu rūpalakṣaṇamadṛśyamiti syāt / ato na yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13887: na tatrāsti vinigamanā rūpamātramupalabdhikaraṃ nānye dharmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13895: yathā andho 'bhyastaghaṭaparimāṇo vinaṣṭacakṣuṣko 'pi spṛṣṭvā ghaṭaṃ jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:13899: bhavatāṃ sūtre 'pyuktam- kāyāgataspṛṣṭaḥ sparśo na pṛthivyaptejasāṃmiti jñātavyam- adṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuriti /
SA16hvsatssu:13902: andha imaṃ vāyuṃ jānannapi na jānāti vāyurayaṃ kiṃ dṛśyaḥ kiṃvā adṛśya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13909: ye saṃkhyāparimāṇādayo dharmāḥ [te] adṛśyadravyagatāḥ, vāyuśca dṛśyaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:13910: (u) asmanmate rūpaṃ vihāya nāstyanyo dharmo dṛśyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13911: ato jñāyate mate ['smin] yatra rūpamutpannamasti tatra cakṣuḥ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:13913: yasmin dharme nāstyutpannaṃ rūpam, tatra sacakṣuṣkasyāpi notpadyate 'nyaghaṭasaṃjñā /
SA16hvsatssu:13914: ato rūpadi vihāya pṛthagasti ghaṭa itīdaṃ na nyāyyam //
SA16hvsatssu:13929: yathā cakṣurvijñānena rūpaṃ jñāyate, na śabdādi /
SA16hvsatssu:13941: ato jñāyate paramārthato nānirvācyāḥ dharmāḥ prajñaptāveva ekatvanānātvasatvāducyate 'nirvācya iti //
SA16hvsatssu:13945: (u) abhāvatve na puṇyapāpādīnāṃ vipāko vimuktyādayaḥ sarve dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13946: vidyamānaṃ nāstīti grahe sa graho 'pi abhāvaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:13948: asti nāstīti vādāḥ śraddhayoktāḥ pratyakṣajñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti anumitijñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:13950: yatkiñcana nāstīti yat vacanaṃ tadeṣu triṣu na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13951: sūtraṃ vānusarāma iti bhavatāmāśayo [yaḥ] nāyaṃ yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:13968: sarve dharmā abhāvā iti bhavata āśaye jñānamidaṃ kiṃ pratītya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:13973: tadā sarve janā yathābhipretaṃ yatkiñcana kuryuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:13979: tathā ca kena kāraṇenāha- sarvamabhāva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:13981: yadi kāraṇena na prakāśayati [tadā] paragṛhītaṃ prakṛtitaḥ sidhyet /
SA16hvsatssu:13983: yo bhāvaḥ kāraṇena sādhyaḥ na so 'bhāva ityucyate //
SA16hvsatssu:13993: avayavinyagrāhye 'pi avayavā grāhyā iti bhavato yanmatam /
SA16hvsatssu:14004: sūkṣmāvayavān paśyato 'vayavabuddhiḥ sadā bhavati na ghaṭabuddhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14033: na hi cakṣuḥ sūkṣmaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14034: na ca mano gṛhṇāti pratyutpannaṃ rūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:14037: manovijñānantu atīte anāgate vartate na rūpe vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:14065: kiṃ rūpaṃ prāpya paśyati kiṃ vāprāpya paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14076: (u) yadi cakṣuraprāptamapi jñānagocara ityucyate sarvasthaṃ rūpaṃ jñānagocaraḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14079: yadi sati pūrvameva cakṣuṣi rūpe ca paścāccakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14090: tathā hi- yadi ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurāśritaṃ, tadā sāyatanam /
SA16hvsatssu:14091: yadi padārtho nirāyatanaḥ tadā āśritya tiṣṭhatīti na labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14092: yadi bravīṣi vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣo 'lpabhāga utpadyate yadi vā vyāpyotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14099: ekaikavijñānāvayavo na vijānāti avayavī tu vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:14101: yadi nirāyatanaṃ, tadā na cakṣurāśritaṃ syāt //
SA16hvsatssu:14116: ato jñāyate śabdo na śrāvya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14121: śabdo 'yaṃ prāpya aprāpya vā ubhayathāpi na śravaṇīyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14131: ye dharmā vibhinnasvabhāvāḥ, na te saṃśliṣyante /
SA16hvsatssu:14132: ye na vibhinnasvabhāvāḥ, kathaṃ teṣāṃ svataḥ saṃśleṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14148: pūrvoktavat gandhaḥ prāpto vā aprāpto gṛhyata ityubhayathāsti doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14152: sūkṣmādyavayaveṣveva sparśajñānaṃ notpadyata iti yathāpūrvaṃ vaktavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:14159: manovijñānaṃ hi na pratyutpannān rūparasagandhasparśān gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:14162: (pṛ) yadi manovijñānaṃ rūpādīn dharmān na jānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:14172: (u) yathā kasyacit cittaṃ svātmānamajñātvāpi cintā bhavati ahaṃ cittavāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:14184: hetau pūrvaṃ san vā guṇa utpadyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:14190: ato na hetau pūrvaṃ san guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14191: bhavato yadi mataṃ hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14195: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu śuklatantuḥ śuklapaṭaṃ sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14197: yadi [SSS_372] hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalaṃ sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14198: kasmāt śuklatantuḥ śukla[paṭa]meva sādhayati na kṛṣṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:14199: ato na hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14207: (pṛ) dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu ghaṭaṃ kiyamāṇam kathaṃ nāsti ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14219: yadi ghaṭaḥ kriyāvān, atīto 'nāgataḥ pratyutpanno vā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14229: hetuḥ kāryasya pūrvaṃ vā, kiṃ vā paścāt, kiṃ vā samakālam, sarvathā na yujyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14232: hetau niruddhe kena phalamutpadyeta yathā avidyamānaḥ pitā kathaṃ putramutpādayet /
SA16hvsatssu:14236: yadi hetuḥ phalañca samakālam na tarhi ayaṃ nyāyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14237: yathā dve śṛṅge yugapadudbhūte nocyete vāmadakṣiṇe 'nyonyahetuke /
SA16hvsatssu:14238: siddhāntā ime trayo 'pi ayuktāḥ / ato nāsti phalam /
SA16hvsatssu:14239: hetuphale ime yadyekaṃ, yadi vā nānā /
SA16hvsatssu:14246: laukikā na paśyanti kañcana dharmaṃ hetuphalayorapṛthagbhāvarūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:14256: na ca paścāmaḥ kañcana dharmaṃ svātmānaṃ [SSS_373] kurvantam /
SA16hvsatssu:14263: cakṣuṣo rūpasya naivaṃ bhavati- āvāṃ saha vijñānamabhinirvartayāva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14271: phalamidaṃ yadi kriyācittapūrvakaṃ syāt, yadi vākriyācittapūrvakaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14273: garbhe 'pi bālānāṃ cakṣurādikāyāvayaveṣu kaḥ sacittatvaṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:14282: dṛṣṭe ca karmakaraṇe citte vikalpayati- evaṃ kartavyaṃ, evaṃ na kartavyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:14291: yat bhavān nānākāraṇairbravīti- sarve dharmāḥ śūnyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14310: tathāgatāḥ paraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvākāraṃ prakṛtito naissvābhāvyaṃ viśeṣasāmānyalakṣaṇāni sarvāṇi pratividhyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14314: (pṛ) yathā bhagavatā bodhimaṇḍagatena dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratilabdham /
SA16hvsatssu:14319: tadyathā bhagavānupadiśati sarvadharmāḥ pratītya samutpannā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14322: vicitrāṅkādīni rūpāṇi nṛttagītādayo nādā gandharasasparśā apramāṇaviśeṣā nopadeśyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14323: upadeśe 'pi nāsti mahaddhitam ityata īdṛśaṃ vastu nopadiśati bhagavān /
SA16hvsatssu:14325: yathā kaścit citrāṅkanādidharmavikalpamajñātvā vadati tāni na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14326: tathā bhavānapi yatkimapyasādhayitvā vadati nāstīdaṃ- vastu iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14329: yathā jātyandho vadati nāsti kṛṣṇamavadātaṃ vā, mayādṛṣṭatvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14331: yadyevam, pratītyasiddhatvānna santi sarve dharmā iti vaktuṃ pāryate /
SA16hvsatssu:14333: tathāgatastu āha- santi pañca skandhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14334: ato jñāyate rūpādayaḥ sarvadharmāḥ santi yathā ghaṭādayaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ santīti //
SA16hvsatssu:14340: idānīṃ vaktavyaṃ kiṃ dharmacittaṃ, kathaṃ tasya nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14341: (u) santi vastutaḥ pañcaskandhā iti cittaṃ dharmacittamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14342: pañcaskandhān śūnyān dṛṣṭvā samyagbhāvayato dharmacittaṃ nirudhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14344: yogī paśyati pañcaskandhān śūnyān yaduta pañcaskandheṣu nāsti nityadharmaḥ sthiradharmo 'vināśadharmo 'vipariṇāmadharma ātmāmīyadharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14350: ato yogāvacaraḥ pañcaskandhān na paśyati, skandhanirodhamātraṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14355: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacara idaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati yāvadidaṃ vijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ ṣaśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14356: na tu rūpādayaḥ pañcaskandhā na santīti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:14358: yathoktaṃ dharmamudrāsūtre- yogāvacaraḥ paśyati rūpādīn dharmān anityalakṣaṇān vikṣepalakṣaṇān vināśalakṣaṇān māyālakṣaṇān nirvedalakṣaṇān iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14361: taddarśanaṃ tāvadvayavadānā[tmakam] ato jñāyate pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14365: pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkurvatastu na tat punarabhimukhībhabati /
SA16hvsatssu:14367: tadyathā kaścana vṛkṣaḥ krakacakṛtto bhasmasātkṛtaḥ prakṣīṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14370: bhagavān rādhamāha- sattvaṃ tathā vibhida, vidhama, yathā nopatiṣṭhati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14371: kiñcāhaikaṃ sūtrama- rūpaṃ rādha tathā vibhida, vidhama yathā nopatiṣṭhati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14372: ato jñāyate yaḥ sattvaparibhedaḥ iyaṃ prajñaptiśūnyatā /
SA16hvsatssu:14374: bhāvanā ca dvividhā- śūnya[tā]bhāvanā nairātmyabhāvanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14376: yathā kaścit jalaṃ nāstīti ghaṭa śūnyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14377: tathā pañcaskandheṣu pudgalo nāstīti [tān] śūnyān paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14388: bhagavānāha- saṃskārāḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ santi māyāvat nirmitavat /
SA16hvsatssu:14390: paramārthataḥ śūnyamiti vacanam- ayamarthasatyataḥ śūnyo na saṃvṛtisatyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14391: paramārthaśca yaduta rūpaṃ śūnyamakiñcanam yāvadvijñānaṃ śūnyamakiñcanam /
SA16hvsatssu:14392: ato yadrūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śūnyatādarśanaṃ tat paramārthaśūnyatādarśanamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14397: tadarthamucyante pañca skandhāḥ paramārthataḥ śūnyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14398: (pṛ) kiṃ nu khalu sūtre noktam asti karma asti phalam, kārakastu nopalabhyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14399: (u) ayaṃ hetuḥ dharmaṇāṃ kārakākhyo nopalabhyata itīdaṃ prajñaptiśūnyatābhidhānam /
SA16hvsatssu:14401: prajñaptisaṃjñā ca yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjarāmaraṇaduḥkhasamudayanirodho bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14402: asmādvacanāt jñāyate pañcaskandhā api paramārthato na santīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14403: [SSS_377] mahāśūnyatāsūtre 'pyuktam- ya āha idaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, tasya jarāmaraṇam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14404: ya āha- sa eva jīvaḥ tadeva śarīram, anyo jīvo 'nyat śarīram iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14406: yeṣāmeṣā dṛṣṭiḥ na te macchrāvakā na brahmacāriṇa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14407: yat tasya jarāmaraṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate tat prajñaptikhaṇḍanam /
SA16hvsatssu:14415: uktañca sūtre- yo dharmo māyā sa mṛṣā /
SA16hvsatssu:14416: yo dharmo 'māyā, sa eva paramārthaḥ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14421: asat dṛṣṭaṃ sadābhāsamasadvai parayā dhiyā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14424: ato jñāyate nirodhaḥ paramārthasan, na skandhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14425: yadi skandhāḥ paramārthasantaḥ, yogāvacaro 'pi dṛṣṭvā mārgalābhī syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14427: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhā na paramārthasanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14430: na sambhavati skandhāḥ satyaṃ skandhābhāvo 'pi satyamiti vaktum /
SA16hvsatssu:14433: tathā yo 'mugdhaḥ na sa paśyati skandhān /
SA16hvsatssu:14437: yathāhānandaḥ- dharmānupādāya asmīti sidhyati yaduta rūpaskandhaṃ yāvadvijñānaskandhamupādāyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:14439: kṣemakaḥ pratyāha- na khalvāyuṣmanto rūpamasmīti vadāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:14442: api ca me āyuṣmantaḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu [SSS_378] asmīti adhigatam /
SA16hvsatssu:14453: ato jñāyate pañcopādānaskandhā api śūnyā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14456: na tīrthikānāmiva rūpaprahāṇakāle jñāyate vastusat rūpaṃ, parantu nānusmaryata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14457: yogī avaśyaṃ rūpādīnāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyati nirodhadarśanāt animitte 'vatarati /
SA16hvsatssu:14458: ato jñāyate rūpādayo na paramārthasanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14462: phenasūtre bhagavānāha- yadi puruṣaḥ phenapiṇḍaṃ paśyet yoniśa upaparīkṣeta /
SA16hvsatssu:14477: ato jñāyate skandhā na paramārthasanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14482: ye niḥsvabhāvaṃ paśyanti, anyalakṣaṇābhāvāt te duḥkhacaryāṃ paripūrayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14492: yathāha bhagavān- yaccakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivī [dhātu]ḥ ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:14493: ya imāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratilabhate sa vadati nāsti yatkiñciditi /
SA16hvsatssu:14497: ato jñāyate sarve saṃskārā niruddhā bhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14498: yadi vastusantaḥ saṃskārāḥ tadā na syuḥ samyak prahāṇavimuktinirodhāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14500: ato draṣṭavyaṃ paramārthataḥ saṃskārāḥ sarve 'bhāvātmakāḥ saṃvṛtitastu santi saṃskārā iti //
SA16hvsatssu:14519: śāstramāha- etāni trīṇi cittāni nirodhayato yogāvacarasya karmakleśā naiva punaḥ samudācaranti (pṛ)
SA16hvsatssu:14522: yathā pradīpo dharmaśca sati niśraye vartate /
SA16hvsatssu:14526: anāsravā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ sarvāṇi nimittāni tathā pradahati yathā na kiñcidavaśiṣyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14528: nimittābhāvāt karmakleśānāṃ na punaḥ samudayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14530: arhataḥ śūnyatājñānagatiṃgatasya asmimānarahitasya na punaḥ samudyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14533: yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:14534: asati ca tṛṣṇācitte na karmāṇi pacyante /
SA16hvsatssu:14535: yathā anabhiṣyanditāyāṃ bhūmau bījaṃ na prarohati /
SA16hvsatssu:14536: yogāvacarasyāsya sarvavijñānasthitiṣu sarvanimittanirodhe vijñānaṃ nirāśrayaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14541: sa kleśābhāvāt vikalahetupratyayaḥ satsvapi karmasu nopapattiṃ vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:14543: kāyaṃ vedayata ityataḥ tasya karmāṇi vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14546: yathā adharmeṇa prabalamadhitiṣṭhati uttamarṇo nāvakāśaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:14548: saṃsāre 'vartamānasya santyapi karmāṇi na vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14549: yathā baddhaṃ puruṣamanye janā yatheṣṭaṃ nindanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14550: evaṃ kleśabaddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ karmatāratamyavaśāt [kleśāḥ] vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14553: śūnyacaryāvihāritvādasya puruṣasya dharmeṣu svalakṣaṇa[saṃjñā] nāstītyataḥ karmāṇi na vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:14557: kleśavege kṣīṇe tu na tāni pravartante /
SA16hvsatssu:14558: yathā cakraṃ gatisthamapi vegakṣayānna punaḥ pravartate /
SA16hvsatssu:14560: yathā sutavatsalāyā mātuḥ raktaṃ stanyaṃ pariṇamate /
SA16hvsatssu:14566: ataḥ sadapi prāktanaṃ karma na vipākaṃ prayacchati /
SA16hvsatssu:14579: mārgasatyam- āryo 'ṣṭāṅgiko mārgaḥ samyak dṛṣṭiryāvat samyak samādhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14580: āryo 'ṣṭāṅgiko mārgaḥ saṃkṣipya dvividhaḥ (1) samādhiḥ parikaraśca (2) jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:14586: yadi bahuvāraṃ na bhāvayati tadā kṣiprameva vikṣipyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14602_1: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ dukhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāmimārgamāryasatyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14606: ato jñāyate laukikaṃ lokottarañca hitaṃ samāhitacittenaiva labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14609: yathoktaṃ sūtre avidyā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvaṅgamākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samāpattaye /
SA16hvsatssu:14611: [SSS_383] vidyā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvaṅgamā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samāpattaye anvageva hrīḥ apatrāpyam /
SA16hvsatssu:14614: ato jñāyate sarvaṃ satkuśalaṃ samādhimupādāya bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14619: uktaṃ bhavatā cittasyaikatrāvasthānaṃ samādhilakṣaṇamiti tatra samādhiścittañcaikaṃ uta bhinnam /
SA16hvsatssu:14639: yathā pūrvamuktam- yatra cittaṃ sukhi bhavati tasminnālambane 'vatiṣṭhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14648: tasya kālasya dvividhaṃ nāma samādhiriti prajñā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:14654: sā samādhirdvividhā ekā vimuktihetuḥ aparā avimuktihetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14662: cittaṃ kiñcitkālamavasthāya yadi parīttamālambanaṃ paśyati[tadā] parīttetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14669: yathā suvarṇakāraḥ suvarṇaṃ dravayati tāpayati secayati kāle ca sthapayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14682: samādherasyāstrividha upāyaḥ samādhyavatāropāyaḥ samādhyavasthānopāyaḥ samādhivyutthānopāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14691: yogāvacaraḥ svacittalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhṇan evaṃ pragṛhṇan evaṃ vyuttiṣṭhan evaṃ parityajan samādhāvavatarati /
SA16hvsatssu:14700: yathā kiñcidviśuddharūpaṃ kiñcitprakāśarūpañca dṛṣṭvā vadeta- mahāhitaṃ labdhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:14701: anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyamityādyanusmarataḥ cittaṃ na sukhi bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14721: prathamadvitīyau yadi dāntau samau tadā labhete //
SA16hvsatssu:14728: (u) ekāṅgabhāvana iti yat samādhiṃ bhāvayati na prajñām /
SA16hvsatssu:14730: ubhayāṅgabhāvana iti samādhiṃ bhāvayati prajñāñca bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14735: yathā sthaviro bhikṣurāha- yogāvacaraḥ samādhinā cittaṃ bhāvayan prajñāmupādāya kleśān pratiṣedhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14736: prajñayā cittaṃ bhāvayan samādhimupādāya kleśān pratiṣedhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14737: samādhinā prajñayā ca cittaṃ bhāvayan svabhāvamupādāya vimucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14738: svabhāvo nāma yaḥ prahāṇasvabhāvaḥ viyogasvabhāvo nirodhasvabhāvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14741: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- ekāṅgabhāvana iti yadi samādhimupādāya raśmiṃ paśyati na rūpāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:14743: ubhayāṅgabhāvana iti yat rūpañca paśyati raśmiñca paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:14744: āryaḥ samyaksamādhiriti yat śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ pratilabdhaḥ samādhiḥ [SSS_386] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14747: raśmimātraṃ paśyati na rūpamiti nāsti kiñcana sūtram sūtre kevalamuktam- ahaṃ prakṛtito raśmimapaśyaṃ rūpamapyapaśyam /
SA16hvsatssu:14749: bhavatā ca vaktavyaṃ kena kāraṇena raśmiṃ paśyati na rūpam ityādi / iti nāvocaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14750: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trayaḥ samādhayaḥ śūnyato 'nimitto 'praṇihita iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14752: (u) yadi yogāvacaro na paśyati sattvaṃ nāpi dharmam /
SA16hvsatssu:14761: śūnyaṃ bhāvayan hitaṃ labhate yaduta nimittaṃ na paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14768: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ yaḥ samādhiḥ śūnyānātmākāreṇa bhavati ayaṃ śūnya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14769: ya ākāro 'nityato duḥkhato hetutaḥ samudayato janakataḥ pratyayato mārgato yathāvadācarato niryāṇato bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14771: ya ākāro nirodhata upaśamataḥ praṇītato viyogato bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14774: (u) yadāha bhavān- anityato duḥkhata ākāraḥ apraṇihita iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14777: bhagavān sadā vadati yadanityaṃ tadeva duḥkham /
SA16hvsatssu:14781: hetutaḥ samudayato janakataḥ pratyayata ākāra iti matam /
SA16hvsatssu:14784: uktaṃ hi sūtre- yatkiñcitsamudayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ tannirodhalakṣaṇamiti paśyan nirvidyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14788: yathāsūtramuktam hīnaṃ madhyamaṃ praṇidhānaṃ na mārga āsaktijanakam /
SA16hvsatssu:14790: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhānnirodha ityucyate iti jñātavyam /
SA16hvsatssu:14794: ato jñāyate ime traya ekārthakā iti na syādbheda iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14795: (pṛ) kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- trayaḥ samādhayaḥ śūnyaśūnyaḥ, apraṇitāpraṇihitaḥ, animittānimitta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14797: (u) śūnyena pañcaskandhān śūnyān dṛṣṭvā ekena śūnyena punarimaṃ śūnyaṃ śūnyīkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:14799: apraṇihitena pañcaskandhān nirvidya apraṇihitena punarimamapraṇihitaṃ nirvedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:14801: animittena pañcaskandhān praśāntān dṛṣṭvā animittena punaranimittaṃ na gṛhṇāti /
SA16hvsatssu:14803: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- traya ime samādhayaḥ sāsravā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14819: yogāvacareṇa hi sāsravāṇāmanāsravāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodho 'dhigantavyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14830: bhagavānāha- dvitīyadhyānaṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ nāmne saṃvartate anyadharmāya saṃvartate yathā piṇḍapātāya śrāvastyāṃ praveśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14849: yadi pañcakāmasukhāsaktaḥ kaścit, ato na dhyānabhāgbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14850: tadarthamāha- pañcakāmasukhānāṃ viyoge paramaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhaṃ pratilabhadhva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14853: laukikā vadanti sukhaṃ gṛhasthasya na pravrajitasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:14854: ato bhagavānāha- idaṃ pravrajitasya dṛṣṭadharme sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:14860: dvitīyā samādhibhāvanā laukikahitāya bhavati yaduta jñānadarśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:14868: ataḥ sūtra uktam- sasmṛtisamprajanyo [SSS_389] yogāvacaro yā vedanā vitarkāḥ saṃjñā utpadyante sarvā[stāḥ] pratijānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14869: vedanānāṃ prajñānaṃ nāma sparśapratyayā vedanā, nāsti tu vedaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14870: vitarkānāṃ prajñānaṃ nāma ahamiti vitarkaḥ; kathaṃ [sa] na bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:14871: yaḥ strīpuruṣādiprajñaptisaṃjñāvikalpaḥ, tatsaṃjñāpratibhedanā vitarkā na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14876: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacaraḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāmudayavyayānudarśī skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14878: sarvāṇi laukikāni lokottarāṇi hitāni caturṣu saṅgṛhītānīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14880: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- caturthadhyāne 'rhatphalaṃ pratilabhamānasya ānantaryamārga āsravakṣaya ityucyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14882: (u) na hi tatrāsti viśiṣṭahetuḥ caturthadhyānamātrasyānantaryamārga āsravakṣayo nānyasyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:14891: tatra pūrve trayaḥ prahāṇasyābhidhānam, antimo jñānasya /
SA16hvsatssu:14897: yathā suvijñaḥ suvijñāya sadā hitaṃ prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:14898: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi sarvasatvānāṃ kṛte sadā sukhaṃ prārthayate /
SA16hvsatssu:14901: (u) nityaṃ lakṣyata aihikāmuṣmikahitasukhaprakarṣaprārthanāṃ kurvan naiva viruddhāsukhaprārthanām /
SA16hvsatssu:14902: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi sattvānāṃ sukhameva prārthayate nāsukham /
SA16hvsatssu:14907: (u) citte dveṣasmṛtimutpādya satvān tāḍayituṃ vihisituṃ vā icchati /
SA16hvsatssu:14913: yogāvacarasya sarvasattvānāṃ lābhaprakarṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahatī prītirbhavati yathātmano hitalābhe /
SA16hvsatssu:14914: (pṛ) kimimāni trīṇi maitrī[rūpāṇi]ā (u) maitracittasyaiva trayaḥ prakārāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14917: na kaścidadviṣan duḥkhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā dayate /
SA16hvsatssu:14918: yadā sarveṣu sattveṣu paramaṃ maitracittaṃ kaścidduḥkhopadravasambhrāntaṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭveva samācaratitasmin samaye pravṛttaṃ maitracittaṃ karuṇetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:14919: atha vā kaścit parasya duḥkhe karuṇāmutpādayannapi na parasyotkarṣe pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14922: kiṃ punarlabdhavijayaṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā [na] pramodyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14923: yogāvacaraḥ sarvasattvān samṛddhilābhino dṛṣṭvā svābhedataḥ pramuditacitto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:14925: ato jñāyate maitrīcittaviśeṣaḥ karuṇā muditā ceti /
SA16hvsatssu:14927: (u) śatruṃ mitrañca paśyato maitracittaṃ na samamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:14932: ato yogāvacaro mitre maitramupekṣya śatrau śātravamupekṣya cittasāmyaṃ cikīrṣati /
SA16hvsatssu:14935: ataḥ sūtra uktam- rāgapratighaprahāṇāyopekṣāṃ bhāvaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14941: yathā vadanti uttamamaitracittena trīṇi dhyānāni bhāvayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:14953: ] nāsmai agnirvā viṣaṃ vā śastraṃ vā kramate /
SA16hvsatssu:14956: yogāvacaro 'nusmarati- ahaṃ vyāpādamutpādya ahameva vipākamanubhavāmi nānya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14958: kiñca yogāvacaro manasi karoti ahamalpakena pāpakena anyasya kṛtena bahūni pāpakāni tacchataguṇāni tadabhinnānyanubhavāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:14964: puruṣasya pūrvādhvani mātā vā syāt, garbhiṇī prasavitrī ca madarthaḥ duḥkhaṃ vyavasyamānā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14965: atha vā syāt mama pitā bhrātā bhāryā putro vā /
SA16hvsatssu:14968: anusmareccāgāminyadhvani mama pitā mātā bhrātā vā bhavet iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14969: arhan pratyekabuddho buddho vā bhavediti [anusmaraṇaṃ] kuryāt /
SA16hvsatssu:14973: pūrvañca nibhṛtaṃ paśyet janasya svabhāvaḥ kuśalo 'kuśala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14981: kṣāntiguṇo yogāvacaro 'nuvicintayati- ahaṃ yadi paraṃ dviṣāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:14982: tadā pṛthagjanasya grāmīṇasya tasya [mama] ca nāsti bhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:14990: na kṣametādhamaḥ sattvaḥ śilavṛṣṭiṃ yathā khagaḥ //
SA16hvsatssu:14992: kṣameta hi māhasattvaḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ yathā gajaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:14996: yogāvacara ime sattvā mūḍhā avijñā bālasamānā na vidveṣyā iti prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:15001: atyantasukhāsaktān dṛṣṭvā ca cintayati- kathamahaṃ parapraṇihitaṃ hāpayeyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15003: duḥkhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭadharme duḥkhitvāt duḥkhī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15004: sukhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā anitya[sukha]tvāt duḥkhī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15005: ataḥ sarve sattvā duḥkhabhāgina ādāvante vā na vimuktilābhina ityanena pratyayena karuṇāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15007: (u) yogāvacaraḥ parahiterṣyālutā pṛthagjanalakṣaṇamiti dṛṣṭvā muditāṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15018: (u) viṣamacitte doṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā cittasāmyacikīrṣayā upekṣāṃ carati /
SA16hvsatssu:15022: (pṛ) ābhidharmikāḥ kecidāhuḥ- tṛtīyadhyānādūrdhvaṃ nāsti saumanasyendriyam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15043: yaḥ sattvānāṃ sukhākāṃkṣī sa sukhavipākaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15046: ākāśe ca rūpaṃ nāstītyato vijñānānantyāyatanacittasyālambane paramasukhavihāritvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15058: bhagavānapramāṇasūtra āha- iha bhikṣurmaitrasahagatena cetasā ekāṃ diśaṃ[sphuritvā viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:15059: tathā] dvitīyāṃ tathā tṛtīyāṃ caturthī ityūrdhvamadhastiryak[sarvadā sarvatratāyai] sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ [maitrasahagatena cetasā] sphuritvā viharati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15060: rūpārūpyakadhātukasattvā anityā bhaṅgurā durgati gāmina ityasti hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15062: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- kāmadhātugato yogāvacara evāpramāṇānyupasampadya viharatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15065: (pṛ) yadi tanna jātā api upasampadya viharanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15071: (u) astīdṛśaṃ karma satyapi nivṛttihetau na nivartante /
SA16hvsatssu:15072: yathā kāma[dhātuka]devādayaḥ satyapi kuśalakarmaṇi durgatāvupapadyante / tathedamapi //
SA16hvsatssu:15078: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadi kaścidekāgracittena dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:15082: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- bhāvayatha bhikṣavo maitracittam, pratijānāmi anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpsyatheti /
SA16hvsatssu:15085: ata ucyate maitrī bhāvanayā anāgāmiphalaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15098: bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatkṣayāya vīryamārabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15100: ājñendriyeṇa sattvānāṃ [SSS_395] duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā [tat] apaneṣyāmīti niyamena cittoddhāpanaṃ mahākaruṇā /
SA16hvsatssu:15104: karuṇācittaṃ hi parasya pāpakaṃ smṛtvā pratighātamutpādayet /
SA16hvsatssu:15106: karuṇācittaṃ kadācit ghanaṃ, kadācit tanīyaḥ, na samaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15108: ātmano hitaṃ tyaktvā parasya hitamātramākāṃkṣata iti mahākaruṇā /
SA16hvsatssu:15114: uktaṃ hi sūtre- pañcāṅga[bhūtā] āryasamādhayaḥ yaduta prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaviśuddhiḥ prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvanālakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15120: prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvanālakṣaṇasya hetuṃ kṛtvā pañcaskandhān paribhedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15125: (u) bhagavān svayamāha- yogī cintayati mamāyaṃ samādhirāryo nirāmiṣa iti prathamajñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15127: samādhirayaṃ śāntaḥ praṇītaḥ prītipraśrabdhilabdha iti tṛtīyajñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15128: ayaṃ samādhiḥ pratyutpannasukha āyatyāñca sukhavipāka iti caturthajñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15129: sa khalu punarahamimaṃ samādhiṃ smṛta eva samāpadye smṛta eva vyuttiṣṭhāmīti pañcamaṃ jñānamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15135: samādhiṃ kṛtvā āryaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ chandayāmītīdaṃ prathamajñānamucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15146: tāpavinirmuktaṃ sukhaṃ pratyutpannasukhamāyatīsukham, pratyutpannaṃ sukhaṃ kleśavinirmuktaṃ sukham /
SA16hvsatssu:15150: ato nityaṃ smṛto vyuttiṣṭhati smṛtaḥ samādhimusampadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15156: (pṛ) uktaṃ sūtre- samādhayaḥ ṣaṭ aṣṭyekalakṣaṇabhāvanā ekalakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:15168: ekalakṣaṇā nānālakṣatvāya saṃvartata iti [SSS_397] yadi kaścit samādhimupādāya jñānadarśanamutpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15169: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇanānālakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartata iti yadi kaścit samādhimupādāya dhyānasamādhiṃ pañcaskandhopāya ñcotpādayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15172: kecidārmidharmikā āhuḥ- ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartata iti yadi kaścit caturthadhyānamupādāya arhatphalaṃ sākṣātkaroti tat /
SA16hvsatssu:15173: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā nānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit caturthadhyānamupādāya pañcābhijñāḥ sākṣātkaroti tat /
SA16hvsatssu:15174: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇanānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit caturthaṃ dhyānamupādāyārhatphalaṃ pañcābhijñāśca sākṣātkaroti tat /
SA16hvsatssu:15175: nānālakṣaṇā bhāvanā nānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit pañcāṅgabhūtasamādhīnupādāyārhatphalaṃ pañcābhijñāśca sākṣātkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:15192: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ yogī nirodhasamāpattāvatāramicchatītyato dhyāneṣu samāpatti (= praveśa)
SA16hvsatssu:15194: tasmānna syāt yadi vānulomyena yadi vā prātilomyena yadi vānulomyaprātilomyena vyutkramādiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15196: yogī nirodhasamāpattiṃ prāpayituravaśyaṃ kramaśo 'vataret kramaśaśca vyuttiṣṭhet /
SA16hvsatssu:15200: yathā ca vidagdho jano na punarabhiramate mūḍhe / tathedamapi syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15203: sūtre kevalamuktaṃ kramikā dhyānasamādhīnāṃ [SSS_398] samāpattaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15207: yathā kaścit śreṇimāruhya ekaṃ sopānaṃ vyutkramet na dvau /
SA16hvsatssu:15212: sūtre yadyapyuktaṃ bhagavatā nirvāṇaṃ samāpadyamāno 'nulomapratilomaṃ vyutkramya dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15217: yadi yogino nirodhasamāpattāvatāraṃ vadati tadānulomyena samāpattiḥ syāt naikakṣaṇe pañcadhā /
SA16hvsatssu:15218: yogī yadi sākṣānnirodhasamāpattyavatāramicchati tadā naikakṣaṇe syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15220: vaśitvāparihāṇitvāt anulomapratilomaṃ vyuttiṣṭhati samāpadyate vyutkrāmati ca /
SA16hvsatssu:15221: yathā kaścidaśvamārūḍho yadi pratibalaruddhaḥ, tadā nāvaśyaṃ pratinivartate /
SA16hvsatssu:15228: yaduktaṃ yathā na kaścit bālakrīḍāyāmabhiramata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15230: yathā kaścidvṛddho naṭaḥ sarvadā nṛtyati na tṛpto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15232: evamāryaḥ anulomapratilomaṃ dhyāneṣu vyuttiṣṭhati samāpadyate vyutkrāmati ca devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pradarśanakāmitvāt maharṣīṇāṃ samādhiṣu vaśitābalācca /
SA16hvsatssu:15233: bhagavān parinirvāṇagamanakāle paramapraṇītadhyānasamādhibhirvāsitaśarīratvāt svatantraṃ samāpadyata vyudatiṣṭhat anulomaṃ pratilomaṃ vyudakrāmīt /
SA16hvsatssu:15239: [tat] bodhisattvapiṭaka uktaṃ vyuktrāntilakṣaṇam- prathamadhyānāt vyutkramya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15245: śāstramāha- sapta niśrayāḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśrityāsravakṣayaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15251: samādhimimaṃ niśritya āsravāṇāṃ kṣayākhyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ prārthayīta /
SA16hvsatssu:15255: bhagavānāha- yogī yenākāreṇa yenālambanena prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate sa yogī tadākāraṃ tadālambanaṃ na punaḥ smarati /
SA16hvsatssu:15256: kintu paśyati prathamadhyāne yadrūpāṇi yadi vā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15260: yogī kāmadhātumohitaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ nirvāṇamiti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:15266: (u) uktaṃ hi susīmasūtre- atikramya sapta niśrayān asti āryamārgapratilambhanam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15268: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- prathamadhyānasāmantakamaprāptabhūmiṃ niśritya [api] arhatphalaṃ labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15281: kasmādāha bhagavān saptaniśrayāḥ sapta saṃjñāsamādhaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15283: sarve niśryāḥ saṃjñākaluṣitā na vimokṣāya bhavanti ityataḥ saṃjñāsamādhirityākhyā /
SA16hvsatssu:15284: āryāstu saṃjñāṃ bhaṅktvā samādhimimaṃ niśritya āsravāṇāṃ kṣayamupādadate /
SA16hvsatssu:15286: yathoktaṃ yogī dharmānimān paśyati rogato gaṇḍata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15290: śāstramāha- sūtra uktaṃ- aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ- adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati iti prathamo vimokṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15293: dvitīyavimokṣe hyuktam- adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15295: ato jñāyate yogāvacaraḥ prathamavimokṣe krameṇa kāyarūpamabhibhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15299: ato na paśyati adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā rūpañca /
SA16hvsatssu:15303: antarbahiśca no paśyan ahaṃ pṛcchāmi vastvidam // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15305: yathoktaṃ ṣaḍdhātusūtre- yo bhikṣavaḥ pañcasu dhātuṣu atyantanirviṇṇaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:15322: (u) tīrthikā vimokṣādhimuktyā rūpalakṣaṇaṃ vināśayanti na tu śūnyabhāvanayā /
SA16hvsatssu:15324: yathābhāvanādhimuktiprayogaṃ mṛtaparityaktaṃ kāyaṃ śmāśānikakṛmayo bhakṣayanti ityādi paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15328: āryāḥ punarārūpyasamādhimupādāya caturaḥ skandhān rogata ityādyaṣṭabhirākāraiḥ paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15337: na tu vivicya ayaṃ cittanirodhaḥ ayaṃ kleśakṣaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15338: yathoktaṃ sūtre- nirodho dvividhaḥ [kṣaya]nirodhaḥ anupūrvanirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15343: kiñcoktaṃ [SSS_402] sūtre nirodhasamāpattimupasampanno bhikṣuḥ kṛtakaraṇīya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15344: yadi nirodhasamāpattirnārhatphalam, tadā kṛtakaraṇīya iti nābhidadhyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15346: (u) sūtra uktaṃ śaikṣo navānupūrvasamādhīn labhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15348: yogāvacaro yadi kṣayanirodhaṃ pratilabdhvā na dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15350: yadi dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyate na kṣayanirodhaṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15358: (pṛ) anupūrva[vihāre]ṣu nirodho vimokṣeṣu nirodhaśca kiṃ nānā /
SA16hvsatssu:15371: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samāpannasya ākiñca nyāyatanasaṃjñā niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15372: nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannasya saṃjñā ca vedanā ca niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15374: eṣu nirodheṣu nirodho viśiṣṭo yaduta yogāvacaro rāgadveṣamohebhyo nirviṇṇo vimucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15375: (pṛ) kathaṃ jñāyate anupūrveṣu cittacaittānāṃ nirodhaḥ vimokṣeṣu kleśānāṃ nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15385: jñātavyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ sakṣātkurvataḥ sarve kleśā nirudhyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15393: kathaṃ sa kāyacittaśūnyatāṃ labhate kleśāṃśca kṣapayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15397: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mama bhikṣavaścīvaramupāditsoḥ kleśo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15404: kecidāhuḥ- catvāri dhyānāni catvāro 'rūpasamādhayaḥ sarve dhyānamityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:15407: samāpattiḥ dhyānavimokṣasamādhiṣu vaśitābalalābhaḥ yathāha- śāriputraḥ- saptabodhyaṅgeṣu samāpattiṃ vyutthānañca vaśīkaromi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15414: yadyupekṣācittaṃ nāsti tadāsamāpattiṃ samāpadyate iti nāsti dūṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:15415: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacaraścatura ṛddhipādān samyagabhyasan himavantaṃ parvatarājaṃ tathā dhamati yathā reṇuparyavasannaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15417: ato jñāyate aṣṭavimokṣeṣūcyate āsravakṣayanirodhaḥ na nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15418: uktañca sūtre- asti vidyāsvabhāvaḥ asti śūnyasvabhāvaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:15421: svabhāvaḥ astyākiñcanyāyatanasvabhāvaḥ asti naivasaṃjñāsaṃjñāyatanasvabhāvaḥ asti nirodhasvabhāvaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15429: pañcaskandhān prajñaptilakṣaṇān yo na paribhedayati tasyāvidyā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15432: yathā bhagavān ekaṃ bhikṣumanuśāsti- śūnyeṣu sarvasaṃskāreṣu saṃskārān śūnyān bhāvayitvā damaya svacittam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15433: yathā kaścitpradīpamādāya śūnyāgāraṃ praviśya paśyati sarvaṃ śūnyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15439: yogāvacara[ścintayati]- yatkiñcanamanaskāraḥ yatkiñcanakṛtakaraṇam sarveṣāṃ nirodhaḥ śreyāniti /
SA16hvsatssu:15441: (pṛ) ime svabhāvāḥ kaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya pratilabhyante /
SA16hvsatssu:15443: sūtra uktam- vidyāsvabhāvo yāvat naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasvabhāvaḥ sarvaṃ khayaṃ samādhisamāpattiviharaṇātpratilabhate yaduta saṃskṛtamārgaviharaṇātpratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15446: dvitīyasvabhāvo 'pi rūpopādāno rupamupādāya tathā vivecayati yathā śūnyaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15448: sarve saṃskṛtadharmāḥ śūnyā iti nirodhasamāpattyā nirodhaṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15450: ato jñāyate atrokto nirodhaḥ kṣayanirodho nirvāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15453: yogāvacaro rūpaparibhedecchayā kāmadhātupratilabdhaṃ samādhiṃ vā rūpadhātupratilabdhaṃ vā samādhiṃ niśrayamāṇo rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15455: (pṛ) eṣu vimokṣeṣu kati sāsravāḥ kati anāsravāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15460: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī [eko] bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni /
SA16hvsatssu:15464: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati adhimātrāṇi[suvarṇadurvarṇānīti vistaro yāvat] idaṃ dvitīya[mabhibhvāyatana]m /
SA16hvsatssu:15465: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni [suvarṇadurvarṇānīti yāvat] idaṃ tṛtīya[mabhibhvāyatana]m /
SA16hvsatssu:15466: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhī rūpāṇi paśyati adhimātrāṇi [suvarṇadurvarṇānīti yāvat] idaṃ [caturthamabhibhvāyatana]m /
SA16hvsatssu:15467_0: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanirbhāsāni tadyathā
SA16hvsatssu:15467_1: umakāpuṣpaṃ[sampannaṃ] vārāṇaseyaṃ vā vastraṃ[nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsam /
SA16hvsatssu:15475: na kevalaṃ santīmāni nīlādīni catvāri rūpāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:15484: (u) pūrvaṃ sāsravāṇi santi śūnyatayā rūpāṇāṃ paribhede 'nāsravāṇi bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15487: ato bhagavān śrāvakāṇāṃ kṛta āha- abhibhvāyatanamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15491: navānupūrvavihārāḥ- catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ nirodhasamāpattiśca /
SA16hvsatssu:15492_0: prathamaṃ dhyānam- yathoktaṃ sūtre yogāvacaro vivicyaiva kāmairvivicyākuśalai [SSS_406]
SA16hvsatssu:15492_1: dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15497: na hi kaściccakṣuṣā rūpaṃ na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:15504: yathoktam- rūpādayaḥ padārthā na kāmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15506: vyavasāyī khalu rūpādiṣu sthitvaiva kāmaṃ prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:15507: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpādayastadbhāgā na kāmā bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15509: yasya rāgacittaṃ bhavati sa kāmān paryeṣate /
SA16hvsatssu:15511: yathoktaṃ mahānidānasūtre- tṛṣṇāṃ pratītya paryeṣaṇā ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:15517: yathoktaṃ sūtre- savitarka savicāraṃ vihāraṃ viharāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15520: yadā samādhipariniṣpattyā cittaṃ na bhūyasā vikṣipati tadā vicāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15523: prītiriyaṃ prathamalabdhā kāyaṃ sukhayatīti sukhaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15528: tadā na syāt pañcāṅgaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam /
SA16hvsatssu:15530: uktañca sūtre- prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ savitarkaṃ savicāram /
SA16hvsatssu:15532: yadi prītireva sukham, tadā saptasambodhyaṅgeṣu prasrabdhibodhyaṅgaṃ na pṛthaguktaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15537: prathamaṃ dhyānamapi pañcakāma[guṇā]nāṃ pratyāsannamiti [te] aṅgāni vaktavyāni syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15547: [tato] vyāvartane punassamādhinimittamupādāya tatrālambane cittaṃ samādhāya maulikaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:15557: yathā śiṣyeṇa saha gacchatīti kiñcidviprarṣe 'pi sahetyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15559: yathā bhūtapīḍitaḥ puruṣo [bhūta] anudgrame 'pi pīḍita ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15564: yathoktaṃ sūtre- praśrabdhakāyaḥ sukhaṃ vedayata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15565: (pṛ) tathā cet kathaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ pañcāṅgamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15567: yathā saptabodhyaṅgāni kālābhisandhiṃ labdhvā caturdaśa bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15576: prītau jātamātrāyāṃ kāyacitte aduṣṭhule sukumāre dānte ca bhavata ityataḥ praśrabdhirityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15578: arogiṇaścaturmahābhūtānāmudayaḥ tadā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sukhīti nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:15581: yathoktaṃ sūtre- saṃskārāṇāmanupūrvanirodhaḥ- tathāhi- prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpannasya vāk niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15582: yāvannirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannasya saṃjñā vedanā ca niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15585: yadi mataṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ vitarkavicārasamprayuktamiti tadapi na yuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:15587: uktaṃ hi sūtre- yadi yogāvacaraḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15588: tadā vāk niruddhā bhavati iti vitarkavicārau ca vāco hetuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15589: kathaṃ vāco heturasti, vāk ca niruddhā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15597: ato jñāyate prathamadhyāne vitarkavicārau syātām iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15600: uktañca sūtre- prathamadhyānasya śabdaḥ kaṇṭaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15603: (u) prathamadhyāne samādhigataṃ cittaṃ kusume salilavat peśalam /
SA16hvsatssu:15614: [punaśca yogāvacaraḥ] vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamāt adhyātmaṃ samprasādanaṃ cetasa ekotibhāvamavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyadhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:15619: (u) yathā prathamadhyāne duḥkhendriye 'satyapi dvitīyadhyāne duḥkhendriyavyupaśama ucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15623: (u) prathamadhyāne santyapi vijñānāni na duḥkhendriyasyāśrayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15626: (u) tathā ce ddaurmanasyendriyaṃ manovijñānasvabhāvajamiti sarvatra bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:15640: ucyate ca duḥkhasya sukhasya ca prahāṇāt caturthadhyānamupasampadya viharatīti / tathedamapi / tathedamapi /
SA16hvsatssu:15641: yogāvacaraḥ prathamadhyāne 'paripūrṇasamādhiḥ sadā vitarkavicārābhyāṃ vikṣipyata ityata ucyate dvitīdhyāne vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśama iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15647: cetasa ekotibhāvaścetasa [SSS_410] ekasmin mārge viharaṇaṃ dhyānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15680: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yasmin samaye yogāvacaro dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
SA16hvsatssu:15681: asya pañca nīvaraṇāni tasmin samaye na bhavanti,
SA16hvsatssu:15682: saptabodhyaṅgāni ca tasmin samaye bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15687: pūrvaṃ prītau samutpannāyāṃ paścādanāsravaṃ yadyathābhūtadarśanaṃ pratilabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15688: na ca sarvāḥ praśrabdhayaḥ prītiṃ pratītya bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:15689: yathā dvitīyadhyāne [SSS_411] prītirnāsti, asti ca praśrabdhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15690: na vayaṃ brūmo jñānavinirmukto 'sti pṛthagvedanādharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15696: bhagavān sadopekṣācitte viharatītyata āha- asti bhagavataḥ prītiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:15704: (pṛ) yathā dvitīyadhyāye 'sti prītiḥ nāsti tu daurmanasyam /
SA16hvsatssu:15707: (u) sarveṣu dhyānasamādhiṣu asti daurmanasyaṃ yathā indriyārtheṣūcyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15713: anāsrave citte ca prīti rna bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:15716: uktaṃ hi sūtre- prathamadvitīyadhyānayoḥ kevalaṃ prītirasti na caitasikaṃ sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15723: kintu paśyati prathamadhyānagatāni rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni rogato gaṇḍato yāvadanātmataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15724: (pṛ) rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghata ityetāni catvāri lokacaritāni nānāsravāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:15725: ata idaṃ sūtraṃ pramāṇīkṛtya nānāsravaṃ sādhayituṃ śaknoṣi /
SA16hvsatssu:15732: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- prītisukhacittena catvāri satyāni pratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15738: kiñca tatsūtraṃ prakāśayati na prītyā paramārthajñānaṃ pratilabhata iti / ata evamucyate //
SA16hvsatssu:15741: prītyāśca virāgādupekṣako viharati smṛtaḥ samprajānan sukhañca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate yadāryā ācakṣante upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārīti tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:15747: yogāvacaraḥ śāntaṃ tṛtīyadhyānaṃ labhamāno dvitīyadhyānaṃ prajahāti /
SA16hvsatssu:15750: yathā kaścit putrabhāryādibhiḥ sadā na prīto bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15753: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi prītiṃ prathamata āgatāṃ tu sukhaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15755: (pṛ) yadi kaściddharmapīḍitaḥ, sa tu śītaṃ sukhaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15756: yogāvacaraḥ kena duḥkhena pīḍitaḥ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ sukhaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:15759: yogāvacaro 'nayā prītyā pīḍita iti aprītisamādhau sukhasaṃjñāṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:15768: yathā bhagavān kauśāmbibhikṣuvivikta āha- ahaṃ sukhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:15786: ataḥ sukhañca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata iti nāma /
SA16hvsatssu:15792: puruṣo 'yaṃ prajñāyopekṣate yat prītāvādīnavaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvidyata ityataḥ sūpekṣāṃ labhate /
SA16hvsatssu:15800: (u) nāhamasmin śāstre vadāmi vedanāvyatiriktaṃ pṛthagasti upekṣāsukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:15818: sukhasya ca duḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva saumanasyadaurmanasyānāmastaṅgamādaduḥkhamasukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:15829: sukhasya duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt cittaṃ neñjate /
SA16hvsatssu:15843: caturthadhyānaṃ prāpya sukharāgasya prahāṇāt smṛtiḥ pariśuddhā /
SA16hvsatssu:15854: yadi kasyacit samādhirasiddhā, [tasya] saṃjñāmādāya smṛtiḥ sādhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:15861: (u) tathā cet aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā nānāsravā syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15869: atra kāmadoṣo 'tisūkṣmaḥ duravabodhaḥ ato 'vaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:15876: yadā cittaṃ sūkṣmaṃ, tadā śvāso 'pi sūkṣmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15879: parvataṃ vā ārohati tadāśvāsaḥ sthūlo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15892: uktaṃ hi sūtre- sukhavedanāyāṃ tṛṣṇānuśaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15904: sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānāmastaṅgamāt nānātvasaṃjñānāmamanaskārā danantam ākāśam ityākāśānantyāyatanamupasampadya viharati /
SA16hvsatssu:15909: etāḥ saṃjñā vividhakleśānāṃ vividhakarmaṇāṃ vividhaduḥkhānāṃ hetavaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15913: tatra saṃkṣepānnoktam asya samatikramādasya nirodha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15914: kecidāhuḥ- sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñeti cakṣurvijñānāśritā saṃjñā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15920: pratighasaṃjñā nirudhyata iti vadato rūpaṃ saṅgrahītameva /
SA16hvsatssu:15922: rūpasaṃjñāṃ pratighasaṃjñāñca vinā nāsti pṛthaṅmanovijñānāśritaṃ rūpam /
SA16hvsatssu:15929: kiñcāyaṃ kāyo maraṇavipannaḥ smaśānāgninā dagdhaḥ praṇaśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:15930: ato jñāyate kāyo 'yaṃ pūrvaṃ sākāśa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15932: (u) ādita ākāśālambanaḥ svīyaskandhālambanaḥ parakīyaskandhālambanaśca siddho bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:15934: karuṇāśīrṣaka evaṃ cintayati- sattvā dayanīyā rūpasaṃjñāpīḍitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15940: rūpe tu cittaṃ na suprabuddhaṃ nābhiraktaṃ nābhyāsaktam /
SA16hvsatssu:15941: yathoktaṃ sūtre- āryaḥ pañcakāmaguṇān dṛṣṭvā saṃsmaran na tatrābhinandati na prabodhayati nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:15946: yathā ca yogāvacaro rūpasaṃjñāvivikto 'pi ākāśāntena caturthadhyānamavalambate /
SA16hvsatssu:15965: (pṛ) asti punaḥ sūtravacanam- ālokaṃ pratītyākāśaṃ jānīma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:15966: na rūpaṃ vihāyāstyanyo dharma ālokaṃ pratītya jñāpyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:15969: ata ālokaṃ pratītya rūpābhāvo jñāyate / natvākāśamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:15992: (u) ākāśaṃ na pratyakṣadṛśyamiti pūrvameva dūṣitatvāt- yat tamasyapi jñāpyamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:15997: (pṛ) uktañca sūtre- ṣaḍ dhāturayaṃ puruṣakāya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16001: (u) yo vastusan dharmaḥ sa sarvaḥ pratiṣṭhito bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16007: rūpe rūpaṃ pratihanyate rūpamasati viruddharūpe vivardhate /
