SA16hvsatssu:16630: śūnyānātmajñānalābhino yaccittaṃ bhavati saṃskṛtadharmāḥ sarve viheṭhanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16636: na hi duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayitā kāmaprītiṃ sevate /
SA16hvsatssu:16640: dharmā anityā anātmakā api na duḥkhajanakāḥ tadā naiva tyājyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16643: sarve sattvā atitarāṃ bhītā bhavanti yadidaṃ duḥkhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:16644: yadi taruṇo vṛddho vā pāmaraḥ paṇḍito vā āḍhyo daridro vā jānāti idaṃ duḥkhalakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:16646: sarve yogacāriṇaḥ puruṣā nirvāṇe śāntopaśamasaṃjñotpādakā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16653: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat rūpaṇamanityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharma, ayaṃ rūpasyādīnava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16658: ato bhagavānāha- ye duḥkhaṃ budhyanti teṣāmahaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ vyākaromi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16664: anayā saṃjñayā ca sarvasattvānāṃ saṃsāre yātāyātānāṃ mānasaṃ kliśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:16668: yathā putramāṃsakhādanam, yathā vā niścarmagobhakṣaṇam, yathā aṅgārakarṣubhakṣaṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:16672: duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayato mano na catasṛṣu vijñānasthitiṣu sukhaṃ viharati sarvatra duḥkhadarśitvāt /
SA16hvsatssu:16673: yathā mugdhāḥ śalabhāḥ sukhasaṃjñayā pradīpe patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16685: yogī sarve dharma bhaṅgavipariṇāmalakṣaṇā iti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:16686: yasmin rūpe āttmatayābhiniviśate idaṃ rūpaṃ vipariṇāmadharma /
SA16hvsatssu:16689: yathā kaścit girinirjharānuvāhito yatkiñcidavalambya tadvihāya mucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16695: pṛthagjanā ātmasaṃjñayā paramārthato duḥkhe na duḥkhaṃ paśyanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16696: anātmasaṃjñayā tu atyalpe 'pi duḥkhe tadupaghātaṃ budhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16700: yadi paramārthaṃ [SSS_436] jānāti tadā hāyapati duḥkhamanātmakaṃ vināśyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:16706: tadā ātmā na bhavet, ātmīyamapi na bhavet, sadā duḥkhamevāsti iti vadet /
SA16hvsatssu:16707: nāstyātmātmīyamiti cintayato dharmeṣu vinaṣṭheṣu na duḥkhamutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16711: idaṃ vastu ātmano hitamityataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16714: ahamāyuṣo 'nte kariṣyāmi na kariṣyāmiti dṛṣṭivicikitsā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16718: cittaviśuddhyā ca kāñcanaṃ loṣṭaṃ candanamasidhārāṃ praśaṃsāṃ nindāñca samaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16733: svakāye puruṣasaṃjñāṃ parakāye ca strīsaṃjñāmutpādya [tatra] abhiniviśate /
SA16hvsatssu:16745: kāmadhātau yāni santi duḥkhāni sarvāṇi tāni annapāna maithunarāgaṃ pratītya bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16748: yathā kalpādau sattvāḥ svargādāgatya loke 'smin upapādukā abhūvan /
SA16hvsatssu:16751: evaṃ krameṇa jarāvyādhimaraṇaśālinaḥ yāvadvatsaraśataṃ bhūyasā duḥkhaiḥ pīḍitāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16752: āhārābhiniveśavaśāt sarve te tādṛśemyaḥ phalemyaḥ praṇaṣṭāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16756: tebhyo 'kuśalaṃ karma kurvanti akuśalakarmataḥ trīn doṣān vardhayitvā devamanuṣyāṇāmapakurvanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16757: tasmāt sarvāḥ kleśavipattaya āhārakāmāt bhavanti jarāvyādhimaraṇalakṣaṇāni annapānādhīnāni /
SA16hvsatssu:16761: yadi vā bālo vṛddho gṛhasthaḥ pravrajito vā anāhārapīḍito bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16771: ye samucchinnāhārāḥ teṣāṃ kleśā na kṣīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:16773: ato bhagavānāha- āhāre 'smin pratikūlasaṃjñāṃ janayet, nāsti tato 'vadyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:16779: dantena carvitaṃ lālayā siktaṃ liṅgaṃ vāntavadāmāśayapatitaṃ kāyasya hitakaram /
SA16hvsatssu:16782: yadi kaścinmadhuramāhāraṃ labhamāno 'pi punarvāntaṃ na bhunakti /
SA16hvsatssu:16789: yathoktaṃ karmavarge- yastarṣito mriyate sa jalakrimibhāvenotpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16799: yogī paśyati lokeṣu sarvaṃ duḥkham, citte ca nāsti kiñcitsukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:16800: ayañca yogī bhāvayati prītiviviktaṃ samādhiṃ tadyathā anātmasaṃjñāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñāmāhāre pratikūlasaṃjñāṃ maraṇasaṃjñām /
SA16hvsatssu:16803: api cāyaṃ paśyati- yatpriyaṃ tatkāmarāgavardhanam, yadvipriyaṃ tat dveṣapratighavardhanamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:16809: pratyutpanno dhaniko 'vaśyaṃ patiṣyāmi, idañca kāmādīnāṃ vihṛtisthānamiti prajānāno dṛśyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16810: pratyutpanno daridro na pratyayopalabhyanirgama iti prajānānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16812: alpatarāśca sattvāḥ susthāna utpannāḥ, bahutarā durgatau patanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16813: yathoktaṃ sūtre- alpatarāḥ susthāna utpadyante bahutarā dusthāna utpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:16816: puruṣo 'yaṃ paśyati kāmādayo doṣāḥ kleśāssadā santānamanuvartanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16821: sa cettu pāpakaṃ karma kariṣyati karoṣi vā /
SA16hvsatssu:16822: na te duḥkhātpramoko 'sti, utpātyāpi palāyataḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16828: tadyathā āśīviṣakaraṇḍaḥ pañcokṣiptāsikā vadhakāḥ śūnye grāme coraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16831: tadyathā lavaṇatiktatṛṣṇānadīvāhitaḥ pañcakāmaguṇaviṣaśalya [viddhaḥ] avidyāndhakārāṅgārakarṣau [patitastādṛśāni] duḥkhāni sattvānanuvartante /
SA16hvsatssu:16835: [yasmāt] pratidīnaṃ lokaistūyamānā vanaṣaṇḍaprasūtasphītaphalasamṛddhiśālino ['pi] bhūpā na dīrghakālasukhalābhino dṛśyante /
SA16hvsatssu:16841: tāṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayatā kṣipraṃ mokṣo labhyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16845: asya ca citte na kleśā udbhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:16854: (u) yogī paśyati kāyasya bījamaśubhaṃ yaduta mātāpitoraśucimārgajaśukraśoṇitasaṅghātaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16856: upapattisthānañcāśuci yaduta mātuḥ kukṣau paripūrṇamaśuci bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16860: annaṃ pānaṃ vastraṃ puruṣakāyagataṃ parīhitaṃ sarvaṃmaśuci bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16873: aśucilūkṣāmakṣikāmaśakādayaḥ sarvā aśucikrimayaḥ sarvadāgatya kāyaṃ spṛśantītyaścāśuciḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16885: asmin kāye tu śatasahasradhā krimayaḥ sadā jāyante mriyante ca /
SA16hvsatssu:16894: surabhikusumagandhamālālaṅkṛto 'yaṃ kāyaḥ iti veditavyaṃ kāyo 'yaṃ svabhāvato 'śuciriti /
SA16hvsatssu:16909: samantato 'yaṃ kāyaḥ sadā aśuci nissārayati yaduta navarandhrāṇi aśucidvārāṇi romakūpeṣu ca naikamasti śuci /
SA16hvsatssu:16916: ayaṃ hi kāyo durgandhamalairaśuciścarmāvṛtatvātparaṃ na jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:16926: yathoktaṃ sūtre- asti vṛkṣe viśuddhatā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16929: evaṃ vinīlakalohitakādilakṣaṇaṃ dīrghakālaṃ bhāvayato 'śubha[saṃjñā] sampūrṇā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16942: maraṇasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayataḥ svasya hitaṃ bhavati yaduta cittaikāgryeṇa kuśaladharmāṇāmupacayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16943: [SSS_442] laukikāḥ sattvā bhūyasā parihitābhiratā svahitaṃ tyajantyeva /
SA16hvsatssu:16946: ājavañjavamanughāvatāṃ hi lokānāṃ sadā maraṇaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:16956: mṛṇmayo 'yaṃ ghaṭo yadi [samyak] prayogapālitaḥ kadācit ciraṃ tiṣṭhet /
SA16hvsatssu:16957: ayaṃ kāyastu ciratamaṃ tiṣṭhamāno na vatsaraśatamatikrāmati /
SA16hvsatssu:16960: saṃkṣepataḥ sarve sattvā asattvāśca kāyasya paripanthino dharmā draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:16962: kiñca yogī paśyati kāyaḥ kṣaṇikanityo vipariṇāmalakṣaṇo naikaṃ kṣaṇamapyārakṣya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16964: yogī dṛṣṭadharme ca paśyati bālyayauvanavārdhakyāni savyādhīni nirvyādhīni vā na maraṇaparihārīṇīti /
SA16hvsatssu:16975: na sāntvavacanenollāpanīyaṃ dhanenānuneyaṃ vigraheṇa vā mocanīyam /
SA16hvsatssu:16976: yathā mahati śaile caturbhyo digbhya āgate nāsti palāyanasthānam /
SA16hvsatssu:16981: kevalaṃ parāmṛśati kiṃ kuśalacārī kiṃ vākuśalacārīti /
SA16hvsatssu:16983: ato yogī kāyo 'niśrayo 'śaraṇo maraṇavartmagata iti paśyan maraṇasaṃjñāmanusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:16984: kiñca yogī sadā paśyati kāyo 'yaṃ jarāvyādhiparipīḍito 'dhruvasvabhāvaḥ pratikṣaṇamutpannavināśī [SSS_443] vijñānasantānavinaṣṭa ityato maraṇasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:16985: kiñcāyaṃ yogī paśyati maraṇaṃ niyataṃ jīvitamaniyatam /
SA16hvsatssu:16995: uktañca sūtre- maraṇaṃ nāma mahātāmastram araśmikamarakṣaṇam asahāyakamanupasthāpakaṃ paramabhayasthānaṃ iti /
SA16hvsatssu:16998: traidhātuke sarvasyāsti maraṇaṃ na tathā jarā vyādhiśca /
SA16hvsatssu:17012: yathā caturṣu samyakpradhāneṣūktam- utpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya [chandaṃ janayati vyāyamati]vīryamārabhate /
SA16hvsatssu:17014: ime ca pāpakā akuśalā dharmā narakādiduḥkhakleśānāṃ pratyayāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17021: (pṛ) imāṃ prahāṇasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayan kiṃ hitaṃ vidante /
SA16hvsatssu:17022: (u) tāṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayan sadā na pāpakān dharmānanuvartate /
SA16hvsatssu:17026: kleśaprahāṇābhirati dharmacī varasaṃvṛtaliṅgasya pravrajitasya hitam tayā nocet svakāyameva manyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:17027: yadi yogī prahāṇasaṃjñābhāvanāyāmabhirataḥ, tadā buddhe dharmapūjāṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:17035: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kāmarāgasya prahāṇāt pañcaskandhāḥ prahīyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17038: tasmin samaye nāsti kāmaḥ, tasya dharmasya prahāṇaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17043: uktañca sūtre- trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ prahāṇasvabhāvo virāgasvabhāvo nirodhasvabhāva iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17044: yaducyate prahāṇasvabhāvo virāgasvabhāva iti tadarhata eva bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17046: yaducyate nirodhasvabhāva iti tadāyuṣo 'nte jīvitavyapagame prahīṇasantānasya /
SA16hvsatssu:17049: yadabhihitaṃ prahāṇamiti tat avidyāṃ prajahātīti prajñā vimucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17050: yadvirāga iti tat tṛṣṇāṃ vivarjayatīti ceto vimucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17057: yo 'nityasaṃjñāṃ [SSS_445] yāvannirodhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati sa kṛtasarvakṛtyo niruddhasarvakleśaḥ prahīṇaskandhasaṃyojanasantatirnirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇaṃ samāpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17060: (pṛ) pūrvamuktaṃ bhavatā- mārgasatyaṃ [dvividhaṃ] yat samādhiḥ tatpariṣkāraśceti /
SA16hvsatssu:17063: yasmāt sati samādhipariṣkāre samādhiḥ sidhyati na tvasati /
SA16hvsatssu:17079: mṛṣāvāda piśunavācā paruṣavācā sampralāpa itīme catvāri vācikakarmāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:17083: tathā hi tadyathā suvarṇakāraḥ pūrvaṃ sthūlamalamapanayati /
SA16hvsatssu:17088: yathoktaṃ sūtre- śīle mārgasya mūlaṃ [SSS_446] sopānañceti /
SA16hvsatssu:17092: imāṃ samāṃ bhūmiṃ vyavasthāpya catvāri satyāni paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17098: pūrva śīlabhedāpattiṃ śīlasamādānahitañca pratisaṃkhyayā vicārya śīlaṃ samādatte /
SA16hvsatssu:17106: tathā kleśavyādhicikitsāyā asati śīle na sampadyata auṣadham /
SA16hvsatssu:17111: asti ca karmāvaraṇaṃ, kleśāvaraṇaṃ, anayordvayoḥ phalaṃ vipākāvaraṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:17114: pariśuddhaśīlo na vikṣipatītyato niyamena nirvāṇamadhigacchati gaṅgāsrotasi dāruskandhavat /
SA16hvsatssu:17124: yathā pārarahite kṣetre jalaṃ na tiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:17134: tathāgatamārgārthī mahākaruṇācittena sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte na śīlalakṣaṇaṃ samādatte /
SA16hvsatssu:17138: uktaṃ hi sūtre- dvau khalvāyuṣman pratyayau samyakdṛṣṭerutpādāya parato ghoṣo yoniśo manaskāra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17142: uktaṃ hi sūtre- [anyataro] 'rhan bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati sma ekānte niṣaṇṇasya mama evamabhavat- abhisambodhisampadā tu mārgapratilābhasya vikalaḥ pratyaya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17144: maivaṃ vocaḥ yābhisaṃbodhiḥ sā tu mārgasya pratilābhasya sakalaḥ pratyayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17146: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇāḥ sattvā ātmano 'bhisambodhiṃ labhamānā hi jātijarāvyādhimaraṇebhyo vimucyante iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17148: tadyathā sālavṛkṣo himavantamupādāya pañca vastūni vardhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:17155: tadaiva smṛtirudapādi pratilabdho mayā dharmaḥ yamupādāyābhisambuddhaḥ tameva dharmamupaniśrayiṣya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17156: brahmādayo deva api prāśaṃsan nāsti kaścit buddhādviśiṣṭaḥ, sarve buddhāḥ saddharmagurukā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17158: [SSS_448] yathā kaścit sacakṣuṣko 'pi pradīpaṃ vinā na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:17159: tathā yoginaḥ puṇyaguṇatīkṣṇendriyatāpratyaye satyapi abhisambodhiṃ vinā na bhavati kaścanopakāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17162: sarve ca sajjanāḥ saddharme pratitiṣṭhanti [iti sā] sarvā devamanuṣyalokeṣvabhisambodhiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17170: indriyāṇāmagopane nimittodgrahaṇāt kleśāḥ pañcendriyāṇi strotovat pravartayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:17172: ya indriyeṣu guptadvāro bhavati tasya śīlādayaḥ sudṛḍhā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:17178: yaḥ saddharmāduparamate tasya mārgo na bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17180: yadi kaścit kuśalasya bhāvanāyai na bhunakti /
SA16hvsatssu:17189: (u) yat bhojanaṃ śītoṣṇādi vyādhiṃ kāmakrodhādyādhiñca na vardhayati /
SA16hvsatssu:17192: bhojanamidamasmin kāle śītoṣṇakāmakrodhādhivyādhiṃ vardhayatīti prajānan na bhuñjyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:17193: (pṛ) tīrthikā vadanti- yaḥ pariśuddhamāhāraṃ bhuṅkte sa pariśuddhaṃ puṇyaṃ vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:17194: yat yatheṣṭhamabhimatarūparasagandhasparśavat approkṣitamabhinimantritaṃ bhuñjyate tat pariśuddhamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17207: āhāraḥ pūrvamevāśuciḥ paścādapi kāyaṃ praviṣṭo naikadhāśucirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:17212: prāṇātipātādviratiradattādānādviratirmithyā jīvādviratirityādinā anurūpamāhāraṃ labdhvā āhāre ca pratikūlasaṃjñāṃ dṛṣṭvā prajñājalaprokṣitamatha tāvadbhuṅkte /
SA16hvsatssu:17216: paśyati na middhaṃ vṛthā, nānena kiñcillabhyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17221: kathaṃ kaścit loke corāṇāṃ raṇabhūmau nidrāsyati / ato na nidrāti / ato na nidrāti /
SA16hvsatssu:17226: kiñca yogī paśyati- manuṣyakāyo labdhaḥ samagrāṇīndriyāṇi,
SA16hvsatssu:17236_0: yadi kaścidanidrannapi akuśalavitarkānutpādayati yaduta kāmavitarko vyāpādavitarko
SA16hvsatssu:17236_1: vihiṃsāvitarko jātivitarko janapadavitarko 'maraṇavitarkaḥ parānugrahavitarkaḥ parāvamanyanāvitarka ityādayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17240: yat kāmaṃ niśritya pañcakāmaguṇeṣūtpannavitarkaḥ paśyati hitaṃ sukhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:17258: yathoktaṃ sūtre- ayaṃ valmīko rātrau dhūmāyati /
SA16hvsatssu:17260: [yatkhalu bhikṣo divā karmāntānārabhya rātrā]vanuvitarkayati [anuvicārayati] idaṃ [rātrau] dhūmāyanam /
SA16hvsatssu:17261: [yatkhalu bhikṣo rātrāvanuvitarkayitvā divā] karmāntān [prayojayati kāyena vācā manasā /
SA16hvsatssu:17279: yoginā smartavyaṃ sarveṣu sattveṣu jananamaraṇapravāhapravṛtteṣu nāsti jñātirajñātiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17290: yogī [kaścit] cintayati- amuko janapadaḥ sukhaḥ kṣemaḥ śivaḥ,
SA16hvsatssu:17291: tatra gatvā nibhṛtaṃ sukhaṃ lapsya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:17300: evamādayo vividhā doṣāḥ santītyato na cintayet /
SA16hvsatssu:17302: yatrābhirataḥ kuśaladharmaṃ vardhayati ayaṃ ramaṇīya ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:17304: sarvo janapado dūrata eva śrāvyo nāvaśyaṃ gatvā ślāghanīyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:17308: duḥkhahetumimaṃ kāyaṃ dhṛtvā yatra yatra gacchati tatra tatra duḥkhānyanubhavati /

SA16hvsatssu:18550: laukikā bhūyasā tucchakaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ subhamityādi dṛṣṭvā tattvajñānādbhaṣṭā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:18551: yaḥ paramārthataḥ śūnyamanātma ityādi paśyati, sa tattvajñānī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18553: āha ca bhagavān sūtre- yasya dhanaṃ vinaṣṭhaṃ, tasyālpīyān lābho vinaṣṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:18554: yasya prajñā vinaṣṭā, tasya mahīyān lābho vinaṣṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18557: āhaca- pradyotānāṃ candrasūryapradyota alpīyān prajñāpradyoto 'gra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18558: yadi prajñā na tattva[jñānaṃ], kasmādevaṃ vadet /
SA16hvsatssu:18566: ato jñāyate prajñā vastutaḥ paramārthālambanā bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:18577: uktaṃ hi sūtre- kiṃ vijānāti vijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:18582: ato laukikaṃ cittaṃ prajñaptimātramālambate na tattvamiti bhavadvacanamayuktam /
SA16hvsatssu:18585: kiñcāha bhagavān- dve samyak dṛṣṭī laukikī lokottareti /
SA16hvsatssu:18586: puṇyapāpādyastitva [samyak dṛṣṭi]laukikī yadāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgānālambya anāsravasmṛtyā samprayuktā prajñā lokottarā / uktañca gāthāyām-
SA16hvsatssu:18588: adhvanāṃ śatasāhasraṃ na yāvaddurgatau gataḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18589: uktañca sūtre- mithyācāriṇaḥ susthāne janma bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18596: āha ca bhagavān- trividhā prajñā śrutamayī prajñā, cintāmayī prajñā, bhāvanāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:18601: āha ca pañcadharmā aparipavkaṃ vimukticittaṃ vipācayanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18608: bhagavān svayamāha- dharmajñānamanvayajñāna paracittajñānañca laukikaṃ jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:18610: api cāha- dharmāṇāṃ sthitijñānaṃ nirvāṇajñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18615: (pṛ) yo dharmo bhave pātakaḥ sa sāsravaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:18621: yadbhavatoktam- asti laukikaṃ cittamaprajñaptyavalambanaṃ yadviṣayādīnāṃ vijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:18624: āha khalu bhagavān- pṛthagjanāḥ satataṃ prajñaptimanudhāvantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:18626: sarvapṛthagjanacittaṃ prajñaptiṃ na paryādātītyataḥ sadā asmitālakṣaṇamanudhāvati /
SA16hvsatssu:18631: ato jñāyate sarvaṃ laukikaṃ cittaṃ prajñaptimavalambata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18632: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- laukikī prajñā yaduta dvidhā samyagdṛṣṭirityādi iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18633: tatredaṃ prativaktavyam- asti cittadvaividhyaṃ mohacittaṃ jñānacittamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:18639: idaṃ pṛthagjanacittaṃ sadā prajñaptigataṃ sat prajñaptimavalambate /
SA16hvsatssu:18642: idānīṃ yadi sarvaṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ prajñaptimavalambate /
SA16hvsatssu:18653: santi trayo vādāḥ- (1) dṛṣṭijaḥ, (2) mānajaḥ, (3) kriyārthaja iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18655: pṛthagjanā yadvadanti ghaṭa iti pudgala iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18657: śaikṣā ātmadṛṣṭivihīnā api samyaksmṛtipramoṣat pañcasu skandheṣu asmimānalakṣaṇena vadanti- ayaṃ pudgalaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18660: yathā mahākāśyapaḥ saṅghāṭiṃ dṛṣṭvā āha- iyaṃ mameti [yat] divyarddhau vicikitsāṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:18661: bhagavān tadvivṛṇvannāha- ayamatyantasamuddhatamānendriyaḥ pradagdhahetupratyayaḥ kathaṃ sābhimānaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:18665: dve samyagdṛṣṭī ityādī sūtraṃ kathaṃ neyam /
SA16hvsatssu:18667: bhagavān dharmāṇāṃ tattvalakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī vineyasattvānanusṛtya vividhaṃ nāma sthāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:18670: api cāha anityādisaṃjñā bhāvitā sarvān kleśān paribhedayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:18671: āha ca- caturthamakṛṣṇamaśuklaṃ karma sarvakarmāṇi śaikṣacetanākhyāni kṣapayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:18672: kiñcāha- manasā sarvānabhiviveśān prajahātīti / āha ca-
SA16hvsatssu:18682: vaktavyā ca dvividhā saṃjñā lokaṃ pratītya satyaṃ, paramārthaṃ pratītya satyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:18685: kācit mohakāṣṭhātmikā saṃjñā yāvat laukikakuśalākuśalāni na vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:18689: itīyaṃ saṃjñā skandhalakṣaṇaparibhedakaṃ jñānamanukūlayatītyato bhagavānupadiśati jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:18690: iyañca saṃjñā tattvajñānasya hetuṃ karotītyato jñānami tyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18697: saptāsravasūtre ca vacanaprahāṇavṛttiprahāṇādaya āsravahetava āsravā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:18699: api cāhuḥ- annavasrādīni bāhyajīvitam, yat parasvāpaharaṇaṃ tadeva parajīvitāpaharaṇam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18702: (pṛ) smṛtyupasthāneṣu uṣmādiṣu ca gataṃ cittaṃ tattvadharmamālambate /
SA16hvsatssu:18705: ato yatra prajñaptividhamanaṃ cittaṃ tadanu samāgataṃ cittamanāsravaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18711: anātmasaṃjñayā cittaṃ bhāvayatāṃ kṣipraṃ rāgadveṣamohebhyo vimucyate ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:18713: anātmasaṃjñayā hi cittaṃ bhāvayatāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñā pratitiṣṭhati /
SA16hvsatssu:18715: ato yo dharmo 'nityo 'nātmā, sa duḥkho 'pi iti prajānan akuśalānnirvidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18723: (u) sūtra uktam- anityasaṃjñābhāvitaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ cittamanātmasaṃjñāyāṃ pratitiṣṭhati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18727: ātmavādī hi paralokasādhanāyāha- ātmā nitya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18728: ataḥ pañcaskandhā anityā iti paśyan anātmāna iti prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:18733: ātmā ma utpadyate vyeti cetyasyāgataṃ bhavati / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18751: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā vāśījaṭopamasūtre- jānataḥ paśyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ vadāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:18752: kiṃ jānataḥ kiṃ paśyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18759: evameva bhāvanānuyogamanuyuktasya bhikṣornaivaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati etāvatko bata me 'dyāsravāṇāṃ kṣīṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:18761: atha khalvasya kṣīṇe kṣīṇānta eva jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18766: ato jñāyate smṛtyupasthānādigato mārgāṅgabhāvanānuyogamanuktaḥ srotaāpattiphalapratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18767: yadyekasmin kṣaṇe yadi vā pañcadaśasu kṣaṇeṣu na bhāvanānuyogaṃ vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:18772: iti vedanā iti jñānamiti prathamamuktamādyaphalasya mārgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:18782: ataḥ smṛtyupasthānādau pūtibhūtaḥ san pṛthagjano bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18786: ato jñāyate smṛtyupasthānādigataḥ viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18787: kiñcogreṇa saṅghe nimantrite devatā upasaṅkramya ārocayanti- amuko gṛhapate arhan yāvadamuka ādyaphalapratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18791: kiñcoktaṃ bhagavatā sūtre- yasya [khalu bhikṣava imāni] pañcendriyāṇi (śraddhādīni) na santi /
SA16hvsatssu:18792: tamahaṃ bāhyaḥ pṛthagjanapakṣe sthita iti vadāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:18797: ayamābhyantaraḥ pṛthagjana ārya ityupyucyate pṛthagjana ityapyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18806: atha ca [tatra] channasya [cittaṃ] na dharmaniyāme praskandati /
SA16hvsatssu:18810: (u) yo nirodhaṃ paśyati sa tattvataḥ pratipannakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:18811: yo dūrabhāgīyakuśalendriyagataḥ paśyati pañcaskandhā anityāḥ duḥkhā śūnyā anātmāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18815: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti- kathaṃ dharmaṃ paśyema iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18817: tatsahabhuvo vedanāsaṃjñā cetanādayaḥ sarve [dharmā] anityā vipariṇāmadharmāṇaḥ aśraddheyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:18826: yoginaścitta evaṃ bhavati- idaṃ praṇītamupaśamapadaṃ yat sarveṣāṃ mṛṣābhūtānāṃ kāmatṛṣṇānāmapagamaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇam /
SA16hvsatssu:18827: yadasmin dharme cittaṃ praskandati adhimucyate neñjate na parāvartate na śocate na paritrāsate /
SA16hvsatssu:18829: ato jñāyate yogī anityādyākāraiḥ pañcaskandhānavalokayan viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18830: teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyan sannikṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18831: yathā channaḥ sthavirān prativadati- mamāpyevaṃ bhavati- rūpamanityaṃ [vijñānamanityaṃ rūpamanātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:18835: atha ca punarme] sarvasaṃskārasamarthe tṛṣṇākṣaye nirodhe nirvāṇe cittaṃ na praskandati,
SA16hvsatssu:18841: ] na khalvimaṃ dharmaṃ paśyato bhavati / iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18842: kiñcāha- yogī yadasmin dharme mṛduprajñayā kṣāntiṃ śraddadhate sa śraddhā[nusārī] pratipannakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:18844: yastīkṣṇaprajñayā kṣāntiṃ śraddadhate sa dharmā[nusārī] pratipannakaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:18847: ato jñāyate nirodhaṃ paśyan sannikṛṣṭaḥ pratipannako bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:18853: bhagavān dvādaśanidānānāṃ nirodhaṃ dṛṣṭvā anuttaramabhisambuddho 'bhūt iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18854: dharmamudrāyāñcoktam- pañcaskandhānanityān vipralopān mṛṣābhūtānasārān śūnyāṃśca paśyato yogino jñānadarśanamaviśuddhaṃ bhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18855: sūtramidamanta āha- yogina evaṃ bhavati- yanmayā dṛśyate śrūyate ājighryate rasyate spṛśyate manyate tat sarvaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ vijñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:18856: yadasya vijñānasya hetupratyayā nityā vā anityā vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18858: anityebhyo hetupratyayebhya utpannaṃ vijñānaṃ kathaṃ nityaṃ bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:18859: ataḥ sarve pañcaskandhā anityāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ kṣayalakṣaṇāḥ vipariṇāmalakṣaṇā viyogalakṣaṇā nirodhalakṣaṇā iti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:18870: sūtre hi bhagavatoktam- caturṇāmaryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtamananubodhāt evamidaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ [sandhāvitaṃ] saṃsaritaṃ mama ca yuṣmākañca idānīmimāni catvāri satyānyanubaddhāni /
SA16hvsatssu:18878: āha ca- ye hi kecit dharmakañcukā ninditakāyāḥ samyakpravrajyāṃ śraddadhante /
SA16hvsatssu:18880: ye hi kecit srotaāpattiṃ sakṛdāgāmitāmanāgāmitāñca lipsanti /
SA16hvsatssu:18882: ye hi kecit arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhatāṃ buddhamārgañca lipsanti /
SA16hvsatssu:18886_0: dharmacakrapravartane coktam- idaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ
SA16hvsatssu:18886_1: iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipaditi paśyato mama teṣu cakṣurudapadyata jñānamudapadyata
SA16hvsatssu:18888: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- avadātavasane hrade prakṣipte sati rūpaṃ [yathā] vedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:18889: evamayaṃ puruṣa ekatra niṣaṇṇaścatvāri satyāni paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18890: kiñcāha pariśuddhacittaḥ samyak bhāvayati- duḥkhasatyaṃ yāvanmārgasatyam /
SA16hvsatssu:18891: evaṃ paśyataḥ kāmāsravāt bhavāsravādavidyāsravāt cittaṃ vimucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18896: bhagavānāha catvāri jñānāni duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:18899: yathā bhiṣak rogaṃ jñātvā roganidānaṃ rogavināśaṃ rogavināśauṣadhañca jānīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:18900: evaṃ yogī duḥkhānāṃ nissaraṇamicchan duḥkhaṃ duḥkhanidānaṃ duḥkhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadañca jānīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:18901: yadi na jānāti duḥkhaṃ kena jñāsyati duḥkhanidānaṃ duḥkhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadañca /
SA16hvsatssu:18905: sarvaṃ [tat] skandhadhātvāyatanādiṣūktam- yadidaṃ rūpaṃ ityādi ayaṃ rūpasya samudaya ityādi ayaṃ rūpasya vyaya ityādi prajānata āsravāḥ kṣīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18906: kiñcāha bhagavān- rūpādīnāṃ skandhānāṃ yathābhūtamāsvādamādīnavaṃ nissaraṇaptaprajñāyānuttaraṃ mārgamaspṛśamiti na vadāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:18908: nagaropamasūtre coktam- yadā mama na jñānamabhūt- [iti] jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇasamudayo jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminī pratipat /
SA16hvsatssu:18909: yāvat saṃskārāḥ saṃskārasamudayaḥ saṃskāranirodhaḥ saṃskāranirodhagāminī pratipat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18910: na [SSS_496] tadā vadāmi- adhigato mārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18912: evamādi [vacanāni] dṛṣṭvā yadi [vadāmaḥ] ayameva darśanamārgādhigama iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18914: (pṛ) nāhaṃ vadāmi- ayamucyate darśanamārgādhigama iti; kintu ayaṃ sammarśana kālīna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18917: tathā no cet nidānaṃ vaktavyaṃ- catussatyadarśanaṃ mārgādhigamakālīnaṃ pañcaskandhādidarśanaṃ sammarśanakālīnamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:18919: pañcaskandhādīnāṃ sammarśanaṃ na kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18927: kecit dvādaśāyatanāni vā aṣṭādaśadhātūn vā dvādaśanidānāni vā anyāni vā paśyanto mārgamadhigacchanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18928: ato jñāyate na catussatya[darśana]mātreṇa mārgādhima iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18929: yadi bhavato mataṃ satyapyasmin vacane naitaddarśanena kleśān prajahātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:18932_0: catussatyavibhaṅga uktam- jātirapi duḥkhaṃ jarāpi duḥkhaṃ vyādhirapi duḥkhaṃ maraṇamapi
SA16hvsatssu:18932_1: duḥkhaṃ vipriyasaṃyogo duḥkhaṃ priyaviyogo duḥkhaṃ yadiṣṭaṃ na labhyate tadapi duḥkhaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:18933: kiñcāha duḥkhasamudayo yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī tatra tatrābhinandinī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18935: idaṃ sarvaṃ lokasatyaṃ na tu paramārthasatyam /
SA16hvsatssu:18942: pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti paśyataścittameva vikṣipyate na mārgo 'dhigamyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18949: ato jñāyate yogī cittata eva saṃskṛtadharme vartate na paramārthata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18950: yathoktaṃ sūtre- saṃskṛtadharmā anṛtā māyopamā jvālopamā svapnopamā ṛṇopamā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18953: asat dṛṣṭaṃ sadābhāsaṃ asadvai parayā dhiyā // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18954: strī puruṣa iti dharmo yathābhūtaṃ nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:18955: pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpamātre strī puruṣa iti sudṛḍhaṃ kīrtayantaḥ pṛthagjanā viparyayamugdhā vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:18958: yogī tu ime pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā anātmāna iti bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:18960: yathoktaṃ dharmamudrāsūtre- yogī bhāvayati rūpamanityaṃ śūnyaṃ viyogalakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:18963: śūnyamiti yathā ghaṭe jale 'sati śūnyo ghaṭa iti vadanti /
SA16hvsatssu:18964: evaṃ pañcaskandheṣu nāstyātmā ityataḥ śūnyā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:18967: ante tu nirodhaṃ paśyati yaduta yogina evaṃ bhavati yanmayā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:18968: ato jñāyate nirodhaṃ paśyata eva kleśāḥ kṣīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18971: nirodhalakṣaṇasākṣātkurvatastu saṃskṛteṣu duḥkhasaṃjñā na [SSS_498] vyavasthitā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18972: yathā kasyacit prathamadhyāne prītisukhamalabdhavato na pañcakāmaguṇeṣu nirvedasaṃjñā jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18973: yathā ca avitarkāvicārasamādhimalabdhvā na savitarkasavicārasamādhau doṣaṃ manyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18975: ato jñātavyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ paśyata eva duḥkhasaṃjñā sampannā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:18982: yasmin samaye nirodhasya nirodhalakṣaṇamadhigatam, tasminneva samaye duḥkhasaṃjñā sampadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:18984: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogī [yat] samudayalakṣaṇaṃ tat nirodhalakṣaṇamiti prajānan suviśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuranuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:18987: skandhā anityā duḥkhā iti paśyannapi na nirodhamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:18990: kasmāt bhagavān pudgalaḥ sukumāramatirityādi dṛṣṭvā catussatyānyudeśayati,
SA16hvsatssu:18996: (pṛ) mārgalābhasamaya eva yadi satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ prahīyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:18998: (u) yogī mārgamanuprāpya dharmāḥ śūnyā anātmāna iti dṛṣṭataḥ paśyan na punarvicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:19000: mārgasatyaṃ paśyan prajānāti idamekameva tattvaṃ nānyadastīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19002: (pṛ) yadi mārgalābhakāla eva satyadarśanapraheyāḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:19005: yathā bhagavān bhīkṣūn pṛcchati- kena vastunā kiṃ vastūpādāya kiṃ vastvabhiniviśya īdṛśī dṛṣṭirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19006: asmin kāye mriyamāṇa eva īdṛśādayaḥ sarvā dṛṣṭayo nirudhyante /
SA16hvsatssu:19007: bhikṣava āhuḥ- bhagavanmūlā hi [SSS_499] no bhagavan dharmāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19009: bhagavānāha- rūpe khalu sati rūpamupādāya rūpamabhiniviśya saktāyadṛṣṭirbhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19011: ato jñātavyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭimupādāya sarve kleśāḥ sambhavantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19013: satyāṃ hi satkāyadṛṣṭau vadanti- ayamātmā nityo vānityo veti /
SA16hvsatssu:19017: tadā na karma, na vipākaḥ, duḥkhavimokṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19032: dharmalakṣaṇaṃ sākṣātkurvato yogino na vicikitsā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19038: śīlavratasamucchedāt mārgaṃ prayujya jñāne jñeyadharmeṣu ca na vicikitsate /
SA16hvsatssu:19040: sa eva samudayaṃ prahāya nirodhamadhigacchan catussatyasampanna ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19041: ata eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vacanameva nirvicikitsālakṣaṇaṃ pradarśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19043: yathoktaṃ sūtre- ādyābhisambodhilakṣaṇaṃ yaduta dharmaṃ paśyati dharmaṃ pratilabhate dharmaṃ prajānāti dharmaṃ pratisaṃvedayate /
SA16hvsatssu:19045: bhagavacchāsane ca vaiśāradyabalamanuprāpya phale supratitiṣṭhati / iti //
SA16hvsatssu:19051: āyataneṣu dhātuṣu cokteṣu padārthā ālambanāni viṣayā jñeyā ityādayaḥ sarve dharmā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:19060: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19065: (u) yat bhavānāha- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19069: kiñcit ṣaṣṭhasya vijñānasya svakalāpe sarvathā asadālambanaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19081: na vastutaḥ sparśasya ṣaḍāyatanāni pratyayā bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:19084: evaṃ caturaḥ pratyayān pratiṣidhyāha bhagavān dve āyatane iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19089: (pṛ) anenaiva hetunā atītānāgatādayoḥ dharmāḥ santaḥ syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19099: yo dharma utpadya niruddhaḥ sa smaraṇīyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19101: kiṃ smaryeta yathā dharmaḥ pūrvaṃ sattvākhya idānīmatīto 'pi sattvākhyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19102: evaṃ tasmin dharme pūrvaṃ smṛtyutpādāt tadeva cittaṃ punaḥ smaryate /
SA16hvsatssu:19105: tasmin dharme niruddhe 'pi tatsaṃjñānusmaraṇamutpādya [taṃ dharmaṃ] vikalpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19106: yo dharmastasya citte jāyate sa dharmo vinaṣṭaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19107: paścāt [ta]nmanovijñānaṃ tat vastu vijānāti ida[meva] nimittālambanaṃ vijñānamityākhyayate /
SA16hvsatssu:19119: yathā āryā anāgataṃ vastu jñātvā vadanti- idaṃ vastu tathā syāt, idaṃ vastu tathā na syāditi /
SA16hvsatssu:19120: (u) āryajñānabalaṃ hi tathā dharmamasantamapi prāk prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:19121: yathā āryāḥ pāṣaṇabhittiṃ bhittvā apratihatamunmajjanti nimajjanti ca /
SA16hvsatssu:19124: yathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ na strīti puruṣa iti vā vikalpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19131: yathā devadatta iti vacane naikaṃ vijñānaṃ catvāryakṣarāṇi vijānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:19135: yathā ca puruṣasya svarūpaṃ naikakṣaṇena parijñeyamam /
SA16hvsatssu:19139: bhavānavādīḥ- dṛṣṭāntaṃ pratītya nāsti kiñcit svātmālambanaṃ jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19141: yogī cittavipaśyanāmanusarati atīte 'nāgate tu cittaṃ nāsti iti vacanāt /
SA16hvsatssu:19143: no cet na jātu kaścitpratyutpannacittasamprayukta dharmaṃ vijānāti / (pṛ) sūtra uktam-
SA16hvsatssu:19144: sarve dharmā anātmānaḥ prajñayā yadi paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:19145: atha nirvindate duḥkhe eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19146: iyaṃ prajñā ātmānaṃ sahabhūdharmānanyāni sarvadharmālambanāni cāpanayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19149: tasyāṃ hi gāthāyāmuktam- atha nirvindate duḥkha iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19163: bhagavānāha- sādhu sādhu khalu bhikṣava iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19165_1: vā bahirdhā vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā [hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā] yaddūre 'ntike vā sarvaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:19166: evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19167: āha ca- rūpaṃ nātmā, vedanā, saṃjñā, saṃskārā vijñānañca nātmā iti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:19168: rūpamanityaṃ tucchaṃ māyāvat bālālāpanaṃ vadhakaṃ steyakamanātmā anātmīyamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19169: kiñcāha bhagavān- atra niṣaṇṇaḥ kaścinmūḍho 'vidyāṇḍagato 'vidyāndhībhūtaḥ parityajya buddhaśāsanamimāṃ mithyādṛṣṭimutpādayati- yadi rūpaṃ nātmā,
SA16hvsatssu:19173: kathamanātmā karma kṛtvā ātmanā anubhavati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19175: sūtre ca anātmajñānaṃ sarvadharmanālambata iti vacanasthānaṃ na kiñcanāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:19180: āha ca- daśa śūnyatāḥ sarvadharmālambanā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19182: kiñcāha- sarve saṃskārā anityā duḥkhā, sarve dharmā anātmāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19185: sarve dharmā anātmāna ityuktatvāt jñātavyaṃ yat saṃskārā iti vacanaṃ tat saṃskṛtābhidhāyakam /
SA16hvsatssu:19186: yat dharmā iti vacanaṃ tat sarvā[bhidhāyaka]miti /
SA16hvsatssu:19187: āha ca- ka ekalakṣaṇadharmaṃ lakṣaṇāntaradharmañcābhimukhaṃ samprajānāti yathā vidyācakṣuṣā rūpaṃ [SSS_504] paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:19188: kevalaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ samyak sambuddhā vimuktilābhina ekalakṣaṇadharmaṃ lakṣaṇāntaradharmañcābhimukhaṃ samprajānanti yathā vidyācakṣuṣā rūpaṃ paśyanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19194: sarvasaṅgrāhakamiti yathā bhagavānāha- aśaṃ sarvajña iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19198: yathā ca tathāgatavarge uktam- tathāgataḥ sarvatyāgī sarvajayī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19205: ayamucyate sāmānyalakṣaṇajñaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ, na tu viśeṣalakṣaṇajña iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19207: bhikṣurayaṃ sāmānyena sarve dharmā anityā iti prajānātītyataḥ sarvajño bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19230: ato jñāyate sarvamanātmeti vacane satyapi pañcopādānaskandhāna[bhisandhāya] uktaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:19239: (pṛ) laukikī śūnyatā sarvadharmānālambate na tu anāsravaśūnyatā /
SA16hvsatssu:19242: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi dharmamudrāsūtre- śūnyatā laukikī śūnyateti /
SA16hvsatssu:19243: (u) iyaṃ lokottaraśūnyatā na tu laukikī śūnyatā /
SA16hvsatssu:19244: (pṛ) atroktaṃ jñānadarśanasyāviśuddhatvāt jñāyata iyaṃ laukikī śūnyateti /
SA16hvsatssu:19247: paścānnirodhasatyaṃ dṛṣṭvā abhimānaṃ vihāya jñānadarśanaṃ viśuddhaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19249: yadbhavānāha- sarve saṃskārā anityāḥ sarve dharmā anātmāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19250: evaṃ hi syāt- yogī yadā nairātmyasaṃjñāsamanvitaḥ tadā dharmasaṃjñāsamanvitatvāt nairātmye dharma iti sa saṃjñocyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19251: yathoktaṃ darśanavarge- yo duḥkhaṃ na paśyati, sa ātmadarśī bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19252: yo yathābhūtaṃ duḥkhaṃ paśyati, na sa punarātmānaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:19255: ataḥ sarve dharmā anātmāna iti vacanaṃ duḥkhasatyamātramālambya anātmā saṃskāra ityabhidadhāti /
SA16hvsatssu:19260: asti dvividho vihāraḥ śūnyavihāra anātmavihāra iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19261: pañcaskandheṣu nāsti sattva iti darśanaṃ śūnyavihāraḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19264: uktaṃ hi sūtre- rūpaṃ niskhabhāvaṃ paśyati [yāvat] vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ niḥskhabhāvaṃ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19266: ato jñāyate rūpasvabhāvo na vastusan yāvadvedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasvabhāvā na vastusanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19267: api [SSS_506] coktaṃ sūtre- pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā māyāvat iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19269: yadi māyā vastusatī, na māyeti bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19273: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhā na vastusanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19275: tathā pañcaskandhā api, naikaḥ [tādṛśaḥ] paramārthiko dharmo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:19279: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mṛṣā nāma yat tucchakam /
SA16hvsatssu:19281: nirodhaḥ sa niyataṃ yathābhūta ityataḥ paramārthasan iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19282: (pṛ) yadbhavatoktaṃ pañcaskandheṣu nāsti sattva iti darśanaṃ [śūnyavihāra] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19285: (u) sāsravo 'nāsravaśca (pṛ) sūtra uktam- yaḥ sattvaṃ paśyati sa pañcopādānaskandhān paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19287: ato jñāyate anāsravān skandhānupādāyāpi sattva ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:19296: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyānivṛtatṛṣṇāsaṃyojanayā pratibaddho mūḍha imaṃ kāyamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:19301: (u) sarve skandhā upādānādutpannā ityata upādānaskandhā ityucyante /
SA16hvsatssu:19304: skandhā upādānaskandhaiḥ sahopādānādutpannā ityata upādānaskandhā ityabhidhīyante /
SA16hvsatssu:19310: uktaṃ hi sūtre- rūpaṃ paśyati śūnyamanātmā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān vijñānañca paśyati śūnyamanātmā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19318: (u) yogī sattvakāraṇe na sattvaṃ paśyatītyata eva śūnyacittamutpādya tataḥ śūnyaṃ paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:19319: pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhe ca na paśyati rūpasvabhāvaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasvabhāvam /
SA16hvsatssu:19332: kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ, pañcavijñānasamprayuktā ca prajñā jñānameva ca darśanam /
SA16hvsatssu:19339: uktañca sūtre- yat dharmeṣu dharmān parīttaṃ prajñayā vipaśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:19343: prathamā cānāsravā prajñā prāthamikaṃ darśanaṃ kṣāntiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19355: parīttavacane ca kevalamuktaṃ vipaśyanā kṣāntiriti na jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:19357: yadi manyase yogino jñānavata eva kṣāntirbhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19359: uktañca sūtre- [evaṃ] jānan paśyan āsravādvimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19361: kiñca bhagavānāha- duḥkhajñānaṃ samudaya[jñānaṃ] nirodha[jñānaṃ] mārgajñānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19364: bhagavān vimuktyarthamāha- yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti jñānam iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19368: na vayaṃ vadāmaḥ pūrvaṃ kṣāntiḥ paścāt jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19383: na savikalpikeyaṃ kṣāntiḥ idaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19384: yathā laukikī vipaśyanā catussatyānusāriṇī kṣāntirityapyucyate jñānamityapyucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19388: (pṛ) sūtre hi pṛthugucyate samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyak jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19390: (u) tathā cet samyagdṛṣṭirna samyag jñānaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19391: yadi bhavato mataṃ samyag [SSS_509] dṛṣṭiḥ samyag jñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19393: pañcāṅgadharmakāye prajñāskandhāt pṛthaguktaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ na prajñā bhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:19394: tathā ca kṣayajñānamamutpādajñānamapi na prajñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19396: yaduta sarvakleśānāṃ kṣayo 'rhataścitte samutpadyata ityata[stata] samyag jñānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19416: prathamata ālambanagatatvāt na dṛṣṭiriti yadi matam /
SA16hvsatssu:19419: bhavatāṃ hi śāsanaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ santānālambanaṃ yathā manovijñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19429: dṛṣṭiḥ jñānaṃ prajñā ityādi sarvaṃ nāsti /
SA16hvsatssu:19437: kecidāhuḥ- santyaṣṭadṛṣṭayo yaduta pañcamithyādṛṣṭayo laukikī samyagdṛṣṭiḥ śaikṣadṛṣṭiraśaikṣadṛṣṭiḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19438: etā aṣṭadṛṣṭirvarjayitvā anyā prajñā na dṛṣṭirityucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19440: (u) jñānadarśanaṃ vimuktilābhaḥ pratisaṃvedanaṃ sākṣātkāra itīdaṃ sarvamekārthakam /
SA16hvsatssu:19441: iyaṃ dṛṣṭiriyaṃ na dṛṣṭiriti yat vacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:19443: (pṛ) uktaṃ nanu sūtre- jānan paśyan āsravādvimucyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19445: (u) yat jñātvā ādau prajñaptiṃ vidārayati tat jñānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19452: tisraḥ prajñā, śrutamayī prajñā, cintāmayī prajñā, bhāvanāmayī prajñeti /
SA16hvsatssu:19455: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rāhulo bhikṣurvimuktiprāpiṇīṃ prajñāṃ sampādayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19456: vedādīn vyāvahārikagranthān śṛṇvannapi nānāsravāṃ prajñāmutpādayatītyato na [sā] śrutamayī prajñā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19457: yat sūtrāṇāmarthaṃ cintayati sā cintāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:19458: yathocyate- yogī dharmaṃ śrutvā tadarthagatiṃ cintayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19460: api cāha- yogī dharmaṃ śrutvā tadarthaṃ cintayan sadā pratipadamanuvartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19463: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yūyaṃ bhikṣavo dhyānasamādhiṃ bhāvayanto yathābhūtajñānadarśanamabhimukhaṃ labhadhve /
SA16hvsatssu:19465: kiñcoktaṃ saptasamyagjñānasūtre- yat bhikṣu dharmaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:19476: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- trīṇyāyudhāni śrutāyudhaṃ vivekāyudhaṃ prajñāyudhamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19509: api coktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān dharmamupadiśati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇamante kalyāṇamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:19510: taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoti satpuruṣastaruṇo vṛddho vā /
SA16hvsatssu:19513: tadaiva bhogaskandhaṃ prahāya jñātiparivṛttaṃ prahāya agārādanāgāraṃ [SSS_512] pravrajati /
SA16hvsatssu:19521: tatra yat dharmaṃ śṛṇoti taruṇo vā vṛddho vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19523: śrutvā yat pratisañcikṣati- sambādho gṛhāvāso 'bhyavakāśā pravrajyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:19535: tatra niṣevya santaṃ puruṣaṃ saddharmamupaśrutya cetīyaṃ śrutamayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:19543: evamādinā tatra tatra sūtre bhagavān trividhāṃ prajñāmavocat /
SA16hvsatssu:19548: yathā hastaka upāsako 'tapyaddeveṣūpapadya tatra dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19555: (u) kena pratyayena kāmadhātau nāsti bhāvanāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:19557: na kāmadhātukamārgeṇa sarvāṇi nīvaraṇāni sarvāṇi paryavasthānāni prajahāti yena kāmadhātukaparyavasthānaṃ nābhimukhībhavet /
SA16hvsatssu:19559: bhavatāṃ śāsane nedaṃ vacanamasti yat na kāmadhātukamārgeṇa nīvaraṇāni paryavasthānāni prajahāti yena kāmadhātukaparyavasthānaṃ nābhimukhībhavediti /
SA16hvsatssu:19563: yathoktaṃ sūtre- aśubhabhāvanāṃ bhāvayan kāmarāgaṃ samūhanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19569: (u) dauṣṭhulyādinā kleśān prajahāti nāśubhādinā iti nāsti kiñcana sūtravacanam /
SA16hvsatssu:19570: uktaṃ hi sūtre- aśubhādinā kleśān samūhanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19575: yadi nāsti, vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kasmādasti aśubhādiḥ, na dauṣṭhulyādiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:19578: atrāpi kāraṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ kasmāt kāmadhātau na samucchedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19583: yayoktaṃ sūtre- cittasamādhānaṃ mārgaḥ cittavikṣepo 'mārga iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19595: (u) tīrthikāḥ prahīṇasaṃyojanā api punaḥ kāmadhātau samutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:19600: api coktaṃ sūtre- kṣīṇatrisaṃyojanastrīṇi viṣāṇi samūhantīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19601: prākṛto na trīṇi saṃyojanāni kṣapayatītyato na vītarāgo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19604: yadi prākato vairāgyakuśalaḥ, sarve 'pi kleśā na syuḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19615: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dvāvimau bhikṣavaḥ aśanyā phalantyā na santrasataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19616: [katamau dvau] bhikṣuśca kṣīṇāsravo rājā ca cakravartī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19625: vastutastu pṛthagjanasya vītarāga iti kathyamānasyāpi nedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:19631: āha ca arāḍaḥ kalāma udrako rāmaputro rūpe vītarāga ārūpya utpadyata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19635: ato [yat]bhavatoktaṃ pṛthagjanaḥ kṣīṇakleśo 'pi punarutpadyata ityato na kṣīṇa[kleśa] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19637: bhavānapyāha- pṛthagjanasya sarvāṇi vidyamānāni prahīṇānīti idaṃ vastutaḥ pratiṣiddhamityataḥ kṣīṇo vīta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19639: ahaṃ mameti yā cintā mriyamāṇo jahāti tām
SA16hvsatssu:19643: yo bālaḥ svabhūmiṃ tyajati taṃ satkṛtavatāmapi nāsti mahāvipākaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19644: yadi vītarāgaṃ tīrthikaṃ satkaroti, mahāvipākaṃ vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:19646: ato jñāyate pṛthagjano vastutaḥ prahīṇa[kleśo] vīta[rāga] iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19649: yadi satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ vyāvṛttavān tadā pūrvokto doṣaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19654: ataḥ pṛthagjano na vastutaḥ prahīṇasaṃyojana iti jñāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19664: na tatrāsti kāraṇamāsannabhūmiṃ niśrayate na kāmadhātukasamādhimiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19668: susīmasūtre coktam- pūrvaṃ khalu dharmasthitijñānaṃ pañcānnirvāṇajñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19670: kintu dharmasthitijñānamavaśyaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtvā paścādāsravakṣayo bhavatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19687: uktañca sūtre- yogī śubhaṃ pratilabhamāno 'śubhaṃ tyajati tadyathā nandaḥ apsaratṛṣṇāmupādāya pūrvatanakāmaṃ jahau iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19688: yaśca prathamadhyāne nopaśamarasamanuvindate, na sa pañcakāmaguṇeṣu mahāvadyamatiṃ karoti /
SA16hvsatssu:19693: yadyāryaśrāvakaḥ kadācit pañcakāmaguṇā na prītisaumanasyajanakā ityanusmarati /
SA16hvsatssu:19708: yadbhavatoktaṃ- śubhaṃ praṇītaṃ pramodamupaśamarasañca pratilabhamāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19716: yathā sūtre bhagavānāha- bhikṣūṇāṃ cīvaraṃ gṛhṇatāṃ triṣu [kleśa] viṣeṣu satsvapi cīvarāsaṅgo niruddha eveti /
SA16hvsatssu:19730: ataḥ satyadarśanamārge na laukikaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:19737: yathoktaṃ sūtre- janapadaniruktau nābhiniveśeta yogī iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19741: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santi catvāro bhāṣitadharmāḥ kiñcidbhāṣitaṃ sārthagati nākṣayakaram /
SA16hvsatssu:19747: yathāha- santi catvāro bhāṣitadharmāḥ kaścidarthopāyaḥ na vyañjanopāyaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19751: ya etaccatuḥpratisaṃvitprāptaḥ sa upāyasampanno duṣpradhṛṣyo duradhigamyo dharmabhāṣaṇe /
SA16hvsatssu:19766: (pṛ) catasra imāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ kasmin dhātau vartante /
SA16hvsatssu:19776: pañca jñānāni- dharmasthitijñānaṃ, nirvāṇajñānaṃ araṇājñānaṃ praṇidhijñānaṃ prāntakoṭikajñānamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19778: yathā jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ yāvadavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19779: asti vā tathāgato nāsti vā tathāgataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19780: eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ sadā sthita ityato dharmasthitijñānamityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19786: yataḥ asti vā tathāgato nāsti vā tathāgataḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19800: sūtre ca bhagavānavocat- asti, bhikṣavaḥ kṛtako jāto bhūtaḥ saṃskṛtadharmaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19802: api coktam- santi dvidhaiva dharmāḥ saṃskṛto 'saṃskṛta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19805: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ye vidyante saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā nirodho nirvāṇaṃ teṣāmagramākhyāyate iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19812: bhagavān bahudhātukasūtra āha- vidvān saṃskṛtadhātumasaṃskṛtādhātuñca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:19816: sarveṣu sūtreṣu nāsti kiñcinniyataṃ vacanaṃ nirvāṇamasaddharma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19817: ato jñāyate yannirvāṇamasaditi tat bhavataḥ svasaṃjñāvikalpa eveti /
SA16hvsatssu:19819: yadi skandhānāṃ viyoge 'pi punarasti dharmāntaraṃ nirvāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19826: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogī rūpalakṣaṇaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati yāvaddharmalakṣaṇaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19827: sūtre ca tatra tatroktam- sarve dharmā anityāḥ sarve dharmā anātmānaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:19832: yadi nirvāṇaṃ dharmaḥ tadā nāsti svabhāva iti darśanaṃ nopalabdhuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19836: ghaṭe vinaṣṭe tu ghaṭo vinaṣṭa iti vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19842: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadidaṃ bhikṣavo duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate anyadduḥkhaṃ notpadyate na punastatsantatirasti /
SA16hvsatssu:19843: idaṃ sthānaṃ paramaṃ śāntaṃ śiva yaduta [SSS_521] sarvapratinissargaḥ kāyikacaitasikarāgātyantavisaṃyogo nirodho nirvāṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:19845: anyaddaḥkhaṃ notpadyata iti vacane ko dharmo nirvāṇādanyo bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:19847: utpannamātrā tṛṣṇā nirudhyate, ajātā na jāyate /
SA16hvsatssu:19857: tathā no cet cīvarakṣayādirapi pṛthak dharmaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:19865: yathā yatra yannāsti tatra tena śūnyamiti jñānam /
SA16hvsatssu:19878: yena jñānena na raṇāyate pareṇa saha /
SA16hvsatssu:19891: (pṛ) tathā cet bhagavato buddhasya kevalamidaṃ jñānaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:19896: yat yogī prakṛṣṭamuttamaṃ jñānaṃ sarvadhyānasamādhibhiḥ paribhāvitaṃ parivardhitaṃ pratilabhya [sva]jīvitasya bṛddhau hrāse vaśitāṃ vindate /
SA16hvsatssu:19902: ṣaḍabhijñāḥ- kāyarddhiḥ dviyacakṣuḥ divyaśrotraṃ paracittajñānaṃ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtirāsravakṣaya[jñāna]miti /
SA16hvsatssu:19925: kecidāhuḥ- prathamadhyānābhijñayā brahmalokaṃ gacchati yāvaccaturthadhyānābhijñayā rūpaparyantaṃ gacchatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19935: yathoktaṃ sūtre rūpe vā ārūpye vā pūrvatanīnamupapattyāyatanaṃ bhagavān sarvaṃ prajānāti /
SA16hvsatssu:19942: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- ālokalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvayan jñānadarśanaṃ sādhayati iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19954: (pṛ) divyacakṣuṣaḥ saṃsthānaṃ kiṃ mahat kiṃ vālpam /
SA16hvsatssu:19972: yathā sāsraveṇa sāsravaṃ jānāti anāsraveṇa anāsravaṃ jānāti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19974: neme vadanti kāraṇaniyamam- anena kāraṇena sajātīyamevālambanaṃ jānātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19978: yathā kaścidavitarkasamādhimupasampannaḥ prajānāti asmāt samādhervyutthite evamevaṃ vitarko bhaviṣyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19983: āha ca- pratyekabuddho mārgasatyadarśanagatatṛtīyacittaṃ jñāsyāmīti saptamaṃ cittameva paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:19991: kiñcaikasmin samaye manasyacintayat- rājā bhūtvā [SSS_525] yathādharmaṃ lokaṃ vineṣyāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:19993: devā api jānanti- ayamarhan yāvadayaṃ srotaāpattipratipannaka iti /
SA16hvsatssu:19995: tadyathā bhagavati parinirvāṇābhimukhe sati anirūddho bhagavatopasampannān dhyānasamādhīn yathākramamajānīt /
SA16hvsatssu:20002: yadi cittaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ, rūpālambanaṃ cittaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20006: yadi na jānātyālambanaṃ, katamat cittaṃ jānīyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:20019: yathā śāriputraḥ bhagavantaṃ pratyāha- ahamatītānāgatānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ cittamajānannapi teṣāṃ dharmaṃ jānāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20020: śuddhāvāsā devāstathāgatacittaṃ jānantītyato bhagavantamupasampadyāhuḥ- atītatathāgatānāṃ bhagavan iryāpatho 'pyevamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:20021: (pṛ) pūrvanivāsā[nusmṛti]vibhaṅge kasmāduktaṃ saha nimittena saha jātyeti /
SA16hvsatssu:20022: (u) anusmṛtirviśadetyata evaṃ nimittasaṃjñāmavocat amukaḥ pudgalaḥ ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:20025: yathāhuḥ- idaṃ tava kulaṃ iyaṃ tava jātiriti /
SA16hvsatssu:20026: jātiṃ nimittañca militvā vadatītyato jñānadarśanaṃ viśuddham /
SA16hvsatssu:20038: asti hi pudgalasya aṣṭamahāsahasrakalpān jānato 'pi nāstīyaṃ cintāmayī prajñā /
SA16hvsatssu:20048: sūtre kasmāduktam- ahamekanavatikalpānāgatya nāpaśyaṃ [kimapi] dānamapacīyamānaṃ vinā vipākena iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20084: (pṛ) anye ṛddhi[pādā] api vaktavyāḥ; kena dharmeṇa sākṣātkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:20085: (u) uktameva pūrvaṃ dhyānasamādhīn gabhīraṃ bhāvayan ṛddhipādān sākṣātkarotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20086: yatprayojanamanusṛtya sākṣātkāraḥ sākṣātkṛtaṃ vastu, [sa] sarva ṛddhipādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20088_0: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tathāgate loka utpanne supuruṣā dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajitāḥ śīlaṃ
SA16hvsatssu:20088_1: samādadānā apanītapañca nīvaraṇāḥ samādhiṃ bhāvayantaḥ satyaṃ paśyanti ityādi sarvamāsravakṣayasyopāyāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20089: kecidāhuḥ- dānādayaḥ kuśaladharmā api āsravakṣayasya nidānāni /
SA16hvsatssu:20090: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogino dānaṃ kṣīṇāsravaśūnyānātmajñānaṃ sādhayatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20101: dvitīyajñānādinā ka upayogaḥ (u) nimittāni niruddhānyapi punarutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:20107: yathā paśyāmaḥ stanyaṃ śuṣyat punaḥ prasravati /
SA16hvsatssu:20108: asti kaścit kālaḥ [yadā] stanyaṃ pratiruddhapayaḥprasūti bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20111: yathā ca tapte 'yasi kṛṣṇalakṣaṇaṃ niruddhaṃ punarutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20115: yasmin samaye nimittāni niruddhāni na punarutpadyante /
SA16hvsatssu:20118: (u) yadā asamāhitacittasthaḥ, tasmin samaye santyapi rūpādinimittāni /
SA16hvsatssu:20120: yadi kiścit cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mithyāmanaskāreṇa mithyā vikalpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20123: (u) yadyogī pañcasu skandheṣu prajñaptaṃ sattvaṃ na paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:20132: teṣu dharmeṣu virajo dharmacakṣuḥ pratilabhata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20137: prākṛtā ajñā vadanti- te vastusanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20138: śaikṣāḥ punaḥ prajānanti- te tucchā riktā māyāvaditi /
SA16hvsatssu:20140: ato jñāyate yayā prajñayā dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti iyamāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyābhijñeti //
SA16hvsatssu:20144: sūtra uktam- yo yogī saptabhirupāyaistribhirarthāvalokanaiḥ samanvitaḥ so 'smin dharme kṣipramāsravakṣayamanuprāpnotīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20146: (u) saptopāyā nāma śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā ca /
SA16hvsatssu:20149: ayaṃ rūpasamudayaḥ ayaṃ rūpanirodhaḥ iyaṃ rūpanirodhagāminī pratipat,
SA16hvsatssu:20155: yadyapīyaṃ śrutamayī cintāmayī prajñā tathāpyevaṃ pañcaskandhān vikalpayan ātmamatiṃ vibhedayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20157: trividhāvalokanajñānaṃ yaduta saṃskārā anityā duḥkhā anātmāna iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20158: skandhadhātvāyatanamukhena saṃskārān paśyato nāstyartho hitaṃ vā /
SA16hvsatssu:20159: (pṛ) tathā cet pūrvamādīnava uktameva- anityā duḥkhā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20162: (u) trividhāḥ śikṣate- pūrvaṃ śrutamayīṃ cintāmayīṃ prajñām /
SA16hvsatssu:20164: pūrvaṃ śrutamayyāṃ cintāmayyāṃ prajñāyāmuktāḥ sapta prakārāḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20167: yadanityaṃ tat duḥkhamiti lakṣaṇasya bhaṅgo [SSS_529] nāma anityasya bhaṅgaḥ nānityasaṃskārāṇāṃ bhaṅgaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20173: (pṛ) yogino 'pi buddhe dharme saṅghe śīladiṣu kṣāntirasti /
SA16hvsatssu:20179: pūrvaṃ hi mārgānukūlāṃ cintāmayīṃ prajñāṃ prayujya paścātpratyakṣajñānamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:20180: yathā hastipakaḥ pūrvaṃ hastipadaṃ dṛṣṭvā tena jñānena prajānāti- atra vartata iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20182: tathā yogyapi pūrvaṃ kṣāntyānvayajñāne na nirvāṇamabhyūhya paścāt tena jñānenābhimukhīkaroti /
SA16hvsatssu:20183: ataḥ sūtra uktam- [evaṃ] jānan[evaṃ] paśyan āsravakṣayamanuprāpnotīti //
SA16hvsatssu:20187_0: kecidābhidharmikā vadanti arhan kṣayajñānaṃ sākṣātkurvan sāṃvṛtāni nava jñānāni prāpnoti
SA16hvsatssu:20195: yathā kaścidāha- granthaṃ jānāmi, tadakṣaramekantu na vijānāmīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20197: (pṛ) yo vītarāgaḥ san na prathamadhyānasamāpattiṃ nādyāpi pratyakṣīkṛtavān /
SA16hvsatssu:20199: (u) sūtre tūktam- asminnantarāle samāpadya paścāttāṃ samutpādayediti /
SA16hvsatssu:20201: (pṛ) yadi [SSS_530] rāgādvirajyamānasyātītānāgatāni sarvāṇi dhyānāni mūlataḥ prāpnāni /
SA16hvsatssu:20203: (u) anāgataṃ karma akṛtamabhūtaṃ na vipākaṃ prāpayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20204: atītāni dhyānāni citta utpannacarāṇi yadi vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
SA16hvsatssu:20207: yadi prāpyamiti, anāgataṃ sarvaṃ prāpyaṃ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:20216: tadānāgate 'dhvani samy dṛṣṭiṃ prāpnoti kaścidārūpyasamādhiṃ niśrityārhatphalaṃ prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:20217: ayamanāgate samyaksaṅkalpaṃ samyagvācaṃ samyakkarmāntaṃ samyagājīvaṃ prāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:20222: yadi ca nāsti anāgata[dharmaḥ] kathaṃ bhāvako phalāni dhyānasamādhyādīnanuprāpsyati /
SA16hvsatssu:20225: tathā no cet phalāni gaṇayitvā gaṇayitvānuprāpnuyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:20237: yathā manuṣyajātiḥ prāptetyato manuṣyalakṣaṇaṃ prāptaṃ bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20240: (pṛ) yogino vidyamānaduḥkhādīnāṃ jñānāni kramikāṇīti sarvaṃ parihṛtameva /
SA16hvsatssu:20244: tadā prāptiḥ prayoga iti nāsti bhedaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20253: yathā samāpattapañcaśīlaḥ punaḥ pravrajyāsaṃvaramanuprāpnuvannapi na maulikaśīlebhyaḥ parihīyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20255: yathā kaścidādau vastu jānannapi viśiṣṭavastu[darśanāya yatata] iti pravibhāgo 'sti /
SA16hvsatssu:20261: (pṛ) imāni laukikajñānāni kṣayajñānena sahārhataḥ samādhisamāpattivyutthānacittakriyāṃ prāpayanti /
SA16hvsatssu:20265: tathā no cet na navajñānāni prāpnuyāt /
SA16hvsatssu:20266: uktañca- anāgatabhāvanāyā nāsti hetuḥ pratyayo vā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20268: ete hi vadanti- satyadarśanamārge kevalaṃ nimittābhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20275: śraddhāvibhukto darśanaprāptatvena parivartamānaḥ sarvasminnānantaryavimuktimārge na sāṃvṛtaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20276: samayavimuktaḥ akopyavimuktatayā parivartamāno navānantarya[mārgeṣu] aṣṭavimokṣamārgeṣu saṃvṛtaṃ mārgaṃ na bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20280: ato bhavān yadi vā samyagdyetuṃ brūyāt yadi vā śraddhāpayet /
SA16hvsatssu:20282: ūṣma[gatā]diṣu sthitikāle uttamāni sarvāṇi kuśalamūlāni bhāvayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20285: ata ūṣmagatādidharmakālāt yāvat kṣayajñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvanā bhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20295: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānānandamāmantryāha- asmin dharme evaṃ jñānena dṛṣṭvā evaṃ pratibudhyasva /
SA16hvsatssu:20299: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bālaḥ pratyutpannaṃ dharmaṃ bahumanyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20301: kiñcāha- pratyutpannāḥ kāmā anāgatāḥ kāmāśca mārasenā māradheyā mārabandhanā ityādau sarvatrocyate pratyutpannavādaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20314: dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānañca sarvaṃ sāsravamanāsravamasti /
SA16hvsatssu:20315: imāni jñānāni ūṣmagatādidharmeṣu sāsravāṇi niyāmāvakrāntiprāpyāṇi anāsravāṇi /
SA16hvsatssu:20319_1: [SSS_533] saṃskārāṇāṃ hetau yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ
SA16hvsatssu:20319_2: nirodhe yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge
SA16hvsatssu:20322: (u) uktaṃ hi sūtre- bhagavānānandamāmantryāha- atītae 'nāgate caivaṃ prajānīhīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20324: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- yogī anusmaret- ahamidānīṃ dṛṣṭarūpeṇopadruto bhavāmi /
SA16hvsatssu:20329: pratyakṣamālokya ca janma duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathātītamapīti viddhi /
SA16hvsatssu:20330: yathā ca tat duḥkhamidañca duḥkhaṃ tathānāgatamapyavehi /
SA16hvsatssu:20331: [bījasvabhāvo hi yatheha dṛṣṭo bhūto 'pi bhavyo 'pi tathānumeyaḥ /]
SA16hvsatssu:20332: patyakṣataśca jvalano yathoṣṇo bhūto 'pi bhavyo 'pi tathoṣṇa eva // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20337: yogī hi atīte 'nāgāmini pratyutpanne ca duḥkhe nirvidyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20348: tadarthameva ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- asti prāptiraprāptirityato 'nupūrveṇa satyaṃ paśyatīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20351: ata ekasmin samaya ubhayajñānaṃ na sambhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20361: yogī anityaṃ duḥkhamiti paśyan śūnyamanātmeti paśyati /
SA16hvsatssu:20368: yathoktam- adhyātmavimuktatvāt tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣaye nirodhe svata evārhan prāpta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20370: (pṛ) nanu sūtre kiṃ noktaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ prahāṇalakṣaṇamiti /
SA16hvsatssu:20371: (u) ayaṃ yogī adhyātmanirodhaṃ sākṣātkṛrvan sarvatra nirviṇṇaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20377: (u) evaṃ darśane sati skandhānāmanityatādidoṣamapi dṛṣṭvā duḥkhanātmasaṃjñāṃ janayati /
SA16hvsatssu:20378: yathoktaṃ sūtre- [yat] duḥkhaṃ tadanityam, yadanityaṃ tadānātma iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20381: yadyayamātmā, ātmana utpādo vyayaḥ syādityato jñāyate anātmeti /
SA16hvsatssu:20386: evaṃ yoginaḥ samyak anityamanātma ca bhāvayataḥ kāyacittamupaśāmyati /
SA16hvsatssu:20387: sarvasaṃskāreṣu samutpanneṣu teṣāṃ vihiṃsāmanubhavato duḥkhasaṃjñā samutpadyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20390: mūḍhastu ātmasaṃjñāvaśātsatyapi mahati duḥkhe na tadupāyāsamanubhavati /
SA16hvsatssu:20400: yathoktaṃ sūtre- abhūtanimittamidamabhūtaṃ saṃjñāmātramiti prajānato duḥkhāni kṣīyanta iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20404: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kaścidarhan tathāgatasya purato vyākaroti- bhagavatā deśitāni na santi mama /
SA16hvsatssu:20406: sadā mama samāhitaikāgrasya samyak caryāmanusmarataḥ kāmādīnyakuśalāni na cittasyāsravā bhavanti iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20411: yathā sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā ayaṃ puruṣa iti saṃśerate /
SA16hvsatssu:20413: sadā animittavihāricittatvāt pūrvaṃ sattvaśūnyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā pañcasu skandheṣu na paśyatyātmānam /
SA16hvsatssu:20425: yathā kaścit tatra tatra pratibaddha ekasmānmukto 'pi na vimukta ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20427: arhan vaśitābalaprāptatvāt prajānāti- kṣīṇāni [me] saṃyojanāni, na punarutpatsya iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20432: kṛtaṃ karaṇīyamiti karaṇīyāni sarvāṇi kṛtvā prajānāti- asmādbhavāt nāsti bhavāntaramiti /
SA16hvsatssu:20433: ato jñāyate arhanneva sarveṣu karaṇīyeṣu vaśitāṃ prāptaḥ kṣayajñānenānutpādajñānena ca samanvitaḥ syāt,
SA16hvsatssu:20435: yathā kaścit jvarārto[jvarā]nudgamakāle 'pi jvarītyucyate / yathoktaṃ sūtre-
SA16hvsatssu:20437: jitvā mṛtyorhi senāñca viharāmi anāsravaḥ // iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20443: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- sarve sattvāḥ samaṃ jñānasamanvitā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20445: (u) yo jinauraso jānāti dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti /
SA16hvsatssu:20454: sūtra uktam- catuścattvāriṃśat jñānāni yaduta jarāmaraṇe jñānaṃ,
SA16hvsatssu:20464: yathoktaṃ sūtre- [tadyathā] nagarasvāmī nagare niṣaṇṇaḥ syāt /
SA16hvsatssu:20465: [tatra] kiñcit dūtayugamekasmāt dvārādāgatyopasṛtya nagarasvāmino yathābhūtaṃ vacanaṃ niryātya [yathāgatamārgaṃ] pratipadyeta /
SA16hvsatssu:20472: dūtā nānādvārebhya āgatā api ekameva sthānamupasarpanti /
SA16hvsatssu:20474: yathā rāhula ekānte niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ cintayan evaṃ prajānāti- īdṛśo dharma parikīrtitaṃ nirvāṇaṃ prati anuprayātīti /
SA16hvsatssu:20476: kiñca bhagavān dharmasyāniśaṃsāyāmāha- dharmo 'yaṃ sarvān kleśāgnīna nirodhayatīti nirodha ityucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20484: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhādayo dvārāṇi nirvāṇaparāyaṇāni bhavanti /
SA16hvsatssu:20493: (pṛ) ucyate ca jarāmaraṇasamudayaḥ jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhamārga ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:20504: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- saptasaptatijñānāni yaduta jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti [jñānam] /
SA16hvsatssu:20513: tatra kasmānnoktaṃ- jarāmaraṇasya svabhāvo nirodho mārga ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:20516: tīrthikā bahavo nidāne bhrāntā vadanti- laukikānāṃ padārthānāṃ heturlokātmaka ityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:20528: pratyutpannamatītādhvanaḥ kadācidbhinnadharma bhavati yadutātītānāṃ sattvānāmāyurapramāṇaṃ prabhāvaśca devatulya ityevamādi /
SA16hvsatssu:20529: āyurādi bhinnaṃ jarāmaraṇapratyayo 'pi bhinno bhavediti janā vadeyuriti bhītyā niyama ucyate /
SA16hvsatssu:20537: kasmāt tatra rūpasya svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya ca svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20539: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣavaḥ saptabhiḥ sthānopāyaiḥ tribhirvipaśyanārthaiśca samanvitaḥ sa kṣipramāsravāṇāṃ kṣayamanuprāpnoti /
SA16hvsatssu:20541: ityādi nidānajñānāni apramāṇaśatasahasrāṇi santi yaduta [SSS_540] cakṣurvijñānamityādi /
SA16hvsatssu:20551: yadidānīntanaṃ duḥkhaṃ pūrvatanīnañca duḥkhaṃ, sarvasyābhūtasaṃjñā pratyayaḥ /
SA16hvsatssu:20554: kāmarāgasya mithyāvitarkaḥ pratyayaḥ ityevamādipratyayānāṃ jñānamapramāṇamanavadhi svayamevonnetavyam //
